name: Bright and airy room
description:
We have a quiet and sunny room with a good view in our 3 bedroom flat. In a welcoming atmosphere, our clean and respectful flatshare is located in a leafy neighbourhood with all facilities: shops, library, cafés and bars, a swimming pools, gyms, and fantastic parks. Well connected by metro and bus with the centre: 15 minutes. For walks, we are also a 20 min stroll away from the riverside.

The space
I am living in a nice flat near the centre of Madrid (15 minutes by bus). We are relaxed, clean, and independent. The flat is located in a leafy neighbourhood with plenty of facilities: little shops, supermarkets, public library, swimming pools (covered and summer ones), tennis courts and free parking outside the flat. It is well connected by public transport (various bus and metro lines).

The room is sunny and well presented. There are two bathrooms, one of which you would share with a guest. It has triple glazing and we provide fresh bedlinen and towels, s
neighborhood_overview: We live in a leafy neighbourhood with plenty of green areas and recreational opportunities such as the library, gyms, swimming pools (covered and summer ones), and the tennis courts. Parking is free outside and it is relatively easy to park near the flat.
host_about:
EN-ES-FR
EN
Hi everybody: I'm Abdel. I'm spanish originaly from Casablanca (Morocco). I've been living for many years in Andlusian area and now in Madrid that I like very much, since 11 years. My job is related with languages and communication. I'm a quiet person. I don't smoke, and I do some sport. I like nature, painting and photography.
Please, do ask me any thing you consider useful for you. 
Kind regards.
 -----
ES
Hola chicos y chicas: soy Abdel. Soy español original de Casablanca, Marruecos. He vivido muchos años en Andalucía y ahora llevo casi 11 años en Madrid, que me encanta. Mi trabajo está relacionado con las lenguas y la comunicación. Soy una persona tranquila y algo reflexiva. No fumo, hago algo de deportes, y me gusta además de la naturaleza, la puntura y la fotografía.
En caso de necesidad, no duden en plantearme cualquier pregunta que consideran oportuna. 
Un cordial saludo.

FR
Bonjour, tout le monde,
Je suis Abdel, espagnol d'origine marocaine (de Casablanca). J'ai vécu pendant plusieurs années en Andalousie, mais maintenant je suis installé à Madrid depuis 11 ans. Je suis une personne cool et un peu pensatif. Je ne fume pas et je pratique un peu de sport. D'autre part, je suis un amoureux de la nature, la peinture et la photographie. S'il vous plait, n'hesitez pas de me poser des questions, si vous en avez besoin ...
Cordialement,

name: PISO, OPERA, MADRID, GRANDE
description:
The space
Hola soy Nacho, alquilo un bonito piso, está situado junto al Palacio Real en Madrid, ideal estudiantes o para vacaciones.
Edificio representativo de la zona, con más de 100 años de antigüedad y muy bien conservado, es un antiguo palacio.
El piso cuenta con 110 metros cuadrados, dos dormitorios muy grandes, cocina muy amplia, donde podrás encontrar todo lo necesario por si quieres cocinar, vasos, platos, cubiertos.. también hay lavadora. La vivienda también tiene un baño, un salón y un comedor.
En el piso caben unas cinco personas, dispone de dos camas 150 cm de ancho, una cama single 90 cm y un sofá cama 120 cm. Las sábanas y las toallas están incluidas en el precio. Las mascotas están permitidas. Se puede fumar en la vivienda.
Está en pleno centro de Madrid, situado en una de las mejores zonas, cerca del Palacio Real, de la Gran Vía, de la Puerta del Sol...irás andando a todos sitios! Aunque hay varias paradas de metro cercanas y varias
host_about:
Hola! somos dos chicos de Madrid,  sociables, nos encanta conocer  gente nueva y viajar por el mundo.
Nos encanta nuestra ciudad y disfrutamos mucho de ella, por eso, si necesitas alguna información estaremos encantados de ofrecértela.
Nos gustan mucho los animales,  y vivimos con un gato maravilloso. Se llama Kevin y está libre por toda la casa.

name: COZY APARTMENT CIBELES-GRAN VIA-PTA DEL SOL-CHUECA
description:
The space
Apartment, 1 Bedroom + Other (See Description), 1 Bath (Sleeps 3-4).

This charming and stylish refurbished apartment is located in well known Chueca area, the heart of Madrid, and placed in a classic historical building.
The flat comprises of 1 double bedroom-there is an additional folding bed that can be put up if required-, lounge dinner, kitchen & shower room. It's situated on the 4rd floor and is bright-overlooking the central patio-, quiet and cosy.There is elevator up to 3rd floor.
Within only a few minutes walk, you can reach the main Museums (Reina Sofía, Prado, Thyssen), the most visited and emblematic touristic sites such as the Plaza Mayor, Puerta del Sol, Palacio Real or the Gran Vía and neighbourhoods such as La Latina. There are loads of bars, restaurants, shops, theatres & cinemas around Chueca.
The apartment is well connected on public transportation. There are three underground stations from 2 minutes to 8 minutes walk

name: Habitación para féminas en el centro de Madrid
description:
Si eres mujer, en nuestra casa encontrarás un ambiente muy familiar y seguro. La habitación cuenta con muchos elementos y detalles decorativos para que te sientas a gusto (televisión, calefacción, ventilador....). El desayuno es abundante.
Yo te proporcionaré toda la información que puedas necesitar durante tu estancia e, incluso, estoy dispuesta a llevarte personalmente a los lugares de interés. Y es que nuestra casa está en pleno centro de la ciudad, a un paso de todos los lugares turísticos.

The space

Se trata de la zona más turística de la capital de España, rodeada de puntos de interés (museos, parques, cines, tiendas, restaurantes) pero en una calle pequeña y tranquila, junto a un convento del siglo XVII.La habitación no es muy grande, pero cuenta con todo tipo de comodidades: cama, armario, mesa de trabajo, bu
neighborhood_overview:
Nuestra casa está en el centro de la ciudad, a un paso de las principales zonas de interés cultural (museos, palacios, parques o monumentos), y rodeados de restaurantes, tiendas, discotecas, teatros, y numerosos medios de transporte (trenes, taxis y distintas líneas de metro y autobús).
Nuestra calle es muy tranquila y segura (estamos junto a una comisaría de policía).

neighborhood_overview: La ubicación de este apartamento es ideal para recorrer a pie los lugares de interés turístico e histórico más significativos de Madrid. Preciosas plazas como la Plaza de España, la Plaza del Callao, Ópera, la Plaza Mayor, la Puerta del Sol,... Impresionantes calles están a sólo 1 minuto como la calle de la Gran Vía y calle de la Princesa, repletas de cines, teatros y restaurantes. O la calle Preciados con multitud de tiendas de prestigio, bares con terrazas y mucha animación. Visitar los principales Museos como son El Prado, el Thyssen y el Reina Sofía o el Palacio Real. Otra opción es coger un autobús que hace recorridos turísticos por la ciudad. A sólo 200 m. empieza la Plaza de España, que a su vez es la entrada a la zona verde mayor de Madrid. A su izquierda se encuentran los 2 jardines del Palacio Real: ”Sabatini” y “Campo del Moro”, y a la derecha encuentrarás el “Templo de Debod” y el “Parque del Oeste”, donde podrás coger el teleférico desde el cual se ve Madrid desde lo alto

It has 2 bedrooms, one with a double bed and the other one with one single bed. The living/dining room has dining table, TV, and a comfortable sofa. A small kitchen is at one end of the common room and is equipped with a washing machine, fridge, electric stove top, microwave and a full set of dishware. The large bathroom h
neighborhood_overview:
AREA WHERE IS THE APARTMENT

The street where the apartment is located in the downtown district, the Barrio de Palacio, one of the most popular areas of the city center, as it has all the amenities and very good communication with all areas of Madrid. Very close to the Gran Via and Puerta del Sol, Madrid can enjoy on foot, without using public transportation.

Also within walking distance is the Gran Via, full of designer shops and theaters, also called Madrid's Broadway, and from there you will reach the Puerta del Sol in a moment.

From Puerta del Sol, a few minutes you reach the Royal Palace, Madrid de los Austrias and the Plaza Mayor. And also to the Barrio de las Letras and the Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofia.

The Paseo de la Castellana and the Plaza de Cibeles are a 15 minute walk from the apartment, and the Retiro Park is less than 20 minutes.

The trendiest neighborhoods of Madrid, Chueca and Malasaña, are also within 5 min

neighborhood_overview:
La Latina / Embajadores
From: https://www.timeout.com/coolest-neighbourhoods-in-the-world
Embajadores
neighbourhoods to visit in 2018
The coolest neighbourhood in the world 2018 is Embajadores, Madrid
Madrid might be the world’s most exciting capital right now, and Embajadores is its most colourful neighbourhood. This is a place where people from near and far live side by side, cooking up a bustling cultural life. To the north, Plaza Tirso de Molina is the territory of florists by day, and at night fills with young revellers queuing to get into Medias Puri, the city’s club of the moment. To the south are Tabacalera and La Casa Encendida, two huge cultural centres standing like transatlantic vessels run ashore in the middle of the city. You can dine on Indian specialities served atop a flowery oilcloth, or get a divine Moroccan lamb tagine for an absurdly low price. Nightlife and street life, street art and high culture, food and people from across the world:

Handy tourist bus stop at Gran Via Avenue. You have everything at hand. The subway i
neighborhood_overview:
The nickname -Malasaña- neighborhood will come following the street dedicated in 1879 to the family and since 1961 Malasaña young seamstress Manuela Malasaña, killed by Napoleon's troops during the days of repression subsequent to the lifting of May 2, 1808 on charges of "bear arms" to bring a sewing scissors when she was arrested. His body was buried in the Hospital of the Good Bliss on the street Silva.
At the heart of the neighborhood is Plaza Dos de Mayo, which was the former site of Artillery Monteleón, where they were quartered against "francesada" the little military force that took up arms against the Napoleonic army, under the command two captains Pedro Velarde and Luis Daoiz. In the remodeled square arch of old barracks it remains. Other typical neighborhood squares are, for example, San Ildefonso and Santa Maria Soledad Torres Acosta.
Like many other central areas of Madrid Maravillas district it has enough alternative atmosphere and nightlife. Some chroniclers hav

neighborhood_overview:
The Chueca neighborhood has become in recent years one of the most fashionable areas of Madrid. Its activity of shops, bars and cultural offer is enormous. But if it stands out for something for the visitor, it is because of the bustle of people who walk its streets.

In Chueca we find some permanently open spaces full of people, such as the plaza that gives its name to the neighborhood. We will also see fashion stores with exclusive products that are nowhere else, public markets turned into meeting places, museums, unique buildings, the occasional religious building, associations, art galleries, many bars and restaurants, and some hotels. In addition, there are underground type establishments such as tattoo shops, specialized bookstores or sex shops.

On the other hand, Chueca is one of the best-known gay neighborhoods in Europe. And a benchmark for the LGTB community (lesbians, gays, transsexuals and bisexuals) worldwide. Madrid Pride is celebrated here at the beg

name: Madrid Apartment Latina
description:
Placed right in the heart of the la Latina district, this luxurious two-bedroom duplex apartment will make you feel like at home in one of the most attractive Madrid neighborhoods.

The space
Situated right in the heart of the la Latina district, this luxurious two-bedroom duplex apartment will make you feel like at home in one of the most attractive Madrid neighborhoods. The apartment, with its distinctive modern deco and furniture, occupies the fifth floor of a recently renovated building (with elevator). It is furnished with a contemporary style and is able to lodge up to four people.

The apartment is arranged on two floors. The base floor layout consists of a master bedroom with a double bed, a full size bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and a large dining room (with two balconies overlooking old Madrid). The second bedroom is on the top floor and it has a double sofa bed.

This high standard apartment will captivate you with its good ta
neighborhood_overview: The main distinctive characteristic of this apartment is its unique location in the la Latina district (Calle Toledo 60). From here, you are at a short distance from some of the trendiest restaurants and tapas bars in Madrid. The aperitif time (noon to four, or later) during weekends and the Sunday's Rastro flea market are also an authentic experience. A few minutes away are the Royal Palace (the most outstanding monumental area in Madrid), San Francisco Church and the Cebada Square. It is also a few blocks away from Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor (north) or Puerta de Toledo (south). It is also very close to the la Latina subway station.
host_about: Originally from a small city from the north of Spain (Pamplona), I moved to Madrid for a job in 2003. Before that, I spent 6 years in the USA. Mainly in Georgia, Miami and Utah. I love traveling, exercising, yoga and partying (it would be difficult not to in Madrid...). I love this city I am sure that you will love it as much as I do!

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is next to to Puerta del Sol, right in the center of the city. It's just a few minutes away from Plaza Mayor (Major Square), where you'll find many restaurants and terraces to enjoy some tapas! If you are visiting on Christmas, you'll also see the famous Christmas Market.
Thanks to its centric location, you can go by walk to most of the main places of Madrid, such as The Real Palace, Almudena's Cathedral, Gran Vía, the museums or Sabatini Gardens. Moreover, you are surrounded by many charming places. I recommend you to visit El Botin Restaurant, the oldest restaurant in the world, founded in 1725, and just 4 minutes away from the apartment. Another lovely place is the Sabatini Terrace, where you'll find really nice views of the Real Palace and the Sabatini Gardens (it's open just in summer). description:
Emplazado en el centro histórico, este apartamento te brinda una gran oportunidad para descubrir y explorar a pie los puntos de interés más bellos de la ciudad, como la Plaza Mayor, la Puerta del Sol y sus inmediaciones, llenas de vida y color. La historia narra que en el siglo XVI este barrio era muy frecuentado por ilustres.

The space

host_about:
Hola somos Jesús&Sonia. Jesús empezó con los apartamentos desde mediados de 2010 y lo mejor ha sido poder conocer a gente de muchísimos paises, diferentes culturas, diferentes edades y diferentes condiciones. Nuestra mayor satisfacción es pensar que hemos contribuido a mas agradable su estancia en Madrid. Todos nuestros apartamentos están situados en el conocido barrio de Las Letras, uno de los mejores de la ciudad. Lleno de bonitos restauranres, excelentes bares de tapas, todos con agradables terrazas, museos, galerías de arte, tiendas, teatros.. A tan solo unos minutos andando de los principales lugares de Madrid como: el museo de El Prado, el parque de El Retiro, la Plaza Mayor, la Puerta del Sol, la Gran Vía, la Cibeles, la Puerta de Alcalá, el Palacio y el Teatro Real, la catedral de La Almudena...

Hi we are Jesús&Sonia. Jesús started renting apartments since 2010 and the best thing since then has been having the opportunity of knowing people from different countries, different cultures, different ages and different backgrounds. We like to think we´ve been a little part of making their stay in Madrid as pleasant as possible. Our apartments are located in the "Barrio de las Letras" neighborhood, one of the most nice in the city. name: 2-bedroom attic & rooftop terrace
description:
The space
JESUS DEL VALLE Apartment

Gorgeous, bright two-bedroom attic apartment with a great terrace and all the amenities. Set in a strategic location very close to Gran Vía, the main commercial and entertainment area in Madrid. This flat is perfect for couples, families or a group of friends.

FEATURES
This bright apartment outfitted with all comforts has an open loft-style living room with two single beds like sofa, connecting to a fully-equipped kitchen with all the necessary appliances to make your stay as homey as possible.
The living room also leads out to a large (20 m2) terrace, with outdoor furniture , allowing you to enjoy wonderful views of the sunset over the city rooftops and Madrid sky-line.
The apartment has a master bedroom with a double bed and another smaller bedroom with a double bed, both with built-in wardrobes.


Amenities.

4th 1/2 floor with elevator ( last 10 steps on foot), air co
neighborhood_overview:
LOCATION.
The JESUS DEL VALLE apartment is located in the heart of the Malasaña district, the alternative, bohemian neighbourhood in Madrid. It is a few steps away from Gran Vía and the calle Fuencarral, the trendy pedestrian shopping street that divides the Malasaña and Chueca districts. The neighborhood has lots of great outdoor cafés, tapas bars, Spanish restaurants, and trendy coffee shops. This area is becoming pedestrianized, so providing a unique place to stroll in this attractive and vibrant city that invites you to wander through its streets.
Public transportation is only a few meters away allowing you to easily and quickly get to all of Madrid's main tourist spots. Nearest tube stations: Gran Vía (line 1), Noviciado (line 2), Plaza de España (line 3), San Bernardo (line 4), Callao (line 5), Tribunal (line 10). It is a stone’s throw away from main historical points of interest, such as the Royal Palace & Sabatini Gardens, the Royal Opera House, and the city's two
host_about:
I'm a friendly, sociable person who is easy to deal with. I love meeting people from different countries, and helping visitors in whatever way I can to have a great time in Madrid. I've travelled around Europe, America and Asia, and speak Spanish, English (not perfect), Italian and some French.
I shared my apartment for many years with Spanish and foreign roommates, short and long term. I now rent the whole apartment, but I don't mind sharing some times.
 I love my city and I'm an expert on Madrid, its neighborhoods, buildings, history ..... and of course great places to shop, eat and go out and have fun.

neighborhood_overview:
Malasaña is to the west of Chueca and to the east of Argüelles. It is surrounded by several metro stations and is a central neighbourhood of Madrid. Residents include Esperanza Aguirre, the former Governor of the Province of Madrid, amongst other politicians and several artists. It was the center of the movida movement in late 1970s and 1980s Madrid.

Malasaña is a vibrant neighborhood full of lively bars and clubs overflowing with young people. Its streets are currently being renovated, making it a much more attractive quarter. It's one of the classic areas for partying the night away. The area's center is the Plaza del Dos de Mayo (in commemoration of a popular uprising on May 2, 1808, brutally repressed by the French troops and which started the Spanish Independence War).

The night life is diverse in Malasaña, though the most common themes are non-pretentious style places (alternative, funk, mainstream), mixed places (including many conspicuous LGBT, which hav

name: Converted theatre, historic centre
description:
Set of rooms with own bathroom (not ensuite, but near your bedroom) in large family flat in 19th century "palacete"; delicious breakfast; everything in walking distance, but quiet street. No extra costs (apart from airbnb's!)

The space
Exceptional set of rooms available in our flat. Delicious continental breakfast included and served; varied from day to day according to your preferences.
The flat is very large and right in the heart of old Madrid, on a quiet side street just down from Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor. Nearest metros: Tirso de Molina and Sol. The building is a mansion (small palace) from 1840 which was a theatre for a time and was completely restored to the mid 19th century style eighteen years ago. There is WiFi. The rooms which are exclusive to you are dotted around the flat and your bathroom is close to your bedroom but not ensuite. The bedroom, unlike your sitting room, is not large, but has everything you need: it's quiet, has a Europe
neighborhood_overview: This is the heart of old Madrid. We have Plaza Mayor, Sol, La Latina, the 3 great art galleries all right on hand, as well as about 500 restaurants within walking distance!
host_about: Although I'm English, I've been living in Spain (Barcelona and Madrid) for half my life, so that must make me "bicultural"! I hosted for a few years, enjoyed it, and am returning to it after  a work-related break. I love the opportunity it gives, as a host, to meet the widest range of people, with all sorts of interests and profiles. Madrid is a great place for a holiday - it can be as relaxed (all-day tapas, siestas) or as lively (bars & clubs everywhere, except for my street fortunately) and as cultural (I'm really close to the 4 major galleries) as you like. And for football aficionados,  well, it's obvious! I would be delighted to give as much or as little guidance as you want to have. Come & stay!

Carabanchel is one of the most authentic districts of Madrid. With an estimated population of 270,000, it is one of the most extensive and populated areas of the capital. Located between the M-30 and the M-40, it is formed by the neighborhoods of Comillas, Opañel, San Isidro, Vista Alegre, Puerta Bonita, Buena Vista and Abrantes.

We are in Abrantes, a vibrant area mainly residential, with many shops and a few traditional bars and restaurants.

We are only 3km away for the Windbona wind tunnel, the best skydiving location in Madrid and award winning Isla Azul shopping mall where you can find all kind of restaurants, shops, supermarkets and cinema.

host_about:
Soy una persona tranquila, amante de la calma y el orden. Me gusta cocinar, la jardinería y disfrutar de la vida junto a mi familia y amigos.

neighborhood_overview:
The nickname -Malasaña- neighborhood will come following the street dedicated in 1879 to the family and since 1961 Malasaña young seamstress Manuela Malasaña, killed by Napoleon's troops during the days of repression subsequent to the lifting of May 2, 1808 on charges of "bear arms" to bring a sewing scissors when she was arrested. His body was buried in the Hospital of the Good Bliss on the street Silva.
At the heart of the neighborhood is Plaza Dos de Mayo, which was the former site of Artillery Monteleón, where they were quartered against "francesada" the little military force that took up arms against the Napoleonic army, under the command two captains Pedro Velarde and Luis Daoiz. In the remodeled square arch of old barracks it remains. Other typical neighborhood squares are, for example, San Ildefonso and Santa Maria Soledad Torres Acosta.
Like many other central areas of Madrid Maravillas district it has enough alternative atmosphere and nightlife. Some chroniclers hav
host_about:
Somos una familia que ha decidido unirse a la ECONOMIA COLABORATIVA, la cual contribuye a disminuir los gastos de ambas partes. 
Trataremos de hacerte sentirte comodo. Mi casa y mi familia, son lo más importante de mi vida y te invitamos a formar parte de ella. Astor, Mauro y yo podemos orientarles en su visita a Madrid. name: Beautiful cozy loft madrid center
description:
The space
Beautiful,couzy and fully refurbished apartment in lavapies, a very exciting neighborhood of Madrid, the place is perfect for 2. people, very lighted and all commodities. 2 min To the metro, very quite at night.
Grocery stores, fresh food markets, cafes and other amenities within walking distance. Around the corner from the Reina Sofia museum, a short walk to the Prado museum and the Retiro park. Situated in the Lavapies, an amazing mutli-cultural and multi-generational neighborhood that is home to a number of great Senegalese, Indian as well as Spanish restaurants. Lavapies is host to a number of art galleries and independent arts organizations such as La Casa Encendida and La Tabacalera. La Tabacalera, an abandoned tobacco factory, has a DIY bike workshop, skate park, art gallery, community garden and DJ collective which spins on Sunday afternoons throughout the year. If you are interested in contemporary art, music and a vibrant community atmosphere then t
neighborhood_overview: Lavapies is a vibrant neighborhood with a lot going on both day and night, have seen a very multitude of dining options, hindu, Moroccan, African, and of typical bars and taverns all Spanish regions .. you can ask me about places for tapas, or well eat like gentlemen .. there are places for everyone.But Do not forget if you want to have the party at home I have a almost professional chef to go to your house and cook!
host_about:
Airbnb es para mi la plataforma perfecta para viajar en su sentido mas amplio, descubrir como las gentes de otras culturas y paises decoran sus propias casas, tambien  la mejor manera o una de ellas para tener la oportunidad de socializar con las gentes de  esos lugares. Como host, tanto como puedo me gusta estar presente e implicarme en la experiencia de mis guest, si la oportunidad lo requiere y el tiempo me lo permite compartire al maximo la experiencia con mis invitados! 

Airbnb is the perfect platform for me to travel in the broadest sense, discover how people of other cultures and countries decorate their houses, also the best or one of them to have the opportunity to socialize with the people of those places. As host, much as I can I like to be present and to engage in the experience of my guest if required opportunity and time permits I will share the moments with you!

CASA ARCO CUCHILLEROS-BOTIN.

Situated in one of the most emblematic streets in Madrid, Cuchilleros Street and close to the Arco Cuchilleros from the most famous Plaza in Madrid, La Plaza Mayor, this apartment offers you a truly authentic "madrileño experience", with its great location.

Cuchilleros Street is located below the Plaza Mayor. It is a street where you can find bars and restaurants nestled in real caves, which provide a unique and evocative atmosphere, that accompanied by a traditional very good gastronomy, get transport you to another world, another time.

neighborhood_overview:
NEIGHBOURHOOD & LOCATION:

Here in the heart of Madrid’s city centre you are surrounded by a taste of grocery stores, tapas bars, like the great famous Mercado de San Miguel and lots of conveniences.

This is the "Los Austrias Neighbourhood" Sol district, bordering with La Latina Neighbourhood with the Cava Baja Street or Las Letras neighbourhood with Huertas Street and Plaza de Santa Ana.

You are under less 1 minute to the Plaza Mayor and 5 minutes walk you arrive at Palacio Real, Opera or to the Km 0 at Puerta del Sol; the centre of Madrid and, in fact, the centre of Spain.

The apartment is also very close to the Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofia museums, and the Botanic Gardens, Retiro Park, Gran Via, Cibeles Square and the Almudena Cathedral, as well as many theatres, cinemas, restaurants, tapas bars and only 5 minutes to El Rastro, the the very famous market situed in the streets during sundays mornings.

name: Quiet duplex apartment in Lavapiés
description:
The space
The apartment.
I offer a duplex apartment in a picturesque building in the central district of Lavapies. A short walk from the most renowned museums (Reina Sofia, Prado, Thyssen), next to Metro and Atocha train station.
In addition to its central location, the place is very quiet and peaceful.
It has a double bed as well as a double sofa bed. The kitchen is well equipped with oven, hob, microwave and extractor fan. Also, a brand new washing machine is installed in the bathroom. Heating is central. You will find everything you need for a comfortable stay (sheets, towels, dishes, utensils, etc.).
The building is a former industrial building that was completely refurbished by 1990, so the flats within are all very original.
If you are coming with children, be aware that the flat is on a second floor, the property has no lift and there are two floors inside the house, so it may not be suitable for very young kids.
neighborhood_overview:
Once in the area, you will find a mix of old (probably, in all senses) neighborhood and a lively multicultural environment. You can find a number of traditional bars, modern style cafeterias for a drink or a nice dinner with music, an oversupply of Indian restaurants, or supermarkets and grocery stores open late if you prefer to cook at home. However, none of the rumors from the neighborhood reach the house because it is oriented toward the interior of the property, away from the noise of the street.
Parking on the street is strictly under payment, although there are several public car parks within walking distance.
You have the subway one block from home, several bus lines and train stations at a few minute walk, so that all of Madrid will be less than half an hour away, either walk or by public transport (according to Hall, one of the best in the world).
Therefore, you will be amidst the bustle of the city and at the same time, and a minute after in a relaxing peaceful

Espero que os guste la casa que pongo a vuestra disposición. Fue mi primera vivienda y espero que la disfrutéis tanto como yo lo hice mientras viví en ella.

description:
SUPERHOST!
You will be very welcome to this sunny loft apartment in the heart of Madrid, MALASAÑA . Central area, very close to Gran Via. Air conditioning. WIFI
This amazing apartment has plenty of light and space arranged over 38 sq meters with original beams.
PERFECT FOR COUPLE GETAWAYS!

The space
Brigth studio in the “best Hipster neighborhood” Malasaña. Central area 5 min walking to Gran Via and Puerta del Sol.
This amazing apartment has plenty of light and space , and it has just been renovated.
All windows have outdoor shades to prevent light or noise.
Original paintings and one of my fashion photographs ( lips) and a good selection of art books and magazines are provided in the library. Natural plants and flowers..
Non smoking place.
100% recycled materials, both in toilet paper, garbage bags and napkins. By trying to consume only the necessary energy and water, we contribute to the environment.

Gues
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located right in the middle of Madrid's central district in what is known as Madrid's Soho ( MALASAÑA neighborhood ). One block away from the busy San Ildefonso square. This is without a doubt one of the trendiest, most exciting areas of this incredibly vibrant city. The area has innumerable shops, bars, cafes, restaurants, galleries, theaters, etc literally at your doorstep.
The building is a protected historical building from 1890, in a lovely small street boasting heaps of character! The space is very bright and sunny and even though it's centrally located it is very quiet and peaceful.
host_about:
Mi name is Al. I am a professor at the university  in ESDMadrid and a profesional photographer for over 30 years. Through my work I have had the opportunity to travel a lot around the world, and get to know and enjoy different cultures and meet great people all over.
I have  converted my photography and portrait  studio to be used as a self catering loft, with everything you may need. You will be able to sense how this wonderful space is definitely special! 
My own apartment, where I life, is in the same building, so I am always available if there is anything you need or if you have any question. That is very practical because I can always take care of your luggage in case of an early check-in or late check-out.
I am in love with Madrid, and I would be delighted to welcome  & help you to discover Madrid. Its culture, museums, shopping, leisure, and gastronomy.

description:
Este céntrico, y cómodo apartamento de 75 m2 se encuentra en Opera, en el barrio de Madrid de los Austrias-Palacio.

Su situación es inmejorable con vistas a la plaza de la Opera. El apartamento es de una habitación espacioso y agradable.
A 2 mins está el metro Opera y a 5 mins el de Sol, y a solo 20 minutos andando de los museos del Prado, Thyssen y Reina Sofia.

En planta 5ª SIN ascensor. WIFI Fibra 600mg

The space
En Plaza de la Ópera, en Madrid de los Austrias, que es una excelente ubicación para conocer Madrid.

El apartamento consiste de una zona de salón con sofá-cama, televisión y mesa para comer, de una cocina equipada .
También dispone de un dormitorio con una cama de matrimonio y cuenta con un baño completo.

A unos minutos andando de Sol, Gran Vía ... En el corazón del Madrid de los Austrias, junto al Palacio Real, Teatro Real, la Casa de la Ópera, la Catedral, jardines históricos, Ayuntamiento,
neighborhood_overview:
BARRIO PALACIO
Palacio es un barrio repleto de grandiosos edificios históricos de Madrid. Los concurridos bares de tapas copan los soportales de la Plaza Mayor, que data del siglo XVII. El Palacio Real de Madrid, del siglo XVIII, es famoso por el suntuoso mobiliario y los jardines paisajísticos. En el Teatro Real, del siglo XIX, se ponen en escena representaciones de ópera y danza. Cerca de allí, los escalones de la catedral barroca de la Almudena son un lugar de reunión popular para ver la puesta de sol.

MADRID
La ciudad de Madrid, capital de España, es una las ciudades que se está convirtiendo en un destino turístico muy atractivo para los turistas tanto españoles como internacional en los últimos años.

The space
Beautiful apartment in the neighbourhood ‟Barrio de las Letras”, right in the cultural centre of Madrid. It is situated on the street Huertas, just a few minutes away from Puerta del Sol, Prado Museum, Gran Vía... It is well connected and really close to the Atocha Train Station that, at the same time, is the high speed train (AVE) station, a metro station and a bus station.
To rent for days, weeks or months. Located in downtown Madrid is a good option to sleep for a short stay in Madrid, just 10 minutes walk from the main monuments like the Royal Palace, the Cathedral, the Plaza Mayor and the Prado Museum.
The LETRA O has an area of 37 m2 and is characterized by its wide independent bedroom with two single beds. It is equipped with two big wardrobes that work as a dressing room, a bathroom with shower and a kitchen-cum-living room facing a wide interior patio. It is a really quiet and bright apartment, decorated in green, grey and black colours.
host_about:
Hola somos Jesús&Sonia. Nuestra mayor satisfacción es pensar que hemos contribuido a mas agradable su estancia en Madrid. Todos nuestros apartamentos están situados en el conocido barrio de Las Letras, uno de los mejores de la ciudad. description:
En una de las calles mas prestigiosas del maravilloso Bº Salamanca se encuentra, en la última planta de un edificio moderno y muy seguro, esta propiedad, que cuenta con una bonita terraza, 2 habitaciones, 2 baños, cerca de los museos más importantes, Parques etc y el centro histórico de Madrid y a un paso de la Calle Serrano, llena de tiendas, supermercados gourmet, orgánicos y ecológicos y los mejores restaurantes de la ciudad etc.

The space
Junto a la prestigiosa calle Velázquez, famosa en todo el mundo por sus grandes boutiques, se encuentra este luminoso y elegante apartamento de 110 metros cuadrados.
En el corazón de la Milla de Oro de Madrid se encuentra este encantador apartamento. Está en un edificio moderno cerca de 'Serrano Street'.
 
Junto a la calle 'José Ortega y Gasset', famosa a nivel mundial por sus boutiques y nombres de los diseñadores más exclusivos del mundo, ya pocos minutos de los mejores centros comerciales del Barrio de Sa
neighborhood_overview:
Se puede caminar hasta el impresionante "Parque del Retiro" donde se puede hacer footing, patinar, andar en bicicleta o simplemente un bonito paseo en barca por el lago.
La calle Jorge Juan tiene tiendas, cafés y restaurantes muy de moda en la ciudad y muy lindos.
Es un barrio muy seguro y tranquilo.

You can walk to the amazing “Retiro Park" where you can enjoy jogging, rollerblading, biking or just a nice promenade. Jorge Juan street has very cute shops, cafes and restaurants.
It is a extremely safe and peaceful neighbourhood.
host_about:
Hola, soy Marta! 
Alquilo un piso en una de las zonas más bonitas de Madrid, el maravilloso Barrio de Salamanca. Me encanta este barrio, donde vivo desde que era muy pequeña. 

Me encanta viajar,leer, hacer deporte y hacer planes con mi familia, los fines de semana ir al campo, salir a cenar con amig@s,, etc.

He vivido en Londres y me encanta esa ciudad y me gusta conocer gente de diferentes culturas y paises. Soy una persona extrovertida, ordenada, familiar y amiga de mis amigos.

Espero que nos conozcamos pronto y podais disfrutar de Madrid!!

Saludos
Marta

description:
The space
The apartment is located in a quiet street behind the world known modern art gallery ,Reina Sofía Museum, where you can enjoy Picasso's Guernica and many other famous pieces. It is also at a walking distance from Atocha railway station, Museo del Prado and the big park of Retiro . The surrounding neighborhoods are Lavapies and Barrio de las Letras part of the city's old town. Although it is at a walking distance from the main touristic areas, the apartment is in a quiet and safe area that makes it perfect to travel with family and kids.
Has two bedrooms, master bedroom with a double bed and the second with 2 single beds. There is a third double pull out sofa/bed as well in the living room. The independent kitchen has everything you will need for a comfortable stay in the city. It has a full bathroom with a shower. 40m2.
Towels and linen are provided.
Taxi, metro train and bus directly from the airport at 5 mn distance.

name: Direct to Plaza Mayor!
description:
Nice place completely renewed in an historical building. At the very heart of Madrid, with all the monuments and places of interest at walking distance. Ideal for a city trip

The space
Willing to experience Madrid in its very core ? Why not stay in the Plaza Mayor, the real heart of the city ? The apartment gives to one of the world’s most beautiful and astounding view. Alexandre Dumas, when travelling to Spain, wrote that the Plaza Mayor is "the coliseum which has the most beautiful vault and the best painted one I ever saw". This vault being of course the sky of Madrid.

Guest access
You will enjoy a very cosy and nice place which permits to enjoy your stay in Madrid. The double bedroom at your disposal has its own bathroom en suite. As one of the guests reported : « The beautiful view of the Plaza Mayor and its bustling crowd contrasted nicely with the remarkable private cozy quiet in the suite ». Continental breakfast is served in the li
neighborhood_overview:
In all regards, the Plaza Mayor is ideally located to visit the City as every interesting monuments or sightseeing are situated nearby, like the Royal Palace, the Golden Art Triangle (Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofia), as well as nice shopping areas.

The neighbourhood also provides any type of restaurants and bars, or the well-known Mercado de San Miguel (San Miguel Market) were any kind of typical Spanish food is served.

It provides also excellent connections with tube stations and with the airport or the train station Atocha.

And any tips on the city, or on bars and restaurants is more than willingly given! Anyway, once you make your reservation, I send you all the information you might need, with a personal A-Z Guide of Madrid...

When visiting a city, nothing better than being nearby everything worth seeing and resting afterwards in a nice atmosphere.
host_about:
Hi, I'm glad to welcome you to my apartment in Plaza Mayor, Madrid. 

I am originally from Belgium, French speaking, but living in Spain for ten years. Being here is a great pleasure and I enjoy the city a lot. I like sightseeing and I will be very happy to give you any information regarding its history and places to see... and of course I can give you nice tips on restaurants and other places to go out at night.

I like travelling and meeting new people is always a pleasure. 

Very much into arts en general, litterature as well as good music... 

Hope to welcome you very soon,

Leaving with my wife and 3 kids since 17 years in Amsterdam. 
Actually my mom is the one who is staying at my flat, she enjoys the company of her friends, excellent cook, and reader addict. Scrabble champ without dictionary. Enjoying her free time as she is a retiree.
She is sharing the flat with an American English Teacher. He is an extraordinary handyman with computers. Also her best friend of the past 30 years is also part of the group.

 If you would like to feel at home and same time have the chance to meet people of different culture and environment, this is your home.

My mom born in the Philippines, spent several years in the US, west and east coast. And have stayed for the past 40 years  in Madrid, where we grew up.

name: COZY APARTMENT MADRID MALASAÑA
description:
The space
Perfectly situated apartment to discover Madrid, and located in one of the most animated and wellknown neighbourhoods: Malasaña. A few minutes walk to other main areas like Gran Via, Sol, Plaza Mayor and Paseo del Prado (also known as the museum street).

The accommodation is a cozy place, where you can still enjoy some elements of the old building as are the wooden beams, the balconies and the patio. It has a comfortable bedroom, living room with sofa-bed, tv, wi-fi, hi-fi, dining area, bathroom with shower and fully equipped kitchen.

The neighborhood - Malasaña - is known for its alternative scene and nightlife and many people compares it with Camden Town in London, the East Village of New York or the Bairro Alto in Lisbon.Located between Chueca and Arguelles district, Malasaña was the center of the social movement called Movida Madrileña in the 70s and 80s.

Nowadays the streets are full of people of all ages and styles, and has
host_about: ¡Hola! Somos una pareja a la que nos encanta disfrutar del centro de Madrid así como de la oferta cultural y de ocio que ofrece. Según creció nuestra familia tuvimos que renunciar a vivir en el centro pero mantuvimos sendos apartamentos para poder compartirlos con huéspedes a los que nos encanta recibir y ofrecerles la mejor experiencia de lo que supone vivir en esta bonita ciudad.

Room in madrid center very close to the Atocha railstation and to Anton Martin subway station. host_about:
Hola soy Antonios, vengo de Chile pero vivo en España hace mas de 11 años, hablo ingles y un poco de frances e italiano. Yo estuide Historia y Antropologia pero ahora tengo un bar en el centro de madrid. Soy una persona sociable y que pasa bastante tiempo fuera de casa, me encanta el arte, la literatura y la musica, de hecho a avces hago de dj.  He viajado mucho, aunque menos de lo quisiera, por Europa, Mexico, Sudamerica, Marruecos y lo que queda.
MI estilo de hospedaje es bien relajado, no tengo horarios ni restricciones solo respeto y buen rollo.  Nada mas, les espero con los brazos abiertos.

Creative and cosy flat in Madrid in multicultural Lavapiés neighborhood.

The space

Welcome to Madrid!

After 10 minutes walking from the Atocha station or freshly jumped out of the Metro( line 3 or 1) in just one or two minutes by walk you'll reach the 40mq apartament, located in an antique typical spanish yard.
We offer you a comfortably-sized studio for one up to two guests with clean look and fresh decor.

Living area, open fully equipped kitchen, basic bathroom with shower, dressing room with closet, cozy double bed in attic, reachable with wood stairs.

host_about:
We are a Miguel & Iaia, a musician and a photographer truly and deeply in love with Madrid.

Miguel is born in the sunny Mallorca, but he lives in Madrid since twelve years, professionally working as music perfomer and composer. He plays chess, he collects old music instruments and  vintage jazz vinyls.
Iaia is based since eight years in Madrid where she works as art-director and freelance photographer. She's a foodie for passion, probably because of the italian blood, she collects herbs, spices and old recipes books. She is a craftaholic and DIY philosopher.

Ideal place to visiting and enjoying Madrid walking from his historic center ! Located in a quiet street in the center of Madrid, a place with cultural and touristic interest, in the area there are museums, theatres, shops and bars with terraces.

The space
Beautiful apartment on two levels in central Madrid. Placed in the neighborhood “Lavapiés -Embajadores” next to the famous "Art Walk" where the Madrid's most important museums like the Museum of Prado, Reina Sofia and Thyssen Bornemisza. A few meters from the “Reina Sofía Museum”, the National Filmotheque "Cine Doré" and the lively street Argumosa with summer terraces.

The apartment is located in a quiet street, no bars, but with traditional shops and fresh food markets in a few meters. In this zone there are a lot of restaurants, coffe shops and tapas bars.

This nice appartment is an ideal place to stay while visiting and enjoying Madrid from his heart and historic centre, walking along
host_about:
I love travelling, meeting people from all over the world, the movies, animals ( specially dogs) enjoying nice people and being happy!

As a host, what I hope the most is that my  guests leave the place having had a  happy stay and of course, that they'll come back!!

My favorite quote "LIVE AND LET LIVE" :)


--------------------------------------------------------

Me encanta viajar, conocer gente de todo el mundo, ir al cine, los animales, especialmente los perros; disfrutar de la buena gente y ser feliz !!

Como anfitriona, lo que más deseo es que los huéspedes de mi apartamento se vayan contentos  y por supuesto, que vuelvan !!!

Mi frase favorita   " VIVE Y DEJA VIVIR "

neighborhood_overview:
GOING OUT

If you want to enjoy a luxurious and glamorous stay, in a nice and well connected area of Madrid, this is your apartment.

Furthermore, it is located in one of the many centers of Madrid. A short metro ride from the historic center, the apartment is a the top of Paseo de la Castellana, one of the most popular and most traditional streets of the city. The apartment is right where the imperial city meets with the new business center from Plaza Castilla and the new commercial towers.

Walking along la Castellana, which is divided into Paseo de la Castellana, Paseo de Recoletos and Paseo del Prado, we will see how the tradition coexists with current trends. From the impressive building of the National Library to the historical Cibeles, only ten minutes walk from the apartment, we arrive at the Santiago Bernabeu, the glorious Real Madrid stadium. Fashion galleries, restaurants for all tastes, outdoor terraces, typical "tapas" bars, the most exclusive
host_about:
We are a spanish family of architects and interior designers. We own several apartments in Madrid and Barcelona,  all of them are located in premium areas and are specially adapted for short term rentals for days, weeks or months. 

Our apartments are really special and are full of soul. Suitable for all those who want to enjoy their holidays, feel at home on a business trip, or take advantage of everything the city has to offer due to their exceptional location (something that students thank us a lot for). These are apartments with all the amenities, isolated from noise while being in the very center of the city. Equipped with all the necessities: from WIFI connection, essential for taking advantage of the city and planning the day before leaving home, to a wine-opener to uncork Spanish wine and savor it slowly after a long day. . .

Our way of being brings us closer to the people. We accompany them throughout the whole process, from the moment of booking until the check out. We give them advice according to their preferences and enrich their stay so they can make the most out of the city and, of course, the apartment. We keep them updated  from our weblogs on all the news, events, and dates not to be missed. We have open channels in social networks for consultation and suggestions, and they can benefit from the experience of others who have already enjoyed our services before.

Our apartments are a more human and personal alternative to hotels. The direct and constant attention, as well as a new home in the city makes us your best option.
  
Have a good trip and we hope to see you soon!!!

neighborhood_overview:
GOING OUT

The apartment is in one of several areas that make up the cosmopolitan Madrid. More specifically in the Salamanca district, an elegant and luxurious neighborhood with nineteenth century architecture, which coexists with the more typical Madrid, the Madrid of the “tapas” and the life on the streets, its friendly people, the joy and the sunshine . A neighborhood that borders the bullring of Las Ventas, located a few meters away. At the same door of the building is one of the most charismatic restaurants of Madrid, El Rincon de Jaen, where bullfighters and celebrities come together. Also, 30 meters away there are two Metro stops that connect directly with the rest of the city: Ventas, lines 2 and 5, and Manuel Becerra, lines 2 and 6. And 10 meters from the apartment you have a bus stop that also connects well with other areas of the city.

name: Fantastic Location. Great apartment, Opera
description:
This apartment has been totally renovated recently.

The space
Sunny, cozy, one bedroom apartment in the heart of Madrid (603 square feet). Walking distance to all amenities, public transportation, museums, shops, restaurants, cafes, and bars. It is located in Opera square, right on the corner of the Opera house and the fabulous Plaza de Oriente (Royal Palace Square), the most beautiful spot in the city. Apartment is on the 5th floor, has hardwood floors, a living room with a sofa and an additional sofa bed, a studio area, one bathroom, and a small, but well equiped open kitchen. Fully furnished. Elevator and doorman in the building.

This apartment is the house of a university professor working and living in the US at the moment, so the entire unit is available all year long when the owner is not there, from the end of August to mid December, and from the first week of January to the first week of May. My niece, Julia, will take care of the apartment

name: Quiet room in a terraced house
description:
The space
Private and bright room in a quiet zone very near of the centre of Madrid.
We live in Entrevías very close to Atocha, the beginning of the centre of Madrid. (15 minutes by Bus, 10 minutes by train)

Your room has a double folding bed. (very comfortable it´s not a sofa)
You have a small terrace and air conditioning in the room.
The bathroom is downstairs, and you can use it when you want.
The neighborhood is full of old houses from the 50´s (is not usual in Madrid to live in this type of building) we live in front of a sport centre so you can play Tennis, football, etc if you want it.
There are a lot of green areas in front of the house (you can see the pictures and a nice views of Madrid from there).

Bus stop just in the door of the hose (line 102 to Atocha in 10-15 min)
Train stop down the street. (5 min walking- 1 stop to Atocha 2 stops to Sol)
Night bus from 23.30. From Cibeles square (line 11)

host_about: Mi vivienda habitual es aquí en mi casa de Madrid donde trabajo eventualmente de lunes a viernes pues mi vida transcurre mucha parte del tiempo en Bilbao. Lo hago ahora con horarios flexibles, también en modo teletrabajo y participo en acciones de voluntariado con la Fundación social de mi empresa de Comunicaciones  en la que he trabajado durante muchos años como Ingeniero. En las jornadas normales, empleo parte de mi tiempo en practicar algún deporte e ir al gimnasio, asistir a cursos, hacer compras o ir al cine. Suelo ausentarme de Madrid con bastante frecuencia, aunque ocasionalmente viene a visitarme mi pareja. Me gusta leer, viajar, la comunicación 2.0, practicar la natación y correr -no más de 10 Km-. visitar museos, asistir a algún concierto o teatro o pasear con parada en un par de bares ;), lo que es fácil en Madrid para mí ya que vivo en el centro y se puede ir caminando a todas partes sin necesidad de coche. Además tengo cuatro estaciones de metro al lado de casa y otras cuatro líneas de autobús  que me dejan en un cuarto de hora en pleno casco antiguo de la ciudad, a lo que añadir biciMAD, sistema público de transporte en bicicleta eléctrica con tres aparcamientos cerca.

description:

- TV

host_about:
I like to travel around the world. We always try to stay in special spots. I hope this will be one for you!/////////////////////////
Ich reise so oft ich kann. Wir versuchen immer eine spezielle Unterkunft zu suchen. Ich hoffe ihr empfindet diese wie eine.////////////////////////
Me encanta viajar. Siempre intentamos alojarnos en sitios especiales. Espero que este lo sea para vosotros!

Soy española y alemana. Junto a mi marido y nuestras tres hijas hemos disfrutado de muchos lugares del mundo, pero sin duda los que mas nos han impactado han sido: Leh, Islas Andaman, Jaisalmer y Hampi en la India/ Jerash, Petra y Wadi Rum en Jordania/ Salar de Uyuni, Desierto de Atacama, Torres del Paine, Machupichu en Sudamérica, Zagora y Meteora en Grecia y Kathmandu en Nepal. Nuestras ciudades preferidas de Europa son: Amsterdam, Hamburgo, Roma, Edimburgo, Estocolmo y por supuesto MADRID!

Deseo que tengáis una buena estancia!

name: Chueca Secret Apartment
description:
The space
Enter this unique apartment and you are immediately hit by the richness of the interior; both its elaborate finish and the quality of the materials. Crafted wood furnishings, marble surfaces, unique art pieces – the harmony of the faux-antique style is magnificent. All of this in the heart of Chueca, the gay friendly district of Madrid, a neighborhood full of original boutiques, great bars, and restaurants. Just minutes from the most important museums and cultural landmarks of Madrid.

The apartment is located in a tradition corrala (communal interior courtyard) building that is over 300 years old. The apartment was recently remodeled using wood and marble to give it a traditional and romantic ambiance, without forgetting modern conveniences. Its third floor location allows sunlight to flood the interior and the apartment looks out over a small cobblestone street and an old, converted convent.

The apartment has a mostly open floor plan.
host_about: Hi, my name is Pedro and I’m renting out a wonderful apartment in the heart of Madrid.  The apartment provides a beautiful sanctuary in the middle of the vibrant neighborhood of Chueca.  If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me!

Hola me LLamo Tomas tengo 34 años, soy actor. Me gusta poder recibir gente y compartir mi casa con ellos para que pasen un buen momento mientras conocen Madrid. Algunos de mis trabajos son:
Tomás Pozzi tiene una amplia y variada formación artística que le ha permitido alternar el mundo del cine con la televisión. Ejemplos de su paso por el séptimo arte son "Mortadelo y Filemón: misión salvar la Tierra", "La máquina de bailar" y "Manolete", que aún está pendiente de estreno. Por su parte, las series de televisión en las que Tomás Pozzi ha intervenido han tenido gran éxito. Tal es el caso de "Los Serrano", "Aída" o "Agitación+IVA; sus apariciones en "Crónicas Marcianas" o "Channel nº4" también le dieron bastante fama. En el teatro ha trabajado en "Ultimas confesiones de copito de nieve", "Black el payaso", "Itaca", "Hamlet" y "Un sujeto". 


Hello my name is Tomas I have 34, I'm an actor. I like to receive and share my home with them to have a good time while getting to know Madrid. I'm here to help and lend a hand and what they want, tell them where to visit Madrid, to be places to go and where a good time in this beautiful city.
Some of my works are:
Thomas Pozzi has a wide and varied artistic background has allowed alternate world of cinema and television. name: ❤Quiet & Comfortable apartment **Superhost**
description:
This modernly colourful apartment is an architects jewel. You will have privacy, silence and comfort right in the middle of Madrid. It is close to museums, restaurants and subway, access it through a wine tree covered patio: Open kitchen, living room with a very comfortable sofa-bed, room with twin beds, bathroom. WiFi. Cable TV. Landline phone.

The space
This property's advantages are: Very quiet, comfortable, clean, full of light and surrounded by nature. WiFi, satellite TV and phone calls are included.

While two guests can accommodate in the bedroom's double king size bed (72in × 84in / 1.80m × 2m) - which transforms into two separate single beds -, two other guests can comfortably share the sofa-double-bed in the living room, actually it is very cozy and firm.

The apartment has a very equipped kitchen, a breakfast/bar area with high chairs and also a formal table to have a nice dinner, for up to 6 people.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located at calle Olivar, one of the most quiet streets in Lavapiés, which is a multi-cultural neighbourhood, full of exotic flavours, lively, safe, friendly, with all kinds of shops and supermarkets. Rent this self catering apartment in this exciting city and explore its artistic, architectural and gastronomic delights in style.

Alternative museums like Tabacalera, Casa Encendida, CaixaForum and Matadero are strung in a 15 minutes walk radius.
Brand new and highly recommendable is Madrid Rio: the 650 ha. large and 10 km long park alongside the Manzanares river, where cyclists and lovebirds meet skateboarders and dog-walkers.

name: Bed&Breakfast, 2 bedrooms for 3, at Latina
description:
2 bedrooms for 3 people in spacious appartment surrounded by beautiful private gardens. Close to delightful Madrid Rio leisure area. 15 min from Plaza España. Quiet and central location. WIFI. Families and kids are very welcome. Please note that every booking request will be evaluated individually.

The space
Fantastic 2 bedrooms for 3 people (one double bedroom and one single bedroom) in 100 m2 apartment in an urbanization surrounded by beautiful gardens. Very spacious and sunny, all rooms are exterior at northwest exposure.

Fully equipped for a comfortable stay and not have to worry about anything, just to enjoy Madrid.

Located in the newest city's space "Madrid Rio" right next to the Historic Town in a very quiet area called La Latina. Enjoy your stay, but you will sleep all night long.

The apartment is located on the first floor of a good residential building with porter, situated in a community surrounded by 4,000 m2 of priv
neighborhood_overview: Peaceful and well located, between gardens. Many proximity shops and nice local restaurants around. The new leisure and sports Madrid Rio is 3 min walk.
host_about:
Vivo en Madrid en el distrito de La Latina con mi familia y nos encanta viajar por España y por Europa y también hemos visitado los EEUU. 

Soy propietario de una pequeña empresa de desarrollo de software y nos gusta mucho el esquí, tenis, senderismo, el campo, la montaña, la playa, ...

Tenemos un apartamento en la estación de esquí de Piau-Engaly en Francia, otro en la Costa del Sol y otro en Madrid.

Nos gusta acomodar a familias, parejas y amigos que deseen disfrutar de sus vacaciones de forma tranquila y respetando la comunidad y el entorno. Los niños son siempre bienvenidos. 

Deseamos que nuestros huéspedes cuiden de nuestras propiedades del mismo modo que lo harían en sus propios hogares, y si surge la ocasión, estamos encantados de conocernos personalmente, y ¿porqué no? visitar su hogar en el futuro.

...

Hi there! I live in the district of La Latina in Madrid with my family. We love travelling around Spain and Europe. We have also visited the USA, and soon we will be travelling in South America.

I am the owner of a small software development company, and I like skiing, tennis, jogging and I enjoy doing nothing under the sun.

We own 3 apartments (Madrid, French Pyrinees and Torremolinos, Málaga), and sometimes we rent them to help paying the bills.

We want our guests to take care of the properties as they would in their own homes. Sometimes we meet our guests and have the opportunity to exchange houses.

name: CENTRICO EN EL BARRIO DE LA LATINA
description:
The space
Attractive studio-apartment for short term rental (days or weeks), located next to the historic Madrid de los Austrias-La Latina. The studio is calm, comfortable, fully equipped, with WiFi and decorated in a cool and modern design with a double bed and a double sofa bed in the living area.
You will be just next to Plaza Mayor, in one of Madrid's best neighbourhoods, only 5 minutes walk from Puerta del Sol and surrounded by a wide range of cultural sites, such as the Royal Palace, the Royal Theatre, Teatro Español and El Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofía museums.
A few metres away you will find the Sunday street market known as El Rastro and Cava Baja and Cava Alta streets, with internationally renowned restaurants such as the legendary Casa Lucio. You can also visit cosy affordable taverns which offer delicious 'tapas'. And if you are interested in shopping, just a short distance away you will find the commercial epicentre of Madrid: Puerta del Sol, Preci

description:
OPTIONAL PARKING SPACE!!!
NEW AIR CONDITIONING!

The space
Enjoy a silent atmosphere in this cozy apartment in a 19th century house 160 feet away from El Retiro Park. Rent a bike down the street or just enjoy a 15 minute walk to El Prado, Reina Sofía or Thyssen museums. Three minutes to Atocha Central Station, to the underground or to the Airport's Bus Stop (20 minutes to terminal 1). The apartment is in a quiet side street, ideal area to walk to the very centre of Madrid and find plenty of bars and restaurants to enjoy a drink, a romantic dinner or hunt for tapas.
This lovely house has been converted into a one space apartment, featuring an open space kitchen, dining and living area and sleeping area (double bed and a sofa where an extra person can sleep). The apartment also offers wifi and is pet friendly.

Host and hostess live next door, so keys will be handed in personally and you

name: Precioso  apartamento  céntrico  en Madrid
description:
Si eliges este apartamento para alojarte podrás disfrutar de un ambiente cómodo y acogedor en un tranquilo barrio residencial de Madrid a solo 20 minutos del centro de la ciudad.
Te estaremos esperando con café
y tés disponibles para que en tu primer desayuno te sientas como en casa.

The space
Apartamento en barrio residencial muy tranquilo ( estación de metro Barrio de la Concepción) de Madrid, muy bien comunicado, con autobuses a 100 mts. de la puerta para llevarte directamente a Gran Vía, en el centro de la ciudad .
El alojamiento dispone de plaza de parking privado incluido en el precio con acceso directo desde el portal, por si traes tu propio coche.
Próximo a las calles Arturo Soria y calle Alcalá, una de las arterias principales de la ciudad con numerosas tiendas y restaurantes donde se puede degustar la comida típica española.
A poca distancia de la M30 vía que en pocos minutos te traslada al centro de la ciudad.
2 Habi
neighborhood_overview:
El barrio en el que se encuentra el apartamento es un barrio residencial, muy tranquilo con parque y zona deportiva muy próxima, donde puedes disfrutar de pistas de paddle, tenis y piscina. Hay un pequeño parque con zona infantil y también un parque canino a poca distancia.
Si te gusta tomar el aperitivo a cinco minutos andando tienes la calle José del Hierro, donde existen numerosos bares donde sirven tapas espectaculares, pero si eres más de cafetería, tenemos la pastelería Mallorca, unas de las más prestigiosas de Madrid, a solo 50metros de casa, por las mañanas se puede oler desde la ventana los pasteles recién horneados, podrás sentarte en su terraza a disfrutar de un magnífico desayuno.
host_about:
Soy una persona inquieta, con muchas aficiones, y aunque estudié para óptico-optometrista, siempre me ha motivado la decoración y  todo lo relacionado con el diseño de interiores. Hace un par de años, decidí lanzarme a un nuevo proyecto de vida y junto con mi pareja  montamos una pequeña  empresa  donde  hacemos  desde objetos de decoración y lámparas ,a proyectos de decoración a partir de materiales reciclados.
Otra de mis pasiones son los animales, siempre he tenido mascotas, durante años he colaborado con una protectora como casa de acogida asi que el verano pasado montamos una guarderia para peludos. Los alojamos en casa y conviven con nosotros como uno más de la familia. Asi puedo compaginar mis dos aficiones favoritas, la decoración y los perros.
En mi tiempo libre me gusta viajar,  ver cine y salir con los amigos.

neighborhood_overview:
You gotta love it, Madrid’s Malasaña neighbourhood. It’s trendy and teeming with hipsters, but laid-back at the same time. A creative hub that’s always alive and kicking. From early morning to late at night, colourful Madrileños talk on street corners and walk their dogs between tattoo parlours and barbershops.

There are many reasons to love this neighbourhood. Here, our lovely Madrid local Brian lists five of them.

1.- The colourful and unpolished streets
Just navigating the streets of this neighbourhood is food for the senses. You’ll feel a local and urban vibe that’s both refreshing and inspiring. Lamp posts are covered in colourful stickers, while façades, street corners and shop shutters are clad in street art.

A large number of dogs frequent these streets, their owners enjoying the sunny weekends with cold beers and gourmet burgers at the small squares. Unpolished and authentic, Malasaña has an addictive atmosphere that will make you come bac

The space
I live in a nice flat near the center of Madrid (15 min by bus). The neighborhood is quiet, with green spaces, small shops, supermarkets, public library, gyms, swimming pools, tennis courts and free parking on the street. It is very well connected, both by public transport and if you bring your own car.

host_about:
EN-ES-FR
EN
Hi everybody: I'm Abdel. I'm spanish originaly from Casablanca (Morocco). I've been living for many years in Andlusian area and now in Madrid that I like very much, since 11 years. My job is related with languages and communication. I'm a quiet person. I don't smoke, and I do some sport. I like nature, painting and photography.
Please, do ask me any thing you consider useful for you. 
Kind regards.
 -----
ES
Hola chicos y chicas: soy Abdel. Soy español original de Casablanca, Marruecos. He vivido muchos años en Andalucía y ahora llevo casi 11 años en Madrid, que me encanta. Mi trabajo está relacionado con las lenguas y la comunicación. Soy una persona tranquila y algo reflexiva. No fumo, hago algo de deportes, y me gusta además de la naturaleza, la puntura y la fotografía.
En caso de necesidad, no duden en plantearme cualquier pregunta que consideran oportuna. 
Un cordial saludo.

FR
Bonjour, tout le monde,
Je suis Abdel, espagnol d'origine marocaine (de Casablanca). J'ai vécu pendant plusieurs années en Andalousie, mais maintenant je suis installé à Madrid depuis 11 ans. Je suis une personne cool et un peu pensatif. Je ne fume pas et je pratique un peu de sport. D'autre part, je suis un amoureux de la nature, la peinture et la photographie. S'il vous plait, n'hesitez pas de me poser des questions, si vous en avez besoin ...
Cordialement,

neighborhood_overview:
PALACE NEIGHBOURHOOD
Palacio is a neighborhood full of great historical buildings in Madrid. The busy tapas bars fill the arcades of the Plaza Mayor, which dates back to the 17th century. The 18th century Royal Palace of Madrid is famous for its sumptuous furniture and landscaped gardens. The 19th century Teatro Real stages opera and dance performances. Nearby, the steps of the Baroque Almudena Cathedral are a popular meeting place to watch the sunset.

MADRID
The city of Madrid, capital of Spain, is one of the cities that is becoming a very attractive tourist destination for both Spanish and international tourists in recent years. Beyond the monuments that can be visited in Madrid, the charm of its main squares and streets, with emblematic places such as the Plaza Mayor, Puerta del Sol or the reborn Gran Vía, is one of its main attractions. But above all, those who visit Madrid appreciate the very welcoming spirit of the city, always with a great cultural, leisure

description:

The space
I really enjoy my neighborhood here in Madrid. I feel it's one of the most dynamic, open-minded and multicultural areas in the city. If you like these things, you'll love the area (-:

General area:
The flat is in an area called Lavapies. It's near Plaza Tirso de Molina, which operates as a flower market during the day. It is in the historic center of the city, walking distance from Sol, Gran Via and Atocha (10 or 15 minutes). In fact, I walk everywhere and seldom use any form of transport at all. The area admits very little traffic as it is a no-car zone. The streets are narrow and quaint. The area is very international with a greater mix of world food than other neighborhoods.

name: Penthouse with terrace in SOL
description:
It is a charming, one-bedroom apartment with a private, exterior sunny terrace that fits four adults. It is located in a historic, but renovated, elevator building.

Our apartment is located on Calle Barcelona 7, a small pedestrian street only a few meters from the famous Puerta del Sol.

It is a charming, one-bedroom apartment with a private, exterior terrace that fits four adults. It is located in a historic, but renovated, elevator building, whose modern décor is harmonious with the building’s old features (exposed beams, wooden stairs, angled ceilings…).

The main bedroom has a double bed and a spacious built-in closet. The living room has a double sofa bed and enjoys fantastic views of Madrid from its private exterior terrace. Both the bathroom and the kitchen, which are accessed through the living room, are completely equipped.

The Puerta del Sol is a Madrid’s main tourist reference point and a must-see during your stay in Madrid. In fact
neighborhood_overview:
The Puerta del Sol is a Madrid’s main tourist reference point and a must-see during your stay in Madrid. In fact, this is the ideal departure point for any walk around the city, visit to monuments and museums, or shopping in Madrid’s commercial district any day of the year.

The apartment is located in an extremely central area that is easily accessible and has a wide variety of commercial and cultural activity in its immediate vicinity. The neighborhood is one of Madrileños’ favorites for "tapas" and is famous for its bars and restaurants, and night life, all of which you will find only steps away.
host_about:
Hi! We are Alfonso & Guillermo, from micasaisyourhouse.

I (Alfonso) started renting my apartment in Madrid years ago and I discovered a vocation: to try to make people feel like home. I've travelled a lot and I'd love that you feel that nice feeling of being like home in a strange place. 

So with my University friend Guillermo we created micasaisyourhouse and now we manage apartments in Madrid (where Guillermo lives) and Seville (where Alfonso lives). We hope you enjoy your stay with us!

See you soon!

Alfonso & Guillermo

name: Single Naranja en casa de artista
description:
1 single a 5 minutos de la estación de tren Atocha, Madrid

The space
Una habitación individual en la casa-estudio del reconocido artista Miguel Larrarte. Con una larga trayectoria a sus espaldas, el polifacético artista ofrece la posibilidad de compartir tu estancia en Madrid en su propio estudio.
Para más información sobre su obra: www.larrarte.tk

Las habitaciones son amplias y luminosas, con armario empotrado, cama, mesa de estudio y mesilla.

El piso está situado muy cerca de la estación de Atocha y del paseo del Arte (Museo del Prado. Museo Thyssen, Museo Reina Sofía, Museo Naval, Caixafórum, Botánico...). También está al lado del Parque del Retiro.

Muy bien comunicado por medios de transporte: tren, metro y múltiples autobuses.

El piso consta de un baño y un aseo.

El huésped tiene derecho en la cocina a hacer uso del frigorífico, tostadora, cafetera eléctrica y microondas.

Guest access

Metro Lavapiés.

The space
The apartment has got A/C even though the apartment its quite cool in summer. We guarantee this!!

Little but very cosy and recently refurbished apartment located in a strategic areas of Madrid, Lavapiés, in the CENTRE of the city and near the main tourist sites.
Metro Lavapiés.

The apartment is prepared for 4 persons, it is small (29sqm) but very comfortable. It has one bedroom with double bed and the living room has a double sofa bed where two more people can sleep. Check-ins late after 20h has got an extra fare of 20eur, after 22h has got an extra fare of 25eur, after 23
neighborhood_overview:
The Lavapiés-Huertas area is the most authentic of the city. Its main attractions are the typical taverns and genuine tapa bars located in a neighborhood full of cultural activity and the main centres of night life.
It is strategically located 5 minutes walking from Puerta del Sol. Santa Ana square is one of the meeting points and it is famous for its terraces. It is near the main museums and the centre of the city. Within two minutes walking distance to Metro Lavapies (Line 3 underground)
Atocha railway station is at 10 minutes walking distance. This is the main railwaystation and it can take you anywhere in Spain.

name: Nice apartment. historic center Mad
description:
I rent a cozy and spacious room for two people, bright and quiet. The house has recently been renovated. Located in the historic center of Madrid, in the neighborhood of "Las Letras", near the most important museums of the city.

The space
I rent a nice double room in my house is newly renovated with good taste, in the heart of the historic area of Madrid.
It is on a 4th floor, very sunny and quiet, fully furnished with all amenities.
The apartment (55 m2) has two bedrooms, living room, kitchen and one bathroom.
The room has 12 m2 and is also very bright, quiet and pleasant.
It is located in the center of Madrid, in the historic Barrio de las Letras, full of restaurants, nice bars and designer shops. It is 5/10 minutes walk from the Plaza Mayor, Prado Museum, Reina Sofia Museum and Thyssen Bornemisza Museum, the Botanical Garden and the Puerta del Sol, and just 10 minutes from the Parque del Retiro.
In the neighborhood have 4 metro station
neighborhood_overview:
Known as "Barrio de las Letras", it is one of the most welcoming and pleasant places in the center of Madrid.
It is within the so-called "art triangle" because the 3 most important museums of the city are here: Prado Museum, Reina Sofía Museum and Thyssen Bornemisza Museum.
In addition there are many restaurants, bars, and terraces where you can enjoy a pleasant time outdoors.
It is quiet but at the same time it has a lot of life and is full of charming corners.
host_about:
Pintora y profesora de diseño gráfico Bellas Artes.
Me encanta la música (toda, bueno casi toda) leer, ir al cine y sentarme en una terracita del barrio, (como he dicho antes, es el encantador barrio de las Letras) con mis amigos a charlar.

Una cosa sin la que no podría vivir?
VIAJAR! Lo necesito para "vivir" que diría una amiga : ) 

No tanto un lema, pero una frase que escuché a un amigo y me encantó:
"La vida es corta pero ancha"

Walking, less than 15 minutes, you can visit the “Prado National Museum”, the “Queen Sofia Art Museum”, “Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum”, the Plaza Mayor and the Royal Palace. The apartment is located in the neighborhood of Lavapies, the most typical and most authentic of all the capital.

name: Apartment in the center of Madrid
description:
The space
Fabulous apartment with 145 square meters, in a historic building from the 19th centuary, which was renovated in the year 2009. It´s perfectly located in a quiet street in the heart of the city. With living room of 55 m2 with two balconies overlooking the street.

Two bedrooms with double beds,It has an other double sofa bed and dining table for eight people, a bathroom and a toilet. Fully equipped kitchen with appliances: dishwasher, washing machine, microwave. Wi-fi and SmartTv.

It is located in a strategic position, at 2 minutes walking from Puerta del Sol, Plaza de Santa Ana, Barrio de las Letras and El Rastro. Right next to the best museums: Prado, Reina Sofia, Thyssen or Caixaforum. Perfectly located, both for shopping and to visit the best restaurants and bars downtown.

Tube nearby: Sun, Tirso de Molina and La Latina.

name: Penthouse with Stunning Balcony Near Plaza Mayor
description:
The building was constructed at the end of the 70s and has an elevator. The apartment was remodeled two years ago.
The balcony is nearly 35 sq meters (350 sq ft) and very private.

The space
The balcony has a table to enjoy eating outside.
There is an outdoor fridge and two deck chairs as well as an outdoor shower with hot and cold water (outdoor late night showers are pure pleasure).
The plants are watered automatically and regular visits (typically once every one or two weeks) by the gardener are included in the price. You won’t have to worry about a thing.
The apartment itself is small – but the cabinets were custom built in order to take advantage of every last space. The dining space is glass-walled, so that you can still enjoy the ambience of the balcony even if the weather’s bad.
Madrid to work for a few months, for this reason all the necessary accessories are available: washing machine, microwave/oven, dishwasher, electric ket
neighborhood_overview:
Right in the center of historic Madrid, next to Plaza Mayor and the Plaza de la Villa and behind the Mercado de San Miguel.
La Latina is the closest neighborhood, but Huertas is nearby and less touristy.
host_about: My name is Ana and I work as a freelance journalist, although I studied interior design. I love reading, music, art and food. Welcome to my own apartment!
