name: Single/Double private room
description:
Single/double room in cozy apartment with 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Building accesible for people with reduced mobility . WIFI.

10 minutes walk to Metro Station San Fermín-Orcasur, 20 minutes by subway to Puerta del Sol, 5 minutes walk to Caja Mágica and a metro station to Hospital 12 de Octubre.

Surrounded by extensive green areas (Parque del Manzanares), groceries, banks, cafes and bars.

The space
Single/double room for rent in a spacious apartment located in the south of Madrid, near Parque del Manzanares, Caja Mágica (Open Tennis Madrid ) and Hospital Doce de Octubre.

The bedroom is quite comfortable and bright. It has one bed (1,50 m) and a huge wardrobe. Bathroom is outside the room and like I rent a second room, in case there were other guest, you would share it with him/her.

Kitchen and living room are available to guests. Wi Fi connection, towels and bedding are included.

If you come by car or
neighborhood_overview:
The area is quiet and very suitable for sports enthusiasts. Running, cycling or walking tours are some of the activities you can practice at Manzanares Park, directly connected with Calle 30 that runs along the banks of the river, passing through El Matadero, Almudena Cathedral, Palacio de Oriente or Casa de Campo in a nice and quiet foot walk.

For tennis enthusiasts, the flat is in front La caja Mágica, which celebrates Mutua Madrileña Masters Tennis, among others sport events.

It is also near Hospital 12 de Octubre.
host_about:
Soy quien soy por las personas que me rodean y no podría vivir sin ellas a mi alrededor. Me gusta estar con gente, conversar, compartir, observar y aprender de cada una de ellas. A veces también necesito estar sóla en casa y descansar, leer, ver la televisón... pero las menos. 

Me encanta el sol y la playa y hacer deporte al aire libre. Y... me gustan las cosas sencillas. Cuando viajo, disfruto observando la cultura de la calle y busco alojarme en casas particulares o en pequeños hostales en los que pueda conocer el país y sus gentes de primera mano. 

Eso es lo que más me preocupa en la vida: ¡¡aprender para seguir creciendo!!

name: Cosy Plaza Mayor apartment in central Madrid
description:
Cosy apartment in central location.

The space
Cosy apartment centrally located metres off famous Historic Centre, San Miguel Market & Plaza Mayor. Here you will be in the centre of all that Madrid has to offer. Walking distance to shops, river manzanares, Atocha Station, Retiro, Museums - Prado, Reina Sofia.... best tapas bars and ambience around. Enjoy fantastic musicians on your very doorstep.

Great position. 5th floor apartment, no lift, renovated, appliances/ammenities. You'll be sleeping in a single bedsit area leading from lounge room. Window with fantastic views overlooking rooftops and lovely cathedral down the road. Apartment has supermarkets and markets with fresh produce, within 2 minutes walking distance. Famous Market San Miguel one of many markets to mention. Fast WIFI throughout apartment.

Excellent transport; Metro and RENFE train in Sol, Buses and Taxis all within 5 minutes walk. From airport you can take renfe train direct
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is centrally located which makes it easy to access the supermarket( 3 mins away), train station Atocha (by foot 10mins), Plaza Mayor (just down stairs and you´re already there ;-), the royal palace, plaza de sol and the opera house by foot only 10 mins walking. Also the Thyssen, Prado and Reina Sofia museums are between 15-20 min walking. Not to mention you are in the heart of a shopping district Sol, Chueca, Serrano..The district is city life but if you walk only a few steps south you will enter the district of La Latina where the grand Sunday market is held "The Rastro", there is also a Sunday market held within the Plaza Mayor square.
host_about:
Hi there. My name is Lara. I am a nurse currently working in Australia. A short time ago I purchased an apartment in much loved Madrid where I have family and friends. I enjoy a bit of travel whenever I can so far I have seen a bit of India, China, Vietnam, Thailand, Sri Lanka, Japan, Malaysia,  Spain, France, Italy, Czech Republic, London, Morrocco, Tunisia, New York, San Francisco, Mexico, Berlin, and Bali. I have used Airbnb myself in Melbourne and enjoyed the homely feel I hope to be able to provide to you.
Enjoy your stay!

Hello,

We rent our house which is located in a nice residential neighborhood, the Barrio de la Arganzuela, which has the advantage of being very quiet and yet be attached to the center of the city, so which one can walk to move it. Besides, it is very near Madrid Río, one of the best parks in Madrid to go for a ride by bike or coffee.

Moreover, is located between the metro stations of Acacias (L5) and Embajadores (L3) that also connect with the downtown area, near a gas station and two minutes from three major supermarkets. On Sundays you can walk to the Rastro, just across the street! While if you take a break, the neighborhood has a pool (on summer) and paddle court.

As for the house is a duplex with a nice double room, a toilet and a bathroom. It has air conditioning on both floors. The kitchen is equipped with everything you need to be able to cook, store food, heating or laundry. The living room has TV, you can use our wifi or

name: Luxurious Duplex (3 heights) in Sol
description:
Do you travel in a group and want to live at Km 0?

This duplex of 200 m2 distributed in 3 heights, gives you a lot of space and independence. If you travel for business you also have your workplaces ready.

When you leave the apartment you will find everything ... but, as soon as you enter the building, a haven of peace and tranquility invades you. Despite its 3 large windows to the outside, not a single noise is heard!

The space
Why choose this duplex?

To experience Madrid from the most central point. Tts location, in Plaza de Sol, means you can go anywhere on foot and the central metro and train stations are just 1 minute away, as well as buses.

So that you can enjoy the whole group together and without being overwhelmed. With a capacity for 8-10 people, this spacious apartment is distributed so that each one of you can have your own space and independence.

neighborhood_overview:
Your neighborhood; the biggest attraction for tourists

The area around the Puerta del Sol is the very center of the city. It is also one of the main places for shopping and in its bars and terraces las cañas (beers) and soft drinks follow one after another without stopping. It is the Bear and the Tree home; the symbol of the capital.

There, you can see the oldest building which is the Casa de Correos, the current seat of the Presidency of the Community of Madrid, and its clock tower in front of which hundreds of people gather every New Year's Eve to welcome the New Year with the 12 bells. Some of the most important streets in the city also end in this central square, such as Calle Mayor, Calle de Alcalá, Carretas, Arenal and your street: Calle de San Jerónimo, among others.

You can walk Preciados, the main shopping street of this area. It serves as a link between the Puerta del Sol and Callao.

name: Studio in Lavapies , Madrid
description:
Centrally located ALL INCLUSIVE studio flat in the vibrant Lavapíes district in central Madrid, South of Sol. Fully furnished with useful appliances and amenities that make this independent and quiet studio a home away from home

The space
A fully independent ALL INCLUSIVE studio flat of 32 sq. fully furnished with all amenities for bed, bath and kitchen such as Linen, Towels, Kitchen pots, glasses, microwave, dishes, cups, glasses, eating and cooking utensils, Iron, ironing board, vacuum cleaner, washing machine, clothes dryer hanger, 32 inch HD Television, ceiling fan, and all items that are needed in order to have a home away from home.

The studio flat is located in central Madrid with 3 metro stations close by in the Lavapíes neighborhood, Less than 10 minutes to Plaza del Sol, Plaza Mayor and the Royal Palace. Atocha railway station is only 15 minutes walk from the flat and all major historical landmarks and museums, are within 15 to 20 minute
neighborhood_overview: Lavapíes is in central Madrid full of life, activities, bars, theater, great places to eat, all kinds of markets, Art galleries,  museums, Royal palace, historical landmarks, the Rastro flea market, Atocha train station, Puerta del Sol.... all is in Lavapíes for you to explore and experience.  Its also called the republic of Lavapíes because of all that the neighborhood offers.
host_about:
I´m from Havana, Cuba living in Madrid and enjoying life in this great town. I enjoy traveling and discovering new places,  new people and all that the world has to offer. I like good food, cheese, Bellota ham and good wine. I enjoy all kinds of music with a focus on rock and roll, Jazz, Classical and Opera. Broadway shows are a passion and love to walk in museums, catch up on history books and reading in general is a great experience. 

Thanks to my travels and working for the travel industry for more than 36 years I have learn to appreciate the little things in life. My studio apartment I believe has all the details a traveler will like to have when they are away from their home. So do not hesitate to contact me and ask questions even if you´re not staying with me. perhaps next time you will.

name: LOVELY & BOHEMIAN IN MADRID HEART
description:
The space
My apartment measures 45 square meters, it has 1 bedroom, 1 open space with Kitchen dining room and sitting room, 1 bathroom.
The kitchen is equipped with all the necessary to eat and cook, Refrigerator, washing machine, dishwasher, microwaves, oven... There is a table with 4 chairs and 1 bed-sofa , 32 " ultra thin television, DVD, satellite TV...
The bathroom is complete of a water closet, a washbasin and a big hydro massage shower.
The general style of the apartment will be characterized by a mixture of modern and traditional... It has the wood beams of the original structure of the Building at the sight, the beautiful handicraft floor comes from Morocco, and there are two Very big windows on Travesia de los Cabestreros side and other two on the patio.
The building is a typical construction of 1864 of the Madrid’s Historic centre, it has 2 nice patios inside...
host_about:
Hey! My name is Andrea! I'm Italian but I lived 11 years in Madrid and 5 in Istanbul and some short periods in Paris, London and Barcelona so I consider myself a quite cosmopolitan person... Traveling, Gastronomy, Art, Cinema and Music are my reasons of life! 
I worked all my life with tourists and I've been continously been a tourist  myself. I love to meet always new people and when it works make friend with them. I'm on couchsurfing and in (Hidden by Airbnb) projects since many years. I like talk about everything except myself :)

Se ofrece habitación privada en piso a compartir en el centro de Madrid en una ubicación inigualable.

The space
Habitacion en Moderno y acogedor Apartamento en ubicación inigualable en el centro de Madrid! La habitación que se ofrece es la de color naranja que aparee en las fotos. Se trata de una habitación interior aislada totalmente del ruido de la ciudad, que consta de una cama de 1.50, armario amplio, mesilla de noche y cajonera alta de cuatro cajones. El escritorio que aparece en la foto ya no se ofrece, pero aun así, la casa contiene una gran mesa e comedor en la que también se puede trabajar. El apartamento consta de un espacioso y luminoso salón comedor que dispone de un sofá (en lugar de dos como aparece en las fotos), mesa de comedor para seis personas, TV plasma, reproductor DVD/Blue ray), baño y cocina totalmente equipada. “Siéntete como en casa al mismo tiempo que conoces
neighborhood_overview: Apartamento en el centro de Madrid, situado a unos pasos de la Gran Vía y desde el que podrás disfrutar dando un paseo de los principales puntos de interés turístico, zonas comerciales y de restauración de Madrid. A dos minutos de los principales teatros y cines de la ciudad, a cinco minutos de la emblemática Puerta del Sol, Templo de Debot, Plaza Callao y Plaza de Santo Domingo. Aprovecha la cercanía y no dejes de visitar los barrios de Chueca, Malasaña  y la latina. Aún así, si decides aventurarte a explorar más allá, toda la zona dispone de paradas de metro y autobús, así como un punto de información turística en la Plaza de Callao que te orientará sobre cualquier duda sobre lugares a visitar. Este apartamento está situado en la trasera del teatro Rialto, en una calle tranquila y peatonal, apartado de los ruidos propios de la ciudad.

name: Elegant & Confortable apartment in the center
description:
Situated in the exclusive neighbourhood of Barrio Salamanca, this 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom property is within walking distance of the best shops.

The space
Situated in the highly sought-after neighbourhood of Barrio de Salamanca, this property boasts one of the most exclusive addresses in Madrid, close to the Italian, Belgian and French embassies and just a short walk away from calle Serrano, the most luxurious shopping district in the city. The area has a wealth of luxury boutiques, cafés and some of the best restaurants in the Spanish capital. With the "Golden Mile" just around the corner, you can stroll down to the likes of Hermès, Armani, Gucci or Cartier in a matter of minutes. The metro stations of Lista, Nuñez de Balboa and Diego de Leon are very close by, as are buses that will take you to the Prado Museum or the Thyssen Bornemisza. A quiet neighbourhood with excellent public transport connections.

The property is accessed through communal garde
neighborhood_overview: Barrio Salamanca is considered one of the best neigbourhoods of Madrid, where all the embassies are found and most of the Embasadors live. Surrounded by boutiques such as Cartier, Hermes and Gucci it also hosts the best Restaurants and Bars making this area a haven to live in.
host_about:
Our small agency was created by two people: Karin Wallis, half English and half Swedish has lived most of her life in Madrid and Nono de Barco, 100% Sevillano down to the marrow, has lived in Seville all of his life. We created the agency as we wish to do something different: take peoples charming homes and transform them into rentals, keeping the magic and charm the owners created when they built their home but at the same time making it comfortable and adequate for our clients such as  giving them plenty of empty cupboard space,  ensuring the only food in the fridge is the one of our welcome hamper and making sure everything is working correctly and is sparkling clean so that when you arrive, the property will feel like instant home to you too. There are no two properties alike, nor are there two guest exactly alike but we do trust we will have the right home for you.

Nuestra pequeña agncia fué creada por Karin Wallis, mitad inglesa y mitad sueca ha vivido casi toda su vida en Madrid y Nono de Barco, 100% Sevillano hasta la médula, ha vivido en Sevilla toda su vida. Creamos esta empresa dado que queríamos hacer algo diferente: transformar la acogedora casa de un propietario a una propiedad para alquilar manteniendo la magia y el encanto que los propietarios metieron en ella pero a su vez adecuándola para que sea cómodo para nuestros clientes. No hay dos propiedades  iguales, ni hay dos clientes exactamente iguales pero confiamos en tener una casa de su agrado.

name: hab individual  en madrid
description:
Habitación individual en un piso tranquilo y bien comunicado

The space
Piso reformado, acogedor, luminoso , silencioso, limpio con todas las comodidades (OJO no hay ni Wi-fi ni televisión) y muy bien comunicado. Dispone de un baño con ducha y secadora de pelo, de 2 habitaciones , de una cocina con lavavajillas, horno...y de un salón muy agradable también con aire. Está a 15 min a pie de ATOCHA y del MUSEO REINA SOFIA, a 10 min del MATADERO y de MADRID RIO y a 4 paradas de metro de SOL (línea directa). Estación de cercanía a 5 min andando y el metro a 2 min. Hay numerosos autobuses para moverse a cualquier sitio de Madrid. Comunidad de vecinos tranquila. No hay ni parking (es fácil aparcarse en la calle), ni ascensor, vivo en la 4 planta. Barrio con muchas tiendas, supermercados,una lavandería a 100 metros, bares y restaurantes. Hablo también italiano y soy bilingüe francés. De hecho soy profe de francés. No se admiten animales y no se pueden hacer fiestas.

name: Cosy double room Madrid
description:
The space
I have a quiet double bedroom to rent in Madrid.
It's a double bed room. Situated in a small apartment, clean, with shared bathroom, with kitchen.
The neighborhood is well served, two metro lines, there are supermarkets, restaurants and many shops. You get to the center (Sol) by Metro in 20 minutes. You could walk to the Bernabeu stadium.
In this room you can know what is living in a typical neighborhood of Madrid.
I can also make suggestions and provide information on tourist sites.

Other things to note
El edifico cuenta con ascensor con llave, yo la proporciono, la primera vez podéis subir por las escaleras, no son muchas, o bajar yo con la llave para subir el equipaje.

Es importante avisar con más o menos exactitud la hora de llegada, para que pueda estar en el piso, entregar las llaves y explicar todo lo necesario.

name: Apartment  in the center of Madrid
description:
The space
Apartment located in the center of Madrid in a beautiful remodeled 19th century building which overlooks a small sunny plaza.
The apartment is a duplex with open floor. Both floors are connected with a beautiful staircase.
On the first floor you will find the living room with a sofa bed for two people, the kitchen and the bathroom. The rooms have large windows with a balcony facing the street.
On the second floor, 1.80 meters height, you will find the bedroom furnished with a queen size bed. Next to it there is another room with a desk. Both rooms are open in the front in order to allow the light to flow through. The rooms are connected by a hallway without a door.
The apartment is located walking distance from all cultural points of interest such as The Prado, The Reina Sofia, Thyssen Bornemisza and Caixa Forum art museums.

name: Apartment in the heart of Madrid
description:
The space
Apartment completely renovated and decorated by an interior decorator in a centenary building, in the historic center of Madrid, in a central but quiet street. The atmosphere is very nice. To visit the main tourist places it is not necessary to use public transport. A few minutes walking you will reach places such as the Plaza Mayor, the Opera House, the Puerta del Sol, the Royal Theater ... And a little further, 15 minutes walking, the Puerta de Alcalá, the Plaza de Cibeles, the Museum Thyssen, the Prado Museum… Three minutes away is the tourist neighborhood of La Latina, with its historic taverns and restaurants, and ten minutes away is the pink neighborhood of Chueca, with its atmosphere and its "march". It is located in the central hub of Madrid's public transport, several minutes from the Sol, Opera and Callao metro stations.The apartment is fully furnished with a large double bed and a sofa bed. The kitchen has a hob, microwave, fridge, dishwasher, toaster,
host_about:
Me gusta compartir experiencias con personas que les guste viajar y conocer cosas de todos los rincones del mundo. Yo misma no podría vivir sin viajar de vez en cuando, pero  con una pequeña maleta con solo lo necesario.

Mis destinos favoritos son el norte de Europa (Lucerna (Suiza), Salsburgo (Austria)…

Mis libros favoritos son aquellos con los que, además de entretenerme, enseñan algo. Mi película favorita es "Conoce a Joe Black" y mi grupo favorito es Pink Floid. Me gusta la comida latina.

Mi lema como anfitriona es: todo lo mío es tuyo.

The modern San Antón market hall is just around the corner, where you can find all kinds of delicacies and fresh food and a big supermarket.
The apartment is located right next to Chueca metro station in the heart of the district.

Fuencarral Street, one of the best alternative shopping streets of Madrid, just a few minutes walk from the apartment is located, as well as the Gran Vía, the Retiro Park, Prado Musum and Puerta del Sol, which are within walking distance in about 10 minutes.

Greetings from Madrid to everyone!!!

name: Agradable, funcional y luminoso (Tirso, La Latina)
description:
Muy agradable y funcional. Muy bien aprovechado, perfecto para una pareja. Completamente equipado. Tiene mucha luz. Acaban de terminar la reforma del edificio entero. Una corrala típica madrileña. La calle es tranquila, casi peatonal. Entre Tirso, La Latina y Lavapiés.

The space
Alquilo piso entre la Latina y Tirso de Molina, (I speak English, Je parle français, Parlo italiano)

El piso está totalmente nuevo, listo para estrenar. Tiene una habitación y un salón, una cocina y un baño con ducha.

Recién reformado, mucha luz, balcón exterior. Totalmente amueblado y equipado (lavadora-secadora, nevera, congelador), sábanas, toallas, platos y cubiertos…
No tiene aire acondicionado a pesar de que se ve en las fotos. Se quitó en el momento de la reforma en 2015por orden de la comunidad de Madrid para proteger la estética de la fachada del edificio que se calificó monumento histórico.
Se está buscando una solución autorizada para sustituir
neighborhood_overview: Es un barrio muy antigua, vivo, popular, familiar, multiétnico... con bares, teatros y restaurantes, tiendas de alimentación, zonas peatonales y placitas con terrazas.
host_about: Soy de madre francesa y padre español. Vivo en el sur de España. Soy traductora y terapeuta transpersonal. Me gusta el yoga y todo lo que conduce a una mayor expansión de la consciencia... Así como los retos que propone esta vida y reír mucho.

name: Stylish apartment in the city center
description:
Luxury and cozy apartment located in Gran Via, the most famous street in Madrid.

Known as the Broadway of the city of Madrid, Gran Via is an area that offers endless experiences, from theaters, flamenco shows, restaurants and stores of the most renown global brands.

This apartment rigorously complies with the disinfection requirements established by Airbnb as a result of COVID. For more information go to the Advanced Cleaning Guidelines at the end of the section "Other things to note".

The space
Facing a calm street, this stylish, cozy and very convenient 1-bedroom apartment for up to 4 people, is located in the heart of Madrid city centre.

It is on the 1st floor of a typical Madrilenian building from the nineteenth century. The building has been fully restored and has an elevator.

Available for short and long stays, this apartment has a contemporary atmosphere with stylish designer's furniture and contemporary pho
neighborhood_overview:
Built between 1910 and 1929, Gran Vía is Madrid’s most famous street and house of numerous restaurants, bars, all types of shops, cinemas and theaters and some of the capital's most iconic buildings.

Gran Via is one of the streets with the most exciting nightlife in Madrid, the street that never sleeps. Some of the most famous buildings in the country can be found here, such as the Metropolis building or the Carrion building with its popular Schweppes sign.

It is also one of the most important shopping streets and house of Primark’s second largest shop in the world, along with other well-known brands like Zara, Loewe, H&M, Sfera, Nike and Adidas.

There is no shortage of events at Gran Via. You can watch the Lion King, Les Miserables or simply go for a live flamenco performance; with many great restaurants in the are you can experience the authentic Spanish gastronomy or enjoy a drink in the bars or rooftops while enjoying beautiful views and its popul

name: Estudio en el Paseo del Pintor Rosa
description:
The space
This studio apartment located on the 15th floor of a stately building on Paseo del Pintor Rosales offers panoramic views of the Parque del Oeste with new, modern-style furniture. It has a queen size bed, 1.50x2m closet, TV , DVD player, sound system and wireless Internet. The kitchen features, microwave, washing machine, refrigerator, electric stove and a set of dishes and kitchen utensils. The apartment has central heating, air conditioning and a satellite dish. There is a doorman in the building. Paseo del Pintor Rosales is known by locals as one of the best places to live in Madrid (it is the neighborhood chosen by film director Pedro Almodóvar). Pintor Rosales receives this praise because of its parks, outdoor cafés, running/walking paths, and its proximity to attractions such as the Plaza de España, Palacio Real, Templo de Debod, and the Arguelles commercial district. It is safe, charming, and easy to travel in and out of given that metro stations, taxis, and

¡So welcome to Madrid! We have a lovelly city.
CharmingRents

neighborhood_overview: La historia de Madrid como núcleo urbano habitado de forma continuada tiene su inicio en el siglo IX, y está marcada por el establecimiento en ella de la corte real en 1561. El edificio del Apartamento se encuentra ubicado en uno de los barrios más antiguo de la ciudad. Este rincón del centro de Madrid estaba rodeado de una muralla que protegía la antigua ciudad medieval  de Madrid, y una de las puertas para entrar a la ciudad estaba colocada en la Plaza llamada Puerta Cerrada, a escasos metros del apartamento. En 1616 se ordena la construcción de la Plaza Mayor, que está al lado del apartamento. Un  lugar con mucho encanto, de festejos, de encuentros, de comercio, de actos religiosos, de Ceremonias Reales y fiestas Populares.  A 50 metros se encuentra el Restaurante Botin, que dispone el Certificado de los Guinnes de los Record, cómo el restaurante más antiguo del mundo. A pocos metros más, nos encontramos con el mercado de San Miguel, un mercado antiguo fusionado con lo moderno, hoy

Me gusta mucho compartir mi casa con personas de diferentes países y culturas, así aprendemos a ser más humildes, humanos, creativos y sobretodo a ser mejores personas.
Mi trabajo consiste en crear vestuario para cine, teatro y publicidad, me divierte crear personajes a través de la indumentaria así como ayudar al actor a través del vestuario a expresarse con más soltura y naturalidad.
¿La frase que mejor defina mi vida? eso es muy difícil pero hay una que me gusta mucho de Fernando Sabater "el coraje para vivir, la generosidad para convivir, la prudencia para sobrevivir".

neighborhood_overview: The history of Madrid as a continuously inhabited urban center has its beginning in the ninth century, and is marked by the establishment in it of the royal court in 1561. The apartment building is located in one of the oldest neighborhoods of the city. This corner of the center of Madrid was surrounded by a wall that protected the old medieval city of Madrid, and one of the doors to enter the city was placed in the Plaza called Puerta Cerrada, a few meters from the apartment. In 1616 the construction of the Plaza Mayor is ordered, which is next to the apartment. A place with lots of charm, celebrations, meetings, commerce, religious events, Royal Ceremonies and Popular parties. 50 meters away is the Botin Restaurant, which has the Guinnes Certificate of the Record, as the oldest restaurant in the world. name: Estudio en pleno centro de Madrid
description:
Este céntrico estudio de vigas de madera vistas y balcón exterior está en una de las mejores zonas de Madrid, a tan solo cinco minutos de La Puerta del Sol caminando, en una finca emblemática del s.XIX. Muy luminoso y silencioso, ideal para pasar unos días en la capital, rodeado de cines, teatros, museos.

The space
Estudio en pleno centro de Madrid. El estudio es muy luminoso, está reformado. Es un espacio abierto pero muy bien distribuido.Tiene un balcón exterior con compuertas de madera y climalit (recientemente instalado) que aisla totalmente del ruido de la calle. El estudio, tiene unas vigas de madera y tarima flotante que le dan mucha calidez y lo hacen muy especial. Es muy coqueto y cómodo. Cualquier duda, ponte en contacto conmigo y estaré encantada de ayudarte. La idea es, que el tiempo que estés, te sientas como en tu casa. ¡Un saludo! ¡¡Y hasta pronto!!



Está totalmente equipado con ropa de cama y menaje del hogar. Tiene wifi
neighborhood_overview: Estudio en pleno centro de Madrid. Situado en una finca emblemática de finales del s. XIX. Es una comunidad de vecinos muy tranquila. A 5 minutos de Sol, de La Latina, de la Estación de Atocha, de la Plaza Mayor, al lado del Bario de las Letras y del Madrid de los Austrias.  Es una zona inmejorable, ideal para pasar unas vacaciones en el centro madrileño rodeado de cines, teatros, museos, restaurantes, zonas comerciales, monumentos, aparcamientos públicos ... Un barrio con mucha vida.
host_about:
Soy Ana, vivo en Madrid (ciudad que me encanta) aunque soy de Sevilla.
El teatro es para mi mucho más que una profesión, me gusta en cine, bailar salsa, leer libros que me acercan a otras culturas, la gente, los gatos, las tortillas de patatas, viajar, la música...Disfruto con cosas sencillas.
Creo que el mundo iría mejor con más humanidad, que se ha de vivir y amar como si fuera el último dia, y que debemos tratar a los demás como nos gustarían que nos trataran a nosotros.
Bajo esta premisa, tengo el estudio que alquilo, tan cómodo, confortable y limpio como a mi me gustaría encontrármelo!!

neighborhood_overview:
This neighborhood is one of the most ancient and authentic of this city. Located at the heart of Madrid, today it is the most cosmopolitan and multicultural. People usually meet in some of the terraces and bars of the neighbourhood.

In front of the apartment there are several shops as well as fresh markets and supermarkets.

Nearby you can enjoy a lot of international restaurants,
specially tapas and traditional Spanish dishes. Also just minutes away there are the best theatres and musicals events.
host_about:
I welcome you to Madrid and I wish you a pleasant stay in this exciting city. As a host, I am willing to offer you my house to relax and feel comfortable after a whole day visiting the city. I treat my guests as I like to be treated when I travel.

I love cooking and the Spanish cuisine so I will gladly share my gastronomic passion with people from other countries.  I'm foodie and I am always exploring new spots and cooking delicious recipes. 

I find very enriching meeting new people and learning new things from them and, of course, offer them my knowledge and experiences.

I will help you to feel you like home in this beautiful city and I look forward to having the opportunity to meet you soon at my house!!

The space
Single bedroom with private bathroom in a large apartment in front of Parque del Oeste, in Paseo del Pintor Rosales.

Paseo del Pintor Rosales is known by locals as one of the best places to live in Madrid (it is the neighborhood chosen by film director Pedro Almodóvar). Pintor Rosales receives this praise because of its parks, outdoor cafés, running/walking paths, and its proximity to attractions such as the Plaza de España, Palacio Real, Templo de Debod, and the Arguelles commercial district. It is safe, charming, and easy to travel in and out of given that metro stations, taxis, and buses can all be found within walking distance.

Nearby places
Parque del Oeste (0 minutes) Templo de Debod (5 minutes) Argüelles metro station and commercial area (5 minutes) Plaza de España (10 minutes) Palacio Real (15 minutes)

neighborhood_overview:
The Barrio de las Letras (or barrio de Huertas) is a historic district of Madrid, famous for writers and characters from the world of culture that inhabited it since the sixteenth century (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barrio_de_las_Letras ). Miguel de Cervantes, Quevedo y Góngora, or Lope de Vega Lived in these streets. The department is located in one of those historical corralas.

It is a very quiet area a few meters from the Huertas area of Madrid with a great nightlife. Surrounded by many places to visit, Plaza de las Cortes, Plaza de Cibeles, Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, Madrid Trail, Retiro Park, Puerta de Alcala, etc. Nearby you will find many activities and attractions.

Visit to the most important Museums, Prado Museum, Thysem Museum, Caixa Forum exhibition center. Tours of the Madrid Austrias and the Borbones. Shopping in the many shops in streets surrounding the Puerta del Sol, Gran Vía Street, Calle Arenal, Calle Preciados, Calle del Carmen, Calle Mayor

There are numerous restaurants, cafes, shops (next to Calle Fuencarral), bookstores, theaters and historical buildings, it has a lot of nightlife. It is a very active neighborhood and well connected with all types of transport. It is also a very safe area.

name: El gusto por los nuevos encuentros
description:
Somos una familia,madre e hija.Vivimos en un barrio popular al sur de la ciudad de Madrid.
Disponemos de una habitación confortable uno o dos huéspedes,un cuarto de baño a compartir, cocina uso básico.
Red de transporte formidable y a mano.

The space
Piso con estancias muy luminosas,colores que le dan un toque de frescura y calidez al espacio.
Dispone de una habitación extra (4 metros aprox.) con dos camas de 80 cms, posibilidad de alojarse una persona o dos máximo,(el precio de alojamiento se aplicará por cada huésped).Ventana a patio amplio exterior (no a calle),lo que hace que sea tranquila y muy silenciosa.Un cuarto de baño para compartir con los dos miembros de la casa (Victoria y Sara).
Servicio de desayuno no incluido en el precio, wifi 24 horas,si necesitas usar el ordenador puedes hacer uso del nuestro (para búsquedas, consultas...).En estancias semanales está incluido un servicio de lavadora y planchado de ropa.Vivimos en un barrio
neighborhood_overview:
Lo cómodo de tener todo a mano,tiendas,supermercados,centro de salud,oficina de correos,biblioteca, polideportivo, metro,autobuses.
Pasar del bullicio de los coches a encontrar el silencio, adentrándote en sus extensos parques.
Ponerte en el centro de Madrid en diez minutos.
De mi barrio,me gusta mucho su gente,gentilicio vallecanos. Su carácter abierto y espíritu de unión profundo.
Su mercado con tradición y con toda su variedad,lo convierte en un referente.
Para ocio de lo que se enorgullece un vallecano es de su equipo de fútbol y su campo El Rayo Vallecano y por último el emblemático local El Hebe para tomar y comer algo con amigos y escuchar música en directo,entre otros.
host_about:
Hi I'm Victoria.Por end I rush to initiate me into the adventure of opening the doors of my house to travelers from all over the world, making available an optional private room: for a person or two.
Get to know different people, cultures, customs, different ways - interact with the traveller - it makes me more attractive to be just a simple - observer.
Live in a unique neighborhood of Madrid, located in the center of the city, with all services at hand: public transport, places to visit: museums, exhibitions, admire the architecture of some emblematic buildings, enjoy the nightlife, alternative leisure and a long etc...you just get lost a bit in this city and let yourself go.
I offer you a quiet and cosy atmosphere, close and respectful treatment.

name: Big cozy room in Atocha (2)
description:
The space
The apartment has been renovated recently, and is quite centric. Atocha train and metro Station are 5 minutes walking, and Sol and the central area is really close (plus you can see many sights of Madrid on your way). The Retiro Park is also a few minutes far away.

The room is quite big, and can host up to three people. There are common spaces for cooking, eating or just relaxing.

Perfectly communicated with the city, train and bus stations and airport, with less than 2 minutes walking from the nearest metro station. Taxi stop 5 minutes far away. The "Rastro" (second hand market) is also not far away, and there are tapas bars in the area.

We have internet connection and TV, if you want to relax on our spare room. At the moment I'm living with one of my sons there, but we are quite open and easy-going. We would love to share a coffee or beer with you!

The room can host up to two people. Coffee and tea are free for

name: BEST LOCATION IN CENTRAL MADRID SOL-MAYOR
description:
Start your day having a breakfast in Plaza Mayor, walk through Palacio Real surrounded by the most beautiful buildings on your way. Go ahead and grab some fresh fruits in Old San Miguel's market or just take a break tasting a glass of wine with some Manchego cheese.

Enjoy nightlife on your way to Barrio de Las Letras. And finally, chill out at the Arab Baths or just relax at home listening to AlGreen's!

The space
A fascinating experience in the heart of Madrid!

A charming, newly renovated apartment fully equipped with a living room with a sofa-bed, a kitchen, a bedroom and a bathroom. The place is very quiet and comfortable, organized so you may have all you need.

Guest access
Full access to all facilities!

FACILITIES

• TV
• Good quality, clean bed linen and towels
• Shampoo, shower gel & hand wash
• Air conditioning
• Heating
• Full internet/wifi access
• Hairdry
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the most exclusive and safe neighborhood in the center of Madrid.

This is the most exciting neighborhood to discover Madrid. Austrias is the place where everything happens! A quaint and safe neighborhood, with its traditional architecture and exciting nightlife, there are plenty of amazing places within walking distance: Plaza Mayor, Puerta del Sol, Royal Palace..

NEARBY

• 1 min walk to Plaza Mayor
• 1 min walk to Mercado de San Miguel
• 2 min walk to Palacio Real
• 2 min walk to la Latina
• 5 min walk to Sol - Preciados
• 10 min walk to Barrio de las Letras - Santa Ana
• 10 min walk to Gran Vía
host_about:
Hola, soy Luis, mi deseo es que tu estancia sea lo mas agradable posible y estaré a tu disposición para facilitarte todo lo que necesites para ello. 
Madrid es una ciudad llena de posiblidades de diversión, de ocio, de cultura y deporte. Estoy a tu disposición para informate de aquello que te apetezca conocer de nuestra ciudad.
Tambien me gusta salir al monte, hacer senderismo y escaladas faciles, es disfrutar de dos mundos, el bullicio y la vitalidad de una gran capital y  la paz y el reposo de los espacios naturales.

name: Madrid´s La Latina Violet Room
description:
The space
Cozy and charming room in a 65m2 apartment in La Latina zone, Madrid center, close to metro lines 1, 3 and 5. Few minutes walking from Plaza Mayor and Sol. Dozens of restaurants in one of the most important turistic zone of the city. La Latina is also known as "The Bohemian Madrid" for its concentration of great bars, pubs and restaurants. Besides, it´s the zone of the widely know flea market EL RASTRO.
The apartment has a living room, dinning zone and kitchen which you have plenty access to. You´ll have enough privacy since we´re out of the house most of time.
We hand you clean towels and sheets. The only bathroom includes a bathtub which you can use after a great tour day. We´re a little concerned about hygiene so you can use the bathroom without any worry !!!
We´re starting on this business so that we appreciate your feedback !

name: Apartamento en Malasaña
description:
I'm moving into a new flat and I'd like to offer you my lovely place right in the heart of Malasaña. It is a one bedroom apartment nicely decorated, two balconies and tons of natural light and walking distance from the interesting sites of the city.

The space
Malasaña is the place to be in Madrid, Google it and find out more about it.

License number
VT-6501
neighborhood_overview: Malasaña is one of the coolest places in Madrid and it's full of life
host_about:
Hola soy Fermín!

I was born in Seville, raised in Granada and I spent my university years in the UK. I studied Information Science and Technology at the City University of London. I have also lived in Italy and the USA for a while. 

I moved to Madrid 10 years ago because I love its vibe, its lifestyle and its people. I have lived in Malasaña in the last 8 years and in my apartment for the last 5. I'm moving into a new place and I'd like to offer my lovely apartment to travelers from all over the world. I'll be delighted if I can make your stay an outstanding experience.

Malasaña is a charming neighbourhood right in the centre of the city. You feel like you are in a small city as the streets are free of the heavy traffic the rest of the city suffers from and yet the main areas of the city are walking distance.

I am a very well traveled person myself and I hope I can help you have a nice time in the city I love.

name: PLAZA SANTA ANA
description:
The space
This apartment has an excellent location five meters far from Santa Ana

The apartment has a capacity for three people, it has a bedroom with bathroom en suite and a double bed with a small balcony overlooking an Inner courtyard. The living room has no windows, but it provides a warm interior lighting and it has air conditioner. It has a sofa bed and an open-plan kitchen equipped with al the necessary items, in addition to a small toilet.
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment has an excellent location five meters far from Santa Ana Square. Definitely it is one of the most important meeting points in Madrid. Its surroundings are the famous Huertas street, heart of Las Letras quarter, place that housed during centuries the bohemian and intellectual life in Madrid. Nowadays the neighborhood has a strong identity, and its literary past keeps written on the walls and floors of the streets, where you can read famous pieces of Larra, Cervantes, Góngora or Lope de Vega, among other genius of Spanish Literature.
It’s a charming experience to stroll around Huertas quarter, traditional corner with the typical castiza atmosphere from Madrid, with its narrow streets and old squares full of restaurants, pubs, taverns and bars to enjoy a drink with fiends. That’s why this area is one of the main meeting points of young and olds, locals and visitors, during day and nighttime. Is a wonderful sensation to sit in one of the many taverns on the area or tast
host_about:
Hola mi nombre es Pablo y os saludo desde Madrid.
Por motivos laborales durante años en mis viajes al extranjero tuve que alojarme en habitaciones de hoteles, a pesar que algunas de las ciudades que visite eran encantadoras, al llegar a mi habitación me embargaba el mismo sentimiento, regresar a mi casa.
Fue al regresar de mi último viaje, cuando me plantee dedicarme a crear espacios cómodos y acogedores, para aquellos viajeros que al visitar Madrid, se encuentren "casi" como en su casa.
Por lo que ahora de dedico a gestionar varios apartamentos tanto míos como de amigos y conocidos que han confiado en mí  y me han dejado sus apartamentos  para que se los administre con toda la confianza, ya que me avalan muchos años de experiencia. Si quieres puedo gestionar también el tuyo, con la garantía de las buenas críticas de mis huéspedes.

description:
Mi alojamiento es bueno para parejas y viajeros de negocios.

The space
This 1,022 sq.ft. apartment is on the 3th floor of a building with a lift. It has a living room, two bedrooms with en-suit bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen. It is right in the center of Madrid (the safe district of Arganzuela). The famous Atocha station is 300 yards away. There are two different subway lines and several buses within 3 minutes walk. Comfortable and located in a very safe district, it makes the perfect choice for people wishing to get to know the city.

neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is modern, calm and safe and has supermarkets and a traditional market. There is a sports centre including a gym and a swimming pool that you can use for single days at good price.
It is near the "Matadero cultural centre"
and the picturesque riverside walk "Madrid Río". There's a locomotive museum which hosts a variety of alternative markets "Mercado de motores" the second weekend of every month. The apartment is at walking distance to the main station, Atocha Station, making travel to the airport, all over the province and the country easy and efficient. It is just 5 minutes walk from the multicultural and charming area of Lavapiés, and 10 minutes walk the lively entertainment hub La Latina, host of the famous "Rastro" Flee Market on Sundays.

Man in his forties, high school teacher. I consider myself friendly, sociable and well-mannered. As a flat mate I am quiet, respectful with the other person's privacy and careful with order and cleanliness.

description:
The space
DESCRIPTION: Little but very cosy and refurbished apartment located in a strategic areas of Madrid, Lavapiés, in the CENTRE of the city and near the main tourist sites.
Metro Lavapiés.

The apartment is prepared for 3 people, it is small (29sqm) but very comfortable. It has one bedroom with double bed (queen size) and the living room has a sofa bed (2mx1m) Japanese futon kind, where one more people can sleep. The kitchen has all the necessary: fridge, washing machine, toaster, kettle and cooking utensils. The bathroom is complete with shower. The apartment has fast internet access.

Check-in late after 20h has got an extra fare of 20eur, after 22h has got an extra fare of 25eur, after 24h is 30eur.

Airport transfer service available. Ask to get more info.

The Lavapiés-Huertas area is the most authentic of the city. Its main attractions are the typical taverns and genuine tapa bars locate
host_about:
Actor y profesor de interpretación. Maestro de Educación Primaria y Secundaria. Amante de todos los deportes. Monitor deportivo de Karate y fútbol. Me gusta el cine y la lectura. Salir a la naturaleza tanto en invierno como en verano. El mar y la montaña son ambos necesarios para mi vida.
He viajado por las capitales del mundo más importantes, pero aún me quedan muchas por recorrer. El tibet es mi destino soñado. Charlar con los lugareños es la mejor forma que conozco para comprender la cultura de cada pais.
Querer es poder.

description:
Nuestro apartamento es realmente precioso. Está decorado con mimo y un toque muy vanguardista. Te sentirás cómo en tú propia casa. Aunque está en el corazón de Madrid, podrás descansar sin ningún ruido. Tiene seis ventanas, lo que permite una estupenda ventilación.
Está rodeado de teatros, cines, restaurantes y de todo el sabor del Madrid más auténtico.
Muy cerquita del apartamento hay varios supermercados incluido un CARREFUR abierto 24 horas al día y dos mercados de productos frescos.

The space
El apartamento se encuentra situado en una zona perfecta para visitar y disfrutar de los mejores lugares de Madrid, ya que se encuentra a escasos cinco minutos a pie de la emblemática Puerta del Sol. Tienen tres lineas de metro al lado del piso y una infinidad de líneas de autobús. El piso es precioso y muy cómodo con capacidad para 4 personas o 5 personas.

name: Lovely attic in Malasaña  WIFI
description:
The space
Attic on the fifth floor of a beautiful building, very near Bilbao and Tribunal metro stations (where you can get to and from the airport in about 25 mins.)
The apartment is very bright, quiet, relaxing and cosy, and has a large terrace with wonderful views. It's a great place to spend a few days exploring and enjoying Madrid.
The attic is located in the trendy Malasaña district, an attractive and lively area, hopping with bars, cafés and restaurants, and right in the heart of the city. The apartment is also just a few steps from Chueca, Madrid's center of cutting edge design as well as the city's gay mecca and site of many trendy restaurants. It is also within easy walking distance to the old historic centre, so is strategically located to tour and visit Madrid's main sights (Plaza Mayor, Puerta del Sol, the Royal Palace) and museums (the Prado, the Reina Sofía, the Thyssen).
The flat is also near the elegant Salamanca district and the Castella

name: CoV19 Free Chic & Sunny Apt. Historic District-Sol
description:
The apartment is disinfected according to the existing recommendations of the health authority. Bed linen and towels are washed according to the hygiene protocol (disinfectant + 70º celsius laundry + iron). All surfaces known as virus carriers, such as door handles, switches, kitchen utensils and all furniture, are disinfected with specific antivirus products. I provide a virus prevention set for every guest (disinfection wipes, antibacterial hygiene hand gel 30 ml, protective mask and gloves).

The space
Cozy and bright south-facing apartment, new and furnished with modern furniture, centrally located in a quiet street, behind the Plaza Mayor and just around the corner from Puerta del Sol and Plaza Santa Ana. Sunny bedroom with air-conditioned, fully equipped new kitchen with balcony, washing machine, and dryer.

The apartment is located in the historic district of Madrid, surrounded by Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, La Latina and Plaza Santa Ana. A 24-ho
neighborhood_overview:
The historic district (Sol / Huertas / La Latina) is ideal for exploring the Spanish capital:

• Most of the sights are within walking distance,
• Thriving cultural life, art galleries and the city's main museums (Prado,
Reina Sofia, Thyssen) are only a stone's throw away.
• The area is also known for its exciting nightlife, its typical restaurants,
Tapas bars and terraces known.

•Puerta del Sol > 200 m
•Plaza Mayor > 100 m
•Plaza Santa Ana > 150 m
•Mercado de San Miguel > 150 m
•Gran Vía > 400 m
•Prado Museum> 800 m
•Reina Sofía Museum > 700 m
•Thyssen Bornemisza Museum > 800 m
•Cibeles > 1,1 km
•Retiro Park > 1,2 km
•Almudena cathedral > 300 m
•Kings Palace > 350 m

The exclusive Chueca district is also nearby, where there are many bars, and offers very chic boutiques, great restaurants and cozy street cafes in its squares.

Fuencarral is a street filled with shops.
host_about: Greetings from Madrid! I've been a resident of this beautiful city for 21 years now and I still love the city. I am a young professional who likes to travel. name: CENTER just WALK & ENJOY LastMinute
description:
The space
Located in the heart of the city and within walking distance of the main monuments, museums and touristic areas. A short 3 minute walk to Gran Via, calle de Alcalá and plaza de Callao, where you will find some of the most emblematic historical buildings of the city. Also, 5 minutes away you will find yourself at Plaza de España and Puerta del Sol, the square where all Spanish roads begin, where people of Madrid meet every New Year´s Eve to welcome the New Year and where the statue of el Oso y el Madroño (the bear and the strawberry tree), symbol of Madrid is located.
A further 10 minutes walk is the Plaza Mayor. You can also walk to the San Miguel Market, el Palacio de Oriente and el Teatro Real, near the Plaza de Opera and the Plaza de las Descalzas. On Sundays, you may also visit the areas known as Lavapiés and La Latina, where you can shop at the oldest street market: El Rastro.
Beautiful newly renovated loft located in an 18th Century historical

name: MORATÍN - Cozy upscale apt museum mile AC
description:
The perfect place to have a great stay, a beautiful apartment in the best area of Madrid

The space
The perfect place to have a great stay, a beautiful apartment in the best area of Madrid. Our 5* reviews confirm that :)
We are renting this refurbished (Feb 2013), sunny, with lots of charm and super central apartment in a quiet semi pedestrian street of the magic and charming neighbourhood of Cortes. This is the perfect place if you are looking for a silent and cozy apartment to feel like home, walking distance to all the sights in Madrid: the museums, entertainment and parks... The Prado museum is just 3 minutes walk from the apartment.
The apartment is located in the third floor of a walk up building (so NO elevator, like most buildings in central Madrid, but we are always willing to help you carrying your luggage upstairs).
The apartment and all the furniture and amenities are brand new and despite of it being in a vibrant neighbourhood, the stre
neighborhood_overview:
Cortes is also known as el "Barrio de las Letras," literary Madrid. This is where Spain's most celebrated Golden Age authors - Miguel de Cervantes, Lope de Vega, Calderón de la Barca, Tirso de Molina - lived during the 17th century. Without hesitation we can say that this is the best and nicest neighbourhood in central Madrid. You’ll immediately note how elegant the neighbourhood is from an architectural standpoint. The streets radiating off its core, Plaza de Santa Ana, are packed with tapas bars and bars to hang out.
Every first Saturday of the month the Frog’s market takes place in the streets of Cortes. Retailers of the area (including designers, vintage clothes, furniture and more) participate in this monthly market.
host_about:
Hi!!

We welcome you to Spain and we wish you a good stay in Madrid!

Oscar works as a photographer and Vanessa is an actress and theatre producer (during 2017 I became mum, so I won't be doing check in's for a while). However, until some years ago Oscar was an engineer and Vanessa was a M&A lawyer. And then one day we decided to turn our lifes up side down and follow our real passions.

We are best friends and on May 2012 we decided to move forward and enroll in a small business together. Vanessa had been hosting with Airbnb for 2 years by then (renting the spare room at her place in Madrid/Milan and her apartment in Barcelona) and her experience (upgraded to Superhost in early 2011) was so positive that we decided we could also help other owners that don't live in town or don't have the time to rent their properties to travelers as you. And this is what we are doing now together. 

More about us, we love to travel: Vanessa has travelled 4 out of the 5 continents with a backpack that has been with her for 18 years now and now has enrolled in her new adventure: becoming a mum in spring 2017. Conversely, Oscar travels by bike and closer to Madrid, so as often as he can he takes his bike for a short trip in the mountains (he's really fit!). He has also spent several summers working in France. As the business grew, we took more people on board. Firstly Paula, a Venezuelan that has been living in Madrid for 11 years now, also keen on travels and on exploring new places. Paula is full of energy and we love her smiley caracter. And last but not least, Javi, whom you'll see on weekends and public holidays (and more often now that the Vanessa's baby is here!).

We are also keen in meeting new people and learning new things from them, but more importantly, we want you to feel at home at any of our apartments and that you feel that there's someone in town who cares for you:-) 

We enjoy little life pleasures like riding our bicycles or growing our small organic vegetables gardens. We like eco-friendly environments since we care a lot about our planet. 

We will help you to find you like home in this beautiful city and we look forward to having the opportunity to meet you soon!!

Oscar_ Bianca_ Javi

description:
Located between calle Velázquez and calle Lagasca, this luxury 2 bedroom apartment is ideal for those looking for a holiday retreat in the most exclusive area of Madrid.

The space
Excellently located in the heart of the Barrio de Salamanca, this two bedroom apartment is ideal for those seeking to stay in one of the most exclusive areas of Madrid. Restaurants, designer shops, tourist attractions, and an exclusive atmosphere. The streets of Serrano, Jorge Juan and Ortega y Gasset are particularly attractive if you want to visit the best designer boutiques.
A short stroll away is the impressive Plaza de Colón, the Paseo de la Castellana boulevard, and the National Library. The beautiful Retiro park (Madrid's ‘green lung') is within walking distance, and offers a peaceful haven away from the bustle of the city. This is one of the most central and better communicated areas of Madrid, with the underground network, buses and trains close by, something that those w
neighborhood_overview: This property is located in the heart of the Barrio de Salamanca, the most exclusive shopping street in Madridrio de Salamanca. This is one of the most elegant and sought-after districts of the capital, known for its aristocratic streets, upmarket hotels, excellent transport links and many high-end shops, chic cafés and restaurants. The beautiful Retiro park just a 10 minute stroll away makes this also an ideal location to go with children. All in all, unbeatable cultural options just a short distance away from the city’s historic centre and financial heart.
host_about:
Our small agency was created by two people: Karin Wallis, half English and half Swedish has lived most of her life in Madrid and Nono de Barco, 100% Sevillano down to the marrow, has lived in Seville all of his life. We created the agency as we wish to do something different: take peoples charming homes and transform them into rentals, keeping the magic and charm the owners created when they built their home but at the same time making it comfortable and adequate for our clients such as  giving them plenty of empty cupboard space,  ensuring the only food in the fridge is the one of our welcome hamper and making sure everything is working correctly and is sparkling clean so that when you arrive, the property will feel like instant home to you too. There are no two properties alike, nor are there two guest exactly alike but we do trust we will have the right home for you.

Nuestra pequeña agncia fué creada por Karin Wallis, mitad inglesa y mitad sueca ha vivido casi toda su vida en Madrid y Nono de Barco, 100% Sevillano hasta la médula, ha vivido en Sevilla toda su vida. Creamos esta empresa dado que queríamos hacer algo diferente: transformar la acogedora casa de un propietario a una propiedad para alquilar manteniendo la magia y el encanto que los propietarios metieron en ella pero a su vez adecuándola para que sea cómodo para nuestros clientes. No hay dos propiedades  iguales, ni hay dos clientes exactamente iguales pero confiamos en tener una casa de su agrado.

The space

The so called “Golden Mile”, is at the beginning of Serrano Street where the most fashionable and elegant shops in Madrid are concentrated, right next to the Plaza. Short walking distance to El Prado, Reina Sofia and Thyssen museums, Cibeles, Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, Huertas, Malasaña, Chueca……all these within a mile walk. No need for car or public transportation. It’s located right in the heart of the city, very close to all major attractions and right between the most exclusive neighborhoods in Madrid City: Salamanca and Jeronimos. They both are clean, safe and quiet at night. Nightlife is just crossing Castellana Street. The area is lively during the day as there are many restaurants, cafés, terraces, bars and shops nearby.
This architecturally protected building is from 1880. It’s quite a restored antique under its original façade.
Has five big double bedroo
neighborhood_overview:
Retiro's history has been strongly determined by the presence of the park with the same name and the railway facilities located at the south and west of this District.

Retiro Park, together with Paseo del Prado, has given its own personality to the area of Los Jerónimos, while the rest of the District is determined by Atocha Railway Station and previously also by Niño Jesús Station.

During the 20th Century, the area consolidated as residential areas for people with a growing economic power.

description:

The space
I live in the centre of Madrid, by the Plaza de España & the Gran Via. On foot, it takes five minutes to the Royal Palace, ten minutes to Madrid of the Austrias; it is a short bus ride to the Golden Mile of Art Galleries and Museums (el Prado, Thyssen etc).
By day, you can go sightseeing or shopping in Madrid, and take easy trips to the medieval towns of Toledo, Segovia and the walled city of Avila; by night, within a few minutes walk of my flat you can find a variety of cafés restaurants and tapa bars: Egyptian, Persian, Italian, Spanish of course and with different price ranges.
On the Gran Via there are theatres as well as films in original version, night clubs and pubs. A safe area with people around till the small hours
neighborhood_overview:
Vivo cerca de la Pza de España en el distrito Universidad. A 5 minutos a pie teneis el barrio de Malasaña, conocido por todos los jóvenes por su ambiente animado y bares de tapas y de música.
Para disfrutar del arte y de la historia, está mi casa a dos pasos de los monumentos históricos, palacios y también de los principales museos de arte: la "Milla de Oro" tiene 4 museos uno tras otro: El Reino Sofía, la Caixa Forum, El Museo Thysssen y el famosísimo Museo del Prado. Casi mi favorito es el Reina Sofía por la belleza de su edificio (un antiguo hospital restaurado) y sus exposiciones de arte moderna con algo para ¡todos los gustos!
Mis ventanas dan al centro cultural Conde Duque donde celebran eventos musicales al aire libre en verano, exposiciones y recitales en invierno. Ha llegado a ser una zona muy popular para todas las edades. Hay restaurantes y bares tradicionales de toda la vida y otro más modernos que invitan probar cosas nuevas.
Casi se me olvida la mayoría

name: habitación en el Centro de Madrid!

Se alquila habitación en piso en Madrid. Es en Lavapiés, 1 habitación, suelo de parquet y calefacción central. Casa con un total de 3 dormitorios + 2 baños compartidos con 2 personas que viven aquí. Respeto + Limpieza imperativa.

The space
Habitación en piso en Madrid en el animado barrio de Lavapiés, muy céntrico con muchos comercios, restaurantes, bares y cafeterías, está detrás del Museo Reina Sofía y a 10 minutos a pie del Museo del Prado. EL edificio cuenta con un conserje y está situado en la calle Dr. Fourquet, una animada calle donde la mayoría de las interesantes galerías de arte contemporáneo están. Tenemos 3 estaciones de metro cerca (Lavapies, Atocha y Embajadores, líneas 1-azul y 3-amarillas). La estación de tren Atocha Renfe también está a 5 minutos a pie y la estación de autobuses también con autobuses y trenes que van directamente al aeropuerto de Barajas. También está cerca del parque Retiro, lugar para ir a trotar o hacer un picnic o una caminat

name: Habitacion Madrid Centro (Chamberi)
description:
El piso esta situada en el barrio de Chamberi en Madrid muy cerca de la Glorieta de Quevedo. Consiste en dos habitaciones (una en que estoy yo y la otra que esta libre). Hay una cama doble en la habitación y el baño, salón y cocina están compartidos.

The space
Hola! Tengo una habitación disponible en un piso compartido. Hay dos habitaciones en el piso y una esta disponible para huéspedes. En la habitación hay una cama doble, lampara, mesilla de noche y un armario con mucho espacio para guardar sus cosas.

La cocina, el salón y el baño están compartidos y también hay una perra muy carnosa que vive allí. La zona es bastante céntrica y se puede ir andando a Puerta del Sol en 20-25 minutos o 8 minutos en el metro que esta situada a 2 minutos del apartamento. Los huéspedes tendrán su propia copia de la llave y pueden ir y venir cuando les apetezca.

A mi no me importa que sea una pareja o solo una persona que quiera ocupar la habitación pero pref
neighborhood_overview: Hay bastante movimiento en el barrio durante el dia y por la noche es mas tranquilo pero hay sitios para cenar o tomar algo. Como el apartamento esta situado en la calle principal es muy facil encontrar algo para comer o para tomar algo.

description:

https://www.airbnb.es/rooms/3939648

Airbnb es para mi la plataforma perfecta para viajar en su sentido mas amplio, descubrir como las gentes de otras culturas y paises decoran sus propias casas, tambien  la mejor manera o una de ellas para tener la oportunidad de socializar con las gentes de  esos lugares. Como host, tanto como puedo me gusta estar presente e implicarme en la experiencia de mis guest, si la oportunidad lo requiere y el tiempo me lo permite compartire al maximo la experiencia con mis invitados! 

Airbnb is the perfect platform for me to travel in the broadest sense, discover how people of other cultures and countries decorate their houses, also the best or one of them to have the opportunity to socialize with the people of those places. As host, much as I can I like to be present and to engage in the experience of my guest if required opportunity and time permits I will share the moments with you!

neighborhood_overview: Very safe area close to the Metro Callao and Gran Via, excellent nightlife, restaurants, bars, historic center of Madrid, perfect for eclectic tastes and not so much.
host_about:
Hola,

 Soy Melvin, desde hace 19 años trabajo como empresario en Madrid, es una ciudad encantadora que enamora tanto al residente como al turista que la visita. 

En Madrid encontrarás una gran oferta de resturantes, museos, tiendas, parques de atracciones, teatros, cines, te encantará. Por este motivo, gestiono apartamentos turísticos, tenemos un equipo de trabajo variado, contamos con personal que se encarga de entregar el apartamento, personal de limpieza y de lavandería, y que son parte fundamental del excelente servicio que brindamos cada día,  aportando al turismo de la ciudad, la oportunidad  de alojarse en mis apartamentos.

Uno de mis objetivos es viajar y conocer otras culturas, disfrutar de la gastronomía que ofrece el resto de Europa y su mágico encanto cultural.

Me apasiona todo lo que tenga que ver con el deporte, también disfruto de una buena película en casa con mi  familia sobre todo las comedias, pues me encanta reír. 

No me gusta preocuparme tanto por el futuro, solo intento vivir la vida, pasarlo bien y ser feliz cada día. 

Les deseo buena suerte y que disfruten de un lindo viaje a Madrid y al resto del mundo.

Para más información, no dudes en mirar los alojamientos que tenemos o puedes escribirme a través de la página de airbnb y te recomiendo el apartamento que mejor se adapte a tus necesidades.


Hello,

 I am Melvin, I have been working as an entrepreneur in Madrid for 19 years, it is a charming city that both the resident and the tourist who falls in love with.

In Madrid you will find a great offer of restaurants, museums, shops, amusement parks, theaters, cinemas, you will love it. For this reason, I manage tourist apartments, we have a varied work team, we have personnel who are in charge of delivering the apartment, cleaning and laundry personnel, who are a fundamental part of the excellent service we provide every day, contributing to the tourism of the city, the opportunity to stay in my apartments.

One of my goals is to travel and get to know other cultures, to enjoy the gastronomy that the rest of Europe offers and its magical cultural charm.

I am passionate about everything that has to do with sports, I also enjoy a good movie at home with my family, especially comedies, because I love to laugh.

I don't like worrying so much about the future, I just try to live life, have fun and be happy every day.

I wish you good luck and have a nice trip to Madrid and the rest of the world.

For more information, do not hesitate to look at the accommodations we have or you can write to me through the airbnb page and I recommend the apartment that best suits your needs.

host_about:
Somos una pareja joven, con gato.
Disfrutamos de una vida tranquila y sencilla.
De las cosas que más nos gusta en es comer,  y en este sentido disfrutamos probar sabores nuevos,  comidas diferentes.
Nos gusta  compartir con personas de diversos lugares con las que podamos aprender, crecer y viajar por el mundo a través de sus historias.
Ale, es una apasionada de las terapias alternativas, la meditación, el pensamiento positivo, el desarrollo personal y emocional. Seguro que te gustará compartir esta perspectiva de vida.
En casa hablamos Español e Inglés y Carlos además habla Francés. Quieres conocer un poco más de nosotros. No dudes en ponerte en contacto. Te esperamos.

La habitación es grande con una gran ventana y mucha luz., tiene todo lo que puedes necesitar para que tu estancia sea perfecta y te sientas como en casa, cama semidoble, armario, mesa de trabajo y silla, un espejo, estanteria con libros y guias turisticas, conexión wifi.

It is a bright apartment, clean, comfortable and very well located.
The room is big, with a window and a lot of light. It has everythin you may need to feel at home. The bed is a semi-double, there is a table and chair, wardrobe, a bookshelf with books and turistic guides, a mirror, wiffi, etc.

Guest access

neighborhood_overview:
Zona con mucho ambiente de Madrid. Llena de restaurante, cafeterías,
y todo tipo de tiendas, incluido un Corte Ingles. Hay varios supermercados cerca y uno en la puerta, asi como una panadería y pasteleria. Tambien hay un mercado tradicional donde puedes conseguir productos frescos, verduras, frutas, carne, pescados, etc.
Si eres vegetariano hay un buen supermercado vegetariano enfrente, asi como un restaurante tambien vegetariano.
Es un barrio muy tranquilo y seguro muy cerca del centro de Madrid, si te gusta caminar en 15 minutos estaras en Plaza de España, Gran Via, Palacio Real, Templo de Deboh o si prefieres coger transporte hay tres lineas de metro, 3,4 y 6 y autobuses que te llevan a todas partes.
This Madrid area is very near downtown and at the same time is a quiet and safe place where you can find restaurants, bares, supermarkets, shops and also a traditional spanish market where you can buy fresh food: fish, sea food, meat, poultry, vegetables, fr

name: Cozy apartment near Madrid airport
description:
The space
1 bedroom flat, 35 sq metres, situated on the 2nd floor (with elevator) of a 3-year-old building in the Madrid airport historical district.
Subway station 'Barajas' is 6 minutes away on foot; bus stops connecting both with the city and the airport terminals are 2 minutes away. Just around the corner there is the historical Barajas district’ square, with many local shops and bars. The flat comes completely furnished and features a fitted kitchen with all sorts of appliances and A/C. As it is oriented to the East, it has lots of light coming in from its 2 large windows, especially because there are no other buildings in front. Ceramic floors, fully equipped bathroom with large shower, electric heating, security door. It is safe and easy to park in the area for those who have a car. Perfect for 1 person or for a couple. Dishware, pots & pans, etc.; ironing table, etc. are available for the guests. Optional: bed linen and blankets.

I speak 3 languages and I love using this skill to make international guests feel more welcome to my apartment and this great city.

The space
This apartment is perfectly equipped for holidays in Madrid. It can host up to 4 people. The double bedroom leading onto a small "patio" ensures absolute tranquillity at night time. neighborhood_overview:
Lavapies is a very animated neighbourhood, with bars and restaurants (internacional and tipical). In the apartment’s street, you can find grocery stores and fruits and vegetables stores. There is a supermarkt at 150 meters.
Few meters right across the street you get one of the places of artistic interest, the Escuelas Pias building (UNED, University of distance education). Definitely it's very close to some of the places of highest cultural interest, such as the Reina Sofía Museum, the Thyssen Museum or Museo del Prado. You will enjoy the area by simply giving a walk or just taking a seat in one of the many few little bars and restaurants immediately located nearby the aparment.

My 5 flats are in the same house.
I can advise you in French, English, German, Spanish and Portuguese.

See you soon!

description:
A cozy airy room for a person who hates sharing a bathroom. This one has its own! We are in Nuevos Ministerios, the only area in the city with access to most subway lines, including the one to the airport. Downtown Madrid is at walking distance. Wifi is available.

The space
The room and bathroom are at the entrance which gives our guests a lot of independence. They do not need to worry about disturbing me.

Guest access
Guests can have access to the kitchen, of course.

Other things to note
I work both at home and out so I might need a bit of privacy. The apartment is big enough for this. When I get home from work, I'd appreciate some space, specially in the living room, my favorite place to unwind.
neighborhood_overview: The best thing about this area is that it is a real neighborhood. You have groceries shops, bakeries,  butcher's,  greengrocer's and chemist's, among other shops. You also have a big department store. You are walking distance from all the touristy sites. If you want the experience of a Spanish bar, we have one every block. Remember, a bar here is a social centre. Everybody goes to one. You have a bunch of very good restaurants, most not expensive at all.
host_about: I'm a New Yorker who's been living in Madrid for the past 25 years. I have a 24 year old daughter who lives between London and Paris. She's an artist.  I own a language school where I prepare students for all kinds of exams including Cambridge University Esol Exams. I am also a translator. I love running long distances, reading compulsively and films. I enjoy food. I have traveled in Europe, the Americas and Northern Africa. My dream is to go on the Trans-Siberian across Russia to Vladivostok, among other things. I write stories in my free time.

A spacious, superluminous and quiet apartment right in the centre of Madrid. Located at the heart of the city, Madrid de los Austrias, the oldest and most emblematic area of Madrid.
It has two ample and comfortable double bedrooms, two bathrooms, one in the main room and the second one in the corridor. And it has a spacious livingroom that can be turned into 2 separate areas one with a sofabed (wich would be the third room) and the other one with a pullout bed.

If your
neighborhood_overview:
Right on the doorstep you will find a supermarket, some awesome local markets, tapas bars, a pharmacy and all sorts of restaurants.
The Royal Theatre and the Royal Palace with its beautiful Sabatini Gardens are within 1 min (all walking distance). Also 1min to the Gran Vía with its theatres, museums and shopping areas; 5 min to Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor; tapas bar zones like Plaza Santa Ana, La Latina and Huertas.
We will be happy to give you directions to get everywhere on request. Everything is ready for you!
If you wish to visit other areas of Madrid or cities like Toledo, Segovia and Ávila, the apartment is conveniently located next to underground, bus and train stations and taxi stands.

We look forward to your visit!

description:
The space
Unbeatable location, high ceilings, comfort and space is what you'll find in this original apartment

The Mercado de San Miguel Apartment is an apartment of 85 m with personality and style in the architectural ensemble of the square, located in a building dating from the fifteenth century and renovated in 2006, while perfectly balancing modern loft concept with the classic lines of the Madrid Austrias ceilings over 4.5 meters high, wooden beams, original brick arches blend with wide spaces decorated with the latest trends.

This Madrid apartment offers a true insight into the rich past of the city; it is situated within a 16th century building and is just a stone's throw from Madrid's oldest restaurant. Original stonework features, wooden floors and the balcony outlook give this apartment an authentically classic Iberian style, which is hard to come across in modern Madrid.

Comparto mi espacio con las personas interesadas en pasar unos días en Madrid. Me ocupo de ellas en la medida de mis posibilidades procurando facilitar su estadía cómoda y agradable.
Tranquilo, alegre, positivo, apasionado por la vida. Me considero una persona espiritual, cercana al budismo. Arte, literatura, viajes, poesía, cine, magia, música, fotografía, astrología, psicología, pintura, teatro...

host_about:
Hola,

 Soy Melvin, desde hace 19 años trabajo como empresario en Madrid, es una ciudad encantadora que enamora tanto al residente como al turista que la visita. 

En Madrid encontrarás una gran oferta de resturantes, museos, tiendas, parques de atracciones, teatros, cines, te encantará. Por este motivo, gestiono apartamentos turísticos, tenemos un equipo de trabajo variado, contamos con personal que se encarga de entregar el apartamento, personal de limpieza y de lavandería, y que son parte fundamental del excelente servicio que brindamos cada día,  aportando al turismo de la ciudad, la oportunidad  de alojarse en mis apartamentos.

Uno de mis objetivos es viajar y conocer otras culturas, disfrutar de la gastronomía que ofrece el resto de Europa y su mágico encanto cultural.

Me apasiona todo lo que tenga que ver con el deporte, también disfruto de una buena película en casa con mi  familia sobre todo las comedias, pues me encanta reír. 

No me gusta preocuparme tanto por el futuro, solo intento vivir la vida, pasarlo bien y ser feliz cada día. 

Les deseo buena suerte y que disfruten de un lindo viaje a Madrid y al resto del mundo.

Para más información, no dudes en mirar los alojamientos que tenemos o puedes escribirme a través de la página de airbnb y te recomiendo el apartamento que mejor se adapte a tus necesidades.


Hello,

 I am Melvin, I have been working as an entrepreneur in Madrid for 19 years, it is a charming city that both the resident and the tourist who falls in love with.

In Madrid you will find a great offer of restaurants, museums, shops, amusement parks, theaters, cinemas, you will love it. For this reason, I manage tourist apartments, we have a varied work team, we have personnel who are in charge of delivering the apartment, cleaning and laundry personnel, who are a fundamental part of the excellent service we provide every day, contributing to the tourism of the city, the opportunity to stay in my apartments.

One of my goals is to travel and get to know other cultures, to enjoy the gastronomy that the rest of Europe offers and its magical cultural charm.

I am passionate about everything that has to do with sports, I also enjoy a good movie at home with my family, especially comedies, because I love to laugh.

I don't like worrying so much about the future, I just try to live life, have fun and be happy every day.

I wish you good luck and have a nice trip to Madrid and the rest of the world.

For more information, do not hesitate to look at the accommodations we have or you can write to me through the airbnb page and I recommend the apartment that best suits your needs.
