neighborhood_overview: All roads lead to the "Puerta del Sol" - literally. Known as "kilometro cero", because the distances of the roads of Spain are measured from here, "Puerta del Sol" not only serves as the center of Madrid, but also of the whole country.The "Puerta del Sol" is the symbol of the city and a reference for anyone visiting Madrid, as most important avenues of the capital diverge here. To the west is the "Arenal" street that leads to the Royal Theatre and the Palace of the East or the Royal Palace. If you're heading to the southwest by the main street you will find the "Plaza mayor" and the "Madrid of the Austrias". To the east, the "Carrera de San Jeronimo" will take you to the Congress of Deputies and the Prado Museum, while the Alcala street takes you directly to the "Plaza de Cibeles", "Puerta de Alcala" and the "Retiro" Park. Any of the shopping streets to the north ("Montera", "Carmen", "Preciados") end up in the "Gran Via", and crossing the street and you "Malasaña" and "Chueca". Around

Hello everyone, I hope you have an unforgettable stay in  Madrid and enjoy everything that this wonderful city offers.

neighborhood_overview:
Lavapiés is a multi-cultural neighbourhood, full of exotic flavours, lively, secure and lots of shops and supermarkets. Rent this self catering apartment in this exciting city and explore its artistic, architectural and gastronomic delights in style.

Alternative museums like Tabacalera, Casa Encendida, CaixaForum and Matadero are strung in a 15 minutes walk radius.
Brand new and highly recommendable is Madrid Rio: the 650 ha. large and 10 km long park alongside the Manzanares river, where cyclists and lovebirds meet skateboarders and dog-walkers.
host_about:
With a positive attitude, the world most probably will smile back at you.
I'm originally from Berlin, passed through New York and Hamburg, and ended up in sunny Spain - first Madrid, now Barcelona. 
My interests span from photography and vegan lifestyle to yoga and travelling. 
When outside my city, I prefer to stay at airbnb hosts, a stunningly efficient and fun way to connect and personalize one's trip.
The inside is the new outside. Detail-oriented within the big picture. Highly motivated, enthusiastic and trilingual.

host_about:
I like to travel around the world. We always try to stay in special spots. I hope this will be one for you!/////////////////////////
Ich reise so oft ich kann. Wir versuchen immer eine spezielle Unterkunft zu suchen. Ich hoffe ihr empfindet diese wie eine.////////////////////////

Soy española y alemana. Junto a mi marido y nuestras tres hijas hemos disfrutado de muchos lugares del mundo, pero sin duda los que mas nos han impactado han sido: Leh, Islas Andaman, Jaisalmer y Hampi en la India/ Jerash, Petra y Wadi Rum en Jordania/ Salar de Uyuni, Desierto de Atacama, Torres del Paine, Machupichu en Sudamérica, Zagora y Meteora en Grecia y Kathmandu en Nepal. name: THE COOL MADRID | CITY CENTRE - WIFI / AirCo
description:
Studio for 2-4 people in prime location! Stlylish decoration and quality of all the facilities and materials for a unique stay. Bright, quite and cozy in the last floor of an Art-Decó building with cultural interest (w/ elevator).
The studio has a modern and fully equipped kitchen, double bed, sofa bed and bathroom. In the heart of the most vibrant neighborhood of the city (between Chueca and Malasaña), a few minutes walk from Puerta del Sol, Gran Via, Plaza Mayor. Air Co and high speed wifi.

The space
The studio, provided with a fast-working wifi, an independent and easy-to-use heating system, A/C, measures 44m2 and it counts with different areas: a living room with sofa bed, a modern kitchen, a bedroom zone with a double bed and a spacious bathroom.
In the cozy living room you will find a comfy and large double sofa bed, a flat-screen TV 32’’ (TDT channels), DVD player, music stereo, a folding table and a coffee table.
The modern kitchen is equi
neighborhood_overview:
The studio is located in the vibrant neighbourhood (¨barrio¨) of Chueca, the most dynamic and emblematic area of Madrid.

Its optimal location allows guests to walk to the most important sights Madrid has to offer: Plaza Mayor, la Puerta del Sol, el Museo del Prado, Gran Vía just to name a few.

The property is located within Chueca, Malasaña, Tribunal, Alonso Martinez and is surrounded by art galleries, bars, restaurants, terraces, tapas bar, bohemian cafes and design shops.

Chueca is also the centre of Madrid´s nightlife, the perfect spot to enjoy the famous Movida Madrileña with its cocktails and tapas bar open all night long.

Moreover in front of the flat´s building you'll find a supermarket open till 11pm, two traditional food markets exquisitely renewed (mercados de San Antón and el mercado Barceló) and three subway stations (Chueca, Alonso Martinez y Tribunal).
host_about:
SPANISH

¡Hola! Gracias por tu visita, soy Elio!

Sobre mí, me encanta viajar, compartir y crear experiencias además de conocer nuevas culturas y sus gentes.

Tras pasar gran parte de mi vida aquí, en Madrid, me he animado a ser anfitriona para compartir los mejores secretos de esta maravillosa y encantadora ciudad con los demás viajeros.

Sigo viajando mucho (siempre que puedo) pero no os preocupéis si no estoy en Madrid porque los chicos de Housy me ayudan a gestionar el piso y se encargarán de acogeros, cuidaros y ayudaros cuando no estoy.

Gracias!

ENGLISH

Hello! Thank you for your visit, I'm Elio!

About me, I love travelling, also I love to share and create new experiences. Also enjoy discovering new cultures and new people.

After spending most of my life here in Madrid, I have decided to become a host so I can share with you the best secrets of this wonderful and lovely city with other travellers. 

I travel as much as I can but do not worry if I am not in the city while your visit, my friends of Housy help me to manage the apartment and they will take care of you and your needs while you are staying at my apartment.

Thank you!

name: Double room with private bathroom
description:
In our beautiful, spacious and cozy apartment, we have a room with private bathroom, very bright and pleasant. We are in the center of Madrid, three blocks from the main square. In middle of the Latina. Good company and good neighborhood.

The space
Our beautiful apartment in the historic district of La Latina, has a very bright room with a private bathroom with tub and sink, the toilet is outside. It is a big house of 130 square meters, with high ceilings and fully equipped. A neighborhood that offers everything you need, quiet, good environment, culture, history. La Latina occupies a large area of ​​classical Madrid, also sometimes known as the Madrid de los Austrias with which largely overlaps, and keeps a quirky own urban organization of the medieval layout, with spacious squares and narrow streets that follow the old route water.

Guest access
We can provide everything you need for traveling with children without additional cost.
neighborhood_overview:
It is a quiet neighborhood, in which you can breathe the history of most traditional Madrid . It is a green neighborhood with many parks. It has a relaxed atmosphere during the week and weekends are filled with the bustle of people coming to spend the day in taverns, terraces, streets and parks.
Variety of supermarkets nearby and the San Miguel market one minute walk.
host_about:
Una breve historia sobre mi. Nací hace 39 años en Santigo de Compostela. He vivido en muchos y diferentes lugares. Desde pequeñas aldeas de la Galicia de los años 70, hasta megaciudades de América de Norte, y en todos estos lugares he aprendido mucho y conocido a personas fantásticas. He estudiado Bellas Artes en Valencia, pero hace siete años que me instalé en Madrid, donde he vivido como empresaria y madre la mayor parte del tiempo. Me gusta mucho viajar, aunque últimamente no lo hago demasiado. Me encanta pasar tiempo con mi gente. Me gusta mi trabajo y mi empresa. Hace cuatro años descubrí el increible arte de la crianza al cual me dedico con pasión. La vida en Madrid es conquistar cada día todo aquello que te hace feliz, cada día una pequeña batalla por no dejarte nada.

A brief history about me. I was born 39 years ago in Santigo de Compostela. I have lived in many different places. From small villages of Galicia in 70s, to megacities North America, and in all these places I learned a lot and met great people. I studied Fine Arts in Valencia, but seven years ago I moved to Madrid, where I have lived as a businesswoman and mother most of the time. I like traveling, but I dont do it a lot lately . I love spending time with my people. I like my job and my company. Four years ago I discovered the amazing art of parenting to which I dedicate  with passion. Life in Madrid is to conquer each day everything that makes you happy, every day is a small battle by not leaving anything.

neighborhood_overview:
The flat is located at the heart of Madrid’s cultural, historic, artistic and retail center. Four of the city’s most prestigious art institutions - the Prado, the Thyssen-Bornemisza, the Reina Sofia Museum and the Caixa Forum exhibition space - are all within easy walking distance, making The Westin Palace, Madrid the perfect base for art lovers.

The nearby Royal Palace, Plaza Mayor and Puerta del Sol. Just a few minutes’ walk from the flat is the chic neighborhood known as the Barrio de las Letras, the streets of which are lined with designer boutiques, fascinating art galleries and trendy restaurants all waiting to be explored.

name: Sol/Gran Vía. Lo más céntrico de Madrid.
description:
No es un apartamento turístico; no se alquila por semanas o días.
SE ALQUILA MÍNIMO PARA TRES MESES, Y MÁXIMO UN AÑO.
Si tienes que residir en Madrid por un tiempo (por estudios, trabajo, etc) y necesitas un domicilio; tres meses, seis meses o un año... éste es tu hogar perfecto!
Está muy cerca de todo y tiene muy buena combinación de transporte público a todas partes, también estaciones de tren y aeropuerto.

The space
El apartamento no es apropiado para bebés o niños, y tampoco está adaptado para personas con movilidad reducida.
Consta de un dormitorio (con dos camas de 90cm.), baño con bañera, sala, cocina independiente y renovada. También dispone de un sofá-cama doble en la sala para eventuales visitas. No se hacen cargos adicionales por invitados.
Está preparado y equipado con todo lo necesario para una o dos personas. Muy confortable, agradable y en muy buen estado.
Incluido: conexión a internet wi-fi, calefacción, aire acondi
neighborhood_overview:
Es el centro-centro de Madrid. En el eje Sol - Gran Vía - Chueca.
Este es un barrio que se ha convertido en lo más apreciado de Madrid. Todos los comercios de moda, locales de restauración, etc., tienen abiertos sus establecimientos en esta zona, y aún quedan algunas pequeñas tiendas tradicionales salpicadas entre calles.
Hay un mercado en las inmediaciones (Mercado de San Antón) que ha sido rehabilitado y se ha convertido en un punto de reunión con gran ambiente.
Restaurantes, cafeterías y bares de todos los estilos, categorías y precios se encuentran por los alrededores.
host_about:
Ofrezco un sitio agradable, para que lo consideres tu hogar; muy bien situado en la ciudad, bien equipado, funcional y limpio. 
Me gusta que los inquilinos se sientan como en su casa, y cuiden la vivienda como lo harían con la suya propia.

Is situated next to the famous Golden Triangle of ART where you’ll find the most important MUSEUMS: The Prado Museum (1500 meters), Reina Sofía National Centre of Art (1200 meters) and Thyssen Bornemisza Museum (1900 meters). Royal Tapestry Factory (200 m). National Anthropology Muse
host_about: I'm the Virginia's mother, now I will take care of  the apartment. I live in Toledo but I'm from Valladolid. I am a cheerful. I truly and deeply in love with Madrid. Step long time walking with my dog, either Retiro Park or down the mountain.  I love the animals and plants. I love the world of mycology. I like meeting people and help everyone in this world.  I like cooking, especially desserts. I take my hosting in airbnb as something serious, and I only feel really happy when my guest have a good experience ENJOY MADRID!  //// Soy la madre de la Virginia, a partir de ahora yo seré su anfitriona durante su estancia en mi apartamento. Paso mucho tiempo caminando con mi perro, ya sea en el Parque del Retiro o por la montaña. Me encantan los animales y las plantas, así como el mundo de la micología. Me gusta conocer gente y ayudar a todos en este mundo. Me gusta cocinar, especialmente la repostería. name: Chambre d'hòtes au Centre de MADRID
description:
Chambre dans un appartement meublé située dans une zone centrale à proximité de tous les moyens de transport et commerces. Chambre double avec fenêtre . Cuisine équipée avec électroménager, salle de bains complète
Zone tranquille et bien sécurisée

The space
Nous louons une chambre d'hòtes pourvue d'un lit matrimonial pour un maximum de deux personnes dans un appartement meublé, avec ascenseur , dans un quartier calme et très bien desservi (bus-métro-trains). Les draps et couvertures sont fournis. Chambre bien éclairée et ensoleillée pourvue d'une grande fenêtre . Vous disposerez également d'une salle de bains avec douche, lavabo et toilettes . Les serviettes sont fournies. Pour votre tranquillité ,vous pouvez facilement vous isoler. L'appartement est très proche du Jardin et du Pont de Toledo lequel franchit le Manzanares – rivière qui traverse la ville-. Le Jardin ou Parc de Toledo est un aménagement paysager très riche et très vaste de part et d'autre du M
neighborhood_overview: Le quartier est bien situé , tranquille et sécure
host_about:
Je suis Français et vit à MADRID avec ma femme
Nous aimons faire des ballades en vélo , marcher , faire un peu de sport découvrir les splendeurs de la ville , les voyages , la musique , les bons films ....
Nous aimons le bon vin et faire quelques sorties au restaurant ( sans abus )
En tant qu'hôtes nous aimons recevoir , nous sommes sociables et à l'écoute des voyageurs

name: LIGHT, AIRY IN THE CENTER + WIFI AND A/C
description:
Located in the centre of the tipical area called Lavapies, a privilaged place to visit the old city of Madrid

The space
This apartment is perfectly equipped for holidays in Madrid. It can host up to 4 people. The spacious bathroom contains both a shower and bath. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you might require during your stay. In the sitting room there is a fold-down bed, as well as a television, a stereo-system, and a free WIFI connection.
Within 45 mins from the airport by metro, this apartment is located right beside the most distinctive of the capital's landmarks such as Puerta del Sol and the Plaza Major. The main museums are within approx.15/20 minutes walking distance.
The Lavapiés quarter is very lively, and we would readily recommend any of the typically Spanish bars and restaurants which cannot be found in the tourist guides. We speak english !!

License number
VT-7219
neighborhood_overview:
Lavapies is a very animated neighbourhood, with bars and restaurants (internacional and tipical). In the apartment’s street, you can find grocery stores and fruits and vegetables stores. There is a supermarkt at 150 meters.
Few meters right across the street you get one of the places of artistic interest, the Escuelas Pias building (UNED, University of distance education). Definitely it's very close to some of the places of highest cultural interest, such as the Reina Sofía Museum, the Thyssen Museum or Museo del Prado. You will enjoy the area by simply giving a walk or just taking a seat in one of the many few little bars and restaurants immediately located nearby the aparment.
host_about:
Freelance translator.
I am a French woman and have been living in Spain for 18 years. I know every corner of Madrid and will be happy to help you discover this beautiful city. Cultural visits, nights out, gastronomy, excursions, tell me about your plans!
My 5 flats are in the same house.
I can advise you in French, English, German, Spanish and Portuguese.

See you soon!

name: Penthouse with terrace in Atocha
description:
The space
Hi there!

We're a couple that would like to rent our penthouse for the summer. With a 30 square meter terrace and very close to the Atocha train station, the Reina Sofia Museum, the Retiro Park and the Lavapies cervezas, our place would mean a real dive into the Madrid way of enjoying life! ; )

You can cook, you can watch tv and enjoy our DVD collection, you can surf for free on internet, you can have dinner in the terrace... Of course you can sleep in our king size bed! There's is also a sofa in the living room for extra guests.

The neighborhood is safe and offers a variety of supermarkets such as Lidl, Mercadona, Ahorramás and a big typical Meat / Fish / Fruit market. Also you can find cheap tapas bar (Bodegas Rosell), a lot of southamerican restaurants (yummy ceviche from Peru, colombian arepas, etc), Thai tapas, chinese, japanese and indian food.

3 metro stops from Sol (metro Palos de la Frontera), 5 minute

name: Best Deal BRIGHT PICASSO SUITE SOL
description:
The space
Picasso Boutique Suite is Marga Casanova’s newest interior design project. You can book an apartment instead of a hotel, but without giving up a boutique hotels treat!. This is what you'll find on this TRIPLE BALCONY SUITE: surrounded by style and elegance. 

Located just off Madrid's epicentre Puerta del Sol, on Montera, the quiet pedestrian street that links Sol with impressive Madrid's main Avenue Gran Via. This apartment puts Madrid's most important attractions within walking distance. 

Spacious up to 4 people, it has been recently refurbished to a standard that reflects the importance of its location. 

The bright living room has two french balconies with wooden shutters which look out onto Aduana pedestrian street on Montera´s corner. A convenient double glass isolation makes you see but not hear. Throughout, there are wooden floors, which contrast nicely with the use of burgundy paintwork and matching decorative elements.
host_about:
Bienvenidos al mundo de Marga Casanova! Soy Marga, diseñadora de interiores, española nacida en Madrid. Mi trayectoria comenzó con el diseño y distribución de textil hogar, que siempre esta muy presente en mis proyectos. Otra parte importante en mis obras son las tapicerías  herencia de mi abuelo propietario de una de las mejores empresas del sector en los años 60.
Me encanta viajar, tengo grandes amigos en Portugal, Bélgica e Italia…donde me siento como en casa. Así me gustaría recibir a mis nuevos huéspedes en Madrid Boutique Suites: cinco apartamentos vacacionales diseñados con elegancia clásica y elementos de diseño puntuales. Todo un eclecticismo reflejo de un Madrid cultural, elegante y moderno a su vez. Situados en la mejor ubicación posible, justo en la puerta del Sol, centro neurálgico de la ciudad. 
Con una comunicación abierta y plena confianza,te atenderemos personalmente para un feliz hospedaje  en Madrid. 
Airbnb nos hace llegar hasta ti para que sueñes tu estancia con  las mejores fotos profesionales de  nuestros espacios Marga Casanova!!!

neighborhood_overview: I love this area, in the historic center of Madrid. The landscape goes from madrid de los Austrias with antique beautiful buildings and narrow streets that makes you feel you are living in that era to modernized areas like sol and callao with neon big signs and screens like a small time square. You can stroll around and enjoy the differences in views, the many restaurants, coffes, shops. This street in particular is very famous in Madrid cause there are all the traditional textiles shops where all the designers, grandmothers and fathers and parents come to buy bottons ribbons and so on. This is the reason why nonetheless is in the center center of Madrid is one of the quietest and yet caracteristic street.
host_about: Hello I'm Paola I'm an Airbnb superhost since years. To see them happy and share experiences makes you feel like you are travelling too. It's a very human enriching experience.

Central 50m2 apartment fully renovated exterior and almost new in the famous street of Infantas in the heart of Chueca in Madrid center. In a perfectly well maintained old building with lift ( elevator) and doorman. Quality finishes, cozy, comfortable, high ceilings, hardwood floors, sunny, warm and fully furnished with a sofa bed for 2 people. It has a separate bedroom with double bed, fully equipped kitchenette, air conditioning / heating, cleaning service and Wifi. Boasting a prime location 2 blocks from Gran Via in the vibrant, trendy Chueca neighborhood surrounded by excellent restaurants, bars and nightclubs. With the Puerta del Sol just 5 minutes walk you can get anywhere in the center of Madrid, museums, shops, Malasaña, Barrio de Salamanca, Castellana, Paseo del Prado, etc in less than 15 minutes. near 3 different subway stations and 2 cercanias train stations in less than 5 minutes walk. host_about:
Hola,

 Soy Melvin, desde hace 19 años trabajo como empresario en Madrid, es una ciudad encantadora que enamora tanto al residente como al turista que la visita. 

En Madrid encontrarás una gran oferta de resturantes, museos, tiendas, parques de atracciones, teatros, cines, te encantará. Por este motivo, gestiono apartamentos turísticos, tenemos un equipo de trabajo variado, contamos con personal que se encarga de entregar el apartamento, personal de limpieza y de lavandería, y que son parte fundamental del excelente servicio que brindamos cada día,  aportando al turismo de la ciudad, la oportunidad  de alojarse en mis apartamentos.

Uno de mis objetivos es viajar y conocer otras culturas, disfrutar de la gastronomía que ofrece el resto de Europa y su mágico encanto cultural.

Me apasiona todo lo que tenga que ver con el deporte, también disfruto de una buena película en casa con mi  familia sobre todo las comedias, pues me encanta reír. 

No me gusta preocuparme tanto por el futuro, solo intento vivir la vida, pasarlo bien y ser feliz cada día. 

Les deseo buena suerte y que disfruten de un lindo viaje a Madrid y al resto del mundo.

Para más información, no dudes en mirar los alojamientos que tenemos o puedes escribirme a través de la página de airbnb y te recomiendo el apartamento que mejor se adapte a tus necesidades.


Hello,

 I am Melvin, I have been working as an entrepreneur in Madrid for 19 years, it is a charming city that both the resident and the tourist who falls in love with.

In Madrid you will find a great offer of restaurants, museums, shops, amusement parks, theaters, cinemas, you will love it. For this reason, I manage tourist apartments, we have a varied work team, we have personnel who are in charge of delivering the apartment, cleaning and laundry personnel, who are a fundamental part of the excellent service we provide every day, contributing to the tourism of the city, the opportunity to stay in my apartments.

One of my goals is to travel and get to know other cultures, to enjoy the gastronomy that the rest of Europe offers and its magical cultural charm.

I am passionate about everything that has to do with sports, I also enjoy a good movie at home with my family, especially comedies, because I love to laugh.

I don't like worrying so much about the future, I just try to live life, have fun and be happy every day.

I wish you good luck and have a nice trip to Madrid and the rest of the world.

For more information, do not hesitate to look at the accommodations we have or you can write to me through the airbnb page and I recommend the apartment that best suits your needs.

name: Stylish Apartments in Chueca by Allô Housing
description:
This cozy apartment is located in the heart of Madrid, on the charismatic street of Las Infantas, in the Chueca neighborhood, 2 minutes walk from the Mercado de San Antón and next to the Plaza del Rey and the Plaza de Pedro Zerolo. Very close to the Gran Via and the downtown nThe location is excellent, with all transport nearby and pedestrian distance from museums, leisure areas, shopping, restaurants, supermarkets, area plenty of life 24 hours.

The space
The apartment has a bedroom with double bed, living room with double sofa bed and a bathroom with shower, air conditioning, heating, Wifi and fully equipped kitchen, the building has a lift. Equipped with sheets, towels and toiletries.

Guest access
- Guests have unlimited access to all amenities and equipment in the flat.
- Please make yourself at home but treat the apartment as you would if it was yours.
- You will be fully independent

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview:
Chueca, in the heart of the city, an area with a marked open cosmopolitan character, very close to the brand clothing and accessories stores, or alternative designs of Fuencarral street, restaurants, tapas bars, cafes, is an area where the people of Madrid and visitors from all languages cross paths, where at night and early morning it would seem that it is a half day, due to the number of people enjoying the already famous night in Madrid. Very close to the Castellana and the Retiro Park, for the visitor who loves nature, to walk and look for a break. For lovers of culture, at pedestrian distance from theaters and cinemas, from the Prado, Thyssen, and Reina Sofía museums, with their permanent and temporary exhibitions, artists consecrated by history and those on their way to consecration.
From the apartment you can move walking around the center of Madrid.

description:
Habitación amueblada y luminosa, con salida al balcón. El piso tiene 3 habitaciones, 2 baños completos, un aseo, cocina, ascensor, wifi. Muy bien comunicado, entre Atocha, Lavapiés y Embajadores. En el piso vivimos permanentemente Clara y Pedro (en una habitación + 1 estudio de trabajo), y alquilamos las otras dos habitaciones, que comparten baño.

The space
Habitación amueblada muy luminosa (orientación sur) con salida a terraza.
Piso muy bien comunicado (metro, tren, autobuses), entre Atocha, Lavapiés y Embajadores. Todas las comodidades: ascensor, portero automático, wifi, cocina completa, baños completos.
Situado en Lavapiés / Embajadores, el barrio más multicultural y pintoresco de Madrid, donde se puede encontrar todo tipo de comida a todas horas (índia, tailandesa, española, vegetariana, etc), teterias, terrazas donde reponer energias con un tinto de verano, tabernas y, si quieres seguir por la noche, bares de copas com buena música.
El domin
neighborhood_overview:
Situado en Lavapiés / Embajadores, el barrio más multicultural y pintoresco de Madrid, donde se puede encontrar todo tipo de comida a todas horas (índia, tailandesa, española, vegetariana, etc), teterias, terrazas donde reponer energias con un tinto de verano, tabernas y, si quieres seguir por la noche, bares de copas com buena música.
El domingo por la mañana, obligatorio pasear por el Rastro, el mercadillo más antiguo de Madrid, y ir de tapas por el barrio de La Latina.
Al lado de La Tabacalera, a 5 minutos de La Casa Encendida, a 10 minutos del Reina Sofia y del Caixa Forum - los amantes del arte contemporaneo tendrán mucho que ver.
host_about:
CLARA. Soy portuguesa y  hace 7 años que vivo en Madrid. Lo que más me apasiona de esta ciudad es su vida cultural, intensa y diversificada, apta para todos los gustos. Aunque actualmente trabajo como profesora de portugués y traductora, mi formación ha sido en Historia del Arte, por lo que vivir al lado del triángulo del arte es todo un lujo.
También me gusta ir a un buen concierto, tomar una caña y, principalmente, bailar.
Cuando empiezo un libro de Murakami no puedo parar.

PEDRO. Músico madrileño. Aunque estudié Geología me dedico plenamente a la Música desde hace 23 años, dando clases, conciertos, componiendo, etc. Aunque viajo bastante con mi trabajo me encanta volver siempre a Madrid, ciudad multicultural llena de vida las 24 horas del día.

name: Central Double Room near Subway
description:
Hemnes room designed with traditional and mordern furniture in a renovated centrally located 100m2 apartment with direct access to Barajas Airport, Atocha Central Train Station and Mendez Álvaro Sur Bus Station, as well as Sol and Museo del Prado.

The space
You are looking at a Hemnes room designed with traditional and mordern furniture in a renovated centrally located 100m2 apartment with direct access to Barajas Airport, Atocha Central Train Station and Mendez Álvaro Sur Bus Station, as well as Sol and Museo del Prado. It is also the perfect spot if you also want to visit nearby towns such as Toledo and Segovia as they are UNESCO World Heritage sites. Must visit if you are in Madrid!

The apartment is super convenient. Metro (Subway) Line3 Delicias is just at the street intersection. Renfe Cercanias Delicias train station is just a couple of blocks up. There are also bus services that go directly to tourist spots. You can also walk to the famous Reina
neighborhood_overview: Mostly residential area away from the noisy night drunks. There are also bars and restaurants around the neighborhood as well as cheaper supermarkets and fruit shops than the center. If you love museums, the famous Reina Sofia museum is within walking distance.
host_about:
I'm a designer, a photographer, a modern nomad. I live with less and work from anywhere in the world. So far it has been 8 cities in 3 continents and counting! 

Though I'm a digital designer by profession, I love interior design and took the chance to renovate my mother's decades-old apartment during a trip back so she could live more comfortably. As you can imagine it wasn't an easy task, try telling your parents to throw that old clock stuck at ten to eleven or that weird looking boat that's supposed to bring luck into the family. But we worked out something in the end and I got to take down some walls, placed a new floor that keeps the house super cool in summer, and basically changed all the furniture in the house. 

That boat stayed on though. ;P

My mother is based in Madrid and has been working as a local tour guide for VIP groups from Asian countries and brings them all over Spain, sometimes even to Morocco, Portugal and France. Though tiring she loves her job and meeting people. My sister and I don't stay in Spain normally so she's happy to have company with at the apartment if she's not away on tour.

If you book with us please take care of the house and treat it as your own. I have prepared a guide to give you an overview of the city. If we are at home we'll be happy to help you with planning so you make the most of your stay in the city :)

host_about:
Bienvenidos al mundo de Marga Casanova! Soy Marga, diseñadora de interiores, española nacida en Madrid. Mi trayectoria comenzó con el diseño y distribución de textil hogar, que siempre esta muy presente en mis proyectos. Otra parte importante en mis obras son las tapicerías  herencia de mi abuelo propietario de una de las mejores empresas del sector en los años 60.
Me encanta viajar, tengo grandes amigos en Portugal, Bélgica e Italia…donde me siento como en casa. Así me gustaría recibir a mis nuevos huéspedes en Madrid Boutique Suites: cinco apartamentos vacacionales diseñados con elegancia clásica y elementos de diseño puntuales. Todo un eclecticismo reflejo de un Madrid cultural, elegante y moderno a su vez. Situados en la mejor ubicación posible, justo en la puerta del Sol, centro neurálgico de la ciudad.

Airbnb nos hace llegar hasta ti para que sueñes tu estancia con  las mejores fotos profesionales de  nuestros espacios Marga Casanova!!!

Cozy loft in a friendly neighbourhood in Madrid.

Modern furniture, with two bathrooms.

neighborhood_overview:
Vicálvaro is a quiet neighborhood and you will enjoy a different Madrid, I can tell you that!

The loft is in the center of the neighbourhood, with lots of bars and cafeterias.
Actualy, you will find 2 restaurants in the same street of the loft with typical food that has nothing to do with touristic places (you can be surprised).
Also, there is a Burger King and a Domino's Pizza.

Supermarkets are walking distance and there is a convenience store in the same street.

There is a hairdresser in the street and a church that may be worth visiting.

You can walk to Faunia (a zoo, where you can find wild animals in their habitats: jungle, African woods, Poles, etc.

It is 30 minutes to Wanda Stadium in public transportation.

There is a park (small forest) where you can walk or go for a run, in case you are sporty :) - Just ask me for directions!

If you have a car with you, you can park in the area for free.

host_about:
Hola,

 Soy Melvin, desde hace 19 años trabajo como empresario en Madrid, es una ciudad encantadora que enamora tanto al residente como al turista que la visita. 

En Madrid encontrarás una gran oferta de resturantes, museos, tiendas, parques de atracciones, teatros, cines, te encantará. Por este motivo, gestiono apartamentos turísticos, tenemos un equipo de trabajo variado, contamos con personal que se encarga de entregar el apartamento, personal de limpieza y de lavandería, y que son parte fundamental del excelente servicio que brindamos cada día,  aportando al turismo de la ciudad, la oportunidad  de alojarse en mis apartamentos.

Uno de mis objetivos es viajar y conocer otras culturas, disfrutar de la gastronomía que ofrece el resto de Europa y su mágico encanto cultural.

Me apasiona todo lo que tenga que ver con el deporte, también disfruto de una buena película en casa con mi  familia sobre todo las comedias, pues me encanta reír. 

No me gusta preocuparme tanto por el futuro, solo intento vivir la vida, pasarlo bien y ser feliz cada día. 

Les deseo buena suerte y que disfruten de un lindo viaje a Madrid y al resto del mundo.

Para más información, no dudes en mirar los alojamientos que tenemos o puedes escribirme a través de la página de airbnb y te recomiendo el apartamento que mejor se adapte a tus necesidades.


Hello,

 I am Melvin, I have been working as an entrepreneur in Madrid for 19 years, it is a charming city that both the resident and the tourist who falls in love with.

In Madrid you will find a great offer of restaurants, museums, shops, amusement parks, theaters, cinemas, you will love it. For this reason, I manage tourist apartments, we have a varied work team, we have personnel who are in charge of delivering the apartment, cleaning and laundry personnel, who are a fundamental part of the excellent service we provide every day, contributing to the tourism of the city, the opportunity to stay in my apartments.

One of my goals is to travel and get to know other cultures, to enjoy the gastronomy that the rest of Europe offers and its magical cultural charm.

I am passionate about everything that has to do with sports, I also enjoy a good movie at home with my family, especially comedies, because I love to laugh.

I don't like worrying so much about the future, I just try to live life, have fun and be happy every day.

I wish you good luck and have a nice trip to Madrid and the rest of the world.

For more information, do not hesitate to look at the accommodations we have or you can write to me through the airbnb page and I recommend the apartment that best suits your needs.

name: Aparment in the famous "rastro"
description:
Apartment just in the center of the authentic Madrid, in the street of the Rastro, at 500 meters of Mayor Square, 760 meters of Sol and close to the effervescent Latina area. The appartment is in a historic "corrala", tipycal building of authentic Madrid. It has heating, wifi, air conditiong and un optional parking with un extra cost of 18 euro per day.
From the apartment you can go walking to the principal points of Madrid.

The space
Apartment in the heart of Madrid, in the Plaza de Cascorro, one of the most tipycal neighborhood of Madrid because it is one of the oldest districts, founded in the time of Ferdinand and Isabella (1495) as one of the first extensions of the old village and later become a symbol of the old Madrid. The apartment has more or less 30 square metres and is equipped to make you feel at home, has separate bedroom with double bed (1,35) living room with sofa bed, kitchen (with the necessary items such as washing machine, hob and fridge
neighborhood_overview:
The Rastro, also called Cascorro, is one of the most authentic neighborhoods in Madrid and it has become a symbol. This district is the area of the "corrala", the antique shops in Ribera de Curtidores street, the effervescent Rastro, the theatres ( Latina and Pavón), the "tapas" in Cava Baja,the flower market inTirso de Molina...all this very close of Mayor Square, Royal Palace, Cathedral and Orient Square.
In the neighborhood there is a lot of restaurants (tipycal cuisine and "tapas" of Madrid and modern and international cuisine)
Also there are many food shops, little fruit shops, supermarkets (LPZ in Ribera de Curtidores street, Carrefour in front of La Latina subway station and Día in Toledo street) and the traditional market of La Cebada.
In the Cascorro square there is a laundry.
Very close to the apartment, two subway stations , Latina and Tirso de Molina, connect the district with the rest of the city.
host_about: Hola, somos Jesús y Amaia.  Nos consideramos  amables y enamorados de nuestra ciudad  y encantados de conocer gente nueva. Actualmente residimos en Pedrezuela,  la sierra de Madrid disfrutando de otra pasión el deporte.

Sí has de trabajar en Madrid este verano lo mejor es que te puedas dar un baño en la piscina siempre que quieras.

neighborhood_overview:
El Barrio de las Letras lleva su nombre en homenaje a los grandes literatos que habitaron sus calles en el Siglo de Oro. Cervantes, Quevedo o Lope de Vega transitaron por esta zona situada entre el paseo del Prado y la plaza de Santa Ana, una de las más populares de Madrid por el encanto de sus calles peatonales y sus muchas tiendas y restaurantes que la hacen especialmente animada los fines de semana.

Desde la Plaza de Santa Ana, famosa por sus terrazas y bares de tapas, discurren en pendiente hasta el Paseo del Prado calles como la de Huertas, cuyos adoquines llevan grabadas citas de grandes escritores en castellano. Precisamente en la calle Lope de Vega, en la iglesia de San Ildefonso (convento de las Trinitarias Descalzas), una placa conmemorativa recuerda que en un lugar indeterminado del edificio descansan los restos del autor de El Ingenioso Hidalgo Don Quijote de la Mancha, Miguel de Cervantes. No lejos de allí encontramos la casa-museo del gran dramaturgo Lope de V

name: A bonbon in the heart of Madrid
description:
Welcome to my sweet and cozy loft!

Located in one of the most emblematic areas of Madrid, near the Royal Palace it is a haven of peace in the bustle of the capital, allowing you to enjoy the entertainment and charm of our city.

The space
You will it truly sophisticated, innovative and welcoming. I've taken care of the smallest of details to make your stay a privileged experience.

It preserves its original art in the rafters and the entrance door, which are over two hundred years old.

The living room has a cozy reading area and a large and comfortable sofa, which can be converted into a bed 1,20 x 1,90m wide.

The bedroom conserves the original rafters in the ceiling. The size of the bed mattress is 1,50 x 2,00m, and is made of high quality viscoelastic material which will give you the best possible rest. Every last detail is taken care of, from the textile towels, bedding up to the household, for maximum comfort.
neighborhood_overview:
Due to its strategic location is at walking distance from the most emblematic places of the city: the Royal Palace, the "Almudena" Cathedral, the Royal Theatre, "Puerta del Sol", "Plaza Mayor" with a required stop in the "San Miguel" Market... And on Sundays you will be able to visit the most important famous numismatic market in Spain.

You will not want to stop walking around "La Latina", "El barrio de las letras" with its trendy shops and antiques, the "Gran Via" street and the "Chueca" district. You will also be delighted in the lively Habsburg district, with its unique streets full of history and places to enjoy the Spanish gastronomy and its lively time for "aperitivo". And you can also walk the neighborhood of Lavapies on Sunday, featuring the oldest flea-market of the city, "El Rastro", or visit the museums "Prado", "Thyssen" and "Reina Sofia".
host_about:
Soy una persona optimista, alegre y sencilla, que busca el lado verde de la vida. Dicen mis amigos que siempre llevo una sonrisa a cuestas. Soy muy perfeccionista y cuido con dedicación y cariño todo lo que me rodea. 

Me gusta el arte, en especial la pintura, viajar, descubrir lugares y gente diferente y aprovechar al máximo el tiempo libre. Pero sobre todo disfrutar de los pequeños detalles, día a día, con mi familia.

Con toda ilusión, he decorado mi bombón de buhardilla, con el fin de que disfrutes de ella como del más dulce de los momentos.

...........

I am an optimistic, cheerful and homely person, who looks the green side of life. My friends say I always have a smile in my face. I am perfectionist and care with dedication and love all around me.

I like art, especially painting, traveling, discovering places and different people and making the most of my free time. But especially, enjoy the little things, day by day, with my family.

With all my heartfelt enthusiasm, I decorated my bonbon attic in order to enjoy it as the sweetest of the moments.

name: Casa/Apartamento en Madrid
description:
Bonito apartamento en Madrid con piscina comunitaria y aparcamiento gratis en la calle. Muy buena comunicación para los accesos al metro, autobús y principales carreteras.
Para los amantes del deporte tiene un gimnasio Go Fit a escasos metros y Pistas de Padel (Río Arena Padel).

The space
El apartamento es pequeño pero acogedor. Tiene 1 dormitorio con una cama de 1,35. En el comedor hay un sofá-cama donde pueden dormir otra persona. Tiene cocina americana totalmente equipada. Un baño con bañera grande. Si vienes en coche es ideal, aparcarás en la puerta de casa y podras disfrutar de un buen chapuzón cuando llegues cansado de patear por Madrid.
Es ideal para persona sola o parejas, está muy cerca de zonas verdes y de ocio como Madrid Rìo, Parque de San Isidro y Parque Sur..
Está a 10 minutos de Latina, 15 minutos de Plaza Mayor y zona centro en autobús y metro y es ideal para gente que practique Pádel porque hay instalaciones en la misma calle y ta
neighborhood_overview: La zona es muy tranquila, pero a 3 minutos se accede a General Ricardos que es una calle comercial, cont tiendas, restaurantes, pubs... y a 5 minutos está Marques de Vadillo y Madrid Río donde se pueden dar largos paseos en bici, patines, monopatín o caminando y se accede al centro de Madrid en poco tiempo: En verano se organizan festivales de música y hay muchas zonas verdes. La Casa de Campo tambien esta cerca. Se puede ir en bici por el Paseo del Manzanares. Es un paseo muy agradable y lleno de vida.
host_about: Me gusta brindar a mis huéspedes una estancia agradable, sirviendo de ayuda e informándoles de todo lo que concierne a su estancia en mi casa..

name: CENTER, just walking with balcony¡¡¡
description:
Situado en mismo centro de Madrid, en la zona con más vida y vibrante de la ciudad. Rodeado de los principales monumentos, museos y atracciones turísticas, donde puedes desplazarte andando a corta distancia y disfrutando de las animadas y singulares calles de la capital. En pleno centro de la conocida zona TRIBALL que tanto ocio, arte, restauración e imagen está generando en la zona centro de Madrid.

The space
El apartamento consta de salón, cocina, baño y habitación, todas estancias independientes. Tiene un bonito balcón, tradicional de la arquitectura de la zona más antigua de Madrid, que permite la entrada de los rayos del sol a la zona del salón. El potente A/C permite aislarte del calor veraniego de Madrid. Servicio de Internet gratis con high speed. La cocina está dotada de los utensilios necesarios para preparar desayunos y comidas sencillas. Dispone de cafetera y secador pelo. Tiene una cama doble y amplios armarios y cajoneras. Está situada en una zona
neighborhood_overview: Andando tan solo 3 minutos estás en calle de Alcalá continuada por Gran Vía y Plaza de Callao donde podrás ver los edificios históricos más emblemáticos de la ciudad en 5 minutos Plaza España y la Puerta del Sol donde se encuentra el km 0 de nuestra red de carreteras, el representativo Oso y Madroño de la ciudad de Madrid y donde cada año damos la bienvenida al nuevo año con el tañer de las doce (website hidden) lo que quieres conocer es la zona más castiza de la ciudad caminando tan solo 10 minutos tienes la Plaza Mayor con una parada obligada en el Mercado de San Miguel, 15 min Palacio de Oriente y Teatro Real junto a la Plaza de Opera y Plaza de las Descalzas. En esa visita puedes aprovechar los domingos y visitar el barrio de Lavapiés y la Latina, donde se despliega el mercado callejero más antiguo de la ciudad EL RASTRO.Próximo al Museo del Prado y Reina Sofia junto a plaza Neptuno. A tan solo 10 minutos estarás en Plaza Cibeles, palacio del Ayuntamiento y Banco Central de España,
host_about:
Soy una madrileña que no para de sorprenderse y disfrutar de su ciudad. Siempre hay rincones no descubiertos y otros paseados mil veces y que continuo disfrutando.
Como anfitriona espero hacerte sentir muy cómod@ en tu visita a mi ciudad y poder trasmitirte las mejores experiencias de como pasear por el Madrid antiguo.

name: Spacious and close to Gran Vía-wifi
description:
Located in the city center, very close to Gran Via, Plaza de España, Royal Palace. To 200m from emblematic Torre de Madrid where Luis Buñuel was living from 60´s to 80´s.
Safety and quietly area to 50m to the Police Station.
150x200 viscolastic matress
Locker room

The space
Our apartment is located on Calle Fomento 25, very close to Gran Via and Plaza de España. It is a spacious and comfortable 75 sq m one-bedroom apartment that fits two adults. It is located in a new building with elevator in harmony with the old Madrid buildings environment. It has free wifi access, air conditioned and heat, etc. It's a very quiet street so the apartment is really peaceful. Linen and towels are included too.

The main bedroom has a double bed and a spacious built-in closet. The living room has a double sofa bed. Both the bathroom and the kitchen are completely equipped.

Guest access
- Heating
- Free wifi
- Air Condition<
neighborhood_overview:
It is located in an extremely central area, that is easily accessible and has a wide variety of commercial and cultural activity in its immediate vicinity, only 3 minutes walking from “Palacio Real”, “Teatro Real”. "Sabatini gardens" and the Cathedral, 7 minutes walking from ” Puerta del Sol” and “Plaza Mayor” and 100 meters from “Gran Via” and “Plaza España”. For your safety, there's a police office right on Fomento street.

The neighborhood is one of Madrileños’ favorites for “tapas” and is famous for its bars, restaurants and night life, all of which you will find only steps away.
host_about:
Hi! We are Alfonso & Guillermo, from micasaisyourhouse.

I (Alfonso) started renting my apartment in Madrid years ago and I discovered a vocation: to try to make people feel like home. I've travelled a lot and I'd love that you feel that nice feeling of being like home in a strange place. 

So with my University friend Guillermo we created micasaisyourhouse and now we manage apartments in Madrid (where Guillermo lives) and Seville (where Alfonso lives). We hope you enjoy your stay with us!

See you soon!

Alfonso & Guillermo

3 Bedrooms, Large living room, 2 bathrooms and kitchen.

Located in the smart neighborhood of Chamberí in the very centre of Madrid, is a very quiet and secure area (http://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chamberí).
In less than thirty minutes from the area of museums, theaters and the 'golden mile' of Madrid.
It´s a cool and calm district, there are many restaurants, bars, cinemas and theaters to enjoy (we can provide you a list of places to eat or go out). You also have many supermarkets 1 minutes walking from home.

description:
Beautiful apartment, fully equipped. In the Madrid center
3 bedrooms, 1 bathrooms, lift, AC, WIFI ...
The best neighbourhood to enjoy the city
You´ll enjoy it !

The space
Beautiful apartment, Fully equiped.
It has a bedroom with a double bed, another with a single or double bed, the third one has a single bed, the living room with sofa bed, bathroom and kitchen.
It is located next to La Latina square, five minutes walking from Plaza Mayor.

Guest access
It has air conditioning and heating. WIFI FREE.
It Has a microwave, oven, washing machine, fridge, dishwasher, hair-dryer, toilet soap, towels, bedding, kitchenware, television, books...

Other things to note
Don´t wait for the end, we want your stay to be perfect
neighborhood_overview:
The Plaza Mayor is the soul of Madrid, full of cultural activities, la Latina square is the perfect zone to live the day (tapas) and the night (drinks).
Is located near the Royal Palace, the Opera Palace, the San Miguel Market, the Prado, the Thyssen,the Reina Sofia, Madrid rio, lot of tipical squares full of bars with terrace, Cibeles, Puerta de Alcalá, Retiro Park ...
With countless pedestrian streets that allow you to entrance to the incredible range of leisure, (cinemas, musicals, theaters, concerts, sport, restaurants, bars, clubs,...) of Madrid.
host_about:
Soy de Madrid y me gusta mucho pasear por mi ciudad, ir al cine, al teatro, sobre todo a ver comedias y musicales, tambien me gusta ir a los museos que estan muy cerca del apartamento como el museo del Prado y el Reina Sofia.
Cuando yo viajo , tambien escojo la opción de ir a un apartamento.
.Conozco muy bien la ciudad y estare encantada de ayudarles para que su estancia en esta ciudad sea inolvidable.
 Hasta pronto !!

description:
Disfrutad de este apartamento en el corazón de Madrid.

Equipado con todas las comodidades: aire acondicionado, calefacción, colchón viscoelástico, ducha de lluvia, cocina completa (combi horno microondas, nevera, lavadora, vitrocerámica). Muy lumionoso.

¡Os esperamos!
host_about: Enamorada de Madrid.....

name: Well connected Guesthouse in Madrid's green belt
description:
Independent, 30sqm house + 25sqm patio with use of shared pool (TIMETABLE OF USAGE TO BE AGREED WITH HOSTS). A double bedroom, bathroom, living room, open plan kitchen and two private sunny green patios it is an oasis away from Madrid's bustle!
10 min walk to Metro, urban rail (a 12 min. ride to Sol city centre), 5min to buses, within walking distance to all amenities, supermarkets, shoppping mall, restaurants, etc. and free parking on doorstep. Next to Montecarmelo, Las Tablas and Alcobendas.

The space
What is unique about our space is the location and surrounding. We are well located for efficient transport into and around Madrid and all its major points for visitors of all kinds and interests. Equally we are next to the circular roads M30 and M40 and all major excursion routes; El Escorial, Segovia, Avila, Aranjuez, Toledo, Sierra de Gredos, etc.
Situated within the relaxing green residential belt of northern Madrid, on the grounds of a stunning vi
neighborhood_overview: We are lucky with a well served neighbourhood with all amenities at hand. Within an easy walk are local shops and services, Holmes place gym, shopping malls, restaurants and bars, schools and playgrounds, a typical Spanish village setting, Fuencarral and some cultural objects. A bit further 3 large hospitals, hotels, industrial and office parks, cinema's, etc.
host_about:
Hosting, entertaining in general, is my preferred activity, I'm a total people person,  travel extensively and very much look forward to welcoming international guests!  Mind, I love cats & dogs too and we have a few well behaved examples around the property. Other favourite pass times are reading, keeping fit and going to the cinema. 

My husband and I feel we need to share our home with others since our children have left the nest. We can recommend many interesting Madrid spots for all tastes, it's a great city! A private tutor of English, I also spend a lot of time on our home & Garden, while my husband is an active classic car expert.

100MB optic fiber Wifi, complete bathroom, toilet, large fully equipped kitchen with dining area and pantry. Individual heating and natural wood floors and cabinet works.

Secure and sanitized.
Spacious, quiet, fast WIFI and roofless terrace. Ideal option to work or study comfortably from home.
Full cable TV package including Live Sports, movies and series.

The space
Great 6th floor Penthouse in the Salamanca district. Three large bedrooms, one with en suite bathroom and whirlpool. A south facing outdoor terrace, perfect for lunch or dinner outdoors. name: Apartamento Cerca del estadio WANDA METROPOLITANO
description:
Perfecto para los eventos deportivos en el estadio WANDA METROPOLITANO!!

Con plaza de garaje.

Bonito apartamento de 60 m2 con terraza. Situado en la tranquila zona de las Rosas, con muy buena ubicación, a tan solo 10 minutos del aeropuerto y del recinto IFEMA y a solo 20 minutos, utilizando transporte público, de la puerta del Sol.

The space
Disfruta de un luminoso Apartamento de 60 metros cuadrados, en la zona de las Rosas de Madrid.

- Cerca del Estado WANDA METROPOLITANO (1 parada de metro o un paseo andando).


- Completamente amueblado y con todo lo necesario para hacerte la estancia fácil y cómoda.
- Construido en el año 2000 aproximadamente.
- Con un salón de unos 18 metros Cuadrados.
- Con una habitación de unos 12 metros Cuadrados.
- Cuarto de baño completo con bañera
- Cocina amplia y equipada.
- Una bonita terraza.
- Una zona común con árboles y columpios.
- Completa
neighborhood_overview:
La zona es muy tranquila y tiene de todo.

Un centro comercial grande a menos de 500 metros. en el que encontrarás comercios muy grandes (Carrefour), tiendas pequeñas y sitios de ocio como cines, bares etc.

Muchos parques alrededor, incluso el mayor carril bici de Madrid a menos de 200 metros.
host_about:
Cuando Teresa y yo tuvimos a Daniela hace 6 años, nuestra vida cambio por completo. Para empezar, tuvimos a cambiar de casa y cuando lo hicimos no fuimos capaces de deshacernos de la casa en la que hemos sido muy felices..

Ofrecerla en Airbnb es la forma de compartir un trozo de nuestra vida con vosotros.

Queremos aprender, compartir y disfrutar de la compañía de nuestros huéspedes.

Some simple rules for a good coexistence will be explained at your arrival.

name: Aparment in latina in the center
description:
The aparment is in the street of rastro a place that be in the center and you can arrive walking all points. Is provide with Wifi, Air conditionated and parkin but it with extra cost of 18e per day.

The space
Apartment in the heart of Madrid, in the Plaza de Cascorro Trail heart. This is a yard, construction typically Madrid, located in one of the most

old Madrid. It was founded in the time of Ferdinand and Isabella (1495) as one of the first extensions of the old village and later became an emblem of Madrid

castizo. The apartment is suitable for two / three people and is equipped to make you feel at home, has separate bedroom with double bed,

living room with sofa bed, kitchen (with the necessary items such as washing machine, hob and fridge with freezer), bathroom (shower bath), closets and storage spaces, television, heating and air conditioning as well as sheets, blankets , towels and cleaning service.

The building
neighborhood_overview:
The Rastro, also called Cascorro, is one of the most authentic neighborhoods in Madrid and it has become a symbol. This district is the area of the "corrala", the antique shops in Ribera de Curtidores street, the effervescent Rastro, the theatres ( Latina and Pavón), the "tapas" in Cava Baja,the flower market inTirso de Molina...all this very close of Mayor Square, Royal Palace, Cathedral and Orient Square.
In the neighborhood there is a lot of restaurants (tipycal cuisine and "tapas" of Madrid and modern and international cuisine)
Also there are many food shops, little fruit shops, supermarkets (LPZ in Ribera de Curtidores street, Carrefour in front of La Latina subway station and Día in Toledo street) and the traditional market of La Cebada.
In the Cascorro square there is a laundry.
Very close to the apartment, two subway stations , Latina and Tirso de Molina, connect the district with the rest of the city.
host_about: Hola, somos Jesús y Amaia.  Nos consideramos  amables y enamorados de nuestra ciudad  y encantados de conocer gente nueva. Actualmente residimos en Pedrezuela,  la sierra de Madrid disfrutando de otra pasión el deporte.

host_about:
Somos una pareja de Español y Colombiana, amables, simpáticos y con buena energía. No fumamos, somos muy limpios y nos gusta mantener nuestra casa lo más bonita que podamos para sentirnos en nuestro refugio y ofrecer algo lindo a las personas. Nos gusta recorrer el mundo y conocer la historia de los lugares a los que vamos, recorrer sus calles, descubrir sus secretos pero, sobre todo, conocer la gente y el día a día de quienes los habitan. Con Airbnb tenemos bastante experiencia y nos parece una forma fenomenal de viajar y compartir. 
Nos gusta salir a pasear, ir al teatro, a musicales, a conciertos, tomar fotografías y ver películas y documentales.

neighborhood_overview: The city of Madrid, capital of Spain, is one of the cities that is becoming a very attractive tourist destination for both Spanish and international tourists in recent years. Beyond the monuments that can be visited in Madrid, the charm of its main squares and streets, with emblematic places such as the Plaza Mayor, Puerta del Sol or the reborn Gran Vía, is one of its main attractions. But above all, those who visit Madrid appreciate the very welcoming spirit of the city, always with a great cultural, leisure and gastronomic atmosphere. You can visit many tourist attractions such as: Puerta de Alcalá, Plaza de Cibeles, the Royal Palace or the Almudena Cathedral. They also value the artistic wealth that their museums enclose, with a special role of those who form the so-called Triangle of Art, with the Prado, Thyssen-Bornemisza and Reina Sofía.

The space
Our apartment is located on Calle Fomento 25, very close to Gran Via and Plaza de España. It is a spacious and comfortable 75 sq m one-bedroom apartment that fits two adults. It is located in a new building with elevator in harmony with the old Madrid buildings environment.

It has free wifi access, air conditioned and heat, etc. It's a very quiet street so the apartment is really peaceful. Linen and towels are included too.

neighborhood_overview:
It is located in an extremely central area, that is easily accessible and has a wide variety of commercial and cultural activity in its immediate vicinity, only 3 minutes walking from “Palacio Real”, “Teatro Real”. "Sabatini gardens" and the Cathedral, 7 minutes walking from ” Puerta del Sol” and “Plaza Mayor” and 100 meters from “Gran Via” and “Plaza España”. For your safety, there's a police office right on Fomento street.

The neighborhood is one of Madrileños’ favorites for “tapas” and is famous for its bars, restaurants and night life, all of which you will find only steps away.
host_about:
Hi! We are Alfonso & Guillermo, from micasaisyourhouse.

I (Alfonso) started renting my apartment in Madrid years ago and I discovered a vocation: to try to make people feel like home. I've travelled a lot and I'd love that you feel that nice feeling of being like home in a strange place. 

So with my University friend Guillermo we created micasaisyourhouse and now we manage apartments in Madrid (where Guillermo lives) and Seville (where Alfonso lives). We hope you enjoy your stay with us!

See you soon!

Alfonso & Guillermo

It is the oldest part of city and one of the most popular districts. It takes part of the medieval and Renaissance Madrid and surely is one of the most beautiful areas of the city. With multitude of squares, churches, old palaces and convents is full of life and history. We will find several street coffees, bars and restaurants as well as numerous shops and their famous Rastro, the major outdoor market of the city.

Surrounded by all type of transports: underground, buses and Atocha train station.

neighborhood_overview: "PRINCIPE TWIN SANTA ANA" is in the heart of the Letters District, his name came from the famous writers who lived and worked there during XVI and XVII centuries. This district is one of the more attractive commercial areas of Madrid with theatres, restaurants, bars, coffees and hotels. Point of contact of tourists and students is the Plaza SANTA ANA, famous by his terraces and his glamorous nightlife. The Letters District is very close to PLAZA MAYOR and PUERTA del SOL ending on the Paseo del Prado where famous hotels PALACE and RITZ are placed. Enjoy the most emblematic works of Spanish and international art in the most important museums in Spain. Experience the most dynamic nightlife and taste the best tapas. Madrid is full of cultural, gastronomic, leisure and business opportunities and welcomes all visitors. Discover the coolest and most glamorous nightlife of Madrid, if you dare.

neighborhood_overview: The quarter known as the Austrias neighbourhood in the centre of Madrid has a number of sites and monuments dating from the 16th and 17th centuries when the court of the Austrian monarchs was in Spain's capital. The architecture of the houses lining its narrow and irregular streets is sober and austere, in keeping with the character of these monarchs. The best way to discover all the monuments and traditional taverns in this part of the city is by walking or bike.

neighborhood_overview: In this apartment, you are in the heart of “Madrid de los Austrias”, or Hapsburg Madrid – an area full of history. You are steps away from the Plaza Mayor and just a couple of minutes’ walk from the Puerta del Sol, the official center of Spain. There are lots of restaurants, bars, gardens, open squares, and shops all around the area.
host_about:
Hi!!

We welcome you to Spain and we wish you a good stay in Madrid!

Oscar works as a photographer and Vanessa is an actress and theatre producer (during 2017 I became mum, so I won't be doing check in's for a while). However, until some years ago Oscar was an engineer and Vanessa was a M&A lawyer. And then one day we decided to turn our lifes up side down and follow our real passions.

We are best friends and on May 2012 we decided to move forward and enroll in a small business together. Vanessa had been hosting with Airbnb for 2 years by then (renting the spare room at her place in Madrid/Milan and her apartment in Barcelona) and her experience (upgraded to Superhost in early 2011) was so positive that we decided we could also help other owners that don't live in town or don't have the time to rent their properties to travelers as you. And this is what we are doing now together. 

More about us, we love to travel: Vanessa has travelled 4 out of the 5 continents with a backpack that has been with her for 18 years now and now has enrolled in her new adventure: becoming a mum in spring 2017. Conversely, Oscar travels by bike and closer to Madrid, so as often as he can he takes his bike for a short trip in the mountains (he's really fit!). He has also spent several summers working in France. As the business grew, we took more people on board. Firstly Paula, a Venezuelan that has been living in Madrid for 11 years now, also keen on travels and on exploring new places. Paula is full of energy and we love her smiley caracter. And last but not least, Javi, whom you'll see on weekends and public holidays (and more often now that the Vanessa's baby is here!).

We are also keen in meeting new people and learning new things from them, but more importantly, we want you to feel at home at any of our apartments and that you feel that there's someone in town who cares for you:-) 

We enjoy little life pleasures like riding our bicycles or growing our small organic vegetables gardens. We like eco-friendly environments since we care a lot about our planet. 

We will help you to find you like home in this beautiful city and we look forward to having the opportunity to meet you soon!!

Oscar_ Bianca_ Javi

host_about:
Hola,

 Soy Melvin, desde hace 19 años trabajo como empresario en Madrid, es una ciudad encantadora que enamora tanto al residente como al turista que la visita. 

En Madrid encontrarás una gran oferta de resturantes, museos, tiendas, parques de atracciones, teatros, cines, te encantará. Por este motivo, gestiono apartamentos turísticos, tenemos un equipo de trabajo variado, contamos con personal que se encarga de entregar el apartamento, personal de limpieza y de lavandería, y que son parte fundamental del excelente servicio que brindamos cada día,  aportando al turismo de la ciudad, la oportunidad  de alojarse en mis apartamentos.

Uno de mis objetivos es viajar y conocer otras culturas, disfrutar de la gastronomía que ofrece el resto de Europa y su mágico encanto cultural.

Me apasiona todo lo que tenga que ver con el deporte, también disfruto de una buena película en casa con mi  familia sobre todo las comedias, pues me encanta reír. 

No me gusta preocuparme tanto por el futuro, solo intento vivir la vida, pasarlo bien y ser feliz cada día. 

Les deseo buena suerte y que disfruten de un lindo viaje a Madrid y al resto del mundo.

Para más información, no dudes en mirar los alojamientos que tenemos o puedes escribirme a través de la página de airbnb y te recomiendo el apartamento que mejor se adapte a tus necesidades.


Hello,

 I am Melvin, I have been working as an entrepreneur in Madrid for 19 years, it is a charming city that both the resident and the tourist who falls in love with.

In Madrid you will find a great offer of restaurants, museums, shops, amusement parks, theaters, cinemas, you will love it. For this reason, I manage tourist apartments, we have a varied work team, we have personnel who are in charge of delivering the apartment, cleaning and laundry personnel, who are a fundamental part of the excellent service we provide every day, contributing to the tourism of the city, the opportunity to stay in my apartments.

One of my goals is to travel and get to know other cultures, to enjoy the gastronomy that the rest of Europe offers and its magical cultural charm.

I am passionate about everything that has to do with sports, I also enjoy a good movie at home with my family, especially comedies, because I love to laugh.

I don't like worrying so much about the future, I just try to live life, have fun and be happy every day.

I wish you good luck and have a nice trip to Madrid and the rest of the world.

For more information, do not hesitate to look at the accommodations we have or you can write to me through the airbnb page and I recommend the apartment that best suits your needs.

host_about:
Soy un chico Italiano de Turin. Amo y vivo en Madrid desde hace 13 años, y aunque me guste mucho viajar, no hay lugar al mundo donde me gustaría mas vivir que en Madrid. Me defino sociable y comunicativo. Me gusta el deporte y mis amigos son una parte muy importante de mi vida. Me encanta mi trabajo que me permite viajar mucho y trabajar desde casa cuando estoy en España. Adoro los animales y vivo con mi Perro Dalí un Jack Russel muy sociable y muy poco Ladrador.. Me gusta cocinar para mis amigos y tener gente cenando en casa en compañía de una buena charla. Me gusta el orden y la limpieza, la organización hace parte de mi día a día.
Tengo gana de ofrecer la posibilidad a quien quiera, de probar a vivir en el centro de Madrid ahorrando un dinerillo y viendo como si aqui hubiesen nacidos. 
Me encantan las peliculas pero prefiero verlas en el cine.... teatro, musica y bicicleta son el pan cuotidianos de mi vida. Bienvenidos!

description:

You can also visit on foot Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, Gran Vía, Retiro's Park, and the famous Rastro flea market.

You'll also get to Atocha's Station in 5 minutes, which is connected to the main Spanish capital cities by regular trains and AVE.

The neighborhood is full of life, with many restaurants, shops, theatres, O.V. cinemas... We'll be glad to recomend you our favourites places!

The apartment has two double rooms, and a sofa that turns into a double bed. You can also ask for an extra bed if you need it and we have also a cot.

It's provided with all the facilites you need to have a pleasant stay: direct access from the entrance (no need to take the elevator because it's located in a quiet patio inside the building) cen
host_about:
Extremeña de nacimiento, vivo en Madrid desde joven. Adoro esta ciudad, pasear por ella, aunque siempre tengo presente mi hogar natal. Me encanta pasear por Madrid de noche, se ve todo de una forma totalmente diferente.
Viajar es una de mis pasiones. He recorrido rincones de Italia, Perú o Túnez, entre otros. 
Otra es mi familia. Ellos son como el baluarte de mi vida. 
Entre algunas de mis aficiones están el teatro, el cine... 
Espero que con estos datos, me conozcáis mas. 



Born in Extremadura. I live in Madrid since I was young. I love this city, walk to it, althought I always have present my hometown. I love to walk in Madrid during the night, everything looks totally different.
Travel is one of my passions. I have gone all over corners of Italy, Perú or Tunizia, among others.
My other passion is my family. They are like the bastion of my life.
Among some of my hobbies, there are the theatre, the cinema...
I hope, with this description, You know more about me.

host_about:

host_about:
Somos una familia con 2 niñas pequeñas. Nos encanta viajar y nos dimos cuenta que no siempre es fácil encontrar el alojamiento adecuado a las necesidades de una familia. Por eso nos decidimos a  alquilar los apartamentos a turistas deseosos de conocer esta magnífica ciudad cómodamente.
Soy licenciada en historia del Arte, por lo que les puedo asesorar en su visita.
Somos nuevos en Airbnb pero hace ya 2 años que alquilamos al turismo con gran éxito de público. Nuestras prioridades son la limpieza y la comodidad de los huéspedes.
En Madrid disfrutarán de los más importantes museos de Europa, de paseos maravillosos y de una gastronomía única . Les recomendaré excelentes restaurantes, muy bien de precio en los que disfrutarán del Gazpacho, el cocido madrileño, las tapas, excelentes pescados y los mejores dulces de Europa.

Located in the neighborhood of Embajadores (the travel and leisure magazine Time Out called it the coolest neighborhood in the world) and very well connected (it already existed in the 16th century). It accommodates two people comfortably.

The space
Comfortable apartment (48 m2) within the so-called triangle of art: museums Reina Sofía, Thyssen, and El Prado. Ideal for weekends or four days maximum. In a fun neighborhood and very well connected. The apartment is located on the fourth floor without an elevator. But the stairs are comfortable to climb. The apartment is in a building of about 100 years, inscribed in the Catalog of Protected Buildings of the City of Madrid and in a neighborhood that already existed in the 16th century. So if you want to enjoy the experience of staying in a place wit
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood has a wide range of bars and restaurants with a very good atmosphere where breakfast, tapas or dinner will be a sure hit.

The apartment is located nearby two pharmacies and several supermarkets, specifically the one located in Plaza de Lavapiés, Carrefour, is open 24 hours from Monday to Sunday.



A few steps from the Doré Cinema, belonging to the National Film Library, where the author's films are projected in the context of different cycles. A few steps away from Caixa Forum and the Reina Sofía Museum. And if you are looking for classic painting you have the Museo del Prado and the Museo Thyssen-Bornemisza within a few minutes walk.

The architecture in Malasaña is rather uniform, with most buildings ranging from 4 to 6 levels, 3 to 5 windows wide, each building painted a uniform colour, almost all windows with French balconies and rare ornamentation.

host_about:
¡Hola! Es un placer presentarme. Soy Alberto y mi profesión es la investigación científica, en una enfermedad neurodegenerativa rara (poco frecuente) la Esclerosis Lateral Amiotrófica (E.L.A.). Dirijo un laboratorio en el Instituto de Investigación Sanitaria del Hospital 12 de Octubre de Madrid.
Como anfitrión, lo que más me gusta es ayudar a nuestros huéspedes a que disfruten de nuestro "pequeño" pueblo, el centro de Madrid, Lavapiés. Si son clientes disfrutones, entonces es cuando mejor me lo paso.
Como huésped, me gusta encontrarme con lo mismo que ofrezco yo, absoluta comodidad y todas las cosas que hacen de una casa tu hogar. Nosotros siempre decimos a nuestros huéspedes que sólo se traigan la ropa, lo demás lo tienen en el apartamento. Estoy deseando encontrarme con anfitriones así ;·)

name: View to Plaza Mayor
description:
Entire apartment, completely renewed, in an historical building. At the very heart of Madrid, with all the monuments and places of interest at walking distance. Ideal for a city trip

The space
Willing to experience Madrid in its very core ? Why not stay in the Plaza Mayor, the real heart of the city ? The apartment gives to one of the world’s most beautiful and astounding view. Alexandre Dumas, when travelling to Spain, wrote that the Plaza Mayor is "the coliseum which has the most beautiful vault and the best painted one I ever saw". This vault being of course the sky of Madrid.

You will enjoy a very cosy and nice place which permits to enjoy your stay in Madrid. The double bedroom at your disposal has its own bathroom en suite. As one of the guests reported : « The beautiful view of the Plaza Mayor and its bustling crowd contrasted nicely with the remarkable private cozy quiet in the suite ». The rest of the apartment consists of one living-room, one
neighborhood_overview:
In all regards, the Plaza Mayor is ideally located to visit the City as every interesting monuments or sightseeing are situated nearby, like the Royal Palace, the Golden Art Triangle (Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofia), as well as nice shopping areas.

The neighbourhood also provides any type of restaurants and bars, or the well-known Mercado de San Miguel (San Miguel Market) were any kind of typical Spanish food is served.

It provides also excellent connections with tube stations and with the airport or the train station Atocha.

And any tips on the city, or on bars and restaurants is more than willingly given! Anyway, once you make your reservation, I send you all the information you might need, with a personal A-Z Guide of Madrid...

When visiting a city, nothing better than being nearby everything worth seeing and resting afterwards in a nice atmosphere.
host_about:
Hi, I'm glad to welcome you to my apartment in Plaza Mayor, Madrid. 

I am originally from Belgium, French speaking, but living in Spain for ten years. Being here is a great pleasure and I enjoy the city a lot. I like sightseeing and I will be very happy to give you any information regarding its history and places to see... and of course I can give you nice tips on restaurants and other places to go out at night.

I like travelling and meeting new people is always a pleasure. 

Very much into arts en general, litterature as well as good music... 

Hope to welcome you very soon,

neighborhood_overview: Very safe area close to the Metro Sol, Callao and Gran Vía, excellent nightlife, restaurants, bars, historic center of Madrid, perfect for eclectic tastes and those who are not so much.
host_about:
Hola,

 Soy Melvin, desde hace 19 años trabajo como empresario en Madrid, es una ciudad encantadora que enamora tanto al residente como al turista que la visita. 

En Madrid encontrarás una gran oferta de resturantes, museos, tiendas, parques de atracciones, teatros, cines, te encantará. Por este motivo, gestiono apartamentos turísticos, tenemos un equipo de trabajo variado, contamos con personal que se encarga de entregar el apartamento, personal de limpieza y de lavandería, y que son parte fundamental del excelente servicio que brindamos cada día,  aportando al turismo de la ciudad, la oportunidad  de alojarse en mis apartamentos.

Uno de mis objetivos es viajar y conocer otras culturas, disfrutar de la gastronomía que ofrece el resto de Europa y su mágico encanto cultural.

Me apasiona todo lo que tenga que ver con el deporte, también disfruto de una buena película en casa con mi  familia sobre todo las comedias, pues me encanta reír. 

No me gusta preocuparme tanto por el futuro, solo intento vivir la vida, pasarlo bien y ser feliz cada día. 

Les deseo buena suerte y que disfruten de un lindo viaje a Madrid y al resto del mundo.

Para más información, no dudes en mirar los alojamientos que tenemos o puedes escribirme a través de la página de airbnb y te recomiendo el apartamento que mejor se adapte a tus necesidades.


Hello,

 I am Melvin, I have been working as an entrepreneur in Madrid for 19 years, it is a charming city that both the resident and the tourist who falls in love with.

In Madrid you will find a great offer of restaurants, museums, shops, amusement parks, theaters, cinemas, you will love it. For this reason, I manage tourist apartments, we have a varied work team, we have personnel who are in charge of delivering the apartment, cleaning and laundry personnel, who are a fundamental part of the excellent service we provide every day, contributing to the tourism of the city, the opportunity to stay in my apartments.

One of my goals is to travel and get to know other cultures, to enjoy the gastronomy that the rest of Europe offers and its magical cultural charm.

I am passionate about everything that has to do with sports, I also enjoy a good movie at home with my family, especially comedies, because I love to laugh.

I don't like worrying so much about the future, I just try to live life, have fun and be happy every day.

I wish you good luck and have a nice trip to Madrid and the rest of the world.

For more information, do not hesitate to look at the accommodations we have or you can write to me through the airbnb page and I recommend the apartment that best suits your needs.
