name: APARTAMENTO CENTRO-DELICIAS
description:
Apartamento dúplex de 40 metros cuadrados con cocina (con vitrocerámica, horno, campana extractora, nevera pequeña), lavadora, microondas, calefacción y aire acondicionado.
El barrio es muy céntrico y está muy bien comunicado.
El apartamento es muy tranquilo.

The space
Our apartment is a 40m2 duplex, with an equipped kitchen (vitroceramic hob, small refrigerator, hood, oven, microwave, washing machine), air-conditioner (for cooling and heating).
La estética del edificio se corresponde con la de una típica corrala madrileña, pero todo está construido de nuevo, tal y como era antiguamente, excepto la fachada que por ser un edificio protegido no podía ser demolida y está restaurada.
El apartamento está pensado para que lo habiten dos personas, como mucho; pero hablad con nosotros si sois una pareja con un niño. Disponemos de una cuna que os podemos facilitar.
The aesthetics of the building corresponds to a typical corrala madrileña , but
neighborhood_overview:
El barrio es muy céntrico y está muy bien comunicado:
A) Metro (Palos de la Frontera-línea 3) a 50 metros, prácticamente a la puerta del edificio:
- va directo a Sol (10minutos).
- va directo a Legazpi (10 minutos): Centro cultural el Matadero: centro de creación contemporánea con exposiciones, arte, música, teatro,..
B) Estación de trenes-cercanías de Delicias a 50 metros: va directo en 30 minutos al aeropuerto (T-4) Esta línea C1 (Aeropuerto T4- Delicias) está temporalmente en obras (de junio 2019 a noviembre 2019) y no puede hacerse el trayecto sin trasbordos.
C) Estación de trenes de Atocha a 15 minutos andando.
D) Para las terminales T1, T2 y T-4 se puede tomar el autobús que sale del aeropuerto y llega a Atocha (a 15 min. del apartamento)
E) Montones de autobuses que pasan muy cerca
Se llega andando al Reina Sofía (15 minutos), al Museo del Prado (20minutos), Museo Thyssen (25 Minutos), al jardín Botánico (20 minutos), al parque del Re
host_about:
Somos una familia de cuatro miembros: Paz y Luis, y nuestras hijas: Celia e Irene.
Nos encanta Madrid y nos encanta que la gente visite nuestra ciudad. Para nosotros tener la oportunidad de devolver la hospitalidad y amabilidad que nos han ofrecido otras personas es una satisfacción. 
Hemos viajado y hemos vivido fuera de España; conocer otras culturas ha sido una experiencia muy enriquecedora y excitante. 
Nos encanta el cine, la lectura, viajar, aprender idiomas(hablamos español e inglés), la naturaleza y temas de ciencia. A mi, además, me encanta cocinar. Y a Luis, tocar la guitarra.
We are a family of four: Paz and Luis, and our daughters, Celia and Irene. 
We like very much living in Madrid and we love people to visit our city. We would like to return all the hospitality and kindness that we have received when we have travelled and lived abroad. To know other cultures has been a rewarding and exciting experience.
We love watching films, reading, travelling, learning languages (we both speak Spanish and English), nature and science topics. I enjoy cooking and Luis loves playing guitar.

A Brand new and very spacious apartment very close to Plaza de Toros de las Ventas. This is a fantastic Madrileño neighbourhood, near the centre but tucked away from the most touristy areas. Perfectly communicated, close to everything and perfect for exploring Madrid. You’ll love my apartment because of the light, the spacious rooms, the comfy beds, the lift, the "futuristic" robotic garage. License number
VT-7780
host_about:
I am a Spanish woman who has been living in the UK for the last 20 years. I decided it was time to find a new home in Spain - somewhere to escape to for my holidays, and eventually to settle down in. After spending a lot of time thinking about where I most wanted to be, I decided that Cadiz was the perfect city. Somewhere I could happily live full time. Near the sea, and with fantastic food, music, dance (I'm a Flamenco dancer) and culture. 
I chose this apartment in Cadiz because I fell in love with this apartment the first time I saw it, and I had to fight tooth and nail to get it ! I think I was very lucky. It's in the best part of the city, and the renovated building and my apartment in particular is gorgeous.

Para más información, no dudes en mirar los alojamientos que tenemos o puedes escribirme a través de la página de airbnb y te recomiendo el apartamento que mejor se adapte a tus necesidades.


Hello,

 I am Melvin, I have been working as an entrepreneur in Madrid for 19 years, it is a charming city that both the resident and the tourist who falls in love with.

In Madrid you will find a great offer of restaurants, museums, shops, amusement parks, theaters, cinemas, you will love it. For this reason, I manage tourist apartments, we have a varied work team, we have personnel who are in charge of delivering the apartment, cleaning and laundry personnel, who are a fundamental part of the excellent service we provide every day, contributing to the tourism of the city, the opportunity to stay in my apartments.

One of my goals is to travel and get to know other cultures, to enjoy the gastronomy that the rest of Europe offers and its magical cultural charm.

I am passionate about everything that has to do with sports, I also enjoy a good movie at home with my family, especially comedies, because I love to laugh.

I don't like worrying so much about the future, I just try to live life, have fun and be happy every day.

I wish you good luck and have a nice trip to Madrid and the rest of the world.

For more information, do not hesitate to look at the accommodations we have or you can write to me through the airbnb page and I recommend the apartment that best suits your needs.

The room is ideal if you are planning a long term visit for work, studying or an internship. The space is nice and in the best location in Madrid.
The room overlooks the lively Huertas St, so expect some partying noise during the weekends.

Pet friendly, gay friendly.

PERFECT FOR COUPLES AND YOUNG TRAVELERS. We have renovated and decorated this apartment located in an old building in the heart of Madrid, very close to the most important places of the city. Beside Gran Vía and 3 minutes from Sol Square

The space
The location is the best, you can visit the most important places of the city walking, you don´t need to use public transport. A few minutes walking you will find places like Sol square, Gran Via avenue, Major square, the Royal Theater and the Royal Palace ... And a little further you will find Puerta de Alcalá, Cibeles Palace, The Thyssen Museum, and the Prado Museum ... Also, few minutes walking there are the tourist districts of La Latina and Lavapies with historic inns and restaurants, and very close to the apartament is the district of Chueca , with the great party atmosphere. name: ROOM WITH PRIVATE BATHROOM
description:
The space
We rent out a comfy and exterior room, with a private bathroom-shower only for the guest. The room has a single bed, two wardrobes, a desk, heating and air conditioning.

The house is very luminous and has a modern decoration, it has a big terrace with views of the Real Madrid’s Stadium where you can have a cold beer or just lying on one of its hammocks. You will have access to the WIFI, the kitchen, the tableware, the fridge, the washing machine…and don’t worry about the bed sheets and the towels, we will provide them to you!

We live two people at home, my 27-year-old son and I. We are quiet and positive people, and we enjoy having guests from all around the world.

Our street is a boulevard and the neighbourhood is pretty quiet. It has shops, restaurants, bars and parks, and the subway station is just at one block. The direct subway line to the airport is just at ten minutes on foot, where you can also take the train to go to th
host_about:
Hi! My name is Macarena and I live with my 27-year-old son.

I love travelling, reading, enjoying a good movie, cooking and going out with friends. My son, apart from the things I've said, is fond of cycling, photography and hiking. ç

We both are open-minded and we enjoy having guests with good vibes.

Our house is always very clean, and we always try you to have a nice and warming stay here.

If you want more information, just send us a message!


Hola! Soy Macarena y vivo con mi hijo Fernando de 27 años.

Me gusta viajar, leer, en buen cine, la cocina y por supuesto, salir con mis amigas.  A mi hijo, a parte de casi todo lo anterior, le gusta correr, montar en bicicleta, la fotografía y el montañismo. Somos gente abierta y disfrutamos teniendo huéspedes en nuestra casa, tenemos mucho positivismo.

Considero fundamental tener la casa siempre limpia, e intentamos que nuestra casa sea lo más acogedora posible!

Si quieres saber más sobre nosotros o tienes alguna duda, no dudes en ponerte en contacto con nosotros, te daremos la información que necesites antes de tu llegada!

name: CENTRALLY LOCATED ROOM 10 MIN SOL 7
description:
The space
A room in apartment on calle San Mateo, one of the best areas in the city. Between Chueca and Malasaña, next to calle Fuencarral and a 10 munute walk from Gran Vía and Sol, two of the main squares in Madrid.
On the same street as the apartment, you can find el Museo del Romanticismo and just around the corner is el Museo Municipal, which is known for its beautiful baroque facade.
It is a charming area surrounded by impressive city buildings.
Close by there is a fresh farmers market.
It is within walking distance from many os Madrid¨s finest restaurants, bars, shops, etc.

name: Relaxed Luxury, Superb location
description:
My place is right around the corner from the Royal Palace and next to the Royal Theater ( Opera House) on a super quiet street but short walking distances to the best Madrid has to offer. Located in the best of the Austrias neighborhood. Puerta del Sol is a 5 minute walk away. You’ll love my place because of the location, the comfort and the ambiance. It´s located a minute from Opera Metro Station . You can choose to walk to Gran Via and Chueca, it will take you 10 minutes.

The space
The apartment is located on the third floor in a mid 19th century fully restored building and was completely renovated one year ago. It has a new modern elevator. It has a bespoke eat-in kitchen with a big island suitable for dinners for six people. With marble counters and leather seats, it is fitted with high end appliances. It has a double living area flooded with light with 2 balconies viewing a beautiful and peaceful street. It has a big LED screen with hundreds of channe
neighborhood_overview: Palacio neighborhood is the oldest of Madrid.  The apartment is located right in the area were Madrid was founded. The area is also known as the Austrias Madrid and it sits on the old wall that used to protect the city from its enemies.  There are dozens of things to do in the area, museums, restaurants and the best night-life Madrid is famous for.
host_about: I am an Interior Designer/ Architect. I also design custom-made furniture, lighting and many types of objects. I love industrial design. I am a very social person and enjoy very much meeting new people.  I like to entertain friends at home.  I really like meditation and practice it every day. Keeps me positive and focused.  I am fully bilingual in spanish and english.

name: Cute apartment in Madrid center
description:
Lovely apartment in Madrid center. Very quiet, 10 minutes walking to Sol Square and Reina Sofia Museum. It is in the Lavapies neighborhood, well known as the multicultural area of Madrid.
In the apartment, you can be up to 4 people. There is one bedroom with a double bed and a sofa bed in the living room, bathroom, a small kitchen, and a little cute terrace.

The space
First of all, to let you know that it is my own apartment what I am renting, so it is very important to be aware of it ( be respectful with the place, with the neighbors,not making parties and much noise, but at the same time, I like you to feel at home.
I like the philosophy of Airbnb of renting your own apartment when you are away and have the chance to make some extra money, but I don´t like to make a bussines of it like many people are doing nowadays
It is a cozy apartment in a very alive neighborhood, although my street is a quiet one. I live on the base floor, the apartment i
neighborhood_overview:
Lavapies neighbourhood, wellnone as the multicultural area of Madrid.
In the neighborhood you can enjoy food from the most diverse countries as well as tapas and traditional Spanish cuisine. There is also a rich nightlife. From traditional coffee through live music venues to local ethnic music.
The cultural offer is very varied, highlighting the National Centre de Arte Reina Sofía. Likewise also in the neighborhood, you can find the “Casa Encendida”, social and cultural center of many activities program, and the “Price Theatre/Circus”, venue for the performing arts through exhibitions, workshops and productions.
host_about:
Hello!! My name is Marta and I live in Madrid even though I travel quite often ,thats why I  rent my  apartment while I´m away. 
My big passion is travelling, I´ve been in many countries like Bolivia, Costa Rica, Honduras, Canadá, New York, around Europe, Australia...and I love meeting people all around the world.

name: 3 Bdr PH, Best Views, Madrid Center
description:
3/1 Beautiful 6th Floor Pent-House with the most stunning, unobstructed views of all of Madrid. In La Latina’s most central district of Historic Madrid. Comprised of 3 spacious bedrooms (master, 2 twin beds & third one w/movable twin or office space)

The space
Beautiful 6th Floor Pent-House (elevator & stairway access) with the most stunning, unobstructed views of all of Madrid; Excellent location to see it all and walk everywhere. Located in the 'Palacios & La Latina' most central district of Historic Madrid (City's Center & Historical area), known by 'The Austrias' district.

Comprised of 3 spacious bedrooms. One with 2 twin beds , the other with a double bed (master bedroom) and the third one with a movable twin , the first two bedrooms have balconies with amazing 180 degree views of the city . One recently renovated bathroom. American Style, modernly equipped kitchen with marble tops, washer and dryer. Towel and fresh bed linens for each guest. F
neighborhood_overview:
Best possible location in the absolute center of historic Madrid. You will not find a better location for being a tourist and traveler in Madrid. The apartment is right on the square of La Latina & the Mercado Plaza de La Cebada (an indoor fresh produce market), also conveniently located around grocery stores, pharmacies, Cava Baja Restaurants... In front of La Latina Metro and just a short walk to Tirso de Molina Metro.

Bakeries and food stores a few steps away.

Very well located next to all the restaurants, tapas and Madrid 'movida' BUT very quiet apartment, where you can rest well.

Gorgeous views and sunsets.

Walking distance to Mercado de San Miguel, Cava Baja, Casa Lucio, Plaza de La Paja, Plaza Mayor.
host_about:
Spanish-American family living in the U.S. sharing the properties we own and love across the United States and Spain. 
Our Madrid apartment has been in the family for generations, and as the 3rd generation of owners, our siblings and I, hope to keep it in the family for many more to enjoy beautiful Madrid and our roots. We go back every year and take the kids to practice their Spanish; we feel privileged to own such a spot to call home in the true center of old Madrid.

We love Spain and the exposure to our heritage that our family gets to enjoy like, if they were living in Spain though our Madrid apartment  and... to expose them to all the culture in the city. We speak English, Spanish, French and Italian. We are happy to send more pictures and details if needed. If you rent with us, we would love to share all our favorite places and tips of Madrid and surroundings. We'll get back to you ASAP but no longer than 24 hours!

name: Prado museum views & swimming pool
description:
Lovely apartment opposite the Prado Museum. The most exclusive area in the heart of Madrid. Next to Palace & Ritz hotel. Best location to know the city by foot with all museums & Atocha train station 2 mimutes walking. Well equiped, terrace, private security & swimming pool on the roof (available from mid june to mid september).

The space
Apartment situated in the emblematic Paseo del Prado, its in floor 5th, with a beautiful light and gourdious exterior views.
The Studio its perfect for having a cup of coffee out in the terrace or just having a short distance walk though the old Vila and city centre, the famous Golden Triangle, “Big three art museums" (MUSEO DEL PRADO -Thyssen – Reina Sofía), RETIRO, Plaza de Santa Ana, GRAN VíA, Puerta del SOL and PLAZA MAYOR
There are plenty of trendy restaurants and cool bars. Located in “Las Letras" , CORTES Disctrict probably the nicest and most central neighborhoods of Madrid.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
Downtown Las Letras district. This elegant neighborhood is the heart of the traditional, cultural and new chic Madrid. The area is a mixture of quiet and charming pedestrian streets. Very safe and protected, it is an oasis of peace restricted only to the residents' cars.
The most important museums in Madrid, such as the PRADO, Thyssen or Reina Sofia, are 2 minutes' walk.

Very close to the beautiful and lively Plaza de Santa Ana -5 minutes' walk-, full of sunny terraces, cafes and most typical TAPAS bars of the city. In the surrounding streets, such as Huertas, you may find exclusive Jazz, Blues or Soul Live Cafes, highlighting the internationally known Café Central or Populart. And of course! Flamenco! There is plenty of “tablaos" in the area, for example, the legendary Villa Rosa. And you can taste the most varied and delicious Spanish cuisine in the typical old taverns and restaurants, such as Casa Alberto, Taberna La Dolores, Los Gatos, Bar Quevedo and others.

Mi casa está en plena calle Fuencarral, la zona más comercial de Madrid. Mi piso es amplio y cómodo, donde estarás cerca de las mayores atracciones turísticas de la capital. Te encontrarás como en casa con todas las cosas que normalmente tienes.

host_about:
Soy de Madrid y tengo 43 años. Tengo sitio en casa y me gustaría compartirlo con personas que vengan a conocer mi ciudad. Vivo en pleno centro de la ciudad en una casa grande y acogedora, perfecta para acercarse andando a todas las atracciones turísticas mas importantes.
Yo mismo soy usuario de la red de airbnb y mi propia experiencia es lo que me ha llevado a compartir mi casa con otras personas. Ya que me parece una forma mas cercana y agradable de conocer no solo la cultura sino también la forma de vida.

neighborhood_overview:
Located in EL RASTRO, one of the most traditional neighbourhoods of the Spanish capital.
With everything you want to visit very close by:
- Subway/Tube in 2 minutes: Tirso de Molina (light blue line), La Latina (light green line).
- Plaza Mayor and Plaza del Sol in 4 minutes.
- La Latina and Austrias districts (restaurants, cocktails, terrazas) in a 2 minute walk.
- Museums and galleries: Reina Sofia, Thyssen, El Prado, La Casa Encendida ... in a 10-15 minute walk.
- Shopping: Gran Vía, Fuencarral, Triball. A 15 minute walk or two subway stops.
- Markets: San Miguel and San Fernando, less than 5 minutes walking.

name: ATICO FELIPE III PLAZA MAYOR
description:
Please before make the reservation, ENTER correctly the total NUMBER of GUEST, including you, that will be staying at the apartment and READ the HOUSE RULES.

Regular check-in is from 15:00h to 21:00h. Ask us if you are arriving out of this time.

You can write us in Spanish or English.

_________________________

The space
ATICO FELIPE III PLAZA MAYOR

Right in the heart of Madrid is this apartment is located in a completely renovated deluxe building from the XVI century with balconies facing to the famous Plaza Mayor.

This penthouse 135 sq meters offer you a great authentic stay in an historic place with all the amenities, lift access, wifi, heating / air conditioning centralized, doorman and portal in the same Plaza Mayor.

This apartment sleeps up to 10 people. Please before to make the reservation, enter the total number of guest that will staying since our price changes per extra person.
neighborhood_overview:
NEIGHBOURHOOD & LOCATION:

Here in the heart of Madrid’s city centre you are surrounded by a taste of grocery stores, tapas bars, like the famous Mercado de San Miguel and lots of conveniences.

This is the "Los Austrias Neighbourhood" Sol district, bordering with Las Letras Neighbourhood in Huertas neighbourhood or La Latina Neighbourhood.

You are under 5 minutes walk you arrive at Palacio Real, Opera or to the Km 0 at Puerta del Sol; the centre of Madrid and, in fact, the centre of Spain.

Nearby Metro station: Sol (L1, L2, L3)
Parking under the square Plaza Mayor.
_________________________

I also love traveling around the world and meeting new people!!

host_about:
Hola,

 Soy Melvin, desde hace 19 años trabajo como empresario en Madrid, es una ciudad encantadora que enamora tanto al residente como al turista que la visita. 

En Madrid encontrarás una gran oferta de resturantes, museos, tiendas, parques de atracciones, teatros, cines, te encantará. Por este motivo, gestiono apartamentos turísticos, tenemos un equipo de trabajo variado, contamos con personal que se encarga de entregar el apartamento, personal de limpieza y de lavandería, y que son parte fundamental del excelente servicio que brindamos cada día,  aportando al turismo de la ciudad, la oportunidad  de alojarse en mis apartamentos.

Uno de mis objetivos es viajar y conocer otras culturas, disfrutar de la gastronomía que ofrece el resto de Europa y su mágico encanto cultural.

Me apasiona todo lo que tenga que ver con el deporte, también disfruto de una buena película en casa con mi  familia sobre todo las comedias, pues me encanta reír. 

No me gusta preocuparme tanto por el futuro, solo intento vivir la vida, pasarlo bien y ser feliz cada día. 

Les deseo buena suerte y que disfruten de un lindo viaje a Madrid y al resto del mundo.

Para más información, no dudes en mirar los alojamientos que tenemos o puedes escribirme a través de la página de airbnb y te recomiendo el apartamento que mejor se adapte a tus necesidades.


Hello,

 I am Melvin, I have been working as an entrepreneur in Madrid for 19 years, it is a charming city that both the resident and the tourist who falls in love with.

In Madrid you will find a great offer of restaurants, museums, shops, amusement parks, theaters, cinemas, you will love it. For this reason, I manage tourist apartments, we have a varied work team, we have personnel who are in charge of delivering the apartment, cleaning and laundry personnel, who are a fundamental part of the excellent service we provide every day, contributing to the tourism of the city, the opportunity to stay in my apartments.

One of my goals is to travel and get to know other cultures, to enjoy the gastronomy that the rest of Europe offers and its magical cultural charm.

I am passionate about everything that has to do with sports, I also enjoy a good movie at home with my family, especially comedies, because I love to laugh.

I don't like worrying so much about the future, I just try to live life, have fun and be happy every day.

I wish you good luck and have a nice trip to Madrid and the rest of the world.

For more information, do not hesitate to look at the accommodations we have or you can write to me through the airbnb page and I recommend the apartment that best suits your needs.

neighborhood_overview:

Imprescindible el Palacio de Oriente y sus jardines de Sabatini.

El Barrio de lavapies es un barrio alucinante para vivir. Lo se porque llevo aquí viviendo más de 15 años. Y Time Out Magazine lo confirma: https://www.timeout.com/madrid/things-to-do/the-best-of-the-barrios-lavapies
Bares y restaurantes de medio mundo, teatros y salas de conciertos, galerías de arte y Museos. Desde La Casa Encendida hasta La tabacalera, pasando por La calle Doctor Fourquet con las galerías de arte contemporáneo más interesantes de Madrid. La mejor Pizzería de la capital: La Saletta, un secreto a voces dentro del Mercado Antón Martín o el restaurante Baobab en La plaza Nelson Mandela, son algunos de los lugares que os invitan a viajar sin viajar, a base de sabores de verdad a precios justos.

Only a 3-minute walk from both Gran Vía Avenue and Puerta del Sol, the New Point Madrid has self-catering accommodations in the center of Madrid. It features a terrace and free Wi-Fi.

All air-conditioned apartments have a modern décor, hardwood floors and a sitting area. Some of the rooms include a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a patio. All have a full kitchen with a fridge, a dining area and a washing machine. Featuring a shower, the private bathrooms also have a hairdryer. Towels and sheets are included.

At the New Point Madrid, guests will find a tour desk. Extras include ironing facilities and guests can use the apartment land-line phone free of charge.

Madrid’s famous Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum is just a 10-minute walk from New Point Madrid and a 5-mimute walk to the lively Chueca district, famous for its café bars and restaurants. The Gran Vía Metro station is across from the property and provides good connections to the rest of the city. Santiago

name: Madrid Center Rastro Lavapiés
description:
The space
Very quiet, spacious and bright room (12 m²)
You have a double bed, wardrobe, table, chairs, heating and fan.
Free WIFI. Breakfast not included. Shared kitchen and fridge. Shared bathroom.

The apartment is located in the Rastro, very close to La Latina and Lavapiés.
Many bars, cafes and restaurants at a great price!
Very central, close to the Art Mile (Prado, Reina Sofía, Thyssen) and the Plaza Mayor or Puerta del Sol.
Very well connected by metro, suburban, bus and taxi.
Additional person € 12 / day
I like meeting people, exchanging experiences and making you feel at home.

Other things to note
El barrio

Lavapies – El Rastro

This area was in medieval Arabic and Jewish neighborhood outside the city walls. When they were expelled in 1492 Lavapies became the most popular neighborhood of Madrid. In the first half of the twentieth century, the neighborhood had fallen into decline
host_about:
Hola soy Javier, vivo en un piso tranquilo y cómodo en el centro de Madrid.
También te puedo ofrecer un bonito apartamento entero a muy buen precio. 
Me encanta la ciudad , porque puedes llegar a todos lados caminando, ver los diferentes estilos de esta Ciudad tan antigua, convivir con un mónton de culturas, los pisos están situados entre los míticos barrios de Lavapés y La Latina en pleno Rastro. Espero que os guste.
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
Hello I'm Javier, I live in a quiet and comfortable in the center of Madrid floor.
I can also provide a nice whole apartment at a great price.
I love the city, because you can get everywhere on foot, see the different styles of this ancient city, living with a lot of cultures, the floors are located between the mythical neighborhood of La Latina Lavapés and in the Rastro. Hope you like it.

name: A Beautiful Room in Madrid Center
description:
The space
A beautiful room to rent in a flat in the center of Madrid, with two rooms, capacity for two people. The flat is bright, charming and is situated between the Anton Martin subway stop, Lavapiés subway stop and Atocha Train Station, two minutes walk to the Reina Sofia Museum and 10 minutes to the Prado Museum.
The flat has two rooms, bathroom, lounge and kitchen. With three balconies to the street, it is a reformed and very friendly flat. It has a fridge, washing machine, cleaning machine, microwave oven, oven, thermostat heating, WIFI, television, coffee machine with capsules.
The neighborhood is a typical neighborhood in Madrid, in walking distance to all the interesting places of the city, near a subway stations, bus stations, theaters, cinemas, museums, supermarkets, shops, etc.

name: BEAUTIFUL NEW CENTRAL APARTMENT
description:
Beautiful apartment, newly renovated, located in the center of Madrid, in the multicultural and cosmopolitan neighborhood of La Latina-Lavapies, one of the best areas to live in the city.
The flat is on the third floor, in a authentic Madrid “corrala” . It is bright and welcoming. Very quiet street , no noise.
It has a modern, practical and comfortable kitchen with refrigerator, washing machine, microwave -grill and ceramic hob. Living room with bed-sofa 150cmX200cm , dining table,TV . Air Conditioning and Heating.
The bedroom is furnished with a large double bed 180x200cm , a comfortable mattress, a double wardrobe , shelves , drawers , desk and chair .

host_about:
I was born and raised in Canada, though both my parents are Spanish.  
In 1990 I moved to Barcelona and since 1992 I've been living in Madrid.
I have 2 daughters, a dog and cat (both rescued), worked in theatre for many years, started a directed a children's events company.
As well, both my mother Beni and I have owned and run our own hostels in the neighborhood of Chueca in Madrid.
For the past 9 years have hosted guests from all around the world!
I speak English, French, Spanish and understand Italian.
Oh, and I love my job!


Hija de españoles, nací en Montreal y viví en Ottawa hasta los 20 años.
En el año 1990 me fui a estudiar teatro a Barcelona. Llevo viviendo en Madrid desde el '92.
Tengo dos hijas, una perra y gato adoptados. Trabajé muchos años en el teatro y creé y dirigí mi empresa de eventos infantiles. Durante un periodo de 15 años, mi madre Beni y yo fuimos dueñas de dos hostales en el barrio de Chueca en Madrid. 
LLevo más de 9 años siendo anfitriona y disfrutando enormemente de mi trabajo!

name: PLAZA MAYOR DELUXE
description:
Beautiful apartment in Plaza Mayor Square. Puerta del Sol can be reached within a 2-minute walk, also Metro Station and Train.
Very bright, spacious, newly renovated with brand new furniture and appliances.
Air conditioning. Free Wifi & Safe

The space
Superb and elegantly decorated apartment in the heart of Madrid, for up to four people in two separate rooms. Located inside Plaza Mayor, one of the most famous and emblematic places in Madrid .

Both the master bedroom and from the living room you can enjoy wonderful views of the Plaza Mayor from their XVII's balconies facing to the famous Plaza Mayor. The main bedroom also has a large dressing room.

It is a second floor with doorman and elevator, bright and fully refurbished. Everything is designed for your confort!

Spacious apartment (100 m2 ) distributed as follows:

- Lounge : with two distinct areas, a sitting area with a comfortable 3 seater sofa with recl
neighborhood_overview:
Many of the city’s most famous monuments can easily be reached on foot.
The surrounding area boasts a wealth of restaurants, cafes and bars to enjoy.
You are under 5 minutes walk you arrive at the Royal Palace, Almudena Cathedral, Opera or Puerta del Sol, the centre of Madrid.
If the walk is a little longer , a 15 minute walk is also the Puerta de Alcala, Plaza de Cibeles, Museo Thyssen, the Prado Museum, Retiro Park...
Just a few minutes from the apartment you will find some of the oldest and most renowned restaurants in Madrid, as Lucio, Lhardy and Botín ... Areas of tapas known as the famous neighborhood of La Latina, the Cava Baja or the recently renovated Mercado de San Miguel.
host_about:
Somos Noelia y Mario, una pareja de Madrid. Vivimos durante varios años en la Plaza Mayor y allí estábamos felices, con un montón de planes a nuestro alrededor, con la tranquilidad de cualquier hogar de puertas para adentro y el bullicio de Madrid con sólo abrir los balcones.

Nuestra familia fue creciendo y tuvimos que cambiarnos de casa, pero como teníamos mucho cariño a nuestro apartamento, decidimos compartirlo con otros viajeros que quisieran conocer el encanto de Madrid.
 
¡Desde los balcones del apartamento se podía disfrutar de una de las plazas con más vida del mundo! Era 2013 y nacía Plaza Mayor Deluxe.

Todo al principio fue una aventura, la reforma, imaginar cómo decorábamos el apartamento, qué equipamiento dejábamos dentro, electrodomésticos, cómo contactábamos con la gente que quisiera alquilarlo…Lo que sí teníamos muy claro es que nuestro fin último es que los invitados que se alojaran en nuestro apartamento se sintieran como en casa.

Entonces llegó nuestra primera reserva... y luego otra y otra más… la gente no sólo venía una vez, sino que ¡muchos querían volver!
Fue cuando nos encontramos con un problema, ¡no teníamos días libres! (vaya problema, ¿verdad?). No en serio, nos daba mucha rabia que la gente que íbamos conociendo y que se iban convirtiendo en amigos quisieran venir a Madrid y no tuviéramos un lugar para ellos. Así que nos liamos la manta a la cabeza y empezamos a trabajar con más apartamentos. En el 2015 nacía Romantic, también en la Plaza Mayor, ideal para parejas. Este apartamento tiene ventanales dan a un patio interior con lo cual se puede disfrutar de los planes de la Plaza Mayor y la tranquilidad y el silencio de un patio privado. 

En el 2016 se nos presentó la oportunidad de gestionar dos apartamentos más y allá que nos lanzamos! Uno de ellos está también en la Plaza Mayor, es el apartamento de más capacidad (hasta 5 personas), lo llamamos Family. El otro está muy cerca de Plaza de España y desde sus ventanales se ve completamente el Palacio Real, las vistas de día y de noche cuando se ilumina el Palacio son espectaculares. Sencillamente impresionante!

El último, por el momento, es Elegance y lo inauguramos en Marzo de 2017. Es un apartamento espectacular, tiene dos habitaciones y en la habitación principal hay dos balcones desde los que se ve la Plaza Mayor, un salón gigante y un cuarto de baño enorme con ducha y bañera. ¡Todo lujo y elegancia!

Lo mejor sin duda de estos años ha sido la cantidad de gente estupenda que hemos ido conociendo, con ellos hemos ido creciendo y ahora tenemos amigos por todo el mundo! 

Os invitamos a que disfrutéis de nuestros apartamentos y esperamos que os sintáis como en vuestra casa.

The House is located in the District of Carabanchel. Here the famous Fiestas de San Isidro, the patron saint of the city is celebrated. In the nearby San Isidro Park, the chulapos and chulapas come in the month of May to celebrate these festivities in popular festivals.

We are also near Madrid River. Wonderful recreational gardens that run across the edge of the near Manzanares, where locals like to walk, rent a bike, exercise and in summer take bath in their fun sources coming out of the ground. There are rental of sun loungers and meadows of grass, as well as cafes and bars. Since it can access other interesting parts of the city.

El Estadio Vicente Calderón and his Museum are also close to the House, within this zone of Madrid River.

The great Park of the Empress is also very close, with more wooded variety.

District is a comfortable and affordable place. With gardens and playgrounds at the door. With supermarket day one minute from the do
host_about:
Hola, soy Mónica.

Madrileña de nacimiento. Vivo y trabajo en Madrid aunque he viajado por países de Europa, Centro y Sur América y Norte de África. Mi destino pendiente: Asia. Hablo Español, Portugués y me defiendo con el Inglés.

Estudié Educación Social y comencé Antropología Cultural. Viví durante un tiempo en Brasil, dónde estudié parte de esta apasionante carrera, la cuál de momento, no he llegado a terminar.
Me dedico a la intervención social con personas sin hogar, en alojamientos institucionales. Un trabajo que considero interesante y desde el que creo se aprende mucho; Sobre todo a nivel de respeto y convivencia, del trato entre personas desde el lado más humano y cómo resolver problemas desde la creatividad y el ingenio.

Intento meditar, procuro pintar y hacer manualidades y me gusta mucho bailar. He hecho danza oriental durante años, aunque ahora la tengo un poco abandonada. También he sacado mi lado más artístico a flote haciendo cursos de clown y poniendo en escena a algún personaje.

Me gusta mucho cocinar. Para mí y para los demás. He hecho cursos profesionales y disfruto enseñando la preparación de platos típicos de nuestra región, aunque me gusta elaborar recetas de cualquier parte del mundo (por lo menos las que conozco).

En mis ratos libres disfruto dando un paseo, visitando los mercados y parques del barrio en el que vivo o teniendo una buena conversación mientras se toma una cerveza con una buena tapa o un chocolate con churros. Esos pequeños-grandes placeres de la vida, de los cuáles creo que se puede gozar en Madrid, sin gastar mucho y si lo conoces un poco. Dar un paseo por el Rastro de Madrid, ir a un concierto o ir al teatro.
Creo que soy de esas personas que te pueden enseñar el Madrid que no sale en las guías turísticas, así como informarte de los lugares más emblemáticos y las rutas típicas. 
Además, cerca de casa, el intercambiador de Plaza Elíptica o la Estación de Atocha te puede llevar a lugares también muy especiales y cercanos como Toledo, Alcalá de Henares o zonas más al Norte como la Sierra de Madrid.
Lugares que me encanta visitar o por los que salir a dar una caminata, sobre todo por el campo, donde procuro ir de vez en cuando. Me gusta mucho hacer escapadas a la naturaleza o pasar unos días en el pequeño pueblo de mi madre, en Ávila.

El barrio en el que vivo y trabajo, Carabanchel, me resulta muy agradable. Tiene una vida social y comunitaria interesante. Sin moverme de él puedo salir a hacer unas compras o dar cursos en los centros públicos o alternativos que existen en la zona.

Madrid, Maguerit como la denominaron los árabes, es una ciudad con mucha magia y encanto, de la que se puede gozar, sobre todo con unas pequeñas pistas y ganas de pasarlo bien.
Te espero en mi casa, de la que disfrutarás durante tu estancia.


Hi, I'm Monica!

Madrid's birth. I live and work in Madrid although I have toured countries of Europe, Central and South America and North Africa. My pending destination: Asia. I speak Spanish, Portuguese and defend me with English.

Studied Social education and Cultural Anthropology began. I lived for a time in Brazil, where studied part of this exciting race, which for the time being, I have not come to end.

I am the social intervention with homeless people, in institutional accommodations. A work which I consider interesting and from which I believe can learn a lot; Above all at the level of respect and coexistence, the treatment of people from the more human side and how solve problems from the creativity and ingenuity.

I try to meditate, try to paint and do crafts and I love dancing. I've done Oriental Dance for years, but now I have it a little abandoned. I've also taken my side more artistic afloat doing clown courses and putting in scene a character.

I really like cooking. For me and for others. I've done professional courses and enjoy teaching the preparation of typical dishes from our region, although I like to prepare recipes from anywhere in the world (at least that I know).

In my spare time I enjoy walking, visiting markets and parks of the neighborhood in which I live or having a good conversation while sipping a beer with a good top or a chocolate with "churros". Those "little and big pleasures of life", which I think that you can enjoy in Madrid, without spending much and if you know him a bit. Take a stroll through the Rastro de Madrid, go to a concert or go to the theatre.

Think I'm of those people who can teach you the Madrid which does not appear in tourist guides as well as inform you of the most emblematic places and typical routes.

In addition, close to home, the Plaza elíptica exchanger or Atocha station can take you to places nearby such as Toledo, Alcalá de Henares and areas further north as the Sierra de Madrid and also very special.
Places that I love to visit or why go to hike, especially for the field, where I try to go from time to time. I like to much make getaways to nature or spend a few days in the small village of my mother, in Avila.

District in which I live and work, Carabanchel, is very pleasant for me. It has an interesting social and community life. Without leaving him I go out to do some shopping or take courses in public or alternative centers that exist in the area.

Madrid, Maguerit as they called it the Arabs, is a city with much magic and charm, which you can enjoy, especially with some small tracks and desire to pass it well.

I hope in my house, which you can enjoy during your stay.



    Oi, eu sou a Monica.

    Do Madrid de nascimento. Moro e trabalho em Madrid, apesar de eu ter excursionado países da Europa, América do Sul e Central, e Norte da África. Meu destino pendente: Ásia. Falo Espanhol, Português e defende-me com o inglês.

     

    Estudou Social Educação e Antropologia Cultural começaram. Eu vivi por um tempo no Brasil, onde estudou parte da emocionante corrida, que por enquanto, eu não vim para acabar.

    Eu sou a intervenção social com pessoas desabrigadas, em acomodações institucionais. Um trabalho que considero interessante e do qual eu acredito que posso aprender muito; Acima de tudo a nível de respeito e de convivência, o tratamento de pessoas do lado mais humano e como resolver problemas da criatividade e engenhosidade.

     

    Tento meditar, tente pintar e fazer artesanato e adoro dançar. Fiz dança oriental por anos, mas agora eu tenho um pouco abandonado. Também tomei meu lado mais artístico à tona, fazendo cursos de palhaço e colocando em cena um personagem.

     

    Eu realmente gosto de cozinhar. Para mim e para os outros. Já fiz cursos profissionalizantes e gostar de ensinar a preparação de pratos típicos da nossa região, embora eu gosto de preparar receitas de qualquer lugar do mundo (pelo menos que eu saiba).

     

    No meu tempo livre gosto de caminhar, visitar os mercados e parques do bairro em que vivo ou ter uma boa conversa enquanto bebe uma cerveja com um bom top ou um chocolate com churros. Esses pequenos-grandes prazeres da vida, que eu acho que você pode apreciar em Madrid, sem gastar muito e se você conhecê-lo um pouco. Faça um passeio através do Rastro de Madrid, ir a um show ou ir ao teatro.

    Acha que eu sou daquelas pessoas que pode ensiná-lo a Madrid que não aparece no turista guias, bem como informá-lo dos locais mais emblemáticos e rotas típicas.

    Além disso, perto de casa, o permutador de Plaza elíptica ou estação Atocha pode te levar a lugares próximos como Toledo, Alcalá de Henares e áreas mais a norte, como o Sierra de Madrid e também muito especial.

    Lugares que adoro visitar ou por que vai para caminhar, especialmente para o campo, onde eu tento ir de vez em quando. Eu queria muito fazer viagens à natureza ou passar alguns dias na pequena aldeia de minha mãe, em Ávila.

No distrito em que vivo e trabalho, Carabanchel, é muito agradável para mim. Tem uma vida interessante, social e comunitário. Sem deixá-lo, saio para fazer compras ou fazer cursos em centros públicos ou alternativos que existem na área.

     

    Madrid, Maguerit como lhe chamavam os árabes, é uma cidade com muita magia e encanto, que você pode desfrutar, especialmente com algumas pequenas faixas e desejo passá-la bem.

    Espero em minha casa, que poderá desfrutar durante a sua estadia.

    こんにちは､私はﾓﾆｶｰです｡

    ﾏﾄﾞﾘｰﾄﾞ

    誕生｡住んでいるし､ﾖｰﾛｯﾊﾟ､中央､南ｱﾒﾘｶ､北ｱﾌﾘｶの国をﾂｱｰしているものの､ﾏﾄﾞﾘｰﾄﾞで働きます｡私の保留中の目的地: ｱｼﾞｱ｡ｽﾍﾟｲﾝ語､ﾎﾟﾙﾄｶﾞﾙ語を話すし､英語で私を守るため｡

     

    研究社会教育･文化人類学を始めた｡ﾌﾞﾗｼﾞﾙでは､どこでこのｴｷｻｲﾃｨﾝｸﾞなの一部を学ぶﾚｰｽ､当分の間､私は終わりに来ていないのためにしばらく住んでください｡

    制度の宿泊施設で､ﾎｰﾑﾚｽの人々 と社会的介入をいます｡私は考えて面白いとは私が信じる仕事にたくさん; 学ぶことができます｡上記のすべての尊敬と共存より多くの人間側からの人々 の治療のﾚﾍﾞﾙでの創造性と創意工夫から問題を解決して｡

     

    私は瞑想をﾍﾟｲﾝﾄしようとしてしないでください工芸品と私の愛のﾀﾞﾝｽします｡年､東のﾀﾞﾝｽをやったが今少し捨てられて｡私はまたより功妙な海上ﾋﾟｴﾛ ｺｰｽ､ｼｰﾝに文字を入れて私の側を撮影しました｡

     

    私は本当に料理が好きです｡私にとって､他の人｡専門ｺｰｽをやったし､どこからのﾚｼﾋﾟを準備したいが､私たちの地域からの典型的な料理の準備を指導を楽しむ世界で (少なくとも私が知っている)｡

     

    暇なときにｳｫｰｷﾝｸﾞ､市場との住んでいる近所の公園を訪問､良い良いﾄｯﾌﾟでﾋﾞｰﾙやﾁｭﾛｽが付いているﾁｮｺﾚｰﾄを飲みながら会話を楽しんでお楽しみ｡それら pequenos ｸﾞﾗﾝﾃﾞｽはの多くを費やすことがなく､ﾏﾄﾞﾘｰﾄﾞで楽しむことができます､あなたは少し彼を知っているかどうかと思う人生の快楽｡ﾗｽﾄﾛ de ﾏﾄﾞﾘｰﾄﾞでの散歩､ｺﾝｻｰﾄに行くまたは劇場に行きます｡

    と思うそれらの人々 の観光客には表示されませんﾏﾄﾞﾘｰﾄﾞを教えることができる午前ｶﾞｲﾄﾞとして最も象徴的な場所､代表的なﾙｰﾄをお知らせ｡

    さらに､ﾎｰﾑ､ﾌﾟﾗｻﾞ見る: ｴﾘﾌﾟﾃｨｶ ｴｸｽﾁｪﾝ ｼﾞｬｰ､ｱﾄｰﾁｬ駅近くに取ることができますあなた近くのｱﾙｶﾗ ･ ﾃﾞ ･ ｴﾅﾚｽ ﾄﾚﾄﾞなどへさらにｴﾘｱ北ｼｴﾗ ･ ﾃﾞ ･ ﾏﾄﾞﾘｯﾄﾞとして､また非常に特別です｡

    またはなぜ時から行くしたいﾌｨｰﾙﾄﾞの特にﾊｲｷﾝｸﾞに行くを訪問する愛している場所｡私は自然に多くの作る逃走したいまたは私の母は､ｱﾋﾞﾗの小さな村で数日を過ごします｡私は生活し､働くｶﾗﾊﾞﾝﾁｪﾙ､

     

    地区は私にとって非常に楽しかったです｡それは社会やｺﾐｭﾆﾃｨの生活面白い｡彼を離れることがなく私はいくつかの買い物や､ｴﾘｱ内に存在するﾊﾟﾌﾞﾘｯｸまたは代替ｾﾝﾀｰでｺｰｽを取るに行きます｡

     

    ﾏﾄﾞﾘｰﾄﾞ､Maguerit として彼らは､ｱﾗﾌﾞ人と呼ばれる都市が多くの魔法と魅力とことができますいくつかの小さなﾄﾗｯｸの特に楽しむ渡します｡

    することを望むご滞在中に楽しむことができます私の家でほしい｡

    Salut, je suis Monica.

Naissance de Madrid. J'habite et travaille à Madrid, bien que j'ai fait une tournée des pays d'Europe, centrale et l'Amérique du Sud et Afrique du Nord. Ma destination en attente : Asie. Je parle espagnol, portugais et me défendre avec l'anglais.

     

    Éducation sociale étudie et anthropologie culturelle a commencé. J'ai vécu pendant un certain temps au Brésil, où une partie étudiée de ce passionnant course, qui pour l'instant, je ne suis pas venu à la fin.

    Je suis l'intervention sociale auprès des sans-abri, dans accommodements institutionnels. Un travail qui me paraît intéressant et qui je crois peut apprendre beaucoup de choses ; Surtout au niveau du respect et de coexistence, le traitement de personnes côté plus humain et comment résoudre les problèmes de la créativité et l'ingéniosité.

     

    j'ai essayer de méditer, essayer de peindre et de métiers d'art et j'aime danser. J'ai fait danse est pour des années, mais maintenant je l'ai un peu abandonné. J'ai aussi pris mon côté plus artistique sous voile, faire des cours de clown et mettant en scène un personnage.

     

    J'aime vraiment cuisiner. Pour moi et pour d'autres. J'ai fait des cours de formation professionnelles et profiter de l'enseignement de la préparation de plats typiques de notre région, bien que j'aime préparer des recettes de partout dans le monde (au moins que je connais).

     

    Dans mon temps libre, j'aime marcher, visiter les marchés et les parcs du quartier dans lequel j'habite ou avoir une bonne conversation en sirotant une bière avec un bon top ou un chocolat avec des churros. Ces pequenos-grandes plaisirs de la vie, qui, je pense que vous pouvez apprécier à Madrid, sans dépenser beaucoup et si tu le connais un peu. Promenez-vous dans le Rastro de Madrid, aller à un concert ou aller au théâtre.

    Pense que je suis de ceux qui peut vous apprendre le Madrid qui n'apparaît pas dans la touristique guide ainsi que vous informe des lieux emblématiques et des itinéraires typiques.

    En outre, à proximité de la maison, l'échangeur de Plaza elíptica ou la gare d'Atocha peut vous emmener dans des endroits à proximité comme Tolède, Alcalá de Henares et zones plus au nord de la Sierra de Madrid et aussi très spécial.

    Les lieux que j'aime visiter ou pourquoi aller faire de la randonnée, en particulier pour le champ, où j'essaie d'aller de temps en temps. J'aime beaucoup escapades de rendre à la nature ou passer quelques jours dans le petit village de ma mère, à Avila.

     

    District dans lequel je vis et travaille, Carabanchel, est très agréable pour moi. Il a une vie sociale et communautaire intéressante. Sans lui laisser, je sors pour faire du shopping ou prendre des cours dans des centres publics ou alternatives qui existent dans la région.

     

    Madrid, Maguerit comme ils l'appelaient les arabes, est une ville avec beaucoup de magie et charme, que vous pouvez profiter, en particulier avec d'autres petits titres et désirez passer bien.

    J'espère que dans ma maison, que vous pourrez déguster lors de votre séjour.

name: La vida es bella.
description:
Precioso
Loft urbano diseñado por un conocido artista madrileño en pleno corazón de la ciudad
Espacioso y acogedor
Elegante y cómodo.
Lujoso sin pretensiones.
Una proporcionada mezcla de estilos, que va a hacer de tu estancia un autentico disfrute.

The space
La casa es acogedora, y elegante.
Situada en una planta sótano.
Muy tranquila y sin ruidos.
Cálida en invierno, fresquita para el verano.
El diseño del espacio y los materiales fueron seleccionados con todo lujo de detalles.
Suelos de madera en toda la casa, incluso en el patio.
Puertas y ventanas de madera con doble acristalamiento.
El baño es de marmol, y la ducha muy grande, los accesorios de marca y calidad.
Las puertas del baño y el despacho son de cristal.
La iluminación graduable y muy bien pensada.
La decoración escogida cuidadosamente, los muebles "retro" fueron importados de Suecia de los años 50.
Toda esa mezcla de de
neighborhood_overview:
Lo que más sorprende es el contraste de lo tranquila que es la zona, sobre todo la casa que se encuentra en la planta menos uno, nada más salir, a pocos minutos tienes una variada oferta de vida y servicios, bares, tiendas, supermercados, y un importante centro comercial.
Y a tan sólo cinco minutos andando, el Parque del Oeste, una vez mas un reducto de paz y tranquilidad pero esta vez de naturaleza, perfecto para salir a correr o a dar un paseo, uno de los parques más grandes de la ciudad, con la casa de campo incluida, una gozada!
host_about:
SurfLoVeArt
Soy artista plástico multidisciplinar con una fuerte conciencia ecológica. 
Trabajo mejorando los espacios en los que me muevo y movemos.
Hago escultura sobre todo MUEBLesCULTURA, diseño y diseño en permAcultura.
Reciclo y reinvento muebles casas y espacios.
Vivo y trabajo en una nave industrial, un lugar precioso donde paso muchas horas creando, dibujando y en mi taller.
Viajo mucho por trabajo y dedico cantidad de tiempo al deporte.
El surf, snowboard, la escalada, y la naturaleza son mis otras grandes pasiones.
Practico la meditación y el chi kung a diario desde hace muchos años para mantener mis mente y espiritu en calma.
La música y una buena dosis de lectura completan mi vida.
Namaste.

1 Habitació privada.

name: Los Ventanales Apartment, Historical Center
description:
Quiet and cozy apartment recently renovated in the Historic Center next to the Plaza Mayor and the Royal Palace.

It has a spacious living room with two balconies overlooking the street, with very high ceilings and very bright. Independent kitchen, bathroom, and bedroom with large closets.

The space
Beautiful and cosy apartment in the heart of Madrid. Newly renovated. With very high ceilings and very bright. It has a spacious lounge with two balconies to the Toledo Street, Separate kitchen, bathroom and bedroom with large closets.

We do not have parking space. There are two public car parks right in front of our apartment. Parking not included in the price.

Other things to note
If you came with little kids there are baby cots and highchairs for babies available.
Second floor with out elevator

Cleaning and disinfection carried out by a specialized company. The bedding is sanitized in a machine at 90 ºC.
neighborhood_overview:

Next to the subway station "La Latina", line 5, all kinds of shops and hundreds of restaurants. Very close to the Cava Alta and Cava Baja with great dining deals, tapas.

It has heating.

Cuando yo viajo , tambien escojo la opción de ir a un apartamento.
.Conozco muy bien la ciudad y estare encantada de ayudarles para que su estancia en esta ciudad sea inolvidable.

Bright and peaceful apartment in Madrid Historical City Centre, one of the coolest areas in town. Plenty of windows and high-end finishing materials. Located in the intersection in between Plaza de España, Chamberí and University districts. 3 different metro stations 5 min by foot.

The space
45 m / 2  - 484 sq ft.
Very tranquil, facing to the quiet landscaped courtyard of the block.
Bright, each single room even the bathroom and the kitchen has its own window.
Optimal for single or couple (3 people max.). Spacious bedroom with queen size bed, exposed brick accent wall in the living room with sofa bed, floor-lamp and a crystal desk. Kitchen is fully equipped and conveniently separated on aside of the living room.
Oak-Wooden floors and distressed white walls.
The building, recently refurbished, was the work of José López Salaberry, one of the architects responsible for the Gran Vía, and it initially housed the first Mahou beer brewery in

host_about:
Since 2012 we have been managing properties in Madrid, for tourist, short term rentals, students and workers. We work together with the company Flexiserv (Cleaning and maintenance) to be able to offer you the best spaces in Madrid, apartments full of charm, and receive you with the best service and treatment possible.

We love and enjoy the city of Madrid, and are devoted hosts so we hope we can assist you in anything you may need during your stay and guide you through the best corners and with the best leisure, gastronomy and tourism of this city.

Desde 2012 gestionamos propiedades en Madrid, para alojamiento turístico, alquileres por temporadas, para estudiantes y trabajadores. Trabajamos junto a la empresa Flexiserv (Limpieza y mantenimiento) para poder ofrecerte los mejores espacios de Madrid, apartamentos llenos de encanto, y recibirte con el mejor servicio y trato posible.

Amamos y disfrutamos la ciudad de Madrid, y somos unos anfitriones devotos por lo que esperamos poder atenderte en todo lo que puedas necesitar durante tu estancia y guiarte por los mejores rincones y con las mejores ofertas de ocio, gastronomía y turismo en nuestra ciudad.

The space

host_about:
Soy un chico con mas de 15 años de experiencia en el sector turistico, y he viajado a mas de 15 paises de los 5 continentes, por lo que se lo que realmente se necesita cuando se viaja a una nueva ciudad, una buena ducha, una buena cama y un apartamento espacioso y luminoso donde poder relajarte y conectarte a internet sin coste extra.
Quiero que mis inquilinos disfruten de su estancia y se sientan como en casa, por lo que para ello tengo preparado todo una lista de sitios de interes turisticos y de ocio para hacer que su viaje sea inolvidable en todos los sentidos.
Solo ofrezco a mis inquilinos lo que a mi me gusta cuando viajo, un servicio que al menos cumpla mis expectativas y me ofrezca la posibilidad de disfrutar al maximo de la ciudad en cuestión.
Solo puedo decir que MI CASA ES TU CASA!
``````````````````````````````````````````````````````
I'm a guy with more that 8 years experience in the tourism industry. I've traveled to over 15 countries on 5 continents, so I really understand what one needs when traveling to a new city: a good shower, a good bed, and a spacious, bright apartment where you can relax and connect to the Internet at no extra cost. 

I want my tenants enjoy their stay and to feel at home. I have therefore prepared a list of all the main tourist sites worth seeing as well as a few suggestions for entertainment and going out so that you can make your trip unforgettable in every way. 

I only offer my tenants what I would like to have when I am traveling. A service that at least fulfils my expectations, is comfortable, and offers me the chance to enjoy the city as best I can.

All I can say is that MY HOUSE IS YOUR HOUSE! Or as we say round these parts, "Mi Casa es Tu Casa!"

name: Exclusive Apartament in Lavapies
description:
Quiet apartment bright fully equipped, close to major tourist attractions and cultural partner of the city located in the district of footbaths in the heart of Madrid.

The space
Apartment located in the neighborhood of Lavapies, in a refurbished “corrala” (singular buildings of the historical area) with a very nice view to the internal garden. Very quiet, bright, completely renovated, respecting the uniqueness of the original wooden roofs, pillars, and ancient brick walls.
The total surface is 42m2 divided in two independent levels: kitchen, lounge and bathroom in the first stage; bedroom in the upper attic stage (1,90 m in the walking area).

Guest access
The apartment is fully furnished, heat & air conditioning all over the house, TV 37 ", DVD, stereo, high speed wifi, double sofa bed in the lounge, ceramic hob, grill, Nespresso machine, washer-dryer machine, large capacity refrigerator, microwave oven. Fully equipped with housewares,
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Sombrerería Street, in the neighborhood of Lavapiés, a quiet downtown traffic restricted area. Lavapiés square is located at 3 min walking distance, 5 minutes to Reina Sofia Museum, 10 min to Atocha station, 15 min walking distance to Puerta del Sol. Around the house there’s a lot of supermarkets, greengrocers and butcher shops, which makes the daily shopping extremely easy, natural and fast.
Lavapiés is basically a pedestrian, bohemian and multicultural neighborhood that still keeps its historical essence. Important theatres (Valle Inclán), alternative theatres, art galleries, museums, cultural centers… all of them are spread around the area. At the same time, Argumosa Street offers a lot of charming sites for coffee, open lunch and dinners, music and dancing…it is a cultural mix that you can live during day and night.
host_about:
Hola soy Juan Ramón, Arquitecto Técnico, vivo en Madrid desde el 2001, una ciudad que desde el primer momento me hizo sentirme de aquí, me gusta la pintura, la música y el cine, disfrutar de la compañía de los amigos, viajar, mi gran refugio el mar.

Estaré encantado de atenderte y ayudarte a disfrutar de tu escapada Madrileña.

Saludos

name: Cozy and quiet flat near Madrid Rio
description:
Flat of generous 40 m2, completely reformed, with two bedrooms, one bathroom and a living room-kitchen, well equipped with almost new appliances; plus an 18m2 backyard for the guests to enjoy. It is located within the Puerta del Angel neighborhood, the University metro line
and bus station are really close by and it takes about 10 minutes to all the atractions in Madrid. The flat is next to Madrid Rio and Casa de Campo, very well known as the lung of the city as it is full of nature.

The space
The space is extremely calm and pleasant for short or long stays. As mentioned before, it has two bedrooms and is fully and well equipped.

Guest access
The apartment is at the complete disposal of the guest. Therefore, it is private and intimate. Regarding services, there is a coffee maker, a toaster, an electric kettle, and there are also all the essentials needed to be comfortable.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a quiet and traditional but lively Madrid neighborhood, where you can find a great array of banks, restaurants, bars, pharmacies, supermarkets, the San José de Calasanz Cultural Center, and medical care services such as the Centro Médico Pacífico or the Centro de Salud Caramuel.
In addition, the apartment is next to Madrid Rio, the Casa de Campo, the Prado de San Isidro and 10 minutes from downtown Madrid and all its main attractions and museums.
host_about:
Iris Nava (México, D. F. 1972)

Vivo y trabajó en Madrid.
Estudié Ciencias de la Cultura en la Universidad del Claustro de Sor Juana. Teatro en el Centro Universitario de Teatro de la Universidad Autónoma de México, y Sociología en la Universidad Nacional de México.
 Hé tomado cursos de danza y artes escénicas desde 1984 y cursos de performance, gestión cultural y turismo.
Soy hace 20 años gestora cultural he trabajado en la Embajada de México en España como coordinadora de Coordinadora de Humanidades y Eventos Especiales.  En Grupo INK  (Trestintas) Madrid como Coordinadora de Producción Interna.
He trabajado en diversas areas dentro del Museo Universitario del Chopo, México, D. F. y he formado parte del Comité Organizador del Festival Internacional Cervantino México, D.F. /Guanajuato, como Asistente de la Subdirección de Artes Plásticas y Actividades Académicas, también he realizado labores de coordinación en el Centro Nacional de las artes en Extensión académica bajo Jefatura de Teatro, Cine, Vídeo, Historia y Critica de las Artes. México, D. F.  Continuo haciendo labores de gestión cultural para museos como el Centro de Arte Dos de Mayo.  
Hago deporte, entre otros orientación, yoga algo de ciclismo, natación y cuando puedo surf, esquí 
Soy una voraz consumidora de cultura y una persona social.

La felicidad reside en las cosas sencillas, comer, viajar, querer, hace deporte, dormir,  si eres capaz de vivir como quieres serás feliz y Madrid es un gran lugar para serlo!.

name: Madrid Apartment Atocha
description:
This is a three bedroom, two bathroom (a full bathroom with bathtub and a toilet) apartment that can comfortably accommodate up to 6 adults.

The space
This is a three bedroom, two bath apartment (one with a bathtub and a toilet) that can comfortably accommodate up to 8 adults. The master bedroom has a double bed and an en suite bathroom. The second bedroom has another double bed and the third bedroom has two twin beds. The living room also has a sofa bed. All three bedrooms have large closets, are bright and quiet. The dining room is located between the living room and kitchen and has a large table for 8 people. The second bathroom is located next to the living room. The living room has an outdoor balcony with double glazed doors, two sofas and a reclining chair. The kitchen is fully equipped.

License number
VT381
neighborhood_overview: This apartment is ideal for families or groups looking for high quality and affordable lodging in the very center of Madrid. Its excellent location (Calle Atocha 84), next to Atocha metro and train station, will facilitate travel from anywhere in Madrid or Spain. Its proximity to the museum area (Reina Sofía, Prado and Caixa Forum are less than 5 minutes away), Retiro Park, or the historic center, will allow you to see Madrid by foot. The neighborhood is residential, very safe, and has all kinds of shops, restaurants and services.
host_about: Originally from a small city from the north of Spain (Pamplona), I moved to Madrid for a job in 2003. Before that, I spent 6 years in the USA. Mainly in Georgia, Miami and Utah. I love traveling, exercising, yoga and partying (it would be difficult not to in Madrid...). I love this city I am sure that you will love it as much as I do!

name: CoV19 Free Sunny Apt. Historic District - Sol
description:
The apartment is disinfected according to the existing recommendations of the health authority. Bed linen and towels are washed according to the hygiene protocol (disinfectant + 70º celsius laundry + iron). All surfaces known as virus carriers, such as door handles, switches, kitchen utensils and all furniture, are disinfected with specific antivirus products. I provide a virus prevention set for every guest (disinfection wipes, antibacterial hygiene hand gel 30 ml, protective mask and gloves).

The space
Cozy and bright south facing apartment, new and furnished with modern furniture, located on a quiet street behind Plaza Mayor and just around the corner from Puerta del Sol and Plaza Santa Ana. host_about:
Hola,

 Soy Melvin, desde hace 19 años trabajo como empresario en Madrid, es una ciudad encantadora que enamora tanto al residente como al turista que la visita. 

En Madrid encontrarás una gran oferta de resturantes, museos, tiendas, parques de atracciones, teatros, cines, te encantará. Por este motivo, gestiono apartamentos turísticos, tenemos un equipo de trabajo variado, contamos con personal que se encarga de entregar el apartamento, personal de limpieza y de lavandería, y que son parte fundamental del excelente servicio que brindamos cada día,  aportando al turismo de la ciudad, la oportunidad  de alojarse en mis apartamentos.

Uno de mis objetivos es viajar y conocer otras culturas, disfrutar de la gastronomía que ofrece el resto de Europa y su mágico encanto cultural.

Me apasiona todo lo que tenga que ver con el deporte, también disfruto de una buena película en casa con mi  familia sobre todo las comedias, pues me encanta reír. 

No me gusta preocuparme tanto por el futuro, solo intento vivir la vida, pasarlo bien y ser feliz cada día. 

Les deseo buena suerte y que disfruten de un lindo viaje a Madrid y al resto del mundo.

Para más información, no dudes en mirar los alojamientos que tenemos o puedes escribirme a través de la página de airbnb y te recomiendo el apartamento que mejor se adapte a tus necesidades.


Hello,

 I am Melvin, I have been working as an entrepreneur in Madrid for 19 years, it is a charming city that both the resident and the tourist who falls in love with.

In Madrid you will find a great offer of restaurants, museums, shops, amusement parks, theaters, cinemas, you will love it. For this reason, I manage tourist apartments, we have a varied work team, we have personnel who are in charge of delivering the apartment, cleaning and laundry personnel, who are a fundamental part of the excellent service we provide every day, contributing to the tourism of the city, the opportunity to stay in my apartments.

One of my goals is to travel and get to know other cultures, to enjoy the gastronomy that the rest of Europe offers and its magical cultural charm.

I am passionate about everything that has to do with sports, I also enjoy a good movie at home with my family, especially comedies, because I love to laugh.

I don't like worrying so much about the future, I just try to live life, have fun and be happy every day.

I wish you good luck and have a nice trip to Madrid and the rest of the world.

For more information, do not hesitate to look at the accommodations we have or you can write to me through the airbnb page and I recommend the apartment that best suits your needs.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Lavapiés, half way between the Antón Martín underground stop and Lavapiés, in the most beautiful street of the neighbourhood. This is a quiet but very lively area. Standing on the balcony it seems impossible that Madrid has more than three millions inhabitants. The Ave Maria Street feels like a village, people know each other; you have all the services you could need (chemists, supermarkets, blockbusters, vegetarian shop, fruit shops, bars, tapas, a range of shops...) 50 meters from your door.
Lavapiés is one of the oldest and most authentic neighbourhoods in Madrid. For centuries a range of different cultures have lived together and it is currently considered to be the most multicultural area of Madrid. It is full of restaurants and shops from all over the world. Strolling around its streets means immersing yourself in a diverse, welcoming and exciting reality. Hindu, Moroccan, Spanish or American voices will surround you. It is a lively, popular neig

Guest access

neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in a very quiet place, but it's very well connected and has every kind of shops, bars and restaurants around, where you can find everything you need.

Only 5 minutes away walking is the "Parque del Retiro", the biggest park in Madrid, adequate for making exercise, going for a walk, reading or having a drink in a terrace.

5 minutes away walking to the north is the Reina Sofía Museum, and 10 minutes away walking you arrive to El Prado Museum and Thyssen Museum. These are the three most important museums in the Madrid, called as The Triangle of Arts, placed in the District of Letters, and provide a huge offer for those who are lovers of paintings and arts.

The cultural offer in the area is completed with the cultural centers of "Caixa Forum" and "Círculo de Bellas Artes", also located in the District of Letters, "La Casa Encendida" and the "Circo Price", placed at 5 minutes walking to the south, and following is the "Tabacalera"

En casa vivimos Patricia y yo, llevamos una vida tranquila, mantenemos la casa limpia y ordenada, e intentamos que el huesped se encuentre a gusto, como si estuviera en su casa.

host_about: Estoy feliz compartiendo mi casa, creo que si en algo nos parecemos todos y cada uno es en el placer de tener oportunidad de conocer gente positiva , curiosa, de compartir con personas de diferentes nacionalidades momentos que son muy ricos donde podemos aprender mucho  sobre otras costumbres ,vivir experiencias , practicar otros idiomas,hacer disfrutar de nuestra ciudad , de su gastronomía , atracciones , particularidades y secretos que si nuestros huéspedes la conocieran por su cuenta dudo que pudieran absorber su verdadera esencia . En una palabra me gusta esta actividad , llevo poco tiempo en ella ya que antes  tuve oportunidad  de ser docente en mi ciudad natal  Buenos Aires , tuve tiendas de ropa con mis propios diseños aquí en Madrid y en cada una de ellas aprendí muchas que  espero me sirvan para este nuevo reto que he emprendido con mucho entusiasmo . Me encanta viajar , por trabajo he conocido muchos países y creo que es una experiencia enriquecedora . Amo la naturaleza , la vida al aire libre , hacer senderismo  y tratar de mejorar un poco este mundo participando en diferentes movimientos sociales . En una palabra me encanta estar viva.

Me gusta conocer gente de otros países.
El que la sigue la consigue.

I like meeting people from other countries.

name: Beautiful apt @Old Town and Royal Palace
description:
Charming spacious aparment for 4 people, with 2 balconies, AA and elevator in La Latina (Old Town), walking distance to the main sights

The space
Charming apartment in the most charming neighbourhood of Madrid, La Latina (Old Town/Habsburgs), a few minutes away from the Royal Palace, Cathedral and Plaza Mayor.
The space

The apartment is on the 4th floor WITH LIFT of an architecturally interesting building (declared as such by the town hall of Madrid), overlooking southest, so the house is very sunny and bright. We've put a lot of energy in making it a cozy home where you can feel at home from the very first moment.
There is a double bed in the bedroom (queen size 150 cm wide) and a sofa bed for other 2 people (140 cm wide) in the living room.
Guest access
The apartment is composed by:
* A living room with stylish decoration. Compfy sofa bed (410x 200cm) and 32"TV, A/C, dining table that fits comfortably 4 people and 2 balconies
neighborhood_overview:
La Latina is one of the most genuinely authentic neighbourhoods in the city of Madrid. It is located in the centre, and its mediaeval streets are arranged around the squares of La Cebada and La Paja.

The streets in this neighbourhood are an illustration of the most popular side of Madrid. This district is much frequented by locals thanks to its numerous bars, pubs and traditional taverns full of character in streets such as Cava Baja, Cava Alta and right in the squares of La Cebada and La Paja. Additionally, every Sunday the neighbouring streets are home to Madrid's famous El Rastro open-air street market.
This neighbourhood today is on the site of what was Madrid's first urban walled enclosure in the Middle Ages, and even now some remains of the defensive wall which originally surrounded it can still be seen. In the past this area was mainly occupied by artisans and manual workers, and the squares of both the Plaza de la Cebada ('barley square') and the Plaza de la Paj
host_about:
Hi!!

We welcome you to Spain and we wish you a good stay in Madrid!

Oscar works as a photographer and Vanessa is an actress and theatre producer (during 2017 I became mum, so I won't be doing check in's for a while). However, until some years ago Oscar was an engineer and Vanessa was a M&A lawyer. And then one day we decided to turn our lifes up side down and follow our real passions.

We are best friends and on May 2012 we decided to move forward and enroll in a small business together. Vanessa had been hosting with Airbnb for 2 years by then (renting the spare room at her place in Madrid/Milan and her apartment in Barcelona) and her experience (upgraded to Superhost in early 2011) was so positive that we decided we could also help other owners that don't live in town or don't have the time to rent their properties to travelers as you. And this is what we are doing now together. 

More about us, we love to travel: Vanessa has travelled 4 out of the 5 continents with a backpack that has been with her for 18 years now and now has enrolled in her new adventure: becoming a mum in spring 2017. Conversely, Oscar travels by bike and closer to Madrid, so as often as he can he takes his bike for a short trip in the mountains (he's really fit!). He has also spent several summers working in France. As the business grew, we took more people on board. Firstly Paula, a Venezuelan that has been living in Madrid for 11 years now, also keen on travels and on exploring new places. Paula is full of energy and we love her smiley caracter. And last but not least, Javi, whom you'll see on weekends and public holidays (and more often now that the Vanessa's baby is here!).

We are also keen in meeting new people and learning new things from them, but more importantly, we want you to feel at home at any of our apartments and that you feel that there's someone in town who cares for you:-) 

We enjoy little life pleasures like riding our bicycles or growing our small organic vegetables gardens. We like eco-friendly environments since we care a lot about our planet. 

We will help you to find you like home in this beautiful city and we look forward to having the opportunity to meet you soon!!

Oscar_ Bianca_ Javi

description:

The space

neighborhood_overview:
Lavapies district, which used to be the core of jewish and morish life hundreds years ago, is definitely the most cosmopolitan zone in Madrid. Having been one of the most genuine zones in the capital it became a multicultural place where you can find traditional local shops as well as Indian, Chinesse, South American and African ones.
It is great to walk around or go for lunch or dinner having the possibility to choose from a wide range of tapas in any of the numerous bars or restaurants nearby. You can also enjoy from the typical buildings such as “the corralas” or the enchanting architecture of XIX and early XX centuries.
Young people disperse in little terraces located in narrow streets throughout the district.
Beside the La Latina district and “El Madrid de los Austrias”. What else could you ask for?
Looking forward to welcoming you in my place!
host_about:
Hola! nací en Granada, aunque llevo bastante tiempo viviendo en Madrid.
Durante mucho tiempo me dediqué a la edición de libros y al trabajo en librerías, tanto en España como en el extranjero pero a día de hoy soy propietaria de La Pianola un bar en el céntrico barrio de Lavapiés, donde además organizamos conciertos, clases de baile, intercambio de libros y a veces intercambio de idiomas ya que este barrio tiene un amplio espectro de lenguas y culturas diferentes. 
Mis intereses se centran en la lectura, el teatro, el cine, la música, la fotografía y el tango-danza.
Y cuando tengo tiempo libre..., que cada vez me queda menos, salgo disparada a viajar y conocer sitios nuevos!

name: SPRINGTIME LOVELY ATTIC CHUECA MALASAÑA CITY HEART
description:
Beautiful attic in the heart of Madrid (Btw Chueca and Malasaña). Lovely terrace overlooking rootops of downtown Madrid . Air conditionating in all rooms. Newly remodelled and fully equiped. Ideal for two people. Madrid's city center at your fingertips

The space
A beautiful attic in the city heart provided with a lovely terrace overlooking downtown Madrid's rooftops for breakfast and relaxing moments. The apartment has one room with air-conditioning, a double bed with viscoelastic mattress and pillows. The room also has a coat rack and shelves for your clothes. The bathroom has three different size mirrors in different places and a rain effect showerhead. I provide you with clean towels, shower gel and shampoo. The living room is air-conditioned and equipped with a large-screen television with cable TV with European channels and a chromecast device (Netflix, HBO...). The kitchen has been recently remodelled and is fully equipped with a washing machine, dishwash
neighborhood_overview:
The attic is located in the very heart of Madrid, between Chueca and Malasaña in a quiet area. Corner to the famous shops street Fuencarral. Take a look here at the map of the area where I selected places where I use to go with friends (Not turistic places) to have a drink, eat or buy some food.
MUSEUMS: If you want to visit the famous museums just walk down Gran Vía. In fifteen minutes you'll enjoy Museo del Prado, Museo Thyssen, Museo de Cera, Museo de América, Museo Arqueológico, Fundación Telefónica, Museo de Ciencias Naturales, Museo de Historia, de Madrid…The main museums in town.
MONUMENTS: Just walking you can visit Palacio Real, Plaza Mayor, Puerta de Alcalá, Puerta del Sol, Cibeles, Plaza de España, Parque de El Retiro, Teatro Real. You dont need to get the metro or bus.
EATING: Typical spanish tapas bars, restaurants and markets are all around. San Miguel Market and Plaza Mayor is 10 minutes walking. If you like delicatessen-style food Mercado de San Anton
host_about:
I live in Chueca in the heart of Madrid. Mi home is a no lift 4th floor and its a exceptional attic. Living in the heart of town is great.  You have everything you need just in your fingertips. You only need to walk around to discovery shops, small restaurants,  drinks and a lot of special places. Madrid is a multiculture town. I love original thai, italian, or chinese food. When I want to go shopping i only need to take a  mall walk and find the best .
I like calm people. When i travel i like to take care of the places where i stay just because I love to go back and feeling welcome again. That’s the reason because I want the same. Ask me everything you need and It will be a pleasure helping you in my city.
