description:
It is an excellent apartment only 250 meters from Gran Vía, you can walk to all the tourist attractions of the city, Plaza España, Plaza Mayor, Plaza del Sol, Museums, Monuments, shops and historic center of Madrid.

The decoration of the apartment is modern with classic touches, and is located in the most central part of Madrid.

The space
The apartment is located in the heart of Madrid, about a 2 minute walk from the most emblematic street in the city such as Gran via "the great artery of Madrid" during your stay in this department you can disconnect and walk to enjoy the elderly points of interest in the city such as the paseo del prado where the famous Prado Museum is located where you can find the famous black paintings of Goya classic art and much more.

The wonderful Plaza Mayor and all its splendor, the Plaza de Oriente, Puerta del Sol, Plaza de Villa, San Ginés Church, Casa Cisneros, Temple of Debod and many more.

Without f
neighborhood_overview: Very safe area close to the Santo Domingo, Plaza España and Gran Vía Metro, excellent nightlife, restaurants, bars, historic center of Madrid, perfect for eclectic tastes and those who are not so much.
host_about:
Hola,

 Soy Melvin, desde hace 19 años trabajo como empresario en Madrid, es una ciudad encantadora que enamora tanto al residente como al turista que la visita. 

En Madrid encontrarás una gran oferta de resturantes, museos, tiendas, parques de atracciones, teatros, cines, te encantará. Por este motivo, gestiono apartamentos turísticos, tenemos un equipo de trabajo variado, contamos con personal que se encarga de entregar el apartamento, personal de limpieza y de lavandería, y que son parte fundamental del excelente servicio que brindamos cada día,  aportando al turismo de la ciudad, la oportunidad  de alojarse en mis apartamentos.

Uno de mis objetivos es viajar y conocer otras culturas, disfrutar de la gastronomía que ofrece el resto de Europa y su mágico encanto cultural.

Me apasiona todo lo que tenga que ver con el deporte, también disfruto de una buena película en casa con mi  familia sobre todo las comedias, pues me encanta reír. 

No me gusta preocuparme tanto por el futuro, solo intento vivir la vida, pasarlo bien y ser feliz cada día. 

Les deseo buena suerte y que disfruten de un lindo viaje a Madrid y al resto del mundo.

Para más información, no dudes en mirar los alojamientos que tenemos o puedes escribirme a través de la página de airbnb y te recomiendo el apartamento que mejor se adapte a tus necesidades.


Hello,

 I am Melvin, I have been working as an entrepreneur in Madrid for 19 years, it is a charming city that both the resident and the tourist who falls in love with.

In Madrid you will find a great offer of restaurants, museums, shops, amusement parks, theaters, cinemas, you will love it. For this reason, I manage tourist apartments, we have a varied work team, we have personnel who are in charge of delivering the apartment, cleaning and laundry personnel, who are a fundamental part of the excellent service we provide every day, contributing to the tourism of the city, the opportunity to stay in my apartments.

One of my goals is to travel and get to know other cultures, to enjoy the gastronomy that the rest of Europe offers and its magical cultural charm.

I am passionate about everything that has to do with sports, I also enjoy a good movie at home with my family, especially comedies, because I love to laugh.

I don't like worrying so much about the future, I just try to live life, have fun and be happy every day.

Estás en Las Ventas en 10 minutos, o en la Puerta del Sol en 15 minutos. Y tienes TODO lo que necesitas dentro de una caminata de cinco minutos. Las escaleras hasta el piso son los originales. Está en el tercer piso.

name: Madrid Apartment Príncipe
description:
Beautiful one-bedroom duplex apartment located in a spectacular area in the center of Madrid. Absolutely quiet (on the top floor) and able to comfortably sleep up to 4 adults: two on the main floor and two on the top floor.

The space
This is a bright, spacious one-bedroom duplex apartment. This beautiful apartment is divided into two levels. The bottom floor has a full bath with a shower, a kitchen connected to the living room, which has two sofas, and a dining table for four (expandable to six). One of the sofas is a sofa-bed for two. The master bedroom, located on the top floor, has a double bed, a spacious closet and a dresser with a half-length mirror. The apartment is very bright, as it has three large windows that open up onto the building’s rooftop terrace.

License number
VT807
neighborhood_overview: This beautiful one-bedroom duplex apartment is located in a spectacular area in the heart of Madrid, halfway between two of the city’s most famous sites: Puerta del Sol and Plaza de Santa Ana. The apartment is on the top floor of a renovated historic building on Calle Príncipe 16, a street buzzing with commercial activity, restaurants and services such as a supermarket only 100 meters from the building. The bustle of this neighborhood provides a contrast to the peace and tranquility enjoyed in the apartment, which is totally quiet thanks to its location on the top floor of the building (which has an elevator). The closest metro station is Sol (less than 5 minutes away), but from this location you will hardly need public transportation since all of the main points of interest are within walking distance.
host_about: Originally from a small city from the north of Spain (Pamplona), I moved to Madrid for a job in 2003. Before that, I spent 6 years in the USA. Mainly in Georgia, Miami and Utah. I love traveling, exercising, yoga and partying (it would be difficult not to in Madrid...). I love this city I am sure that you will love it as much as I do!

You can control the temperature in the apartment using the air-conditioning and the heating system.

Guest access
We give keys to our guests, so they can go in and out whenever they want. We provide towels and bed sheets, and also the amenities and equipment for the kitchen. There is a lift in the building. The wifi is free for everybody.
If you need any information about how to enjoy the city, we can help you with booking a tick
neighborhood_overview:
The city center is completely different from any other district. The night life is incredible, there are a lot of bars and restaurants close to the apartment. There are also theaters close to us - you can do everything in the center of the city.
The citizens are so friendly and kind, they are happy to help the tourists and make them feel like at home.
host_about: I love to travel but lately I do not have much time to do it. Having guests at home from all over the world is the most similar thing to travel. I can also show you the best restaurants of the area and help you with one day trips organization.

name: Lovely 3Bed w/Balcony in Madrid City Center
description:
Welcome to my lovely apartment - the perfect base for business travelers and visitors alike! Located in a stately building from the beginning of the century, it has been completely renovated respecting the style, with all services and facilities. The nearest tube is only two minutes walk away, and connects you the main attractions. With a fully equipped kitchen, a great location, gorgeous decor, and three balconies, the apartment has everything you need for a comfortable trip to bustling Madrid!

The space
The three bedroom apartment is spacious and relaxing, the ideal place to come back to after a day of exploring or work. Great transport links mean you’ll be right in the hub of the city but able to escape the hustle and bustle!

The living area is light and airy, with a gorgeous antic-style high ceiling and lovely finishing touches. You will love the feeling of luxury and comfort in the space, there is a large sofa, and flat screen TV. Sit back and ma
neighborhood_overview:
The cosmopolitan area of Chueca is the social capital of Madrid and is known for its famous Gay Pride parties in the summer months of June and July. The quaint, cobbled streets compliment the older community while the trendy bars and new art galleries cater to the younger generations. It is an open-minded and highly social community housed in this area of Madrid, with small streets and traditional Spanish architecture adding to the atmosphere. Well connected to the centre of Madrid, Chueca is the perfect place to enjoy a relaxing holiday or enjoy the social scene at the many bars and restaurants. Be sure to visit the famous San Antón Market for fresh food stalls, tapas, cultural highlights and events.

The area is well known for great restaurants, and Tepic is a good option to start your exploration of the food scene. The restaurant offers a modern twist on Mexican dishes, with the tacos being the speciality. Ex Libris offers a more formal yet fun menu of international cuisin

The space
Moon tiene una superficie aproximada de 90 m2 y forma parte de LA CASA DE LUNA.
Los huéspedes han calificado esta propiedad con 5 estrellas, destacando el trato amable y la comodidad.

- Gran salón con 2 balcones, chimenea, confortable sofá de tres metros lineales con cama doble oculta.

name: GRAN VIA STAR: TU CASA ESTELAR.
description:
Este romántico apartamento con decoración "shabby chic", apto hasta para 4 personas, convertirá tu viaje en una experiencia inolvidable.
Disfruta de esta cosmopolita ciudad de la mañana a la noche en el "Soho", la zona de moda de Madrid.

The space
STAR forma parte de LA CASA DE LUNA, pero tiene su propia puerta con llave de seguridad para una total privacidad e independencia.
Los huéspedes han calificado esta propiedad con 5 estrellas, destacando el trato amable y la comodidad.
La distribución se compone de:
- Salón con sofá nido (2 camas) y balcón.
- Barra con 4 taburetes y menaje de mesa.
- Dormitorio con 1 balcón y cama doble (140 x 200 cm) con 4 cajones de almacenaje.
- 2 armarios.
- Baño con ducha hidromasaje.
- Cocina con todo lo necesario para cocinar.
- Electrodomésticos: Placa inducción, microondas, frigorífico, extractor, cafetera, exprimidor, tostador, plancha, secador de pelo.
- Laundry con Pla
neighborhood_overview:
Junto a Gran Vía, STAR está localizado en el punto perfecto para iniciar la visita al Madrid monumental, gastronómico, cultural y nocturno. Quieres descubrirlo?
- VISITA MONUMENTAL: LA CASA DE LUNA es un excelente punto de partida para visitar el Madrid de los Austrias, la plaza Mayor, la zona de Opera con el Palacio de Oriente, El Retiro...
- MUSEOS: Bajando hacia Cibeles por la Gran Vía llegamos al Paseo del Prado, con la mejor oferta de Museos de la Ciudad: Museo Thysen, El Prado, Reina Sofía y CaixaForum son los principales.
- QUE HACER: STAR está en pleno "soho" madrileño, un barrio con una intensa vida cultural. Teatros, cines, salas de exposiciones, centros de canto, danza, talleres de pintura, salas de conciertos, editoriales, librerías, talleres artesanales, escuelas y centros de diseño... Simplemente paseando te tropezaras con todo un abanico de posibilidades.
- DONDE COMER: La zona presenta una rica y variada oferta gastronómica nacional e internacional.

name: Lovely Apartment in Malasaña 2
description:
Cozy apartment located in Malasaña, a bohemian area full of charm, history and culture.
Your home away from home!

The space
The apartment is very bright, there are 3 bedrooms, large living room with balconies, fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. The rooms are very cozy and bright with high ceilings and parquet floor.

Guest access
I'll give all you need for a pleasant stay. You'll find bed linen and towels, shower gel, shampoo and hair dryer. We have WIFI, landline telephone for free local calls, central heating and washing machine. You can use the lounge and kitchen and have your own space in the fridge and cupboards.
I have bikes available for rent and, on request, we can organize guided tour.
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is a delightful mix of characters, many tourists visit it, but Malasaña has a stable of artists, bohemians and eternal neighbours. Known for its many tapas places, cafes, pubs and excellent restaurants population.

name: Excelent location to visit Madrid
description:
Excelent location to enjoy Madrid, nearby Madrid’s 3 main museums (2 minutes walk to Prado museum 3 minutes to Thyssen-Bornemisza museum and 5 minute to Reina Sofia Modern Art Museum). Retiro Park (5 minutes walk), Puerta del Sol (5 minutres walk)-

The space
The apartment is located on the third floor of a historic listed building in the so called Barrio de Las Letras. The flat is quiet large master bedroom and a sofa that can eventually be used as a Bed. It has a lovely lounge and dining room, a bathroom, five small nice balconies. The space is comfortable and has all amenities required to cook and feel at home

Guest access
The flat is quiet large master bedroom and a sofa that can eventually be used as a Bed. It has a lovely lounge and dining room, a bathroom, five small nice balconies. The space is comfortable and has all amenities required to cook and feel at home.
neighborhood_overview: You can visit Madrid Historic Area within walking distance from the flat as it is located in the Historic Area “Barrio de Las Letras” and Huertas Neighbourhoods that offer cultural  and bustling nightlife. The street itself is beautiful, with bars, restaurants and taverns but the flat is very quiet at night. All of central Madrid (Sol, Gran Via, Lavapies, Plaza Mayor) is within walking distance from the flat.

name: Quiet 2 bedrooms, 5 min. Palace, WIFI & Heating
description:
The great location, the decoration, the tranquility and our attention are the features that our guests value the most. You will be staying in a 2 bedroom flat, in the heart of old Madrid, in the historic Austrias-La Latina. With elevator, it will suit all your needs and will enjoy a quiet sleep with AC in all the rooms. Bathroom and kitchen recently refurbished. Area with great restaurants, tapas bars, supermarkets and you will reach in a few minutes Royal Palace, Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor.

The space
The location is one of the features that our guests value the most. Our cozy apartment is located in one of the most historic street of the center of Madrid, where bullfighting took place in the middle age, and at 5 min or main touristic sites as Plaza Mayor and Royal Palace, and surrounded by great bars and restaurants. Being in the center of Austrias quarter, is located in the top of the building (do not worry, you will use the elevator¡), and it is the only apar
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is within walking distance to major attractions in the center of Madrid. At 5 minutes walking distance you can arrive to La Almudena Cathedral and Royal Palace,  in other 10 to 15 minutes you will arrive to Plaza Mayor and Puerta del Sol, and further ahead reach la Gran Vía, a main commercial street full of cinemas, theaters and restaurants. Heading to Manzanares River, in 10 minutes walk you can get to Madrid Rio, the splendid pedestrian and cycle track that spreads along the river Manzanares, full of nice terraces and parks. The atmosphere in the neighborhood is great, full of restaurants and delis, nice artisanal shops, and full of night live, especially around the Cava Baja. On sundays we are just also walking distance from Rastro street market, a wonderful and unique experience. We are also at 5 min of La Cebada Market where you can buy food or other basic things you might need. You will experience the best atmosphere in Madrid. Once you book our place we will send y
host_about:
I welcome you to Madrid and I wish you a pleasant stay in this exciting city. As a host, I am willing to offer you my house to relax and feel comfortable after a whole day visiting the city. I treat my guests as I like to be treated when I travel.

I love cooking and the Spanish cuisine so I will gladly share my gastronomic passion with people from other countries.  I'm foodie and I am always exploring new spots and cooking delicious recipes. 

I find very enriching meeting new people and learning new things from them and, of course, offer them my knowledge and experiences.

I will help you to feel you like home in this beautiful city and I look forward to having the opportunity to meet you soon at my house!!

Es un apartamento muy cómodo, con todo lo que se puede necesitar para la estancia porque está totalmente equipado, por otro lado ha sido decorado de forma que uno se siente como en casa, con toques que lo diferencian de hoteles y apartamentos más impersonales.

name: Quiet attic in La Latina
description:
Enjoy Madrid's city center in this quiet, spacious and cosy attic located in the beautifull neighbourhood of La Latina, close to the main turistic attractions and shops. Perfect for couples or small families.

The space
The attic is in the 4th and last floor. Because it's exterior and South-facing it is very bright. It´s 65 m2 approximately. It's situated in a quiet street, you will have complete privacy.

The bedroom is joint to the living room by a partition wall so it is perfect for a couple or 2 people, although it can comfortably sleep 3 people as it also has a sofa bed.

The kitchen is quite big and fitted with all appliances: oven, washing machine, dishwasher, microwave, toaster, four ring hob....

There's Wi-Fi, air conditioning and heating.
neighborhood_overview:
It's located in the quarter of La Latina, an area famous for its tapas bars. It is 5 min. away from El Rastro (Madrid's sunday market) and the Madrid of the Austrias, and 10 min. away from Sol, Plaza Mayor, Gran Vía, Palacio Real... also 10-15 min. away from the cultural area of museums like the Thyssen Museum, the Prado, Reina Sofia, La Casa Encendida, the National Library or the Archaeological Museum, to name a few. You can walk anywhere from here.

Nearby you'll find supermarkets, bars, cafes, restaurants, bakeries, playgrounds, etc

description:
¿Qué mejor que visitar Madrid y alojarse en plena Gran Vía madrileña? Te ofrezco un cómodo y céntrico piso para que puedas disfrutar de la ciudad como si estuvieras en tu propia casa, sólo o en compañía, ¡podréis alojaros hasta 6 personas! y además...

The space
La ubicación es única, se encuentra a muy poca distancia de los lugares más interesantes y emblemáticos de la ciudad (Sol, pza Callao, pza España, La Cibeles, Paseo del Prado, pza Mayor...), pero no creas que por estar situado cerca de la Gran Vía vas a dormir en una da las calles más ruidosas y transitadas de la ciudad...¡ Ni te enterarás! Es un piso interior de lo más silencioso y confortable.

El apartamento dispone de todos los servicios necesarios para tu estancia. Consta de dos habitaciones ambas con cama de matrimonio y además dispone de un sofá cama muy amplio. Tiene 1 baño totalmente equipado y una cocina de lujo! Totalmente equipada con todo el menaje necesario,

neighborhood_overview: Very safe area close to the Callao Metro and Gran Via, excellent nightlife, restaurants, bars, historic center of Madrid, perfect for eclectic tastes and those who are not so much.
host_about:
Hola,

 Soy Melvin, desde hace 19 años trabajo como empresario en Madrid, es una ciudad encantadora que enamora tanto al residente como al turista que la visita. 

En Madrid encontrarás una gran oferta de resturantes, museos, tiendas, parques de atracciones, teatros, cines, te encantará. Por este motivo, gestiono apartamentos turísticos, tenemos un equipo de trabajo variado, contamos con personal que se encarga de entregar el apartamento, personal de limpieza y de lavandería, y que son parte fundamental del excelente servicio que brindamos cada día,  aportando al turismo de la ciudad, la oportunidad  de alojarse en mis apartamentos.

Uno de mis objetivos es viajar y conocer otras culturas, disfrutar de la gastronomía que ofrece el resto de Europa y su mágico encanto cultural.

Me apasiona todo lo que tenga que ver con el deporte, también disfruto de una buena película en casa con mi  familia sobre todo las comedias, pues me encanta reír. 

No me gusta preocuparme tanto por el futuro, solo intento vivir la vida, pasarlo bien y ser feliz cada día. 

Les deseo buena suerte y que disfruten de un lindo viaje a Madrid y al resto del mundo.

Para más información, no dudes en mirar los alojamientos que tenemos o puedes escribirme a través de la página de airbnb y te recomiendo el apartamento que mejor se adapte a tus necesidades.


Hello,

 I am Melvin, I have been working as an entrepreneur in Madrid for 19 years, it is a charming city that both the resident and the tourist who falls in love with.

In Madrid you will find a great offer of restaurants, museums, shops, amusement parks, theaters, cinemas, you will love it. For this reason, I manage tourist apartments, we have a varied work team, we have personnel who are in charge of delivering the apartment, cleaning and laundry personnel, who are a fundamental part of the excellent service we provide every day, contributing to the tourism of the city, the opportunity to stay in my apartments.

One of my goals is to travel and get to know other cultures, to enjoy the gastronomy that the rest of Europe offers and its magical cultural charm.

I am passionate about everything that has to do with sports, I also enjoy a good movie at home with my family, especially comedies, because I love to laugh.

I don't like worrying so much about the future, I just try to live life, have fun and be happy every day.

I wish you good luck and have a nice trip to Madrid and the rest of the world.

For more information, do not hesitate to look at the accommodations we have or you can write to me through the airbnb page and I recommend the apartment that best suits your needs.

description:
Reina Victoria house is a great, luxurious gifted apartment with every possible comfort. The aristocratic building is from the begininng of the XX century. It´s decorated with vintage style and the metro is at the front door.

The space
Luxurious apartment with vintage and industrial decoration. The building is representative of the 20th century. It is located in the centre, in Moncloa district close to Canal de Isabel II Garden´s where you can go for a walk or run, golf and paddle.
The surroundings have good restaurants and tapas bars.

The apartment well -lit, quiet and full of details as AC in all the rooms. It has two bedrooms. The kitchen is full equipped, oven, microwave, dishwasher, washer drier. The house has been recently completly remodeled and it has been decorated with industrial furniture created by the designer from Madrid Noe Gonzalez. The bathrooms have rain-shower and decorative radiators.

Apartment have got WIFI.
host_about:
Somos una pareja divertida e inquieta. Nos gusta viajar para conocer nuevas culturas, lugares y su gente. Nos encanta compartir vivencias con personas con inquietudes similares.

Casa Reina Victoria es un hogar que hemos ido creando con mucho mimo y detalle para que vuestra estancia en Madrid sea muy especial y la recordéis con mucho cariño. 

Esperamos que disfrutéis muchísimo de vuestros días en esta ciudad llena de vida y estaremos encantados de ayudaros a solucionar cualquier duda que os surja durante vuestra estancia.

Gema e Igor

name: Excellent location - Huertas, Prado
description:
Beautiful apt in Madrid centre with all the amenities. Located in a very quiet street in Huertas. Two minutes walk from Retiro and five minutes from Sol. One balcony from where you can see the Retiro park.

Fully equipped, sofa-bed in the living-room, and Wifi-Wirel

The space
This flat is located a few steps from Retiro Park and very close to the Prado and Reina Sofia museums. "El barrio de las letras" is one of the most unique neighbourhood, quiet and sought-after in the center of Madrid. From this apartment you can walk to the three major museums in Madrid (the Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofía), the historic area (Puerta de Alcalá, Gran Vía, Puerta del Sol...). This is mainly a residential area that is quiet yet has a large number of cafes and restaurants. The closest metro station to the apartment is Atocha Renfe or Anton Martin.

Guest access
The apartment comes fully equipped and clean.
Bed linen / towels.
Fitted kit

You can also easily walk to the main museums El Prado and Reina Sofia, National Library and the City of Madrid, in the Plaza de Cibeles.

description:
We have carefully decorated this stylish 2 bedroom apartment in Barrio de Malasaña.
You will enjoy its central location within walking distance of most amenities, 5 minutes to Gran Vía.
We have a small "courtyard patio", a well equiped kitchen plus a large living room.
Services included: Wifi, bed linen and towels, air conditioning in the living room, final cleaning
We will be pleased to host you, our home is your home

The space
Modern apartment in Malasaña neighborhood, for 6 people.
Quiet and well insulated to ensure a relaxing stay.
2 bedrooms with 2 double beds and a double sofa bed in the living room, internal terrace, wifi, air conditioning in the living room and independent kitchen.

Guest access

We can help you to book airport transfer, Madrid culinary tour, Segovia/Toledo/Ávila day trip, Flamenco show

Internet

neighborhood_overview:
Home to a population of mainly young professional, Malasaña neighborhood has seen an increase of its popularity in the last years. As such, the vicinity is currently the liveliest area in the city center.
Centrally located, most of the amenities are within walking distance; you can stop for a tapa in one of the countless bars or enjoy micro-theatre performances. You can wander in the little streets surrounding the historic Plaza del 2 de Mayo square just a stone throw from the Gran Vía Avenue and Plaza del Sol.
The neighborhood counts as well on thriving cultural life such as theatres, art galleries and the main city museums (Prado , Reina Sofia, Thyssen) which are very close.
Fashion victims will be pleased to stroll through Fuencarral Street and its surroundings with their vast array of trendy and vintage shops as well as the main international franchises.
Should you be interested in a particular activity let us know so we can share our local knowledge.
host_about:
Entusiasta de Madrid, me gusta pasear por sus calles y observar cómo cambia la ciudad, sus gentes, el paso de las estaciones o simplemente perderme por el centro.
La felicidad reside en las cosas sencillas, comer, viajar, querer, hace deporte, dormir,  si eres capaz de vivir como quieres serás feliz y Madrid es un gran lugar para serlo!.
Al mismo tiempo necesito escapadas frecuentes a la montaña y al mar, contacto con la naturaleza que se pierde en las ciudades.

name: Classy and Historic *2Bed/1Bath*
description:
Settle in our charming, stylish, high-ceiling apartment. Abundant natural sunlight flows through its 3 balconies! The Gourmet Kitchen is perfect for entertaining as it opens into the grand living room. Located in the heart of everything!

The space
Spanning 870 square feet, this newly renovated apartment consists of a grand living room, a fully-equipped kitchen connected to it, two bedrooms, and a bathroom. Decoration has been carefully selected for you to be immersed in a classic but comfortable and fresh ambiance. Three balconies channel abundant daylight into the rooms and offer a full view of the quiet street, from the Nuñez Palace at one end to the San Cosme Chuch at the other.

Guest access
Located in the heart of everything “Barrio de las Letras” has to offer, from quick subway and train access to acclaimed restaurants, shops, parks, and museums. The Reina Sofia is just around the corner!

neighborhood_overview:
Pure life.No doubt about it, the Barrio de las Letras contributeslargely to life in Madrd, replete with people working and enjoying their timeoff, who live in an extraordinary milieu.
In a distric with a clearclassic feel, we believe it apt to repeat Baltasar Gracian´s words:"All that really belongs to us is time".Well, this is our time, the time for a community with roots that unfurl just perfectly into 21st century. Enjoy your time with us! WELCOME

host_about:
Hola,

 Soy Melvin, desde hace 19 años trabajo como empresario en Madrid, es una ciudad encantadora que enamora tanto al residente como al turista que la visita. 

En Madrid encontrarás una gran oferta de resturantes, museos, tiendas, parques de atracciones, teatros, cines, te encantará. Por este motivo, gestiono apartamentos turísticos, tenemos un equipo de trabajo variado, contamos con personal que se encarga de entregar el apartamento, personal de limpieza y de lavandería, y que son parte fundamental del excelente servicio que brindamos cada día,  aportando al turismo de la ciudad, la oportunidad  de alojarse en mis apartamentos.

Uno de mis objetivos es viajar y conocer otras culturas, disfrutar de la gastronomía que ofrece el resto de Europa y su mágico encanto cultural.

Me apasiona todo lo que tenga que ver con el deporte, también disfruto de una buena película en casa con mi  familia sobre todo las comedias, pues me encanta reír. 

No me gusta preocuparme tanto por el futuro, solo intento vivir la vida, pasarlo bien y ser feliz cada día. 

Les deseo buena suerte y que disfruten de un lindo viaje a Madrid y al resto del mundo.

Para más información, no dudes en mirar los alojamientos que tenemos o puedes escribirme a través de la página de airbnb y te recomiendo el apartamento que mejor se adapte a tus necesidades.


Hello,

 I am Melvin, I have been working as an entrepreneur in Madrid for 19 years, it is a charming city that both the resident and the tourist who falls in love with.

In Madrid you will find a great offer of restaurants, museums, shops, amusement parks, theaters, cinemas, you will love it. For this reason, I manage tourist apartments, we have a varied work team, we have personnel who are in charge of delivering the apartment, cleaning and laundry personnel, who are a fundamental part of the excellent service we provide every day, contributing to the tourism of the city, the opportunity to stay in my apartments.

One of my goals is to travel and get to know other cultures, to enjoy the gastronomy that the rest of Europe offers and its magical cultural charm.

I am passionate about everything that has to do with sports, I also enjoy a good movie at home with my family, especially comedies, because I love to laugh.

I don't like worrying so much about the future, I just try to live life, have fun and be happy every day.

I wish you good luck and have a nice trip to Madrid and the rest of the world.

For more information, do not hesitate to look at the accommodations we have or you can write to me through the airbnb page and I recommend the apartment that best suits your needs.

Habitación con encanto en la mejor zona de Madrid. Al lado de Plaza España, Plaza Mayor, Palacio Real, Parque del Oeste. Calefacción, ascensor, wifi, lavadora y todas las comodidades que necesitas. neighborhood_overview: El barrio de Argüelles vecino a Moncloa (Universidad), el distrito centro, el Palacio real, Plaza España, Gran Vía y el viejo Madrid, es un área señorial y de gran encanto por su arquitectura ordenada, sus calles arboladas, la variedad de transporte urbano y la cercanía de un auténtico oasis: el parque del oeste.
host_about: Me gusta la gente que viaja, porque a mi me encanta hacerlo. Soy una apasionada de Madrid, ciudad en la que vivo desde hace muchos años. Mi nivel de inglés y francés  es básico tirando a medio, pero estoy deseando practicar.

name: Singular y luminoso apartamento rústico en el corazón de La Latina
description:
Disfruta de una pequeña y rústica cabaña ubicada en pleno centro. Baja al patio y date un baño de sol. Ubicado en el corazón de uno de los barrios más pintorescos de Madrid, este apartamento es un buen punto de partida para conocer la capital.

License number
Vivienda registrada VT-659
neighborhood_overview: Con una ubicación envidiable, este apartamento ofrece la comodidad de moverse a pie por el centro de la capital y la singularidad de una auténtica corrala de vecinos. La Latina es además un barrio multicultural bien comunidado con el resto de zonas.
host_about:
Me encantan los animales y la naturaleza. Disfruto muchísimo yendo con mi hija y mis perros al campo desconectando de la ciudad. Entre mis aficiones se encuentra el bricolaje, montar en bici y pasear por el campo o perderme callejeando por las mañanas por las calles de Madrid. 

El apartamento ha sido reformado completamente por mi hija y por mí, creando una pequeña cabaña en pleno corazón de la ciudad, que permita a tod@s los viajer@s por un lado, disfrutar del bullicio y de la vida en la capital y por el otro, que les permita relajarse y desconectar. Porque para mí viajar no es más que  un libro que se lee con los pies.

neighborhood_overview:
The building totally reformed is in the Chueca district of that are the epicenter of Madrid and everything a symbol of modernity, vanguard and tolerance. In its streets he is easy to find diversion, fashion and much ambient.

The district of Chueca is in the zone center of the city and the streets of Fuencarral and Hortaleza are their main axes. In the last years, this area has become the standard of the freedom and opening of the Madrilenian society.

It is a district to enjoy the fashion because it lodges stores of all type. Also they are streets to enjoy the friends and at night because it has the numerous premises of celebration, or is for having a drink calmly or to dance until high hours. In the same way, the gastronomical proposals with restaurants of design abound, popular or of international kitchen. And everything in a tolerance atmosphere and diversity.

name: Hab. de Matrimonio -Palacio Real
description:
Habitación de matrimonio con baño propio, en la zona de El Madrid de los Austrias, barrio que está dentro del antiguo recinto árabe de Madrid, una de sus zonas más exclusivas de la ciudad, a unos 100 m. del Palacio Real y la Plaza Mayor.

The space
La vivienda data de 1859, sus techos son de casi de 4 m. de altura y tienes columnas y vigas vistas de madera. La cama perteneció a mi abuelo y fue traída de Cuba a principios del siglo XX. El edificio es un remanso de paz.

Guest access
No hay servicio de cocina y el uso de la nevera y las zonas comunes es previo permiso.

Other things to note
La hora de check-in es a partir de las 13:00 hasta las 21. A partir de las 21 y hasta las 00, hay un sobre cargo de 35 € que el cliente abonará a la entrada. La hora de check out es antes de las 12:00.
neighborhood_overview: Enclavado en el barrio más antiguo de Madrid, los Austrias, con calles empedradas, casas señoriales de grandes portales, pequeñas plazas y antiguas iglesias... Nadie queda indiferente a tanta belleza!
host_about:
Soy de Tenerife pero vivo en Madrid desde hace 28 años. Desde hace 25 años soy profesor titular del Conservatorio Profesional de Amaniel. También doy conciertos, la mayoría como solista.
Además de la música mi otra pasión es la lectura y la escritura. He publicado, hasta el momento, ocho libros de poesía y numerosos ensayos. Mi otra afición es el deporte. Me considero una persona culta que aprecia la sabiduría de la vida.

The flat is bright, charming and is situated between the Anton Martin subway stop, Lavapiés subway stop and Atocha Train Station, two minutes walk to the Reina Sofia Museum and 10 minutes to the Prado Museum.

The building is very unique, it is a 'Corrala', a type of building very characteristic of the popular neighborhoods of Madrid, dating from 1890 although it is restored, in perfect condition and has a very special atmosphere that transports you to the time in that the neighborhood was the Jewry of Madrid. The interior courtyard with its flowers and plants is very beautiful.

name: Habitación  DOBLE/INDIVIDUAL tranquila y céntrica
description:
Con confortable y cómoda cama grande de 1,35 cms. La habitación es de tamaño mediano, tiene armario de dos hojas,escritorio y mesita de noche. Es muy silenciosa tranquila y luminosa, está en una zona muy bien comunicada por metro, tren y autobuses, aunque se puede ir al centro y puntos turísticos caminando en un agradable paseo en 15 minutos. En el piso vivo yo y las personas que venís a alojaros y que me encanta recibiros. Así que hay muy buen ambiente.

The space
La habitación está situada en un barrio muy tranquilo y bastante céntrico, aunque alejado del bullicio, las aglomeraciones y de los ruidos. Hay un bonito paseo en tan solo 15 minutos a pie desde Sol hasta el piso. Está maravillosamente comunicado con la estación de renfe de Atocha (ahora llamada "Estación del Arte"), la estación sur de autobuses (Mendez Alvaro) y el aeropuerto. En la zona hay supermercados, bancos, cafeterías, terrazas...y se encuentra a 5 minutos de zonas de descanso como Madrid Río o
neighborhood_overview: Es un bonito barrio tranquilo muy bien comunicado que tiene de todo: supermercados, tiendas, bancos, bares, zonas de ocio. Está muy cerca de las zonas turísticas del centro de Madrid y de zonas de ocio y de la ribera del río Manzanares.
host_about:
Soy una persona muy sociable, aventurero y me encanta conocer gente, los deportes, viajar y disfrutar de las pequeñas cosas de la vida y compartir experiencias, a ser posible rodeado de buenos (Email hidden by Airbnb) gusta hacer que cada huésped que pasa por aquí se sienta como en su propia casa.

I am a very sociable and adventurous person and I love meeting people, sports, travel and enjoy the little things in life and share experiences, possibly surrounded by good friends.
I like to make every guest that passes by here feel at home

name: Apartment in Madrid historic center
description:
Apartment equipped with a double bed, two single beds, bathroom and kitchen. Tranquillity assured in the historic center of Madrid, Plaza of Spain, located 50 meters from Gran Via, 250 meters from the Royal Palace.

The space
Apartment equipped with a double bed, two single beds in loft area, a bathroom and kitchen equipped with everything you need to cook, washing machine, hairdryer, iron, TV, wifi.

Guest access
The subway ride is the best way to travel from the Airport to “Plaza de España” (the area where the apartment is located) The subway station is at the Airport. and the subway station "Plaza de España" is in front the building.

Other things to note
There is a playground next to the building.
neighborhood_overview: Ideal for a walk along the emblematic "Gran Via", "Puerta del Sol", "Plaza Mayor", "Debod Temple", "el Rastro", and visit  museums "el Prado", "Reina Sofia", and "Thyssen Bornemisza" , near the Amusement natural Park "Casa de Campo" and "El Retiro" fun for the young. Located in the historical city center of Madrid.
host_about: Saludos desde Madrid.  Para todas las personas que quieran visitar esta hermosa ciudad y descansar en este alojamiento agradable, tranquilo y acogedor, el apartamento está situado en pleno centro histórico de Madrid. Me encanta la história y el arte de mi ciudad, y estoy seguro  que también te gustará;  desde este alojamiento puedes ir paseando a los sitios de mayor interés cultural y artístico de Madrid, aquí encontrarás un ambiente agradable y acogedor.

description:
El piso está en el barrio de Delicias, a 4 paradas en metro del centro. Es una zona tranquila y con encanto, cerca hay lugares de interés como el museo del ferrocarril donde organizan mercados de diseño y comida, el Madrid río y el El Matadero.
____
The apartment is located in Delicias, an authentic and cozy neighborhood, well comunicated to the city center: 4 stops in tube. You have the railway market nearby, where they organize flea markets, also the river and the Matadero Creation Center.

The space
El piso es muy luminoso y tranquilo. Tendrás un cuarto privado con baño privado.
____
The flat is very luminous and peaceful, you will have a private room with a private bathroom.

name: Cozy & comfortable double sofa bed
description:
Comfortable double sofa bed in a cool & charming 45 sq. studio apartment. Shared place with us, for 1 person (divided with curtains for privacy). Centrally located, 3min walk to metro station Bilbao & Quevedo (L1,L2 & L4). 15min walk to Gran Vía.

The space
The apartment is fully furnished, sofa bed, bathroom and kitchen. The price includes tea, coffee, hot water shower, toilet paper, clean bed sheets and towels.
Located in Chamberi, few minutes walking to very known Malasaña neighborhood, where you can find Madrid famous chill out bars and restaurants, mix of old and modern famous tapas bar, Famous Fuencarral street with cinemas and trendy shops.
In the apartment there is no air conditioning, because the building was constructed with thick clay bricks walls which naturally maintains the internal temperature, fresh and cool during summer. A ceiling fan is sufficient.

Guest access
Kitchen, refrigerator, books and local guides.

name: Sunny Bedroom in the center of Lavapiés
description:
A beautiful room with lots of light and balcony. One matrimony size bed. It is a great place to relax. It is located in the heart of Lavapiés, a bustling bohemian neighborhood with a lot to offer. I prefer month long reservations but I am also open to week stays.

The space
This is a lovely space located in the central neighborhood of Lavapies. The room itself has a queen bed, a full huge closet, a balcony and it´s luminous. There is also a spacious shared bathroom and living area with 2 balconies. The kitchen is also fully equipped with all the basics ( spices, oils, sugar etc...)
The apartment is right off of the Lavapies metro and within walking distance (15 minutes) to Atocha Train Station and Puerta del Sol (the heart and center of Madrid), the Prado museum as well as the Reina Sofia. The neighborhood is a vibrant, multicultural space with plenty of shops, restaurants and bar to enjoy within a short walk. Price very reduced if you stay for a month!
neighborhood_overview: It's quite close to some of the most culturally interesting sites in Madrid, such as the modern art museum Reina Sofía, the Thyssen Museum or the Museo del Prado. You can enjoy the area by simply taking a walk or just sitting in one of the many little bars and restaurants right by the apartment.

name: Apartamento en La Latina
description:
Precioso dúplex de 65m2, situado en una zona tranquila y cerca de todos los lugares de interés: Plaza Mayor, Barrio de la Latina, Restaurante Mercado de San Miguel, Palacio Real, Catedral de la Almudena, Jardines del Moro, Jardines Sabatini, Botín. Te va a encantar mi lugar debido a el ambiente relajado y a que está rodeado de zonas verdes. El piso tiene vistas a un parque y una luz preciosa, incluso ves la puesta de sol desde el salón.

The space
Es un dúplex encantador, Muy luminoso y confortable.
En el primer piso se encuentra el Salón con sofá-cama de 1,40m, la cocina y el baño con bañera. Todo perfectamente ventilado ya que hay 5 balcones exteriores a zonas ajardinadas.
El piso superior es tipo buhardilla con una cama de 1,60x2,00m, nuestros estudios, armarios y cajoneras.

El piso es ideal para una pareja para estar cómodos. Es donde vivimos, así que todas nuestras cosas están ahí y confiamos en el buen hacer de los inquilinos.
neighborhood_overview: Está a 5 minutos andando del bullicioso centro y su fiesta y de zonas tan emblemáticas como La Catedral de la Almudena y el Palacio Real, pero a la vez es tranquila y relajada por estar rodeada de zonas verdes y tener el río Manzanares y la Casa de Campo a 2 minutos, por donde podréis disfrutar de bonitos paseos.

description:

**
I am offering a room on the third floor of a newly built building, preferably for a person. Located in the heart of Madrid

The space
Se trata de una habitación en piso muy luminoso, 3ª planta con ascensor (unos 70 metros) en un edificio de nueva construcción. Situado en el corazón de Madrid a unos pasos de la plaza de tirso de Molina. Es uno de los barrios más antiguos y castizos. Cuenta con un gran salón muy acogedor y amplio lleno de luz y con balcón, una cocina totalmente equipada, y un baño muy mono. La decoración muy cuidada hará que te sientas como en casa. Sólo somos un vecino por planta, por lo que estoy seguro que no tendrás problemas para descansar, ya que se trata de una comunidad muy tranquila y las características de la edificación hacen que no escuches ni un solo ruido de la calle mientras estás en la habitación.
neighborhood_overview:
Es un barrio castizo y carismático. Orientado al turismo cultural, pero también con mucho ambiente festivo. Tienes multitud de teatros y museos en las inmediaciones del piso, así como salas de exposiciones cines (tanto normales como de Versión Original) y parques. Sin duda es un barrio lleno de vida.

*******************************************************

Charming and historical. Perfect place for tourists, with a very festive atmosphere. Very close to many theaters and museums as well as recreational parks.
Without a doubt its a neighborhood full of life.
host_about:
Ingeniero Industrial de profesión. Me gusta mucho conocer gente de todo el mundo, viajar y compartir tiempo con mi familia y amigos.

Me encantan los deportes y salir a disfrutar de la ciudad con mis amigos. Soy una persona muy abierta y tolerante.

********************************************************************************************

Young Industrial engineer of profession, I love meeting new people from all around the world, I like to travel and to spend time with family and friends. 

I love sports as well as going out to the city with my friends. I am a very open minded person and reasonable.

The house is located in one of the most exciting neighborhoods of Madrid, Atocha- Lavapies.

name: Bienvenidos en Malasaña!
description:
A 20'del aeropuerto,céntrico apartamento de diseño recién reformado en el barrio más característico de Madrid.Silencioso,cuenta con 2baños,2habitaciones,cocina equipada,amplio salón,WIFI fibra óptica,sabanas,toallas,secador de pelo,productos baño

The space
A 20 minutos de metro del aeropuerto (T1,T2,T3,T4) y de la estaciones centrales de Atocha y Chamartín, el alojamiento esta situado entre los barrios de Chueca y Malasaña cerca de la Gran Vía y de la Plaza del Sol. Aquí se encuentran los bares de culto en los años 70-80 creando el ambiente alternativo y vivo que caracterizan esta preciosa y autentica zona de Madrid.

El apartamento es muy luminoso y no obstante se encuentre en el pleno centro es muy silencioso y intimo. Cuenta con 2 baños, 2 habitaciones (una de ella con el baño en la habitación), una cocina totalmente equipada con lavadora, lavavajillas, horno a microondas, horno, tostador, batidora.. y un amplio salón con una ventana y un balcón des
neighborhood_overview:
El histórico barrio de Malasaña juntos al adyacente barrio de Chueca representan los barrios más importantes de la movida madrileña. Aquí se concentran los bares de culto en los años 70-80 creando el ambiente alternativo y vivo que dan autenticidad a esta preciosa y característica zona de Madrid. Podrás alcanzar todo el resto del centro de Madrid en un máximo de 20 minutos caminando.

Los sitios turísticos de más interés: la plaza del Sol, la plaza Mayor, el Palacio Real, el teatro de la Opera, los Jardines de Oriente, la puerta de Alcalá, el parque del Retiro, la plaza de la Cibeles, el Museo del Prado (donde podrás admirar muchas obras de Velazquez y Goya entre otras), el Museo Reína Sofia (donde podrás admirar el famoso cuadro "Guernica" de Picasso entre otras obras ), el museo Thyssen Bornemisza (donde podrás admirar pinturas antiguas y modernas) ...

.. y si estás cansado y no te apetece más caminar no te preocupes .. lineas de metro y parada de buses muy cerc

name: LOFT EN CHUECA : V
description:
Hola! Me llamo Vega y hace más de 10 años que vivo en uno de los barrios más auténticos de todo Madrid, Chueca. Tu futura casa durante unos días está en el corazón del barrio y a 5 min andando de Gran Vía, Malasaña y Sol.

The space
El que será tu loft en Chueca tiene todo lo necesario para que disfrutes de unos días inmejorables en Madrid. Con una cocina americana y un salón común decorado por una servidora, sólo espero que tu estancia aquí sea perfecta y puedas vivir Madrid de la mejor manera posible. Hace más de 10 años que vivo aquí y no cambiaría esta casa por nada el mundo. Ahora quiero que tú también la puedas disfrutar y por eso me he querido meter en esta aventura de AirBnB. En el momento en que tengas tus llaves quiero que te sientas como en casa. Con televisión, wifi, lavadora, microondas...Vamos! Con todo lo necesario. Y una cosa muy importante para el verano, en esta casa no se pasa calor.
neighborhood_overview: Tu loft en Chueca está en la frontera de Malasaña, entre la calle Hortaleza y Fuencarral, dos de las calles más icónicas de Madrid. Una de las zonas más de moda de la ciudad.
host_about:
Loft en Chueca : recien estrenado  Alquilo dos Habitaciones 
Me llamo  Vega y soy atista plastica y llevo alquilando habitaciones hace 10 años

name: Bonito apartamento en pleno Colón
description:
The space
Es un pequeño apartamento de 30m2 ideal para una persona sola o una pareja. Se encuentra en muy buen estado y cuenta con todo lo necesario para poder disfrutar de Madrid como si estuvieras en tu propia casa.

La plaza de Colón se encuentra situada entre dos de las mejores zonas de Madrid, justo en el eje Paseo del Prado/Castellana, que recorre una parte importante de la ciudad. Cruzando la plaza te sitúas en la calle Serrano, el epicentro de la zona de compras y el barrio elegante de Madrid por antonomasia. A la espalda del edificio empieza el distrito de Justicia, más moderno pero también lleno de tiendas, restaurantes y locales de ocio.

Downtown apartment close to the Retiro park and museums, perfect to enjoy Madrid in couple, family or friends.

neighborhood_overview:
Location is one of the most important values of the apartment since is just on the heart of Salamanca district, where you can find all types of restaurants for tapas adapted to all kind of budget. Also the district is the main commercial area of madrid, where you have to types of areas: Goya street where you can find all the chain shops ( Zara, Mango, El corte ingles...) and also very close from Serrano where are the premium brands ( Chanel, Loewe...). You can also find 100 meters El Retiro, the main park of the city, and Alcala monument. And only 20 minutes walk of the Prado and Thyssen museum.
On the other side is very well communicated via metro ( there are 4 stations only 5 five minutes walk) and also by bus. If you take the metro you are only at ten minutes of Gran Via and Callao which is know as the city center.

name: Habitación luminosa centro ciudad
description:
Habitación exterior amplia y luminosa con armario, para una persona responsable y ordenada. Situada entre la Catedral de la Almudena y Madrid Rio. Próximo a Príncipe Pio, muy bien comunicado.
Cerca de parques históricos. 4º piso, ascensor.

Guest access
Zonas comunes de la casa: Salón, cocina y cuarto de baño. Equipados con todos los electrodomésticos.
neighborhood_overview: Barrio de Imperial, junto a Centro y Palacio. Se trata de un barrio de los años 30 enclavado en la parte baja del cerro de las Vistillas y de la Catedral de la Almudena y circundado por el Parque de Atenas y el Campo del Moro y por Madrid Rio. Recientemente se ha instalado en la manzana de al lado el Campus Madrid de Google. Es un barrio familiar con muchos bares y supermercados y muy bien comunicado con el resto de Madrid así con sus salidas por estar junto a la M-30 y a la estación de cercanías de Príncipe Pío (metro, autobuses y tren de cercanías). También en este complejo, hay un centro comercial (Warner) con muchas tiendas y cines.
host_about: Me gusta charlar y saber de las costumbres de otras regiones o países. Me gustan los idiomas, la música y el deporte (y Madrid...). Tengo en casa una colección de CD´s musicales, de mapas y DVD´s de películas, así como biblioteca.

name: Malasaña centre
description:
I recently renovated this appartment in the center of malasaña for family visits.
Its a 40sqm exterior with wifi, air conditioning and anything you may need to enjoy your stay.

The space
Its an air conditioned 40sqm exterior + two balconies and an entrance hall. I designed the space (Im an architect) to feel as big and spacious as possible. It has one bed room and a sofa that opens up to a double bed. Its still very new, but already is getting its own personality.
Its a third floor and has two big exterior windows with a good view and lots of light.
neighborhood_overview: The flat is in the center of malasaña. If you are looking to stay where the Madrileños live and go out, this is definitively one of the best choices.

name: Renowed appartment in Malasaña
description:
A 70m² renewed apartment located in Malasaña, in the city center. In a quite street beside garden squares and restaurants where you can enjoy the city. It ’s very well connected to the main touristic points;
The perfect place to enjoy Madrid!

The space
Cozy and very light apartment with wood floor; you'll can enjoy all kind of commodities that will help you to have a great stay.
Our apartment has room for 4 people; a room with a doble bed and a comfy fold-out coach in the sitting room. Two bathrooms and a kitchen with all kind of appliances for any need you have.

Guest access
Located in the centre of Madrid. Easy to get from the airport (45 min in public transport). The building has a lift, really helpful if you have chart babies, heavy suitcases or just feel lazy.

Other things to note
In the kitchen you will find toasts, coffee and tea in case you want to enjoy your breakfast at home.
neighborhood_overview: This is a quartier full of trendy restaurants, public squares, 2nd hand- shops and streets markets where you could enjoy the city as a local.  Although Malasaña is  a very lively area there are no pubs in our street, so a good sleep is always guaranteed.
host_about:
Me llamo Marta  y te invito a que disfrutes de nuestra casa en el centro de Madrid. 
Si tienes cualquier duda sobre nuestra casa, no dudes en escribirme, te contestaré encantada.

neighborhood_overview:
Sumérgete en el barrio de moda de Madrid. Zona semi-peatonal, en que podrás disfrutar del ambiente joven, multicultural y a la vez típico madrileño.

Lavapiés es un barrio tranquilo, pero con un montón de cosas que hacer, restaurantes, bares, teatros, galerías de arte y tiendas pequeñas.

La casa tiene unos 100 m y cuenta con un amplio salón comedor, dormitorio principal, otro dormitorio con dos camas y otra habitación estar con un sofá cama doble que comunica con una amplia y moderna cocina, donde pueden dormir otra u otras dos personas. Un baño completo y un aseo, asi como una terracita de teka (ideal para fumar x ej) que da a un gran patio que hace q la casa sea luminosa y silenciosa por completo aun estando en el centro de Madrid.
Cuenta con calefacción central, aire acondicionado, ascensor, wifi privado, equipo de música, 3 TV, DVD, ordenador e impresora. Microondas, lavavajillas, lavadora, frigorífico congelador, vitrocerámica, cafetera, tostadora, exprimidor para zumos, planc
neighborhood_overview: Es un barrio muy bonito, tranquilo, seguro de dia y de noche y muy bien comunicado con cualquier punto de la ciudad, tanto en metro como en bus o coche. Está lleno de bares, restaurantes para tapear o comer muy bien, asi como supermercados y sitios donde tomar una copa, cines, gimnasio, piscina cercanos a la casa, etc.
host_about: Mi nombre es Carmen y soy una apasionada de viajar y conocer gentes y ciudades de todo el mundo, cosa que he hecho gracias a mi trabajo como Organizadora de Eventos. Actualmente soy Coach terapeuta emocional especializada en "autoestima e imagen interior y exterior".  Me encanta la decoración y la moda como aficiones. La casa que alquilo es muy acogedora y elegante y un remanso de paz en el centro de Madrid. Me encargo personalmente de ella por lo que yo os daría la bienvenida y os orientaría y explicaría los sitios donde ir en la ciudad y alrededores, ya que nací en Madrid y lo conozco muy bien. Además os  daré trucos y sitios de gran interés pero menos turísticos, dependiendo de vuestros gustos y aficiones, donde podréis ir, ya que yo como viajera del mundo, sé que a veces lo menos turístico es lo que más gusta! También puedo daros servicio de guía turística y acompañante a ciudades cercanas. Estaré encantada de daros la bienvenida en mi casa, donde os encontrareis como en la vuestra.. Hasta pronto!!!

name: Duplex Plaza Mayor con terraza
description:
Duplex Plaza Mayor 7 pax con preciosa terraza en edificio singular.

The space
Disfruta de una estancia en pleno corazón de la ciudad de Madrid. Si tu intención es estar en el centro, esto es lo que estas buscando!

Con el famosísimo edificio de La Posada del Peine como vecino, el apartamento se encuentra situado entre las calles Marques Viudo de Pontejos y calle Postas, una de las calles imprescindibles de paso a la hora de conocer la famosíma Plaza Mayor y todo el Madrid de los Austrias.

Recién reformado, el apartamento duplex, compuesto por dos apartamentos unidos, consta de todo lo necesario para disfrutar de una buena estancia en Madrid.

Se encuentra en el Tercer y Cuarto piso de una casa singular con tan solo un apartamento por planta!

Caben 7 personas en la siguiente distribución:

Planta 3ª.
Habitacion suite con cama doble y sofa convertible en cama individual. Baño completo con bañera hidromasaj
host_about:
Soñadora, creativa, diseñadora, mama, empresaria, mexicana de nacimiento y española de sangre. Me encanta mi ciudad! la comida, la arquitectura, sus calles, su gente...el sol!. 
Sueño con poder viajar por todo el mundo. Me encanta conocer gente nueva y mezclarme en otras culturas. Encontré marido en Serbia y somos dueños de una famosa Creperia en Madrid.

name: CHARMING HOUSE IN MADRID CENTRE
description:
ASK FOR THE SPECIAL OFFERS DURING JULY & AUGUST 2018!!!

PARKING SPACE AVAILABLE!
2 bed and 3 balconies in completely remodeled 19th century house. Quiet neighbouhood 3 mins from Atocha Central Station and 3 mins from Retiro Park. Confortable, walking distance to everywhere and lots of transports. Superb!

The space
Enjoy a silent atmosphere in this cozy apartment in a 19th century house 160 feet away from El Retiro Park. Rent an electric bike down the street or just enjoy a 15 minute walk to El Prado, Reina Sofía or Thyssen museums. Three minutes to Atocha Central Station, to the underground or to the Airport's Bus Stop (20 minutes to terminal 1). The apartment is in a quiet side street, ideal area to walk to the very centre of Madrid and find plenty of bars and restaurants to enjoy a drink, a romantic dinner or hunt for tapas.This lovely and shiny house has recently been converted into a beautiful apartment, featuring an open space kitchen, dining
neighborhood_overview:
We love the idea of walking or cycling to anywhere in the city centre, but waking up in the morning listening to the Retiro Park birds...
Observing the passing of the seassons through the balconies...
Going down the street saying goodmorning to our neighbours as if we were living in the countryside...
Forgetting that we have a car...but having a parking where to forget about it!
The terraces where to stay talking for hours...
Having everything you might need at a walking distance: drugstores, supermarkets, petrol station...
Seeing our daughters enjoy their infinite possibilities any time of the year...
host_about:
Somos gente de teatro. Tenemos nuestra propia compañía y dos niñas pequeñas que son el motor de todo lo que hacemos. Nos encanta viajar y como allá donde vamos encontramos personas que nos abren su corazón, también nosotros queremos que quien venga disfrute y cuente con nosotros para que su estancia sea lo más placentera y mágica posible...

"Ríe y después encontrarás el motivo".

name: Apartment Mayor/Sol balcony 3 BD
description:
Beautiful apartment in the historical center of Madrid, on Calle Mayor
The apartment is located in a historic building. Both the building and the apartment has been recently renovated (July 2014)
At the 4th floor with elevator and has 2 large balco

The space
The location of the apartment allows you to walk to all the interesting places. The Plaza Mayor and the Mercado de San Miguel a few meters. Sol, Opera, La Latina neighborhood of Las Letras, Chueca and Museum a short walk
Restaurants, bars and shopping area around
This fully equipped, free wifi, 32 "TV, air conditioning in the lounge, heating, linen, towels, and all kitchen utensils that you need
It has 3 bedrooms, each bedroom with a bed of 1.50 x2. It also has a double sofa bed in the living room

Guest access
During the stay, guests have access to the entire house.

The house includes, among others:

- Heating
- Air conditioner
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in one of the most importants streets in Madrid, Calle Mayor, right in the center of the city. It's just a few metres away from Plaza Mayor (Major Square), where you'll find many restaurants and terraces to enjoy some tapas! If you are visiting on Christmas, you'll also see the famous Christmas Market.

Thanks to its centric location, you can go by walk to most of the main places of Madrid, such as The Real Palace, Almudena's Cathedral, Sol Square, Gran Vía or Sabatini Gardens. Moreover, you are surrounded by many charming places. I recommend you to visit El Botin Restaurant, the oldest restaurant in the world, founded in 1725, and just 4 minutes away from the apartment. Another lovely place is the Sabatini Terrace, where you'll find really nice views of the Real Palace and the Sabatini Gardens (it's open just in summer). I love going to rooftop bars, and "The Hat" is a really good one! It's really close from the apartment too, in Calle Imperial. El J

name: Habitacion independiente
description:
Habitación Independiente con Baño de uso exclusivo para los huéspdes.
Está a 200 mtrs. de metro Pan Bendito y parada de autobuses. Dos tiendas de alimentación y farmacia, a la salida del portal.
Fácil de aparcar.
Pza. Anocibar 5 piso 4A
¡Por favor, NO contactar a través de otras aplicaciónes! LES VOY A BLOQUEAR SIN LEER!
Escribiendo por el hilo de mensajes de AirBnB, los huéspedes van a concentrar en un único lugar toda la información necesaria para su correcta recepción.

The space
Es un piso con dos baños, uno para los huéspedes y otro para la familia. Todas las ventanas y la terraza, dan hacia un parque, con buenas vistas.
La casa está resguardada de los ruidos de las calles transitadas, sin estar lejos de ellas. Mucho sol en invierno y bastante menos en verano. Se puede descansar muy bien.
El precio es de 20€ a veces puede aparecer un precio de 1€ más alto o más bajo es porque la plataforma admite muchas divisas de todo el
neighborhood_overview:
Al lado del portal hay dos tiendas de barrio y una farmacia, también están muy cerca supermercados como Mercadona y Lidl.
Es un barrio familiar y tranquilo y con plazas para aparcar fácilmente y con zonas de parques.
host_about:
Me gusta conocer gente nueva de todo el mundo, sus costumbres, la música que les caracteriza y la cocina típica de cada lugar.
Ser anfitrión es un placer, hacer que las personas se sintieran como en casa, ayudarles a tener una estancia agradable y que les quedara un recuerdo inolvidable de su viaje. 
Se acerca la Navidad con las luces y los Belenes, la Noche Vieja y los Reyes Magos. Sería magnifico poder enseñar a todos que vinieran a mi casa, la atmósfera mágica de Madrid.

name: Apto.con vistas a la Puerta del Sol
description:
Comfy, cute and cosy two-level apartment, fifty meters away from the enthralling Puerta del Sol, its terrace allows tenants to enjoy the mystifying views of downtown Madrid against a stunning panorama of its mountains in the background.

The space
Fifth-floor duplex (building with elevator). Two bedrooms furnished with twin-beds and a king-size bed respectively, plus a living-room with sofa-sleeper; fully-equipped independent kitchen and bathroom. The charming terrace invites guests to sit and relax while enjoying he astonishing views of downtown Madrid.

This fully-equipped apartment offers every possible commodity: TV, wi-fi, glass-ceramic, electric and microwave ovens, fridge, wash. machine, dishwasher, coffeemaker, toaster, silver- and table-ware, juicer, blender, hair-dryer, towels and sheets and bedspreads.

Guest access
The elevator is between floors, so you have to climb 11 steps.

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview:
The incredible and superb location of the flat allows guests to enjoy and live the Madrid experience to the full. Within walking distance, guests will be able to visit the most emblematic areas of the city, including parks, distinctive alleys of old Madrid and cultural landmarks such as museums, palaces and theater houses.

In addition, guests will find a rich and varied offer of leisurely activities in the area: restaurants, small cafés, cocktail-bars, pubs, gastro-pubs interspersed with shops, movie theaters, live-music pubs, exhibitions and malls, all placed within walking distance from the flat.
host_about:
Soy una persona muy familiar y sencilla.

Intento compartir la mayor parte de mi tiempo con las personas a las que quiero, es mi mayor ambición.

name: Malasaña flat, 4 people, 35 sq.m, 1 BR, 1 BTHR
description:
Welcome to our Malasaña apartment located at calle Madera.
We are right in Madrid downtown, close to Gran Vía, within walking distance of most of the amenities.
Lay-out, 1 bedroom apartment with double bed, double sofa bed in the living, up for 4 people, fully equiped kitchen, bathroom.
Services included: Wifi, bed linen and towels, air conditioning, final cleaning
It will be a pleasure to host you, our home is your home.

The space
Individually decorated, with everything you need for a pleasant stay: Modern furniture, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi.
It has a living room, with a sofa bed for 2 people, as well as a fully fitted kitchen.
The bathroom is fully equipped with Hydromassage shower, hair dryer and toilet.
Master bedroom with double bed and fitted wardrobes.
Special discounts for medium and long stays

Guest access
Additional services:
We can help you to book airport transfer, Madrid
neighborhood_overview:
Located in Madrid's Soho, the neighborhood has seen an increase of its popularity in the last years and is currently one of the liveliest areas in the city center.
Centrally located, most of the amenities are within walking distance; you can stop for a tapa in one of the countless bars or enjoy micro-theatre performances. You can wander in the little streets surrounding the historic Plaza del 2 de Mayo square which is just a stone throw from the Gran Vía Avenue and Plaza del Sol.
The neighborhood counts as well on thriving cultural life such as theatres, art galleries and the main city museums (Prado, Reina Sofia, Thyssen), are very close.
If you enjoy shopping, Fuencarral Street and its surroundings propose a vast array of trendy and vintage shops as well as the main international franchises.
host_about:
Entusiasta de Madrid, me gusta pasear por sus calles y observar cómo cambia la ciudad, sus gentes, el paso de las estaciones o simplemente perderme por el centro.
La felicidad reside en las cosas sencillas, comer, viajar, querer, hace deporte, dormir,  si eres capaz de vivir como quieres serás feliz y Madrid es un gran lugar para serlo!.
Al mismo tiempo necesito escapadas frecuentes a la montaña y al mar, contacto con la naturaleza que se pierde en las ciudades.

name: Brand new Apartment in City Center
description:
Renovated apartment with beautiful views of Corredera Baja de San Pablo street, first floor with lift, balcony, wifi, one bedroom with double bed and a sofa bed double bed. Air conditioning. Maximum 4 people, two blocks from Gran Via.

The space
In its 45 square meters, we offer an apartment in an ancient building completely renovated, with elevator on the first floor with spectacular balcony for you to enjoy the Madrid movida, a lounge for your rest and relaxation, sofa bed (queen 1.20 m) A tv, kitchenette, air extractor, washing machine, refrigerator, microwave and toaster, iron, safe, Nespresso coffee with a variety of flavors to indulge, bedding, towels, hair dryer and kitchenware and bathroom needed for a comfortable stay.

All electrical appliances are new, eco-efficient and silent. A bathroom with large shower for your enjoyment and a room on the inside of the place where you can relax from the city that never sleeps, with double bed (1,50 m) Ve
neighborhood_overview:
L'Appartement is located where modernity and tradition meet in Malasaña, the most fashionable district of Europe, "the new Soho" located in Madrid. Theaters, bars, vintage stores, supermarkets, bookstores, clothing stores, department stores, terraces, art galleries and restaurants centuries as part of the offer of this neighborhood that never sleeps. Landmarks of Madrid, such as Plaza de Callao, the Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, the Palacio de Oriente Madrid de los Austrias, as well as museums and Markets Fashion (San Anton, San Miguel and Platea) will be also easy access with a short walk, and an extensive network of public transport metro and bus, you can reach in few minutes to the main museums and attractions in the city.
Malasaña is the area between San Bernardo Street west, south Gran Vía, Fuencarral street east and north of Carranza. You cross the street and go into San Bernardo Conde Duque area, ending at the Plaza of Spain and Princess Street.
host_about:
Hechizada con Madrid! Soy una persona que disfruta cada rincon de todo lugar nuevo que visito, encantada en conocer personas de diferentes culturas en esta Ciudad que brilla por si misma y brindarles mi casa para que se sientan como en la suya!
Mar

name: MARVELLOUS ATTIC in CHUECA. Pelayo St.
description:
Elegant, modern and unique attic, silent and bright, on top floor of a lovely building in the heart of Chueca. Sunroom+terrace that opens to exterior, kitchen w/balcony.
Design by a well known Spanish architect, flat published in many international architectural magazines.
host_about:
I was born and raised in Canada, though both my parents are Spanish.  
In 1990 I moved to Barcelona and since 1992 I've been living in Madrid.
I have 2 daughters, a dog and cat (both rescued), worked in theatre for many years, started a directed a children's events company.
As well, both my mother Beni and I have owned and run our own hostels in the neighborhood of Chueca in Madrid.
For the past 9 years have hosted guests from all around the world!
I speak English, French, Spanish and understand Italian.
Oh, and I love my job!


Hija de españoles, nací en Montreal y viví en Ottawa hasta los 20 años.
En el año 1990 me fui a estudiar teatro a Barcelona. Llevo viviendo en Madrid desde el '92.
Tengo dos hijas, una perra y gato adoptados. Trabajé muchos años en el teatro y creé y dirigí mi empresa de eventos infantiles. Durante un periodo de 15 años, mi madre Beni y yo fuimos dueñas de dos hostales en el barrio de Chueca en Madrid. 
LLevo más de 9 años siendo anfitriona y disfrutando enormemente de mi trabajo!

name: Lovely Apartment Center of the City
description:
Lovely and spacious apartment in the center of Madrid, just 3 minutes away walking from Plaza Mayor, located next to all the great and must see sites and attractions of this wonderful city. The apartment is registered at the "Comunidad Autónoma de Madrid" as a "Vivienda de Uso Turístico" with registration number VT-4685.

The space
*Note: The apartment is perfect for 4 guests, but you may add one extra bed in the living room for a fifth guest.

Ideal for a romantic getaway, small families, and small groups.

It is a lovely spacious apartment (110M2), less than 3 minute walk to Plaza Mayor. You can see one of the entraces to the plaza from one of its balconies.

It is located in a lovely and secure street.

New apartment in entirely restored 19th Century building. It has been fully renovated and redecorated with luxurious qualities.

Next to MUST SEE sites in Madrid.

Next to some of the best restauran
neighborhood_overview:
Nearly everything you have two see and enjoy in Madrid downtown is whitin a very short walking distance, Plaza Mayor, Sol, Opera, The Royal Palace, the shopping walking street of Preciados, the emblematic Gran Vía, the lovely San Miguel Market, and the Cava Alta and Cava Baja Streets which are full of life and you can try the delicious "spanish tapas".

On Sundays you can get to the colourful fleamarket of El Rastro, where you can find antiques, clothing and curiosities.
host_about: I'm from Madrid and I love the alternative, cultural and night life which this city offers. Although almost everybody knows where Madrid is located, I think it is a city which continues surprising its visitors.

Surrounded by bars, restaurants, supermarkets and neighborhood stores.

The space

Wi-fi, swimming pool, air conditioning. Double bed (sheets and towels provided), TV. Kitchen with full tableware, refrigerator, microwave oven, toaster, kettle for your convenience.

name: Bright, spacious, central flat
description:
Very bright, spacious, great location. One queen bed, plus a small bed/room for a third person. Full kitchen, big dining table, air con, 1.5 baths, daytime porter, very quiet, blackout shutters, and no TV. Close to 4 metro lines. ~75m2

The space
Bluetooth stereo with good speakers :)

Other things to note
Some pointers for travel, shopping, and restaurants:

Options for getting from airport to the apartment:
- Taxi (fixed rate €30; 20-25 minutes)
- 200 bus to Avenida de America bus terminal, then a taxi (~€10-12; 30-45 minutes)
- Metro to Alonso Martinez for (~€7 per person; 45-60 minutes)


Shopping: various boutique clothing stores around town. Keep an eye out in most neighborhoods for clothing stores that appear out of nowhere. There are a couple on Fernandez de la Hoz within 6-8 blocks of my street going northward. The Malasaña and Chueca neighborhoods, which are 10-15 on foot to the south of the a
neighborhood_overview: Located near Alonso Martinez metro -- great restaurants, three metro lines. 10 minute walk to Chueca, 15 min walk to Malasaña, 20 min walk to Retiro Park. Less than 30 min by metro or bus to almost every major attraction. One of the most popular neighborhoods to live in right now in Madrid.
host_about:
After teaching in international schools for a few years, I'm back in school as a student in Madrid. Love to travel, love to eat, love to hike and bike and swim in swimming holes :) Also love my neighborhood here in Madrid and the people in it, and I can't get enough of great Spanish food and travel around this country :D 

I've stayed in a couple of great AirBnB places now, and I'm happy to open my place for a little while!

The living room is quite spacious and have a big new TV. There is also air co
neighborhood_overview:
Our attic is located on Malasaña, a central neighbourhood of Madrid, surrounded by several metro stations.

Malasaña was the center of the movida movement in late 1970s and 1980s Madrid. It
is a vibrant neighborhood and a center for the 'hipster' phenomena, full of lively bars and clubs overflowing with young people.

It's one of the classic areas for partying the night away, but still our street is really calm, so you will have no problems during the night. The night life is diverse in our neighbourhood, though the most common themes are non-pretentious style places, mixed places and colourful or bohemian cafes.

Commercially, it has many fashion boutiques as well as shops for design and nice market products, which rarely mainstream. There are many second-hand vintage shops, used book stores and unique gift shops.

name: Inviting Flat @ Madrid's Heart
description:
Inviting and renovated flat in the very heart of Madrid (Santa Ana & J. Benavente Squares). Close to all the relevant and fascinating Madrid spots. An exceptional place to get the most of Madrid.

The space
This inviting and bright 45 m² flat with all conveniences that you could want, including a 42" Flat Screen TV, Free WiFi and A.C, will make your stay more than comfortable:

The apartment comprises of a living room with a sofa-bed, and a room with a big full-size bed with storage and a wardrobe. Perfect for a single guest, a couple or even three friends!

The kitchen is fully equipped with vitro-ceramic hob, oven, fridge, toaster, microwave, washing machine, and a complete kitchenware if you fancy cooking (but being at the Spanish Tapas Mecca…who would cook?)

The bathroom is spacious and clean with a large bath, washbasin and hair-dryer. It´s perfect to relax after a touristic journey.

Exceptionally located in a quiet
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is one of the most charming of Madrid and it´s surrounded by the most authentic Spain´s Capital tradition. The Plaza Mayor, Plaza de la Villa, Puerta del Sol, Gran Vía and the Royal Palace will surely captivate you upon your first walks in the city.
The flat borders with the lively 'La Latina' quarter, the undisputed epicenter of Madrid Tapas, a great option to feel the Spanish 'joie de vivre' and share a beer (or two) with friends and locals. Want to taste the most trendy tapas in a unique place? If so, visit the 'Mercado de San Miguel', a MUST EXPERIENCE.
Another way to enjoy Madrid cuisine and its atmosphere is having walks in the nearby 'Las Letras' quarter (within only 3 min. from the apartment). There you´ll find out why Madrid terraces are so popular all over the world (specially in Spring and Summer).



Did you know Madrid has its own London Soho version? 'Chueca' is probably the most COLOURFUL quarter of the city, plenty of styl

The space
Piso totalmente equipado que cuenta con una habitación con una cama doble, televisión 32” , DVD, películas, armario empotrado de pared a pared, cuarto de baño con tina; un salón con un sofá cama que al desplegarse se convierte en una cama de 1 metro de ancho y una cocina tipo americano equipada con vajilla para 2 personas, copas para vino y cerveza, microondas, cubiertos, mantel, nevera y todo lo necesario para cocinar (sartenes, cacerolas).
