neighborhood_overview: La Latina occupies the place of the oldest area in Madrid, the Islamic citadel inside the city walls, with narrow streets and large squares. It is administratively locked almost entirely within the district of Palacio in Centro. It was named after the old hospital, founded in 1499 by Beatriz Galindo "La Latina". It occupies a large part of what is known as El Madrid de los Austrias, and although its boundaries are subjective, it could be argued that it was essentially the vicinity of the San Francisco Racecourse - that continues from the Plaza de la Cebada up to the San Francisco el Grande Basilica. These limits are: to the north, Segovia street - a deep ravine formerly occupied by the San Pedro Stream which empties into the Manzanares River, to the south there is la Ronda and Puerta de Toledo, on the east there is Toledo street - bordering Rastro and the district of Lavapiés - and to the west, Bailen street.
host_about: My neighbors and I do not like noisy people and I am expecting quietness from you.

neighborhood_overview:
Many of the city’s most famous monuments can easily be reached on foot.
The surrounding area boasts a wealth of restaurants, cafes and bars to enjoy.
You are under 5 minutes walk you arrive at the Royal Palace, Almudena Cathedral, Opera or to the Km 0 at Puerta del Sol; the centre of Madrid.
If the walk is a little longer , a 15 minute walk is also the Puerta de Alcala , Plaza de Cibeles, Museo Thyssen , the Prado Museum , Retiro Park ...
Just a few minutes from the apartment you will find some of the oldest and most renowned restaurants in Madrid, as Lucio , Lhardy , and Botín ... Areas of tapas known as the famous neighborhood of La Latina, the Cava Baja or the recently renovated Mercado de San Miguel .
host_about:
Somos Noelia y Mario, una pareja de Madrid. Vivimos durante varios años en la Plaza Mayor y allí estábamos felices, con un montón de planes a nuestro alrededor, con la tranquilidad de cualquier hogar de puertas para adentro y el bullicio de Madrid con sólo abrir los balcones.

Nuestra familia fue creciendo y tuvimos que cambiarnos de casa, pero como teníamos mucho cariño a nuestro apartamento, decidimos compartirlo con otros viajeros que quisieran conocer el encanto de Madrid.
 
¡Desde los balcones del apartamento se podía disfrutar de una de las plazas con más vida del mundo! Era 2013 y nacía Plaza Mayor Deluxe.

Todo al principio fue una aventura, la reforma, imaginar cómo decorábamos el apartamento, qué equipamiento dejábamos dentro, electrodomésticos, cómo contactábamos con la gente que quisiera alquilarlo…Lo que sí teníamos muy claro es que nuestro fin último es que los invitados que se alojaran en nuestro apartamento se sintieran como en casa.

Entonces llegó nuestra primera reserva... y luego otra y otra más… la gente no sólo venía una vez, sino que ¡muchos querían volver!
Fue cuando nos encontramos con un problema, ¡no teníamos días libres! (vaya problema, ¿verdad?). No en serio, nos daba mucha rabia que la gente que íbamos conociendo y que se iban convirtiendo en amigos quisieran venir a Madrid y no tuviéramos un lugar para ellos. Así que nos liamos la manta a la cabeza y empezamos a trabajar con más apartamentos. En el 2015 nacía Romantic, también en la Plaza Mayor, ideal para parejas. Este apartamento tiene ventanales dan a un patio interior con lo cual se puede disfrutar de los planes de la Plaza Mayor y la tranquilidad y el silencio de un patio privado. 

En el 2016 se nos presentó la oportunidad de gestionar dos apartamentos más y allá que nos lanzamos! Uno de ellos está también en la Plaza Mayor, es el apartamento de más capacidad (hasta 5 personas), lo llamamos Family. El otro está muy cerca de Plaza de España y desde sus ventanales se ve completamente el Palacio Real, las vistas de día y de noche cuando se ilumina el Palacio son espectaculares. Sencillamente impresionante!

El último, por el momento, es Elegance y lo inauguramos en Marzo de 2017. Es un apartamento espectacular, tiene dos habitaciones y en la habitación principal hay dos balcones desde los que se ve la Plaza Mayor, un salón gigante y un cuarto de baño enorme con ducha y bañera. ¡Todo lujo y elegancia!

Lo mejor sin duda de estos años ha sido la cantidad de gente estupenda que hemos ido conociendo, con ellos hemos ido creciendo y ahora tenemos amigos por todo el mundo! 

Os invitamos a que disfrutéis de nuestros apartamentos y esperamos que os sintáis como en vuestra casa.

name: PUERTA DEL SOL CENTRO CHUECA
description:
En Madrid, en pleno centro de la ciudad, conocido como Puerta del Sol, se encuentra este apartamento de lujo, nuevo, puerta de seguridad, caja fuerte, aire acondicionado, cocina, cuarto de baño. Sin Ruidos!!! Aislamiento acústico para dormir bien.

The space
El apartamento está situado en la última planta del edificio número 11 de la conocida Puerta del Sol, al tratarse de una buhardilla, queda aislado de ruidos para poder descansar mejor. Está totalmente equipado con cocina, baño, aire acondicionado, calefacción, y con unas calidades de lujo, que harán que su visita a Madrid sea aún mas agradable si cabe.

Other things to note
El edificio es un edificio Histórico protegido, cuya construción data en 1860. El apartamento es totalmente nuevo, con suelo de madera y todas las comodidades necesarias en el siglo XXI. Lugar ideal para descansar, que proporciona intimidad a quien lo utiliza.
neighborhood_overview: Madrid es una ciudad única, como única es su popular Puerta del Sol, alojarse en este lugar es estar cerca de todo, bien comunicado con paradas de Metro, Autobús, Tren y Taxi. Vivir en Puerta del Sol, es vivir cerca de todo, El Teatro Real, El Museo del Prado, El Parque del Retiro, son los embajadores de la cantidad de teatros, museos, parques y jardines. Importantes son las fiestas de Madrid, San Isidro en Mayo, La Paloma en Agosto, y el Orgullo Gay en Verano son un buen ejemplo de convivencia y diversión. Cafeterias, Restaurantes, Pubs y Discotecas hacen al visitante su estancia más agradable, y hospedado en el centro lo disfrutará aún más sin necesidad de transporte.
host_about: Estrovertido, deportista, honesto y con buen rollo.

host_about:
Me llamo Belén y mi marido se llama Álvaro. Tenemos dos hijos de 11 y 9 años.
Nos gusta viajar, desde que estamos juntos hace casi dos décadas hemos visitado países como Marruecos, Egipto, Noruega, Dinamarca, Senegal etc… así hasta más de 50 países.
Nos encanta la aventura, el deporte (correr, esquí, surf...), conocer a gente y compartir la vida con amigos. Nos gusta ser anfitriones y que nuestros amigos se sientan como en casa, eso es lo que esperamos si vienes a nuestra casa.
Yo siempre he pensado: "arrepiéntete de lo que No haces no de lo que haces” así que contacta YA!! Te estamos esperando.

Located just 200 meters from Madrid’s Plaza Mayor, and 400 meters from the Puerta del Sol, this 4 bedroom apartment offers air-conditioner, free Wi-Fi and great views of the city. We are in the heart of the city, you can go everywhere by walk.

The space
The apartment is perfect for a big family or a group of friends. 10 people could stay here for a great weekend in Madrid. The apartment has 4 bedrooms prepared for 8 people and 2 sofa beds for other 2 people. There are 2 bathrooms equipped with towels for everybody, there are also bed sheets and pillows in the apartment. The kitchen is fully equipped, there is a fridge, washing machine, dishwasher, and all necessary utensils.
If you are on holidays with your under 3 years old baby there is a possibility to request a crib without any extra charge.
You can control the temperature in the apartment using the air-conditioning and the heating system.

Guest access
Our guests will have t
neighborhood_overview:
The city center is completely different from any other district. The nightlife is incredible, there are a lot of bars and restaurants close to the apartment. There are also theaters close to us - you can do everything in the city center.
The citizens are so friendly and kind, they are happy to help the tourists and make them feel like at home.
host_about: I love to travel but lately I do not have much time to do it. Having guests at home from all over the world is the most similar thing to travel. I like to practice sports like basketball, ski, golf, running,yoga...; if you want to practice any of these here in Madrid, I can help you with it. I can also show you the best restaurants of the area and help you with one day trips organization.

The space
Splendid, interior, street floor flat, with big windows, charmingly decorated and equipped to the last detail in order to make you feel at home. The building is located in a semi-pedestrian street. Our location is perfect to walk the city and it is also very well connecte
neighborhood_overview:
The Barrio de las Letras (Las Letras Neighborhood) is a restricted area with car traffic limited just to residents (taxis are also allowed), which makes it pleasant and fun to stroll around.

Despite our street is very quiet, the neighborhood is full of tapas bars, restaurants, terraces, art galleries, antique stores, boutiques, bookstores, academies, churches, old an new places full of history and flavour. Furthermore, you have the three most important museums in town in less than a 5-minute walk.

The space
The apartment is on Calle Huertas, which is a very well-known street here in Madrid. neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in the Barrio de las Letras, "The Literary District" right in the Historic part of Town. You can walk everywhere: to the Prado Museum, the Reina Sofia, the Thyssen, the Parque del Retiro, the Plaza Mayor and many other interesting places. There is so much to do in Madrid! We do have a minimum stay of 3 nights, but most people think that it's not enough at all!
host_about: I have lived in Madrid with my family since 2000. We travel a lot and like to stay at apartments ourselves. It makes you feel like you live in that city. I have set up my apartments with the idea that people would feel at home while they are in Madrid. It's their home away from home. I speak several languages and enjoy meeting people from all over the world. It will be my pleasure to host you in Madrid.

name: Attic with charm in Lavapiés
description:
Beautiful and bright penthouse located in the Central District of Lavapiés. It has a kitchen and dining room fully equipped and a quiet and spacious bedroom. It is within 10 minute walk from Atocha station, Puerta del Sol, the Prado and El Retiro.

The space
Beautiful attic of 50 sq meters, very bright and quiet, located in the multicultural district of Lavapiés. It is within a 10 minutes walk from the train station of Atocha, next to the Museum Reina Sofia and very near to the Cinematheque. It is also in a walk distance to Plaza del Sol, Barrio de las Letras, the districts of Chueca and Malasaña, the Museums El Prado and Thyssen and the park El Retiro. The flat is in the last floor of a spanish Corrala. It has a kitchen fully equipped with ceramic hob, microwave, fridge, freezer, washing machine, toaster and tableware; a very welcoming dinning/living room with a sofa bed for two people, a bathroom with bathtub and a spacious bedroom with a double bed and wardrobe
neighborhood_overview: Lavapiés is the most popular and authentic district of Madrid. Known for its multiculturalism, it offers many bars and restaurants where you can enjoy the best cuisine of the world. You can find several theatres, popular markets and the most famous flea market every Sundays.
host_about: I am 37. Was born in Winnipeg Canada, but I am portuguese. Have lived in Barcelona Spain for more than 10 years and for the last 5 have been living in Madrid. In 2014 I moved for 1 year and a half to Moscow Russia to be working in the Sochi Winter Olympic and Paralympic Games. After that I moved to Rio de Janeiro Brasil for 3 months to work in the Football World Cup and now I am back in Madrid. I work in Sports Media Broadcast and for my work I travel a lot. I speak 5 different languages (portuguese, english, french, italian and spanish) and I love travelling for pleasure; having the chance to meet new people and share different experiences.

host_about:
Soy guia turistico hace mas de 30 años,me gusta viajar y ayudar a otros en sus viajes,me gusta conversar leer y compartir con otras culturas.
Soy un apasionado  de la tecnologia en movilidad ,y de internet y de la forma que hace que nos podamos comunicar personas de diversas culturas y ambientes.
Me encantan hablar de cualquier cosa pero las series, y los libros y los viajes me fascinan.
Ahora paso la mitad del año en Chile y la otra mitad en europa.
Cuanto mas viajo mas sitios me quedan por conocer.Aun no fui a mis preferidos de la infancia: Peru,egipto y la india ,y adoro hablar de proyectos de viajes de mil maneras diferentes y sobre todo compartir mis experiencias y escuchar los de los demas y sus (Website hidden by Airbnb)

description:
The space
Habitación con cama doble en piso espacioso y luminoso situado en La Latina, barrio bohemio en pleno centro de Madrid y a tan solo cinco minutos de Puerta del Sol.

La habitación es también muy luminosa, con espacio suficiente tanto para una como dos personas. En nuestro magnífico salón podrás disfrutar de tus comidas o bien descansar después de un duro día conociendo la ciudad.

Por supuesto, tendrás total disponibilidad y libertad para hacer uso de todas las demás comodidades de la casa (cocina, lavadora, baño y ¡hasta nuestros maravillosos balconcitos!)

Convivirás con Rafa, Helena y Valeria, tres chicos jóvenes y encantadoras que intentarán hacer de tu estancia una experiencia aún más agradable.
neighborhood_overview: La Latina es uno de los barrios más céntricos de Madrid, muy cerca de todos los atractivos turísticos de la ciudad. ¡El mítico Mercado de la Cebada se encuentra a tan solo dos calles, y el famoso mercadillo del Rastro lo tienes justo al salir de casa!

name: Habitacion para VEGETARIANOS.
description:
Barrio tranquilo en donde los vecinos se saludan por las calles.
Piso de 3 habitaciones.
Habitación con una cama individual (que se convierte en cama doble 160x200) y un armario.
En metro, mi casa está a 35 minutos del centro de Madrid, 15 minutos de IFEMA y 20 minutos del aeropuerto.

Ambiente familiar, limpio y acogedor. Vivo en el piso.

Pedimos que la alimentación en la casa sea vegetariana. No TRAER carne (ni embutidos), ni pescado (ni mariscos) a la casa. Tomamos huevos y lácteos

The space
En un barrio tranquilo, típicamente madrileño, está mi casa que es pequeña y tiene tres habitaciones, un baño, salon, cocina y un pequeño patio. No tenemos tele (pero si conexión con antena). Cocina equipada con vitrocerámica, horno, microondas, tostadora, sandwichera y demas utensilios.

La habitación tiene una cama individual, que se convierte en cama doble de 1,60X2,00cm y un armario. La ventana da a un patio exterior.
neighborhood_overview:
El barrio es tranquilo y bien comunicado, con una estación de metro a 5-8 minutos y paradas de autobús a 3-5 minutos de casa.
HAY QUE TOMAR TRANSPORTE PÚBLICO PARA IR AL CENTRO DE MADRID.
En un radio de 200 metros hay bancos, supermercados, farmacia, bares, restaurantes, etc.
Pedimos que dentro de la casa, la limentación sea vegetriana. No carne, ni pescado, ni embutidos, ni mariscos. Tomamos huevos y lácteos.
Ambiente familiar. Vivo en el apartamento
host_about:
Hablo español.
Falo português.
I'm learning English.
Capisco un po 'di italiano.

Soy Brasileña, residente en España, desde 2001 y vegetariana desde 2002. Tengo una simpática niña. 
Me gusta el deporte, practico capoeira, american crossfeet, acrobacia.  Soy profesora de portugués y me divierte mi trabajo. 
Amante de la pedagogía Waldorf y todas sus ramificaciones. También me gusta conocer otras pedagogías y sistemas educativos. La historia, geografía, psicología, experiencias personales, son otras de mis pasiones 
Me encantan actividades al aire libre, estar con gente, charlar y escuchar sus historias, conocer algo de su cultura, probar platos nuevos etc. Pero también respeto el silencio, si es lo que prefieres.

name: Superb Apartment Center of the City
description:
Superb and spacious apartment in the center of Madrid, just 3 minutes away walking from Plaza Mayor, located next to all the great and must see sites and attractions of this wonderful city.

The apartment is registered at the "Comunidad Autónoma de Madrid" as a "Vivienda de Uso Turístico" with registration number VT-4782.

The space
Ideal for families and groups.

It is a lovely spacious apartment (140M2), less than 3 minute walk to Plaza Mayor. You can see one of the entraces to the Plaza Mayor from one of its balconies.

It is located in a lovely and secure street. The apartment has an excellent soundproofing, allowing to rest at night despite staying in the center of the city.

New apartment in entirely restored 19th Century building. It has been fully renovated and redecorated with luxurious qualities.

Next to MUST SEE sites in Madrid.

Next to some of the best restaurants and shops in the city.
neighborhood_overview:
Nearly everything you have two see and enjoy in Madrid downtown is whitin a very short walking distance, Plaza Mayor, Sol, Opera, The Royal Palace, the shopping walking street of Preciados, the emblematic Gran Vía, the lovely San Miguel Market, and the Cava Alta and Cava Baja Streets which are full of life and you can try the delicious "spanish tapas".

On Sundays you can get to the colourful fleamarket of El Rastro, where you can find antiques, clothing and curiosities.
host_about: I'm from Madrid and I love the alternative, cultural and night life which this city offers. Although almost everybody knows where Madrid is located, I think it is a city which continues surprising its visitors.

Arantxa

name: Amazing Duplex in Huertas (Works on the building!)
description:
Spectacular duplex in the heart of Huertas.
It is an apartment on two levels, ground floor and basement. High ceilings, large windows, two bedrooms and two living rooms. Completely renovated, new furniture and appliances and tastefully decorated.

*** Building is under construction. They are installing 2 elevators. May be noise and disturbances from construction, Mon to Fri business hours. That is why we offer the apartment at a low price until the completion of the works scheduled Jan 2021.***

The space
Duplex apartment of about 80 m2, over two levels, a ground floor and a basement. It consists of two separate and independent bedrooms (with double bed each), two leaving-rooms (one upstairs and one in annexed to the basement bedroom). Kitchen, bathroom with bath and separate toilet in the ground floor bedroom. A sofa bed and a TV in each of the 2 leaving rooms.
Large windows on the ground floor and small windows in the basement. High ceilings
neighborhood_overview:
In the neighborhood of Cortes. At 30 meters from the Plaza de Anton Martin on the one hand, and the same distance from the C / Huertas on the other. Barrio de las Letras, cultural, bohemian and alternative on merit. You will be in the historic center of Madrid.
A very authentic and dynamic neighborhood, known as the Barrio de las Letras has recently again become fashionable neighborhood in Madrid. Full of shops, bars and independent restaurants.
host_about:
Since 2012 we have been managing properties in Madrid, for tourist, short term rentals, students and workers. We work together with the company Flexiserv (Cleaning and maintenance) to be able to offer you the best spaces in Madrid, apartments full of charm, and receive you with the best service and treatment possible.

We love and enjoy the city of Madrid, and are devoted hosts so we hope we can assist you in anything you may need during your stay and guide you through the best corners and with the best leisure, gastronomy and tourism of this city.

Desde 2012 gestionamos propiedades en Madrid, para alojamiento turístico, alquileres por temporadas, para estudiantes y trabajadores. Trabajamos junto a la empresa Flexiserv (Limpieza y mantenimiento) para poder ofrecerte los mejores espacios de Madrid, apartamentos llenos de encanto, y recibirte con el mejor servicio y trato posible.

Amamos y disfrutamos la ciudad de Madrid, y somos unos anfitriones devotos por lo que esperamos poder atenderte en todo lo que puedas necesitar durante tu estancia y guiarte por los mejores rincones y con las mejores ofertas de ocio, gastronomía y turismo en nuestra ciudad.

name: Genial apartamento en la Latina
description:
Estupendo apartamento situado en el centro histórico, comercial y cultural de Madrid, en el corazón del Barrio de la Latina. Recién reformado, para 2 o 4 personas, a 5 minutos de la Plaza Mayor y de la Puerta del Sol.

The space
El apartamento es muy luminoso ya que el salón cuenta con un balcón a la Calle Toledo. El dormitorio es tranquilo y silencioso.
La cocina independiente es tipo oficce, y está totalmente equipada (frigorífico, horno, microondas, lavadora), ropa de cama y baño, calefacción individual, tv, conexión a internet 4 G.
Nice flat located in the historical, economical and cultural centre of Madrid, in the Latina’s heart. Recently remodeled, it is carefully decorated and it is suitable for 2-4 persons. The flat is bright as it has a wonderful balcony with a great view of Toledo’s street. It has a quiet and calm bedroom, a well-equipped office kitchen with all necessary devices (fridge, washing machine, oven, microwave, toaster…) and a ful
neighborhood_overview:
Por su ubicación, es ideal para conocer a pie los lugares más emblemáticos de la ciudad: la Plaza Mayor, Puerta del Sol y sus animados comercios, el popular Rastro madrileño los domingos y los días festivos, el Palacio Real y la Catedral de la Almudena, la Gran Vía y el Barrio de Chueca. El Barrio de las Letras con tiendas de ropa y de antiguedades y los conocidos museos de El Prado, El Reina Sofia y Thyssen Bornemisza. La Latina, es una zona muy animada, ideal para disfrutar de la gastronomía española y su animada hora del aperitivo y de “Tapas” en los bares y tabernas tradicionales en las calles de la Cava Baja, Cava Alta y las plazas de La Cebada y La Paja. Le dejaremos un mapa de la ciudad con todo tipo de sugerencias, con el fin de que pases un viaje inolvidable.
It is the ideal place to stay and enjoy Madrid as it is close enough to walk to the most remarkable sites: La Plaza Mayor, La Puerta del Sol, the famous El Rastro open- air street market on Sundays, El Palacio Real y
host_about: Soy una chica, española a la que le encanta su pais y viajar a otros lugares, motivo por el que conocí esta página que me llevó a comprarme este apartamento que he decorado con mucho entusiasmo (me encanta el mundo de la decoración). Vivo en una ciudad próxima a Madrid .(Ciudad Real), pero tengo un amigo que se encarga de recibiros si yo no puedo. Lo que más me gusta es disfrutar con los amigos, conocer sitios nuevos, pasear las ciudades, el arte, la fotografia, mi familia....Espero que disfruteis en mi casa como yo cuando estoy en ella.

description:

The space
The house is amazing! Very big and full of light all day long. Is located right in Plaza de Chueca so you will have to walk only 5 seconds to reach the subway! The furniture is Industrial / Vintage and everything in our house has been chosen delicately and with pleasure and affection.

neighborhood_overview:
Chueca is most friendly quarter of Madrid city center. There is a bar, restaurant or pub in each corner and the atmosphere is of tolerance and happiness. You will never be bored in a place like Chueca because there is always something going on.

Wether you want a cozy and romantic restaurant, or having a drink in a fancy terrace, clubbing or shopping, you can find it all in Chueca.
host_about:
Hi there!! I´m Iris, originally from Colombia but living in Spain for 14 years now! I used to live in Barcelona (city I love) but moved to Madrid 6 years ago (and I love it even more!!) ... I think is one of the best places to spend time... its a city that offers all: nice restaurants, awsome party, lovely people and amazing weather ....

I work in the financial sector but as soon as I leave the office I forget all about my job and do what I really enjoy in life... I do yoga almost every day, I do sports, read about budism and yoga, cook spicy food and love meeting my dear friends for a walk or drink;  lately, I started to learn Portuguesse as I´m planning to spend over a month in Brasil at the end of the year!!! ... I love being outdoors and traveling, that´s my other passion... 

As a host, I´m a very caring and very polite, as well as cheerful and willing to help you with everything you might need during your stay as its important to me that you spend a nice time in Madrid ... I like having the house neat and clean so you can feel like you're on your own home... as a renter, I am equally neat and careful with things and I love to socialize without overwhelming  .... I think in any case, you'd have a peaceful and joyful experience !!

Central Madrid people are a great mix of bohemia and modernity. This is a neighborhood where you will find people on the street at all hours of the day and the night. The house is located near areas with a great gastronomic and cultural offer (concerts, cinema, theater, museums ...)

neighborhood_overview:
Huertas is also known as the "Barrio de Las Letras" or Cortes. It is where the most important writers of the Golden Age of Spanish literature lived in the 17th century: Lope de Vega, Cervantes, Calderón de la Barca or Tirso de Molina. Cortes neighbourhood was the place of inspiration, writing and representation of the works. When you walk along the streets you immediately notice the architectural elegance of the neighbourhood which takes you to another era. The streets close to Plaza Santa Ana are packed with tapas bars, restaurants and places to have a drink (or dance).
Every 1st Sunday of the month there´s the Frog Market which takes place in the streets of the neighbourhood, with dealers selling furniture, designer clothes, antiques, etc.
host_about: Passionate about old cars, traveling, running, swimming, the Internet and the latest technologies.

name: Amazing duplex penthhouse in the centre of Madrid
description:
In the popular ‘Barrio de los Austrias’ district – in the heart of Madrid – this trendy duplex-attic apartment can be found. Recently renovated to the highest standard in luxury and comfort, the apartment exudes all that is best in taste and design. The 100-square-meter property is an oasis of absolute peace and calm, a nice contrast with the fun and excitement of the surrounding neighborhood, which is full of young people eager to discover the authentic “real” Madrid.

The space
On the lower level of the duplex you will find a beautiful bright living room with two balconies overlooking a quiet and small street. This area is equipped with a large flat screen television. At the other end of the lower floor is a fully equipped kitchen with a huge bar and another LCD television. In the middle, separating living room and kitchen, is a charming dining room which accommodates up to six people. In addition, this floor is favoured by a pretty guest bathroom.

A
neighborhood_overview:
Having an address in the ‘Barrio de los Austrias’ is the best way to discover this vibrant city. A few steps from your door is the world famous ‘Puerta del Sol’ (also known as “Kilómetro Cero”) which is a starting point to many of the city’s historic places. The ‘Puerta del Sol’ is the real heart of the city and the main meeting point for locals. Standing in the centre is the impressive statue of ‘El Oso y El Madroño’, the symbol of the city. From there you can walk up through ‘Calle Mayor’, famed for its old shops and superb ancient houses, until you reach the well known ‘Plaza Mayor’, one of Madrid’s most beautiful ‘plazas’, where the ever popular ‘tapas’ can be enjoyed in the many nearby bars and restaurants.

From the ‘Kilómetro Cero’ you could also walk up the ‘Calle Toledo’ until you arrive at the ‘Rastro’, where one of the most interesting and exciting markets in Spain is held each Sunday.

A short walk from the ‘Puerta del Sol’ and you will find an edifice

En el barrio más antiguo de Madrid, se encuentra este luminoso y confortable ático recién reformado, por el arquitecto Charlie Díaz, y completamente equipado que ofrece unas vistas privilegiadas sobre los símbolos de la ciudad (La Catedral de la Almudena, La iglesia de San Andrés, La Colegiata de San Isidro, Plaza de España, la Casa de Campo, la Sierra de Madrid) y su particular puesta de sol.

Cubiertas inclinadas, vigas de madera y muros de ladrillo combinados con todos los lujos y necesidades de una vivienda moderna crean un espacio cálido, agradable y sofisticado, refugio perfecto tras
neighborhood_overview:
Situado en el barrio de La Latina, en el centro del Madrid de los Austrias, en el casco antiguo de la ciudad.

A menos de cinco minutos puedes visitar el monumental Madrid de los Austrias con el Palacio Real, la Catedral de la Almudena o la Opera de Madrid. Caminado un poco más podrás disfrutar del "cool" Barrio de Lavapies, del mercadillo del Rastro (los domingos y festivos, un mercado al aire libre con más de un quarto de milenio de existencia) y del Madrid más castizo con la Plaza Mayor y la mítica Puerta del Sol.

Cruzando la Gran Vía, repleta de cines y musicales, te encuentras inmediatamente con los barrios de Malasaña y Chueca, conocido como el barrio gay, llenos de tiendas de moda, terrazas, cafés y restaurantes.

Y en un agradable paseo de menos de diez minutos, atravesando el peculiar barrio de Las Letras, llegarás directo al Museo del Prado, al Reina Sofia y al Museo Thyssen-Bornemisza.

Si deseas ir un poco más allá, a dos pasos te
host_about:

If you are four, please, ask us for disposal. The apartement is full equipped: heating, air conditioning, bed clothes, towels, 80 tv, channels, internet by optical fiber, fast wifi, etc. It is quite cheery, close to bustle of the daily life of Madrid, but very comfortable and silent.

The house has an elevator, but it just goes up to the 4th floor so it is necessary to climb some steps to the 5th floor. The flat is equipped with WiFi and cable TV, which has a lot of international channels.

host_about:
Hola,

 Soy Melvin, desde hace 19 años trabajo como empresario en Madrid, es una ciudad encantadora que enamora tanto al residente como al turista que la visita. 

En Madrid encontrarás una gran oferta de resturantes, museos, tiendas, parques de atracciones, teatros, cines, te encantará. Por este motivo, gestiono apartamentos turísticos, tenemos un equipo de trabajo variado, contamos con personal que se encarga de entregar el apartamento, personal de limpieza y de lavandería, y que son parte fundamental del excelente servicio que brindamos cada día,  aportando al turismo de la ciudad, la oportunidad  de alojarse en mis apartamentos.

Uno de mis objetivos es viajar y conocer otras culturas, disfrutar de la gastronomía que ofrece el resto de Europa y su mágico encanto cultural.

Me apasiona todo lo que tenga que ver con el deporte, también disfruto de una buena película en casa con mi  familia sobre todo las comedias, pues me encanta reír. 

No me gusta preocuparme tanto por el futuro, solo intento vivir la vida, pasarlo bien y ser feliz cada día. 

Les deseo buena suerte y que disfruten de un lindo viaje a Madrid y al resto del mundo.

Para más información, no dudes en mirar los alojamientos que tenemos o puedes escribirme a través de la página de airbnb y te recomiendo el apartamento que mejor se adapte a tus necesidades.


Hello,

 I am Melvin, I have been working as an entrepreneur in Madrid for 19 years, it is a charming city that both the resident and the tourist who falls in love with.

In Madrid you will find a great offer of restaurants, museums, shops, amusement parks, theaters, cinemas, you will love it. For this reason, I manage tourist apartments, we have a varied work team, we have personnel who are in charge of delivering the apartment, cleaning and laundry personnel, who are a fundamental part of the excellent service we provide every day, contributing to the tourism of the city, the opportunity to stay in my apartments.

One of my goals is to travel and get to know other cultures, to enjoy the gastronomy that the rest of Europe offers and its magical cultural charm.

I am passionate about everything that has to do with sports, I also enjoy a good movie at home with my family, especially comedies, because I love to laugh.

I don't like worrying so much about the future, I just try to live life, have fun and be happy every day.

I wish you good luck and have a nice trip to Madrid and the rest of the world.

For more information, do not hesitate to look at the accommodations we have or you can write to me through the airbnb page and I recommend the apartment that best suits your needs.

name: Bright and cozy apartment in Madrid
description:
Small but very cozy apartment in Lavapiés/Rastro, 2 minutes away walking from the Rastro Sunday flea-market.

The space
30 sqm apartment. Very bright and comfortable.
The bed is a mezzanine bed, there is a built-in staircase to climb up the stairs, so please take this into account if you are a sleepwalker or have a physical condition.
In the sofa in the living room eventually could sleep a third person or a kid, but it is not a sofa-bed.
The appartment is an open space, so there is no privacy, just the bathroom door.

The building is a traditional corrala of Madrid, and it has been fully renovated last year.

The building has no elevator, but my place is on the first floor.
neighborhood_overview:
It is very close to downtown and many touristic attractions, and also very well comunicated with underground and train stations nearby.
The Rastro sunday market is only two minutes away. The neighborhood (Lavapiés, Rastro) is very animated and lively, with bars and restaurants very close, but my street is very quiet. It is a renovaved apartment in a renovated building in ancient city center.
The only possible drawback is that I don't have a "proper" bedroom, but a mezzanine bed with a staircase (not a ladder) to get to it. That means that it is not very convenient for persons with mobility problems, or night-walkers :o)
The building has no elevator, but my place is on the first floor.
The sofa in the living room could also acomodate another person, but it is an open concept apartment, that means, there's no intimacy (apart from the bathroom door, of course).

It is very close to downtown and many touristic attractions, and also very well comunicated with u

name: PRETTY BEDROOM PLAZA MAYOR
description:
MADRID CITY CENTER, near PUERTA DEL SOL, between PLAZA MAYOR, ROYAL PALACE and OPERA.... balcony and view on a pleasant pedestrian Street, lovely, spacious bed room, modern with lots of light. Confortable appartment.. 30 Euros

The space
Santiago street is one of the oldest .... (Some local people say is the oldest) street in Madrid ... Inside the Christian fortifications ( you can see them exposed in certain cafes and restaurants around) and next to the even older Arab fortifications... Visible near Almudena cathedral ... Five minutes walk... On the left of the Royal Palace..
Have a look on Internet ... The history around there is interesting...

You hava an interesting bronze maquette of the fortifications on Square Isabel II (Opera subway entrance) at the back of the Opera.

Goya's house is situated at number 6 Calle Santiago ... He had the whole building ....

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the heart of Old Madrid near the Plaza Mayor, Los Austrias extends from Arenal Sol Mayor and traveling to La Latina and the Plaza de Oriente opposite the Royal Palace. It is two minutes walk from the apartment to the Plaza Mayor ... stop for tapas in the Mercado de San Miguel and walk two or three minutes more to Puerta del Sol ... If you feel like continuing the walk you can go towards Las Cortes .. have a look at the pleasant Plaza Santa Ana ...and if you have enough time visit the Prado Museum... the Thyssen museum ... ... the Jardin Botanico .... the Jardines Del Buen Retiro are five minutes walk from the Prado museum... where you will find everything you can expect from a Park ...
Plaza Mayor is the heart of the Hapsburgs and aside the Calle Mayor leads to the Plaza de la Villa, with its typical architecture of the Austrias, calle Bailen and Almudena cathedral - Plaza de Oriente infront the Royal Palace.

The apartment itself has 3 bedrooms, one of which is the private room for this listing. The living room, kitchen, and bathroom are shared with 2 people (we are very clean and considerate and we expect our guests to be the same!). Our home is your home away from home!

name: “Triangle of Art in Madrid”
description:
Acogedor apartamento en frente del Museo del Prado.
Piscina comunitaria en la azotea durante los meses de verano.

Cozy apartment just in front of Prado Musseum.
Swimming pool on the roof of the building during summer months with beautiful views

The space
El apartamento consta de un dormitorio con terraza, salón-comedor, cocina y baño. Es perfecto para una pareja y encontrarás todo lo que puedas necesitar para alojarte unos días.

The apartment has a bedroom with a small terrace, living room, kitchen and bathroom. It´s perfect for a couple and you´ll find everything that you can need to stay several days.

Guest access
Piscina comunitaria situada en la azotea del edificio con espectaculares vistas. Abierta los meses de verano: Junio, Julio, Agosto y Septiembre.

Communal pool located on the roof of the building with spectacular views. Open in summer months: June, July, August and September.
neighborhood_overview:
Está situado en una zona privilegiada para visitar los museos principales de Madrid y muchos lugares de interés turístico. Está justo enfrente del Museo del Prado, a pocos minutos del Museo Reina Sofía (C/ Sta. Isabel, 52), Museo Naval (Pº del Prado, 5).
A pocos minutos andando del Parque del Retiro, Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, barrio de Salamanca, La latina, Chueca, Estación de Atocha...

It is located in a privileged area to visit the main museums in Madrid and many tourist attractions. It is in front of Prado Museum and 5 minutes by foot from the Museum Thyssen-Bornemisza (Pº del Prado, 8), Museo Reina Sofía (C/ Sta. Isabel, 52), Naval Museum (Pº del Prado, 5).
A few minutes by foot from the Retiro Park, Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, barrio de Salamanca, La latina, Chueca, Atocha train station...

name: El Loft de tus sueños en el centro de Madrid!
description:
Nuestro increíble, moderno, cómodo y céntrico Loft de 70m.te te encantará. Ubicado en la Plaza de la Moreria en el Barrio de la Latina y el área de Austrias de Madrid.
Lujo reformado pero con detalles de la casa original que data del año 1900. ¡Es genial!
Todo exterior , súper limpio y con vistas al Viaducto y la casa de Campo de Madrid.
Una maravilla para vivir y disfrutar en pleno Madrid de los Austrias, repleto de arte contemporáneo . Súper luminoso y wifi súper rápida si tele-trabajas .

The space
Nuestro hermoso y moderno Loft de 70 metros cuadrados está ubicado en la Plaza de la Moreria, en el barrio de Los Austrias, en el corazón de Madrid, un barrio único con mucho encanto.
El apartamento tiene todas las comodidades que pueda imaginar ... cocina equipada con los mejores electrodomésticos: cafetera, placa de inducción, horno pirótico, lavavajillas, nevera / congelador, microondas, licuadora, lavadora, extractor, utensilios de cocina. En
neighborhood_overview:
El barrio de Austrias está perfectamente comunicado, tienes 2 paradas de metro muy (URL HIDDEN) latina y opera a 5 minutos.
En un minuto a pie estás en la calle Bailén, por donde pasan el autobús hacia Gran Vía y Puerta del Sol.
El transporte público de Madrid es uno de los mejores del mundo, es fácil, cómodo y súper simple. También le explicaremos todo lo que necesita saber para moverse por la ciudad.
ESTOS AUTOBUSES ESTÁN EN LA CALLE BAILEN.
AUTOBÚS NÚMERO 3 .... IR A CALLE MAYOR-PLAZA MAYOR-SOL-CHUECA
BUS NÚMERO 148 ... IR A CALLAO-GRAN VIA
host_about:
Somos unos grandes anfitriones y nos encanta recibir gente en casa, somos  una pareja simpatica!!! nos encanta disfrutar de la vida , viajar, pintar , la escultura, pasear.
Nos gusta mucho la música , el cine ,el teatro y comer bien!!!
y nos encantara que disfrutes de nuestra casa que con tanto cariño y buenas vibraciones hemos creado!!

name: 2 Bedrooms near famous Rastro "  La Latina"
description:
In Latina you will discover a lot of plazas and squares that are like a treasure. The best known is certainly La Cebada, but it is worthwhile to get away and find others such as La Paja, Humilladero, San Andrés or Puerta Cerrada. In addition this area is known for its great atmosphere, as it is the quintessential neighborhood of canes and terraces. Just a few steps from the royal palace, near the classic restaurant "Casa Lucio", very popular among tourists from all over the world, for its tradition and their  famous "starry eggs of Lucio”. Also, the restaurant" El botín ", known as the oldest restaurant in the world.
Next to the apartment you will find El Rastro, an open-air market that is held on Sundays and holidays in the historic center of Madrid, in the popular neighborhood of la Latina. It is a market with more than 400 years of history in which you can find both everyday objects and curious gadgets, all wrapped in a lively atmosphere. In addition to the San Miguel Market,
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood of La Latina is versatility. That ability to transform to adapt to almost any situation: Tapas on its terraces, meals in trendy restaurants, until night falls and it's time to take a walk through its pubs. Not forgetting also shopping, music and the good atmosphere.
One of the charms of the area is that it preserves the medieval physiology of its streets. Its hidden corners and narrow alleys can take you to areas you've never seen before.

name: Apartment-Loft Casado del Alisal
description:
In the way that connects the ‘Retiro Park’ with the ‘Prado Museum’ sits this cozy apartment, located in a representative building of the ‘Jerónimos’ district, surrounded by emblematic houses which are at the level of the neighborhood they sit on.

The space
With a surface of 50 square meters, this loft-type apartment offers a sitting space in the central area, with the kitchen and the bathroom at one end and the bedroom on the opposite one, with a small balcony overlooking the street, from where the ‘great lung’ of Madrid (Retiro) can be seen.

The living room has a sofa with a chaise-longue, convertible into a double bed, which has apart a chest inside, allowing the storage of bulky items. Two coffee tables surrounded by poufs complete the seating area, opposite a LCD TV on the wall. The kitchen, open to the living room, is fully equipped with large and small appliances (including a dishwasher and a washing-dryer machine) and has a bar with two stools p

name: Opera / Royal Palace apartment
description:
Charming apartment in the historic center of Madrid. Its 100 m2 distribution makes it ideal for families and groups of up to 6 people. It has been renovated with special attention to quality and design.

The space
The apartment is on the 1st floor with an elevator. It is bright and spacious, and it is located on a quiet semi-pedestrian street.

It has 2 bedrooms, one with a double bed and the other with two single beds, a large bathroom, fully equipped kitchen, spacious living and dining room. It can accommodate up to 6 people thanks to a sofa bed in the living room.
We can also provide you with a travel crib free of charge.
The apartment has WIFI, Air Conditioning and Heating.
Due to the coronavirus, we’re taking extra care to disinfect frequently touched surfaces between reservations.

Other things to note
There are several super markets and shops within 3 minutes walk from the apartment, offering good varieties of
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the historic center of Madrid. A few minutes’ walk from the Royal Palace, the Opera, Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, La Almudena Cathedral and San Miguel Market. Ideal for cultural visits, it is well connected with the Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofia museums.

You have great selection of restaurants, tapas bars, pubs and cafes in the surroundings and most of them have terraces.

The best shopping areas are also at a walking distance: Gran Via, Fuencarral, Callao, Barrio Salamanca, as well as the famous open-air street market called El Rastro (flea Market).

It is also close to the two biggest parks of the city: Casa de Campo and Retiro.
host_about:
I am French and married with a Angel. We travel as much as we can and when we do it, we mainly stay in the historical city centre . If you are like us, you will then enjoy very much the apartment and its alleys!

Je suis française et je suis mariée à Angel. Nous aimons voyager et quand nous le faisons, nous restons toujours dans le centre historique des villes, si vous êtes comme nous, vous profiterez alors de l'appartement et de ses ruelles!

Soy francesa y estoy casada con Angel. A nosotros nos encanta viajar y cuando lo hacemos siempre nos alojamos en el centro histórico de las ciudades, si sois como nosotros vais a disfrutar del apartamento y de su entorno!

The space
Apartment with two bedrooms and two bathrooms. Big Sunny terrace. Bright and quiet. You wont hear a noice. Splendid location. Near the hot spots of the city but in a quiet place where you can feel the "real Madrid".

Other things to note
The center of Madrid, where our apartment is located, is closed to private traffic. Thanks to the fact that we have a parking space, you can access the center with your car and park. Follow our instructions to avoid fines.

Disfruta de vivir en el emblemático barrio de Chamberí al lado de Paseo de la Castellana, cercano a multitud de lugares de interés turistico.
Habitación amplia, exterior, mobiliario vanguardista, soleada, tranquila, con cama de 1,40.
Todo nuevo. Con 2 baños.

Enjoy living in the emblematic neighborhood of Chamberí, with the privilege of being next to Paseo de la Castellana.
Large double room, avant-garde, exterior, bright,
With bed of 1,40. All new. With 2 bathrooms.
neighborhood_overview:
El barrio de Chamberí es un barrio residencial señorial con diversos puntos de interés cultural, como el Museo Sorolla, que ocupa una elegante casa del siglo XIX e incluye una galería de arte. Andén 0 es una estación de metro cerrada que alberga un museo del transporte. En el escenario de los Teatros del Canal se ofrecen flamenco y provocativas obras. Madrileños de todas las edades se congregan en la plaza de Olavide, calle Ponzano y Alonso Cano para tomar tapas y los jóvenes acaban en las exclusivas discotecas de Almagro.

Chamberí is a stately residential neighborhood with various points of cultural interest, such as the Sorolla Museum, which occupies an elegant 19th-century house and includes an art gallery. Andén 0 is a closed metro station that houses a transport museum. Flamenco and provocative plays are offered on the stage of the Teatros del Canal. Madrileños of all ages congregate in the Plaza de Olavide, Ponzano and Alonso Cano street to have tapas and young people

name: Fab penthouse in hip neighbourhood
description:
Spacious penthouse in a charming traditional building with renovated open plan kitchen and bathroom. Fully-furnished and decorated in an industrial vintage style, the apartment is located in one of the coolest neighborhoods in the centre (Justicia).

The space
The penthouse has the charm of an old traditional Madrid building with high ceilings, large windows and tile flooring but with a renovated and recently refurbished kitchen and bathroom. The decoration is inspired in an industrial style. Huertas is more conservative; boutique shops, trendy cafes, famous old bars with tapas. Retiro park and the Prado museum are a 10 minute walk.

neighborhood_overview:
This neighbourhood is buzzing with atmosphere. Traditionally, this was part of Madrid's leafy outskirts, where families lived a quiet routine, everyone knew each-other, with great access to the centre of Madrid in 10 - 15 minutes on public transporte. Today, the neighbourhood retains the family and friendly ambiance, with lots of small local shops for everything from bakeries, and fresh fruit shops to shoe shops, and toy-shops. Many immigrants who moved to Madrid to look for work, move here once they start to have children, so most of the public spaces are full of parks for kids, and colourful out-door vibe, with lots of nationalities and languages.

Inside secrets for locals: A couple of doors away, on the same road, you can find a wonderful old-fashioned "Roast House" that offers home made meals (Delicious roast chicken from a traditional farm), to order. The prices for they "take away" meals are really cheap (old fashioned prices for locals!) and the quality is home made,
host_about: I am a collector of antique embroideries. I was born in Madrid, and often travel for my passion. I rent my apartment in Madrid, for people who like to travel and chase after their passions.

name: Madrid centre rooms in 98m2 appartment
description:
Hello,
There are three free rooms in my 98m2 house and you can have one for the price indicated in the ad or contact me to rent more than one room.
The house is equipped with a spacious and bright living room with a newly renovated kitchen and has two complete bathrooms.
It has everything you need to enter and live comfortably.

The space
This apartment is spacious and grand, characterised by white walls, high ceilings and arches. The property has a very spacious living and dining area. The kitchen is fully equipped with up-to-date appliances. The appartment is 98m2 and is fully equiped. The kitchen has a double fridge, has induction heating and everything needed. There are two livingroom spaces, one with sofas and one with a dining table. The metro is some steps away, Chueca station, and the street is the only perpendicular to Chueca square. The neighbourhood is very lively and charming and has all kinds of restaurants, shops, markets, etc.
neighborhood_overview:
Chueca is one of Madrid's most vibrant areas, well-known for its LGBT friendly atmosphere. There are endless bars, cafés and restaurants to choose from, and you can reach Sol and Malasaña on foot. Chueca, the closest metro station is just 1 minute away for those who need to travel to work.
Chueca: Known for its gay friendliness, Chueca is very lively and friendly for people of all age; lately it has also earned the nickname “SoHo” of Madrid for its New York-feel. The centre of the neighbourhood is Plaza de Chueca and the Mercado de San Antón (just behind Plaza de Chueca), which has a variety of gastronomic offerings from different cuisines. The pedestrian part of Calle Fuencarral runs through this district and is one of the few commercial areas open on Sundays, making it perfect for those who like to do their shopping on the weekends.

Along with Spanish and English, I speak German and Italian.

name: Functional studio in Madrid.
description:
Studio located in one of the commercial districts of Madrid. Cozy decorated to feel like home. Equipped with all appliances, TV, DVD and movies, wifi, a 1.35 bed, air conditioning, hairdryer and first aid kit.

The space
A small and cozy studio, ideal for 1 person in the neighbourhood Argüelles, next to the well-known Princess Street, one minute walk from underground station Arguelles. Fully equipped with all appliances, hairdryer, first aid kit, bed of 1.35, with wifi, TV, DVD and a selection of movies, air conditioning, full kitchen and bathroom with shower.
Although the announcement stated that the studio is perfect for one person, I have no objection to accommodate 2 persons at no additional cost. I am only trying to give priority to those travelers who, for work or pleasure, come to Madrid and their accommodation search is limited since most accommodations are offered for 2 people.

Other things to note
Check in time is between 4 pm
neighborhood_overview: The studio is located in one of the best and most important commercial areas of the capital.  Argüelles is well-known for its strategic location and its college environment. Excellent underground and bus communications. Principal underground stations and bus stops. Range of supermarkets and shops in the area. Moncloa, Plaza de España, Royal Palace, Paseo Pintor Rosales, Temple of Debod, Parque del Oeste and surroundings .... all are just a few examples of the points that make it a priviledge area. Also, very close you can find various points of BICIMAD, service offered by the council which allows you to explore the city by bike.

name: Beautiful 3 bedroom apartment  in José Abascal
description:
In the most exclusive area of the populous neighborhood of Chamberí sits this property, located in an elegant building.

A totally separate entrance – as it rests on a ground floor – gives privacy and uniqueness to this home.

The space
It has a gorgeous flat distribution, which houses three bedrooms, two bathrooms with shower, large living room with kitchen and dining area. Five windows facing ‘José Abascal’  endow fairly warm and pleasant light, especially in the afternoon.

The living area is the heart of the property; it enjoys a seating area consisting of a comfortable sofa and two vintage-style armchairs. An extensive library boats a large format TV and generous space for books and other objects.

The modern kitchen – equipped with large and small household appliances – is fully integrated into the decoration project.
A nice table for 6 connects the kitchen to the living room, providing a good space for meals and meetings.<
neighborhood_overview:
The prestigious ‘Barrio de Chamberí’ is known for its land-marck buildings, small museums with a long history behind, flavor stores (both traditional and recent of well-known firms) and a varied cuisine of excellent quality: bars, cafes and restaurants, which give much life to this traditional district, where a great part of Madrid’s high society settled many decades ago and live now with new and exquisite neighbors, who have found their ‘cup of tea’  in this special environment.

Furthermore, the proximity to the well known ‘Barrio de Salamanca’ (only a few minutes away) makes it even more special.

Sunny living room with 2 balconies heading south, kitchen, bathroom and a double room with a window to a silent block’s central courtyard.

It’s a very bright apartment. You have WiFi

The building is very close to La Cebada Square in the neighborhood of La Latina. This is a protected historic area in the city center with the famous Rastro Market, Plaza Mayor and Puerta del Sol, Parque de las Vistillas and Catedral de La Almudena.

There are a lot of bares and restaurants all around. There is one in particular that you shouldn’t miss: El Eduardo (c/Toledo 105). It’s lpaced just around the corner and you will have free tapas with your drink. If yo
neighborhood_overview:
The streets in this neighbourhood are an illustration of the most popular side of Madrid. This district is much frequented by Madrid locals thanks to its numerous bars, pubs and traditional taverns full of character in streets such as Cava Baja, Cava Alta and right in the squares of La Cebada and La Paja. Although it tends to be very lively all the time, the atmosphere is particularly animated in the evenings and at weekends. Additionally, every Sunday the neighbouring streets are home to Madrid’s famous El Rastro open-air street market.

Another good time to visit this neighbourhood is during the festivities in honour of the Virgin of La Paloma, which take place around 15 August and are some of the most authentic celebrations in Madrid. The streets are filled with cheerful high spirits, there is popular dancing for all, and many madrileños dress up as chulapos and chulapas in the typical regional costumes.

name: Culture & Cuisine in the Centre
description:
What people like most is the location of my flat. In the centre of Madrid, it is walking distance to monumental & cultural Madrid, the old town, but also to the Gran Via and Malasaña for shopping & night life, eating, drinking & music for young and less young!
I offer fresh fruit for breakfast and tea or coffee with toast, homemade jam or honey. If you want to make a sandwich to take out with you, you can keep things in the fridge.

The space
Mi casa forma parte de un edificio que pertenece al Palacio de Líria y es única por ser monumento histórico. Por ubicarse en el centro de Madrid es muy tranquila y la casa es muy soleada.

Guest access
Mis huéspedes tienen acceso a sus habitaciones, el cuarto de baño y cocina. Aunque no permito cocinar, la gente puede preparar un té o un café fuera del horario del desayuno, menos a la hora de comer. De hecho, la cocina es un lugar agradable así que muchas veces los huéspedes se juntan para charl
neighborhood_overview:
Es un barrio variopinto: muchas tiendas de comida y merceria se han convertido en boutiques de tendencias actuales y bares. Hay los de siempre de la caña y tapa pero también hay sofisticados en plan gourmet. Hay también algún club con música.
En el centro cultural Conde Duqu-al lado de mi casa- hay recitales, teatro y exposiciones y también el museo ABC , buen ejemplo de la transformación de una vieja fábric abandonada a un edificio moderno, bonito y útil. Es un barrio con mucha vida y energía y hay algo para todas las edades.

FAMILIES: Very comfortable for 4 adults and some child, it’s actually perfect for families (cozy and at the same time large). It has 2 big beds and a travel crib may be provided if requested in advance. Also a sofa bed for one at the living room

Around Doctor Fourquet Street, which has 15 art galleries sheltered from the Reina Sofia Museum, making it a benchmark of modern and contemporary art in Spain. In the surrounding streets, there are the best known alternative theaters, the Spanish Film Archive and several schools of cinema and theater. Neighborhood very dynamic and cultural environment.

host_about:
Buenos días ,
Me llamo Vladimir y soy estudiante de Relaciones Internacionales , en mi tiempo libre me gusta viajar , ir a actividades culturales , aprender y disfrutar dela capital de España.
En la convivencia soy un chico responsable,ordenado y educado . Le doy gran importancia a la limpieza , no me suele gustar que entre compañeros no  exista relación , es decir soy partidario de fomentar actividades de ir a ( cenar , ver tv, salir  .. etc) .  Destacar que no me hace mucha gracia las mascotas , ya que en la ciudad el tiempo se pasa rápido y todas las mascotas exigen mucho tiempo .
Mis experiencias en el extranjero han sido fantásticas y me gustaría que mi futuro RoomMate viviera lo mismo en Madrid , porque es una ciudad para disfrutarla ! .

description:
Habitacion tranquila, silenciosa en calle Ponzano, luminosa, decorada con gusto WiFi 300-Mb. restaurantes y bares de diseño. Agradable, buen ambiente. Metro Alonso cano. L.7 y Rios Rosas-L.1. Cerca de todo lo mejor de Madrid. Baño,y uso de la cocina.

The space
La habitacion es amplia, confortable, posibilidad de dormir una segunda persona. En el baño la ducha tiene estupenda presion. Posibilidad de usar la lavadora. La cocina de Ikea es pequeña pero con todo lo necesario para una cocina rápida, horno, microondas..etc...El salon es mi espacio pero puede usarse en mi ausencia

Guest access

Chamberi es un barrio de Madrid muy tranquilo y cerca de todo el centro de Madrid que él tambien comparte con mucha solera.
Mi calle Ponzano se ha puesto de moda. Ultimamente se ha llenado de bares, y restaurantes de diseño.Solo con salir de cas
neighborhood_overview:
La calle Ponzano-25 esta en Chamberi. Ultimamente se ha puesto de moda con muchisimos restaurantes y bares. Se puede ir andando a muchisimos sitios de Madrid. la situacion es muy centrica y bien comunicada por metro L. 7 Alonso Cano, y Linea.1 Rios Rosas o Iglesia.Tambien muchos autobuses. Hay un parque estupendo a 5 minutos andando donde puedes correr, pasear o tomar el sol. También un estupendo gimnasio con spa muy cercano.
CHAMBERI es a la vez muy tranquilo y seguro.
host_about:
Hola soy ILDE, me gusta viajar. suelo hacerlo por mi cuenta y soy facilmente adaptable a las situaciones. Me gusta conocer gente y entrar en contacto con la gente local de los sitios que visito. Airbnb me ha dado la oportunidad de magnificas experiencias y espero seguir usandola cuando mi economia me permita volver a viajar de nuevo.
Ahora soy yo el anfitrion y respondere con gusto a mis invitados. 
seguro que nos entenderemos y hallareis en mi todo tipo de información necesaria en esta gran ciudad.

description:
Central apartment at calle Mayor, just beside Plaza Mayor, quiet as it overlooks an internal courtyard.
Master bedroom with two single beds, and a double sofa bed with two single beds as well in the living room.
We provide bed linen, towels, internet, and final cleaning (all inclusive rate)
Well equiped premises with air conditioning, lift available.
We will be pleased to host you, our home is your home.

The space
Unbeatable central location, 3 minutes walking distance to Puerta del Sol and just besides Plaza Mayor.
Modern one bedroom apartment recently decorated.
It can accomodate up to four people (2 single beds in the master bedroom plus 2 pax in the living room in a double sofa bed)
Feel at home with its fully equipped kitchen, Internet access and comfortable furniture.
We do have a lift but there is flight of stairs to get to the lift.
Discounts for medium and long term stays.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
Mayor street is the place to be in down town Madrid, the main street of old historical city center
Located right in the heart of the city it combines its historical charm with a lively atmosphere.
The area is mainly pedestrian, counts on many services, shops, and is close to most of the amenities, all of them within walking distance.
host_about: Entusiasta de Madrid, me gusta pasear por sus calles y observar cómo cambia la ciudad, sus gentes, el paso de las estaciones o simplemente perderme por el centro.
